objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

lg.l: tuhi se tapībaḷa niścaḷa kalu ye āmbhaṁku | 4 |
aneka dānabe ye thile ẏehu bane

lg.note: tuhi se tapa nirmaḷakalu āmbhaṁku |–ṇa, ṭa, gha, ñja

lg.l: tumbhe banabāsa naile kemante marante daita | 10 |
karābanti bibhā ye se śubhalagna bichāri | 13 |
rahile nicinte tahiṁ bañchile māsa tini | 14 |
byāse bāsudeba ye achanti tāṁka tule
tahiṁki āṭhalakṣa tera sahasra baraṣa bhoge | 16 |

lg.note:
trijaṭā tūṇāsena daitapaca nīḷa kapaca mahābīrā
meruśūḷa mūḷe ye aneka duṣṭa asurā |–ja, cha, ṅa
āṭhalakṣa teṣaṭhi sahasra baraṣa ye bhoge |–na, ṭha
pratā kapiḷāra madhye marunāme sambatsara |–na, ṭha

lg.l: bāṇijya nāme karaṇa bhoga ye niẏata | 18 |
ẏehi samaẏe rajatva kale śveta nr̥pa | 19 |
tumbhara byatrake mora āna nāhiṁ tāta
birāṭa rājye dina bañchiba ye agyāṁtabāse | 25 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile hoa ki ẏemanta
rajusi yāgaku paśi na dilu tahiṁra nimantu | 27 |
byāse boile bābu muhiṁ se kapaṭa kali
tote cihnai boli sabhāku paśita na dili | 28 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile se mohora bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya

lg.note: dhr̥ti nāme yoga bhoga tinilitā |–ka, ṭa

byāse boile tote cihnai boli paśite na diḷi
tahiṁra nimante antara karāili |–ka, ṭa
lg.l: byāse boile tumbhe ho kicchihiṁ na jāṇa
yujheṣṭhi debe boile tumbhe bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
sūryyasena boli kumāre tā tahuṁ utapatti | 34 |
jībaghāta na karai rājā toḷi phaḷa na bhmañjai
pāciṇa bhūmire paḍile tāhā āhāra karai | 39 |
dharmahuṁ anīti se na karai rāẏe
jagujība śiba boli rājā gaja aśvantana caḍhi | 41 |

lg.note: haiheẏa baṁśe bitrama keśarī |–gha, ṇa

lg.l: nabadvīpa sapata sāgara karai rāẏe sādhi | 44 |
āstānara taḷe rājā yāi kalā taśasahasra praṇipatya | 49 |
jagata karatā nātha svāmī daṇḍe abadhārī hoibā
muhiṁ yāga karibi mote yāganika jaṇe debā | 50 |
tu ho baśiṣṭha yāa śveta maharāja yagyeṁ
tu ho yāganika mote kalu, kāhiṁ tora ghr̥ta | 53 |
46|1 paśu janmaṭhāru kīṭa pataṅga pariyante |–ṇa, na, ṭha

div.note: tu ye yāganika māgilu mohora kāryyakalu naṣṭa |–gha, ṭha, na, tha

lg.l: tu yebe rājā pāribu ghr̥ta aṇṭāi
āmbhanta bara svarge basa mukata hoiyāi | 55 |
ratnajharī dharai rajā baśiṣṭhāṁka caraṇa pakhāḷi
puṣpa gandha candana dhupa dīpa naibedya
aneka binonti rājā ratnamāḷi dilā hr̥da | 58 |
ghr̥ta samudraku khaṭilā pañchadaśa baraṣa pariyante | 62 |
yehne bāñcchā siddha hoiba tora kāryya | 63 |
bho ghr̥ta samudra mote prasanna hoibā
muhiṁ yāga karibi ghr̥ta mote debā | 64 |
ghr̥ta samudra boilā baśiṣṭhara megha srohākāṭhi
baraṣibi yāga saribāyāẏe yeteka tāku aṇṭi | 66 |

div.note: ẏekabarṣa pariyante yagyāṁkara tuhi |–kha, ṭha, na
aneka binoẏīrāẏe manare sānanda |–kha, na, ṭha

lg.l: yāga āropaṇa kalā caubiṁśa baraṣa prati | 69 |
śagaḍa tumbha pramāṇe megha baraṣanti ghr̥tadhāra | 70 |
agnira śikhā hāde uṭhilā sapata brahmāṇḍa gheni | 71 |
lobheṇa ghr̥ta tahiṁ ye khāile baśyānara
ludubudu byādhi helā satya tretā dvāpara pariyante
ye yisa bhakṣai kahākuhiṁ nāhiṁ pāra
pitāmaha boile brahmāṇḍa pure basilu ho śveta

div.note: pilohā byāpilā byādhi hoilā asusthe |–na, kha

deba manuṣya saburi garbheagni
agni debatāṁka teja hoilāka hāni |–ṇa, ka, ṭa
brahmāpure basāile debatāmāne |–gha, kha, na, ṭha

lg.l: āmbhara debakāryya acchi janama hoa mañche
aneka godhana gheni hoasi kṣīra ādhāri | 79 |
se yujheṣṭhiṁka sebānte mukata hoi tote | 81 |
bābu śvetaraja puṇi basilā mañcha brahmāṇḍe
tohora nimante jāta se hoilā madhyakhaṇḍe | 82 |
baḍai dhārmika se śveta tāhāku na ninda | 83 |
yujheṣṭhi boile se yebe ẏeḍe gyāṁnabanta rājā
muhiṁ tāhāṁka caraṇe karibiṭi ki pūjā | 85 |
byāse boile tu nirañjana sārikṣe debā
yujheṣṭhi deba boile ẏe pāñchāḷī jighnasenī
dvārikā bhmabanaku ẏehāṁku jagannāthe yāntu gheni | 87 |
byāse boile bābu tu kimpe kahu ẏemanta
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile byāse na yāntu dropatī
tu deba sakaḷa bhūta jagata adhikārī
kebaṇa tote agocara tu kāhā na jāṇu
baḍai dr̥bhāra se pr̥thīki helā mahbhārā | 92 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boiel yebe yibe dropatī
ẏe kemante dina bañchibe thibe kāhāra ye kati | 95 |
byāse boile bābu se birāṭai pāṭarāṇī
biśvāmitraṁka śāpye rākṣasa hoi baśiṣṭhaṁka śateputra kalā se bhakṣabhojā | 98 |
baḍāi pratāpī se aṭai sundara rākṣasa

div.note: kutūhoḷī puruṣa tu sarba parimāṇu |–na, kha, ṇa
kaḷipāda baṁśe kaḷipādhi gotrī rājā |–ja, cha, gha

lg.l: ẏehāra nandana hoila ye durānteka baḷī | 103 |
baḍa bibādī rāja anubarate sājai parathāṭha | 106 |
kaḷapi deśara rājā kāḷa ye naumi
bairāṣṭa paẏāṇa kala tāhāra thāṭha gheni | 107 |
bairāṣṭa nr̥pati ye bhājilā raṇa teji
kaḷapi rajāra saini tāhākaiṁ yābate beḍhilā | 111 |
padmeka yoddhā gheniṇa kāḷa ye naumi
bairāṣṭa rājāṁku beḍhilā konta khaḍaga gheni | 112 |
ẏekā ghāntike prahāra kalā aśilakṣa kontakāra | 113 |

div.note: sudeṣṇā bhārijā tāra aṭai garuhaṁsā |–ṭha, na, kha
ẏekā ghāntike prahāra kalā kontaśara | ṭha, na

lg.l: aneka saini tule padile bahuta senāpati | 114 |
hastā nakṣatra ye rātra pāñchadaṇḍa ghaṭi | 119 |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa barīẏāna nāme yoga
amr̥ta lagana ye tahiṁ māhīndra nāme beḷā
bandī mukata karāiṇa rajye karāilā utsaba | 122 |
paṇḍita kṣetre kendra pāde dekhile br̥haspati | 123 |
beni karasthaḷe śohe śagkhanidhi padmanidhi cihna
teṇu se putrara nāma dileka birāṭa | 125 |
mahata dhārmika se rājā aṭai saṁkocana
se bāḷaka goṭika pāḷilā kari ati yatana | 126 |

div.note: paṇḍita candrama pāde thile br̥haspati |–ṭha, na

lg.l: kañchana nāmeṇa hāde ye ẏekai maharuṣi
tāhāṁku bhagati kalā se saṁkocana rāṇī
aruṇa mañji śatagoṭi dile tāhāṁku āṇi | 128 |
ẏehākaiṁ grāsa tuhi karasi go māẏe
putrara janama śuṇi se kañchana maharuṣi
tohora parasāde muni mora śate putra jāta | 134 |
dekhiṇa mahātamā ye parama sānanda hoile
takṣaṇe boile tohora heu śatesiṁghara baḷa | 137 |

div.note: saṁkocana nāmeṇa ye ẏekai maharuṣi |–gha, ṇa, ja
kañchana manasija boli ẏekai maharuṣi |–kha, na
nirāśī brahmabettā agastaṁkara śiṣi |–na, gha, ja, ñja

lg.l: ghana ghana rudhira bahilā nāsikāra bāṭe
ẏekasiṁghara prakarme tote prābhaba karu bhīma | 142 |
byāse boile bābu śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
maḷaẏa basanta tule se peṣile menakā | 145 |
dekhiṇa mohita hoile se biśvamitra tapaniṣṭhi | 146 |
bhagnatapa hoiṇa ruṣi dhaile tāku koḷe
manohara bane menakāku śr̥ṅgāra kale baḷe | 147 |
se amoha retuṁ kanyāẏe hoilāka jāta
bāsaba debata tāku dekhi mahābhaẏa kalā | 149 |
bāsaba debatā boile tule yāa mañchapura
saṁkocana rājā ghare yāiṁ tu huasi abatāra | 150 |

div.note: abaśya kīcake bhīmara hoiba bheṭābheṭi |–ka, ṇa |
śakuntaḷā nāma tāku dileka bidhāta |–ka, ñja, kha

lg.l: bairāṣṭa kumāra ye pradāna heu toe | 151 |
jāṇiṇa gopyāna tu ye karibu sarbakathā
byāse boile bābu tu ẏethaku āna bichāra nakara mane
praḷambita hoi yujheṣṭhi puṇa pucchanti byāsaṁkara pāśa | 158 |
byāse boile śuṇa ho dharma yujheṣṭhi

div.note: śrīkr̥ṣṇā–sudeṣṇā |
teṇu se saṁkocana koḷe ye hoicchi utapanna |–ṭha, na, kha
byāse boile bābu ẏethaku tu bhrānti karamane |–ka, ga, ṇa

lg.l: bābu birāṭara pitāku ye kāḷanaumi badhakalā
garbhabāsa hoi tāra gharaṇi paḷāi ailā | 162 |
bābu maghadeśe matsadeśe yebe karāi pāribu rājā
lakṣerājā mukhe bābu pāibuṭi bahuta pūjā | 166 |
baḍāi sambhare rāja tāku dilaka duhita | 167 |
dui sāgara pādānti ye batiśa goṣṭha gāī
beni bhaṇḍāra rājā tāku yautuka dei | 170 |
goṣṭhaka kete gāī kahibā muni tathya | 172 |
kicchi dili nāhiṁ boli rājā ye kahilā | 174 |

div.note: pāñcha parāẏudha turaṅgama naba parāẏudha padānti |–ka, ca, ṭa

lg.l: aneka rājya maṇḍaḷa se sādhilā bhmajabaḷe | 176 |
bābu birāṭaku basā yā tāhāra rājye nei | 177 |
se mohora tahiṁ ye paśilā śaraṇa
tu tāhāku bābure karā yā kāraṇa | 178 |
samadaṇḍa gheni kīṁcaka bāhilā magha matsadeśa | 179 |

div.note: kurumāna boliṇa ye ẏekai parabate |–na, ṭha, kha

lg.l: se parbata upāḍi se dhailā nijakare
yesa neke triẏe dhari bulābanti gadābare | 187 |
śate sahasra senā ye paḍile mahīloṭi | 188 |
keśa dhariṇa kīñchaka ye chāpoḍe prahāri
ratha gaja aśva tini sāgara saini
sadhaka puruṣa nātha jaẏa tu abadhūtā | 198 |
kheḷanta siṁgha jāṇi na jāṇu rātradibā
ādi anta madhya tuhi se ādi debā | 199 |

div.note: rātradina saṁgrāma hoilā abiśrāma |–ga, tha, gha, ṇa, ka
pāṣāṇa girire bijaẏe matsaindra nāthe |–kha, ṭha, na

lg.l: śūnya āsane svāmī koṭi brahmāṇḍa ghoṭi
śata tiriśi mudrāẏe ye samaẏeka byāpi | 200 |
ananta siddha ye tuhi matsainda nāthe
(hīna samaẏa) anukāḷa bañchāilu nātha lokeśvara jitā
nirantare sebā muṁ ye māgai paramayogī
pabana āpyāne yāhāra aneka kāḷa bhogī | 205 |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa śatasahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi | 207 | | 207 |

div.head:
{@birāṭara maghadeśa prāpti,
pañchapāṇḍabaṅkara chadmarūpa dhāraṇa
o
śamībr̥kṣa ḍatmatti, tāhāra troṭare
astraśastra rakṣaṇa o pañchapāntabaṅkara
guptabeśa dhāraṇa kari rahibāra mantraṇā@}

lg.l: svāmī matsyaindra nātha tu ye sadaẏe yogeśvara
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye matsyaindra nātha mahābhoḷā
nāthaṁkara tahuṁ khasi paḍilā akṣala akṣaẏa jaẏamāḷā | 2 |
macchadeśe thāā tu samasta gheni saini | 6 |
byāse boile bābu yujheṣṭhi pūrba ẏehenneka sañchā
tuhi ẏebe agyāṁtabāsa tahiṁre thāi bañchā | 7 |
byāse boile se kaḷapi deśara rāẏe
daṇḍabhagna dekhiṇa se thāṭha gheni āẏe | 9 |
aśi parārddha sanya ye sabiheṁ mukuṭa bandhā
maghadeśe māḍi basilā maccha deśara sārabhūmi | 11 |
kaḷapi deśa rājā deba maghadeśe acchi rahi | 12 |
ubhaẏa baḷa saina hoile yāiṁ bheṭa | 14 |
na ghañchanti saini nuhanti kehi bhaṅga | 15 |
rātra dibānteṇa ye biśrāma nāhiṁ kicchi
ye yāhāra samara karanti baḷa āñchi | 16 |
sahasre sahasre bhāra luhā gadā gheni

div.note: biśāśate koṭi sanya samaste aśvayoddhā |–ba, cha, ñja
bīrabhadrānadī tīre achanti benithāṭha |–na, ṭha, kha, cha
na bhāñjanti saini baḍa sambhare rahichanti |–ka, gha

lg.l: ye abā leuṭi nārāja bindhai tahiṁ rahi
lohasāra gadā dhari kāḷa ye naumi
lohasāra gadā paḍi tāra aṅga hoilā śatecūra | 30 |
gadā bhaga dekhiṇa se pāila mahābhaẏe
āre āre boli hākai kīcaka senāpati

div.note: pratagyāṁ sāmartha se kṣatriẏa achārgaḷa |–ja, cha, na, ca

lg.l: dra yodhanara tahiṁ śaraṇa ye paśilā turita | 37 |
byāse boile bābu ẏemanta macchadeśa purī
bābu bairāṣṭa upara baṁśe harikeśara nr̥apti
sadaẏe bara tāku yācile parama yogī
kharbeka aṇḍira bacchā pāñchalakṣa acchi maī | 43 |
prathame cire cire duhiṁ ye pakānti bhūmiki
kaṭaka beḍhi kṣīranadī bahuthāi sāta ghaḍiki | 44 |
ẏesanaka sampada bābu se matsarāja purī
ẏe mr̥tumaṇḍaḷeheṁ se rājyaku kehi nāhiṁ samasari | 45 |
bābu ẏeka dineka yebe rahiba macchapurī
śarīre pāpa na thiba tāra chaḍamāsa sari | 46 |

div.note: kirātara nandana ye paḷāilā trigartta |–ja, cha, ca, ta, ṭha, ñja
ẏe mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe rājā hoi kehi nāhiṁ sari |–gha, ṇa, ṭha

lg.l: pāṇḍaba pañchu bīre ye dropatī sahite | 48 |
gahana ghora aṭabya se kehita na jāṇi | 49 |
karuṇākara boli ye ẏekai batā taḷe
tebe se bhrāthe draśana karibe āstānara | 53 |
svāmī tumbhara ye birāṭa na jāṇai parakr̥ti
āmbhara bākya śuṇi bābu chāri ye pāṇḍaba | 55 |
samaste tumbhe thiba birāṭa rājye gopya hoi
ye aba matsyadeśe dropatīṁki boliba anīti
gupate nāśiba tāha jāṇantā nohi kehi
jīṇantā heu pache tahiṁki birodha nāhiṁ | 58 |

div.note: bahai uttarabahinī ye gaṇḍukī nadī phuṭi |–ña, ja, ka, ca, cha
abaśya nāśiba tāha thiba tumbha mati |–ṭa, gha, ka

lg.l: se kathā mote lāgilā muṁ hoibi pratibādī | 59 |
athaba ẏehāku prakāśa kariba ye yadi
byāse boile birāṭe kopa na karibu bhīma
ẏe kathā śuṇi mauna hoile chārijaṇa
ẏethaku he jagannāthe āmbhe tohora śaraṇa | 66 |
tuhi ye rakṣā nātha karibu sarbakāḷa | 67 |
āmbhara bhārā deba na sahai medinī
mago pāñchāḷī tu śrīkr̥ṣṇāku karithibu seba | 69 |
māgo mahata janaku ye paḍai pramāda
sahi pārile parama paṇḍita huai labhai parama pada | 70 |

div.note: tāhā bināśa tumbhe karibaṭi mattagarbā |–tha, gha, ña
kemante birāṭa sahibaṭi prabhmapaṇa gheni |–ca, cha, ja, na, tha

māgo mahata janaku ye paḍai bipatya
sahile se hoi parama paṇḍita |–ka, ṭa, gha, tha

lg.l: tu mātra laẏe na chāḍibu āmbhanta catrapāṇi | 71 |
tohora prasāde hari bañchibu āmbhe kāli | 72 |
yujheṣṭhi dhabaḷa barṇṇa diśile pāṇḍura barṇṇa | 75 |
kiṁśuka puṣya paraẏe tāra śarīra prakāśi | 76 |
nakuḷa śvarīra ye śuddha subarṇṇa barṇṇa
lohita tambā jāṇi diśila mādrīra nandana | 78 |
kuṁkuma barṇṇa jāṇi diśilā tāra śarīra tra baḷī | 79 |

div.note: tu mātra daẏā karithabu catrapāṇi |–ṇa, ṭa
tuhi puṇi āmbhanta na chāḍibu catrapāṇi |–da, kha, na, ṅa
tohora sudaẏāre bañchibu āmbhe kāli |–jha, gha, na, ṭha
kehi bāri nuāribe tumbhara bana mr̥tti |–ka, ga, na, ṭha

arjuna śarīra ye nīḷautpaḷa kanti
nidāgha sūryya jāṇi diśai tāra jyoti |–kha, na

sahadebara śvarīra surabhi puṣya ḍhaḷi
kanakarucira prāẏe śarīra tāhara jhaḷi |–na, ja, kha, ca, ṭha, ñja

lg.l: ẏekā mantrake saburi barṇṇamāna ye leuṭi | 81 |
adr̥śya uluka bidyā gohana mantra beni
ẏesaneke aneka mate se pāṇḍabanta tiāri
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku ye nārāẏaṇa bacana parakāśi
āmbhe bije karuachu gheni byāsa maharuṣi | 84 |
ẏete boli antarīkṣe gale deba garuḍa ārohī | 85 |
śūnyeṇa rahiṇa se beniẏe dekhuchanti ẏekadr̥ṣṭi | 86 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile āmbhara bola śuṇa
ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍara dhana acchi lāga
bhūmire thoile ta pr̥thī na sahiba

div.note: adr̥śya ghoḍiṇa bidyā gohana mantra beni |–tha, ga
pāṇḍabanta śikhāile deba catrapāṇi |–ka, kha, ña
pr̥thīre thoile ta bāsuki kāndiba |–ka, ga
jaḷe thuanteṇa nebe baruna nr̥pabare |–kha, ṇa

lg.l: gariṁkara rājā ye aṭai acaḷa caḷa meru
ẏe baḍāi saṁkaṭa mote paḍilā bāsudebe | 92 |
ẏe śahasra thiel āmbhe gopya hoibāka kāhiṁ | 93 |
ẏe maha durāpada kathā ho pucchibā kāhāku
āgahuṁ na pucchilāiṁ āmbhe byāsa bāsudebaṁku | 94 |
yujheṣṭha deba haraṣa hoile tāhā śuṇi

div.note: ciñjaranti dharma nandana samastaṁka mukha chāhiṁ |–kha, na, tha, cha, ña
“ẏe śahasra thile āmbhe gopya hoibāka kāhiṁ” ẏehi sthānare ‘kha’ adhikā adhikā pātha :–
śrīhari boile tumbhe dharmarāja
sahadebe pachāri kariba sarba kāryya |
āmbhe yāuachuṁ ẏebe dvārābatī purī
garuḍa ārohī caḷigale debahati |
byāsadeba caḷile ye badrikā āśreme
dhaumya purohite bijekale anyasthāne |
agsti bolanti śuṇa manu narapati
ẏethu anantare pāṇḍabe kale yisa rīti |

lg.l: madhyare bistīrṇṇa tāhāra achai ẏeka troṭe | 100 |
ẏesaneka kari se br̥kṣa sañchilā sarbasācī | 104 |
yujheṣṭhi debe āśriyya hoile tāha chāhiṁ
bābu ẏeheneka sañchita re karithilu kāhiṁ | 105 |
bābu baḍāi āśrijyare aṭai ẏe br̥kṣa
śuṇite icchā mohora kaha re bibatsa | 106 |
ẏe br̥kṣara caritra muṁ kahai upāẏe | 107 |

div.note: dhabaḷa nīḷabarṇna diśai dibyajyoti |–jha, ña

lg.l: sācibaṭa tale se māninī rūpa dhari | 113 |
pārbatī sārikṣe ye tāhāra rūpa goṭi
śr̥ṅgāre bhoḷā se aṭai parama yogī
puruṣa baśa bidyā jāṇai se rākṣasi | 120 |
kapiḷāsa pure bije na kale deba suḍhaḷe | 121 |

div.note: sācībaṭa taḷe se mānabī rūpa dhari |–ṇa, ca, tha, ñja, gha
pārbatī sārikṣe diśe tāra rūparāśi |–na, ṭa, ṭha

lg.l: bābu gaṅgāra mandire abā īśvara chanti rahi
aneka bimukha debī hoile bāṭa chāhiṁ | 123 |
kugyāna kūmantra se jāṇai asurī aparṇṇā | 124 |
svarga mañcha bhmabana na pāile loḍikari | 126 |
svāmī kakaḍā māsa śukaḷa pañchamī aṭai
ẏe dina kaiḷāse kr̥ṣṇa saṅge thili yāi 127 |
īśvare kāhiṁ chanti dekhila ki jagannāthe

div.note:
“aneka kāḷa bāṭa chāhanti girijā”
ehi pāṭha pare ‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
kebaṇa upāẏe karibā kahare nandīkeśara
tu jāṇuki kebaṇa ṭhāre rahiachanti śūḷadhara |
nandīkeśara boilā māgo na jāṇai muhiṁ
ẏekasare īśvare gale kāhāku na kahi |
ẏemanta śuṇi pārbatī ye aneka bikaḷa
naẏanayugmaṁ lotaka bahai ḍhaḷahaḷa |
kugyāna kumantra se jāṇai asurī anapūrṇṇā |–ga, na, cha, ṭha

lg.l: māgo hiraṇākṣī rākṣasī to īśvaraṁku mohilā | 134 |
pārbatī rūpa dhariṇa ye mohilā rākṣasī | 136 |
lakṣe yojanakaiṁ boli śara ye sampādi | 138 |
bābu tu kṣatrī aṭu bīra dhanurjaẏe
arjunara śara bhedilā yojana lakṣa lakṣa
hr̥dagate paḍi nārāja piṭhi katiki galā kaṇṭi
gajaṇa rākṣāsuṇī ye pañchutāḷa uñche uṭhi | 143 |
īśvara dekhinte ye dahana tāra kāẏe
asthi carma māṁsa na rahilā nārājara ghāẏe | 144 |
dekhiṇa āśra jya ye hoile mahāmāẏe
boile phālaguni dhanya dhanya tora kāẏe | 146 |
atihiṁ ānanda hele īśvaraṁku pāśe chāhiṁ | 147 |
pārbatīṁka sahite āmbhe ye hoilu praṇapatya | 148 |
pārbatī sārikṣe asurī rūpa diśilāka mote | 149 |
se andhāra ghora bhmabana diśilā kapiḷāsa svarga jāṇi
mohora gyāna nāhiṁ se pure thilā pichāśuṇī | 150 |

div.note: astha carma māṁsa tāra kicchi na dekhile debarāẏe |–ka, ga, ṇa, jha, gha, tha

“asthi carma māṁsa na rahilā nārājara ghāẏe”
pare ‘ṭha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–|
īśvaraṁka āge tāra yāāne jībana
śibaṅkara tuṭilā tā māẏā bndhana |
tahuṁ mane paḍigalā kailāśa nagarī

lg.note: umā boile sādhu sādhure dhanurjaẏe |–ka, ṇa, ga, tha
lg.l: bhagati mahimāṁ tāra kahite ki pāri
īśvare boile pāṇḍaba jībana tora dhani
mohora koḷe thāiṁ asurīra galā jaḷi | 154 |
nāhiṁ nāhiṁ kṣatrī ẏe tini bhmabana svarga
guṇasāgara pāṭha bīra abhaẏe bara māga | 155 |
ẏe āmbhara satya satya debuṁ phāḷaguni | 156 |
pārbatī boileka bara māga kinā pātha
śuṇa ho manurāẏe badanti agasti munibara
arjuna boile svāmī kisa bara māgibi
puṇa puṇa janmiṇa ta nohibi trijībi | 159 |
lg.note:
“śarīra bahiṇa ke āsibāka uburi”
pare ‘ka’ potire adhikā pāṭha |–
bhagatira mahamāṁ kahite na jāṇi
puruṣabaśa mantrabidyā se jāṇai mohinī |
puruṣa deha dhari ke āsiba uburi
mohinī rūpa dhari se bahilā caturī |
samāsyā–bacana
lg.l: arjuna boilā svāmī ẏemanta bāñcchā karai
svāmī agyāṁtabāsa boli āmbhaṁku dharmara kaṣaṇa
ḍāhāṇa bhmajuṁ keśaba bāhāra kale śroṇi | 163 |
īśvare boile tora yetebeḷe paḍai kāryya
svāmī śamībr̥kṣa ardhaaṅga ye sadāśibara kāẏe
dhātāra chāri badana ye br̥kṣara chariḍaḷa | 169 |
svāmī madhyeṇa kroṭeka acchi pratakṣe girijā

lg.note: pāñcha bhāiṁka śahasra br̥kṣe thoibuṭi | ñja, na, kha, cha
sadanandara bibhūti pārbatīra maḷi |–na, ṇa
benikare dhari deba bhiāile br̥kṣagoṭi |–jha, ca, ṭa, na, ja

lg.l: āna ke sahi pāribaṭi ẏe śasaṁkara bhāra | 171 |
arjuna kahile muṁ ḍaḷe yāiṁ uṭhai
bhīmasena ṭhākure baḍhāi diantu thoibi troṭe nei | 173 |

lg.note: nabatāḷa utsarge yāiṁ lagilā phālaguni |–ka, ṇa, ga, tha, gha
śatetāḷa utsarga se bhīmasenara kaẏe |–ka, ṇa, ga
sarbajana tāraṇa tu atu br̥kṣa beni |–ṇa, ga

“praḷaẏa uttāraṇa tu kaḷapi mahābrahmi” pare
‘ka’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
saṁsāra thambha droṇaguru bheṭi
mahāyoga br̥kṣaku bheṭile yujheṣṭhi |
harihara abatāra aṭai se br̥kṣa
tebe se sahasra bahi pārile gariṣṭha |
yebana sahasra sahi nuārai pr̥thī
se br̥kṣa tahiṁ cchedile prajāpati |

lg.l: gaganaku śikhā pātāḷaku pāñcha yojana kaṇṭi | 180 |
śrī bāñcchabaṭa tu mahata br̥ṣa śamī
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi | 182 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu śamībr̥kṣara mahimāṁ
se br̥kṣare basi nabasr̥ṣṭi bhiāilā bedabrahmā | 184 |
ẏe chāripakṣī puṇa br̥kṣara ḍaḷare thāānti
ẏekā dhanure lāgiacchi bābu bāāna koṭi bhaṇḍāra dhana | 187 |
na puṇa haraṇa karanti ẏe ratnākaiṁ lobhe | 188 |
subuddhi sodarare kemante hoiba ẏe rakṣā | 189 |
arjuna boilā ẏethaku deba na kara cintā
baḍa baḷabanta puruṣeka se achai rakhantā | 190 |
sehi khaḍi gheni lekhana kalāka pituḷī
sehi pituḷī bidāri bāhāra hoilā pracaṇḍa baḷī | 191 |
lg.note: puruṣeka rakṣā kariba se baḍāi baḷabantā |–ṇa, ba
se pituḷi bidāri bāhāra gandharba pracaṇḍa baḷī |–ca, ña
lg.l: kara caraṇa nāhiṁ ye nāhiṁ tāra muṇḍa
peṭa piṭhi nāhiṁ aṁga meda mr̥tupiṇḍa | 192 |
ẏe rakṣā karithibaṭi agyāṁtabāsa saribā yāẏe | 193 |
yujheṣṭhi debe hasile bhīmasena mukha chāhiṁ
bābu ẏehenneka parapañcha dekhilāta āmbhara nāhiṁ | 194 |
āre muhiṁ aṭai dharmapuruṣa yathārtha prakr̥ti
hātha sukeh paśākheḷi harāili rājya ye bibhūti | 195 |
āre mote khatāuṇī nimante tohora ẏeḍe chaṭā
śahasranta rakhiba kemante ẏe mr̥tupiṇḍa goṭā | 196 |
samasta gopyana kala ẏe saṁsāra janahite | 197 |
svāmī śira kandha nāsā śrabaṇa chāri caraṇa hoile
arjuna ta laẏe kari cintilā bkṣasthaḷe
br̥kṣara upare bulilā se tambācatra prāẏe | 200 |
badana bihune se chāḍilā ghora raḍi
mr̥kṣāgata hoi paḍile chāri ye pāṇḍaba | 202 |
lg.note: yujheṣṭhi debe hasile arjuna mukha chāhiṁ |–cha, ja, ṭha, na, ja, kha
br̥kṣare bulilā se kurāḷa catra prāẏe |–ja, ṭa
sthābara jaṅgama kīṭa pataṅga paḍilāka jhaḍi |–ṇa, gha, jha, ga

lg.l: śūnye bihantā puruṣe rahi nuārile ākaśe | 203 |
āu raḍiẏe dile niśce chāḍante jībati | 205 |
yujheṣṭhi debe pucchākale ẏeta baḍāi durlabha
ẏe mr̥tupiṇḍa bābu ke aṭai pūrbagarbha | 207 |
kara caraṇa nāsikā rūpa nāhiṁ kicchi
arjuna boile svāmī muṁ yebana beḷe gali svarge
sundara paṇe ẏehāku bāsabara baḍāi sadha | 213 |
lg.note: tetiśa koti debatāẏe pāile mane trāse |–ṭha, ja, cha, na, ba, kha, ca
yahuṁṇa mukhe jaḷa siñchile arjuna |–kha, ga, ṇa, ka, ṭa
kaṇaẏapraśura nandana nīra rutudhvaja |–ka, gha, jha

lg.l: ye yāhāra padārthamāna āṇi bidyādharanta dili | 217 |
svāmī pracantabaḷī gandharba mote koḷakari dhari
boila bara māga pātha nāśalu mo dārā bairi | 218 |
muhiṁ boili svāmī yebe mote debu bara
agyaṁta banabāsa baraṣe teradina mora śasranta rakṣākara | 219 |
se pracaṇḍabaḷī boilā bābu tohora kāryyakāḷe
mohora raḍighāte kehi na āsibe kati | 222 |
bābu birāṭa rājyeṇa ta rahibā gupate
bhīmasena boilā deba cintā na kara āmbhara kathaku
yisa tisa kahile āmbhaṁku nāhiṁ doṣa
mithyā kathā kahi dina bañchibu abyāṁtabāsa | 227 |
svāmī styahuṁ mithyā ye nuāsai tumbhara bākye
yujheṣṭhi boile tu āmbhaṁtu na kara cintā
birāṭaku satyahuṁ āmbhe na kahibuṁ mithyā | 229 |
pūrbara lekhana meṇṭaṇa na yāiṭi karma | 232 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile yāhā kahilure bhāi
dharmeṇa yebaṇa kathā acchi kahibi tukuiṁ | 233 |
tu ye boilu bhīma rātreka dibaseka

lg.note:
yebaṇa hiṁ bāge kahile āmbhanta na karai nāśa
mithyā kahile dina haribuṁ agyāṁ tabāsa |–ka, ṇa
lg.l:
231|2 “hāribā jiṇimā ho satyeka micheka”
pare ‘ka, ga, ṇa’ pothire alagā pāṭha :–

div.note: candreka sūryyeka dharmeka adharmeka
ghyāṁteka agyāṁteka paṇḍiteka apaṇḍiteka |
bhaleka mandeka śubheka aśubheka
haraṣeka biraseka sampadeka bipadeka |
kīrtta akīrtti ẏemanta achai aneka
ẏethira madhyare ye achai bichāraka |
sarūpa kari mote kahibā deba dharma |–ka, ṇa, ga

lg.l: tu ye boilu bhīma tirīẏeka puruṣaẏeka
tu ye boilu bhāi pāpeka puṇyeka
tu ye boilu bhīma candreka sūryyaka
tahiṁra madhye acchi tārā ye asaṁkhyeka | 237 |
tu ye boilu bhīma satyeka micheka
kebaṇa upāẏe hoiba nāma ye pālaṭa | 239 |
dharma bichāri ātme kontabhaṭa(?) nāma bahibu | 240 |
kontabhojara nandinī kointā mātā āmbhara yugate
svāmī arthakuhiṁ hārilu guṇaku heḷa aṭa
samānye pūjā tumbhaṁku kemante kariba birāṭa | 243 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho chāriheṁ tumbhe śuṇa
bhīmasena boilā bābu uṭha ho arjuna
ātmā bitre hoiluṁ bhāi bhārijā sahita | 248 |
duje paśā kheḷi hārilu rājya bhaṇḍāra | 250 |
puṇa se paśā kheḷine birāṭa saṅgara | 251 |
ẏeghānti kisa hoibaṭi dhana dharma hiṁ ta nāhiṁ
prāṇaghāta hoibā ki ẏehi paśāra pāiṁ | 252 |
ucita paśākheḷare ke acchi āmbhanta sari
paśā chāḍi acchiki āna ye upāẏe | 257 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ki āu acchi āna buddhi
sāmānye basibāku ẏehā muṁ acchi sādhi | 258 |

div.note: trailokye ke acchi ho āmbhaṁku jiṇantā |–ca, cha, ja
āmbhe na basile ho rājāra āstāne |–ga, ja

lg.l: bhīmasena badana chāhiṁ badaẏanti dharma nr̥pati | 262 |
tohora kathaku re bhīma mohora baḍa cintā
tinibeḷe bhmañjile tote na aṇṭa tiniṣāṭhi pauti | 264 |
bhikṣā māgile ta bhikṣā diantā kehi nāhiṁ
samaste bhaẏa karanti tora batra naẏanakaiṁ chāhiṁ | 265 |
paṇḍita dhārmika nohu na jāṇu kaṭa chanda
yeṇe yāu teṇe anubrate karu dvanda | 266 |
bābu kaṇaẏaparbata jāṇi diśai tora kāẏe
ẏehā gopya karibuṭi tu kebaṇa upāẏe | 267 |
bhīmasena boilā deba achai mora buddhi
muhiṁ sūpakāra hoibi jāṇai agni rānddha | 268 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile tu kisa abā randdhabu
tukui se bhojana hoiba ānaku kisa debu | 270 |

div.note:
prakr̥timāna tumbhara na jāṇima matsanāhā
tumbhaṁku śāntikari kahiba bākya kāhā |–ja, ca, cha
tinibeḷa bhmañjile ẏehimati prati prati |–gha, ṭa
tinibeḷa bhmañjile ẏehimati prakr̥ti |–ka, ga

lg.l: sabu sūpakāra chaḍāi muṁ hoibi ẏekajaṇa | 271 |
sabunti chaḍāi birāṭa ye ẏekā deba mote | 272 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile re kebaṇa guṇa tohora
hāṇḍire ye gāḍi deba basāile cūlire
ẏehanneka bidhāne deba jāṇai muhiṁ rānddha
yujheṣṭhi deba boile ẏeta gaurī saurī naḷabidhi | 276 |
ẏeḍeka mahiṁmā tora āmbhaṁku śuṇilāta nāhiṁ
ẏe tiniprati rāndhaṇā bābu pāilu kāhiṁ | 277 |
ẏe tiniprati rāndhaṇā mote kahilu doharā agni | 278 |
yujheṣṭhi debe kahile tohara kebaṇa bhagata
thokāẏe dine agnire tu karu āṁchobana | 281 |
āmbhe aneka binoẏī bahuta prakāre agniki karithāu sebā
ghr̥ta āhuti dei binoẏī rātra dibā | 282 |
dekhi nuārilu agni debatāṁka nija mr̥tti
rāndhaṇā pāka deba bhakṣaṇa karai muhiṁ nitye | 284 |
anna meñjana muṁ ye bhmañjai ardha ardha
pāñchadinara pua muṁ bhojana ku ẏeḍe sadha | 285 |
kointāẏe kahile ye paṇḍu rājāṁkara pāśe
svāmī maḍhaphuli yogāḍa na thāi ardhaśeṣe | 286 |
ke ẏehā ādhāra karai ye basi niti
śuṇiṇa paṇḍu rājā tabada prāẏe hoi
se kathāku manare pratye na kale gosāiṁ | 288 |
andhāra mandire ye paṇḍu rājā chanti basi
śayyā yugatuṁ ye uṭhaṇa muhiṁ āsi | 291 |
āre duṣṭa kumara pakāibi tote hāṇi | 294 |
rāgeṇa phiṅgi pakānte muṁ paḷāili turite | 295 |
muhiṁ āge paḷāi pache paṇḍu ye nr̥pati
agni debatā brāhmaṇa sarūpa hoi pache goḍāi achanti | 296 |
nisate paḷāili banaste yojana śata chāri | 297 |

div.note: pāñcha baraṣara pua bhojanaku ẏeḍe sadha |–ña, ka

lg.l: leuṭi chāhānteṇa muṁ paḍili muhaṁ māḍi
upare khaṇḍā nei rājā piṭile mohori | 298 |
chāḍa chāḍa paṇḍāẏe māribi ẏehu duṣṭa
nityāprati maṇohi yogāḍa ẏe karai uttiṣṭa | 300 |
brahmaṇa boile tu bātuḷa hoilu ki raẏe
ātmaghātaka apāra doṣa ye nāśakaranti tanaẏe | 301 |
indura mañjārī chuiṁle ki pāka pakāi dei | 302 |
paṇḍu rājā boile mote hoilāka ayogya
deba pitre diai ye agrate annabhoga | 303 |
ẏehāṁkara doṣa ye na ghenanti debatāẏe | 304 |

div.note: ātmāru jāta karichuṁ bāḷuta tanaẏe :–kha, na
“ātmaghātaka apāra doṣa ye nāśa karanti tanaẏe” pare ‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
bāḷutahatyā pātaka ye saṁsāru bāhāra
yebaṇa hatyāku puṇa nāhiṁṭi pratikāra |
caṇḍāḷa bāḷaka hou abā brāhmaṇa bāḷaka hou
mr̥ga paṇupakṣī bāḷaka houkinā kīṭa pataṅga bāḷaka hou |
ẏemānaṁku naśile ho paraloke pāi daṇḍa
ihaloke apakīrtti paraloke narkakhaṇḍa |
ẏebeḷeke ẏehākaiṁ chāḍa ho rājana
mācchi gañjāṣṭa na lāgai jāṇa |

lg.l: doharā agni ye hoanti tahiṁki tuṣṭa | 306 |
tu yebe mane aprate karu mahābīrā
tuhi se āja sinā dekhilu ho paṇḍu
sata baraṣa hoilāni āmbhe ẏehāra uttiṣṭa bhmañju | 308 |
kopa chāḍi praṇapatya hoile paṇḍu ye nr̥pati | 309 |
bhojane atriputi ẏehāku ādhāra na aṇṭi | 310 |
āmbhantakuhiṁ ghr̥ta ye hne bhmañjante na aṇṭe
troṭa anai rūpe thibu ẏehāra garbhagate | 311 |
svāmī prasanne dile mote doharā bahati | 313 |
svāmī ẏesaneka bidhāna muṁ pāichaiṁ pūrbe
birāṭa ghare sūpakāra hoibi ballabha nāma ẏebe | 314 |
pararāṣṭa yuddha paḍile hakarā karibāka mote | 316 |
svāmī sanidhya hoi basithiba tumbhe birāṭara kati | 317 |

div.note: sāta baraṣa hoilāni āmbhe annapāṇi chāḍu |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: yebaṇa bacana kahi abā āmbhe nuāribu āstāne
tu kehne gopyāna bābu hoibu re bibatsa | 320 |
birāṭa rājye muṁ ye boibi br̥hannārī | 321 |
beṇu rīṇā yantratāḷa tāṇḍaba bhraraha samgīta | 322 |
anteśvara pure kesaneke pśibu puruṣa bhāba thiel | 324 |
goṭā paribā na paśai randdhabāra pure | 325 |
kāminī rūpeṇa khoṣā khoṣibi deba keṣa | 326 |
tirī beśa aḷaṁkāre pinddhabi deba śāḍhī
arjuna boilā deba muṁ napuṁsaka hoibi
guṇa ghr̥ṣṭa phaḷibara beni bāhi pinddhabi | 329 |

div.note: kanyāra pure muṁ karāibi nr̥tya |–ṭa, tha, ca
āstane birāṭa tote ghenimāka śidhā |–gha, ṭa, ka, tha
guṇa goṣṭi pinddhacchi benibāhi pinddhabi |–ca, ña

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi deba biṣāda ye arjuna bacane
napuṁsaka lakṣaṇa bābu tu hoibu kesane | 330 |
mama hr̥de śuṇite lāgai baḍa cintā | 331 |
dhūrtta saṁhāṇa nr̥pati aṭai rāẏe maccha
abaśya śodhiba se ye kariba parīkṣa | 332 |
yujheṣṭhi pucchākale ẏeheneka achai ki pūrba
nija nāma gopyāna tora hoithilāka kebe | 334 |
arjuna boilā muṁ yetebeḷe galāi amara maṇḍaḷe
kirīṭī nāma mote dile pāka ye śāsana | 336 |
aneka beśa beśane ye tāṇḍeba nr̥tyakari | 338 |
nr̥tya ārambhare muṁ āstāne thili basi | 339 |
mote dekhiṇa se kāmasāgare ye bhāṣi | 340 |

div.note: abaśya śodhā tote re kariba pratakṣa |–na, cha, ga, ñja
bichāri śodhākale na thiba sarūpa |–ga, tha

deba aḷaṁkāramāna mote kale ābharaṇa
gandhapuṣya candana mo śarīre lepana |–ña, cha, ṭha

lg.l: mohora badana se chāhiṁla yahuṁ āsi
muhiṁ tahāra badana na chāhiṁli sambhāṣi | 341 |
muhiṁ tāhāra badana na chhiṁli yahuṁ toḷi
kiñchita kariṇa se ye chāhiṁla ẏekadr̥ṣṭi
svāmī kapāṭa pāḍiṇa muṁ palaṁke basi śaramāna guṇi
priẏambadā ubaṁśī dvāre miḷile beni ye taruṇī | 345 |
kapāṭa phiṭāa boli binaẏe bolanti dvāre
mātāhuṁ āna muṁ ye na bolai tāhāre
binoẏī rātreka se basila mora dvāre | 347 |
kapāṭa na pheḍiṇa muṁ na chāhiṁli tāra mukha
raẏaṇī śeṣa hoilā se hoilā bimukha | 348 |
kāma kaṣṭhore ubaṁśī kope bihila mote śāpa
muhiṁ jagatamohinī re mora bhāṅgilu sina darpa | 349 |
ābara ratiraṅga karibu ki anya tirī gheni | 350 |
svāmī indra debatā kopakale tāhā śuṇi
nikaḷaṁka putre mora kaḷaṁka lagāilu āṇi | 352 |

div.note: kiñchita kari muhiṁ ye chāhiṁli ẏekadr̥ṣṭi |–ṭa, ca, ja, ña
priẏamadā ubaṁśī āsi māganti ramaṇi |–ka, tha, ga

lg.l: muhiṁ tote ẏebe śāpya debaiṁ ubaṁśī
praḷambita hoi bāḷi bāsabe bacana sambhāṣi | 353 |
ubaṁśī boilā more kopa na kara suranāhā
mora śāpya parama hita hoiba parimāṇi bujha ẏehā | 354 |
svāmī agyāṁtaba sa ye baraṣe teradina
svāmī sabukāḷe sampade kāhāra na yāiṭi dina
rātra dibasa yehne sampada bipasda tehne
aṇahita kāḷe ẏe na thiba tāra tahiṁ
ẏethakaiṁ bhrānti tumbhe na kara debasvāmī | 361 |
arjuna bacane se hoile parama śāṇḍi
tu kemanta kari bañchibure sukumāra bhāi goṭi | 363 |
bābu ẏe mahāghora araṇyare tote haṁsulī supāti

div.note:
yujheṣṭhi boile śuṇa ho nakuḷa kumāra
tu kehneka bañchibu kahani mo āgara |–ṭa, ñja, ca, na, kha, ṭha

lg.l: bābu bidyādhara parāẏe sukumāra tora kāẏe
mo tahuṁ byatreke ānaku kahi nuāru kathāẏe | 365 |
śuddha subarṇṇa kuṁkuma jāṇi śobhita tora barṇṇa
bābu kohuṇi bidyāre tu nohusire kuśaḷa
bābu tohora kathāku mohora baḍa cintā
mohora arjilā karma bhmañjucha re chāribhrāthā | 368 |
nakuḷa boile deba tumbhare muhiṁ sukhī
lalāṭa lekhana deba kāhara beḷe hoiba upekhi | 369 |
sadā sampade prāṇīṁkara na yāiṭi dina
sadā bipatti ye kebe nohai lekhana | 370 |
rātra dibasa yehne hoai tesana sampatti bipatti jāna
kāhāra beḷe deba hoiba se āna | 371 |
mohora kathāku deba kicchihiṁ na bhāḷa
granthikāra nāme muṁ ye hoibi bājīpāḷa | 372 |
yujheṣṭhi pucchākale granthikāra bājīpāḷa kāhāku ye boli
ẏe kemanta caritaṭi muṁ bujhita nuārili | 373 |
nakuḷa boilā muṁ pāgaḍā bāruāḷa hoibi
svāmī mohora hāthare yebaṇa aśva sāji
ākāśa kṣepī pāranti se huanti mahāteji | 375 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile āmbhara dekhilā śuṇilā nāhiṁ pūrbe
aśva lakṣaṇa bidyā jāṇilu kemanta tu ẏebe | 376 |

div.note: nakuḷa boilā bājī ye ghoḍāmuhiṁ bāruāḷa hoibi |–ca, ja

yujheṣṭhi boile ẏehā dekhilā nāhiṁta naẏane
aśva lakṣaṇa bidyā tu jāṇilu kesane |–cha, kha, na, ṭha, ñja

lg.l: svāmī tuḷamāsa āditya biṣṇu ye prabhaba
makara māse āsditya aruṇ anāme bidita
ananta mr̥tti deba teja adr̥śya ye hoi | 381 |
mithuna māse udita tapana nāmeṇa sūryya
kakaḍā māse ye jaḷadhara nāme teja | 383 |
mārttaṇḍa nāme āditya kanyamāse ude hāde | 384 |

div.note: saanmāna nāme satyayuga kathāra prasanne |–kha, na, ṭha

sūryyaṅkara dvadaśa nāma yathātrame “āditya hr̥daẏa” mate,
meṣa, br̥ṣa, mithuna, karkaṭa, siṁha, kanyā, tuḷā, bitha, dhanu,
makara kumbha, mīna māsare :–

tapana, indra, rabi, garbhasti yama, hiraṇyaretā, dibākara
mitra, biṣṇu, aruṇa sūryya o bedāṅga |

adhikāṁśa pothire chāroṭimāsare sūryyaṅkara nāma acchi o
anya keteka pothire dvādaśadityaṁkara nāmamānaṅkare
baisadr̥śya thileheñ tuḷanā kari uparoktamate gr̥hīta
hoiacchi |

lg.l: dvādaśa māse ẏe ye dvādaśa āditya
svāmī dakṣara nandini ye saṁgyaṁ mahāsatī
koṭiẏe kiraṇa ye birañchi nārāẏaṇa mr̥tti
svāmī rūpajyoti dekhi se saṁgyāṁ apūrṇṇā
stambhanamohana baśa uccāṭana guṭikā añjana tāku samasta śikhāi | 389 |
ārādhanā bhagati kari tuhi birañchi nārāẏaṇakaiṁ khaṭa | 390 |
saṁgyāṁhuṁ adhika guṇe bhagati sehu sañchi | 392 |
ẏe bidhire satya tretā dvāpara ye kaḷi
kuṇḍaḷa nāmeṇa kāḷa abada bhoga kare | 395 |

div.note: kr̥tāśva bolikari ẏekai satyamāse |–ga, tha
kr̥tāntaka bolikari ẏekai kalpamāse |–ca, ta, cha
kistughna nāme ẏekai kalpamāse |–kha, ṭha, na

lg.l: uttama bāra sedina ye maghāsiṁha rāśi
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa yoga ey haraṣa | 397 |
aneka bhracchanā kariṇa chāẏa dile gāḷi | 398 |
chāẏāra upare pāda prahāra kalā tama | 399 |
yāāre yama tora bāma caraṇa akṣobha hoi gaḷu | 400 |
athabā yebe muhiṁ aṭai tora māẏe
gaḷuta koṣṭha byādhi heu prahāra kalu yebaṇa pāẏe | 401 |
gaḷuta koṣṭha bydhi hoilā yama debatāṁkara pāẏe | 402 |
nityakarma bidhi ye saẏaḷa jana cintā
āpaṇā bhmabane āsi bije karai sabitā | 403 |
bābu kāhāra śapyare tohara śarīre hoila ẏeḍe kaṣṭa | 404 |
trodhe gadagada hoiṇa ye nāśakara boilā
sabye asabye putre mātāku karibe doṣa
mātāẏe rāge putraṁku śāpya dianti abaśya | 407 |
baṁśa rahiba ki birañchi nārāẏaṇa boile | 408 |

div.note:
nityakarma bidhi ye saẏaḷa jana cinti
āpaṇā bhmabane āsi prabeśa kale rabi jyoti |–ka, ga, gha, tha

lg.l: māẏā kariṇa se āmbhanta acchi seb | 409 |
bichāri jāṇile ẏe putraṁkara nohe garbhadhārī | 410 |
teja sahi nuāri saṁkyām āmbhanta kalāka hāde māẏā
dhyāne jāṇile se ye aṭai debī chāẏā | 411 |
aṁgyāṁra gopya se jāṇileka deba hr̥de
chāẏāku prasanna boile deba parama sānande | 412 |
ẏetekāḷa prakr̥ti jāṇī khaṭilu ye tuhi
saṁghyāṁ debīra ballabha ye aṭai hāde muhiṁ | 413 |

div.note: chāẏāra trāsa ye jāṇile deba hr̥de |–(ga, tha)
śāpyara trāsa ye jānile deba hr̥de |–(ka, ṇa)
saṁgyāṁra ballabha nāme saṁketa aṭai muhiṁ |–(na, ṭha)
chāẏāra ballabha nāme saṁketa aṭai muhiṁ |–ka, tha
surañchi turaṅgama hoile debaicchi |–gha, ṇa
ẏekā ramaṇa hoilā batiśa daṇḍa pariyante |–ka, ṇa, ga, gha, tha, cha
priẏā priẏā bolikari puṇa kaleka retapāta |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: bīryya paḍante garbharu putreka hoile sambhūta | 419 |
atihiṁ ānande puṇa sagyāṁra pāśe miḷi | 421 |
putrajanma hebāru rahi nuārilā yete reta
ākaśa puruṣa hr̥dagate ajapā laẏe ghoti | 424 |
stambhana mohana baśya uccāṭana guṭika añjana
abyaẏa puruṣa se svaẏaṁ samasta mantra sādhi | 426 |
svāmī paṇḍuṁkara abasthāne mādrī mote gheni koḷāgrate
ananta baitaraṇī kūḷe ye bheṭile rehante | 427 |

div.note: re re priẏā bolikari puṇa kaleka retapāta |–tha, ñjaga

rehantaṁkara aśvalakṣaṇa kāẏe,
digapāḷa śarīra akāma ajapā alaẏe |–ka, ṇa
anaḷa puruṣa se samasta mana sādhi |–ja, cha, ca, ṭa, ṭha, na
rasa rasaẏana bidyā sarba mauṣadhi |–ka, kha
asādhya sādhana hoipāre mauṣadhi |–ga, ñja

lg.l: se parama puruṣa mote dhariṇa koḷagrate
svāmī ẏeteka bidyā yebe sādhi pārai saddha
byādhi na pīḍai mr̥tu nohoi aśva ye nohanti br̥ddha | 431 |
abadhānī boliṇa ye ẏeka mantra goṭiẏe
tāha paḍhi sājile ākāśe kṣepanti haẏe | 432 |
aruṇa mantra baḷi karmaṇa mantra beni
aśva raṇe sāji jiṇanti ye pāranti cihni | 433 |
sāma tita kaṅga nāme achai tini mantra
akāṭa apuṭa ẏe ulukaṇa haẏe yete | 434 |
banara aśva āsi khaṭibe mohara mantra paḍu | 435 |

div.note:
agni arukata pannasiddha guṇḍi dihaṇḍi
rujisa medha ādu mantra mr̥tyugaṇḍi |–kha, na

saṁgyāṁ ārādhaka tapana siddha goṭi
rūka sāma dhanuruṣana mr̥tyu phiṭi |–tha, ga

svāmī ẏeteka bidyā sādhi pāili sanddha
nirogī hoi aśva nuhanti mr̥tyubyādhi |–kha, na
ẏemanta sādhile ākaśe kṣepanti haẏe |–ka, cha, ña

lg.l: thāṭha na jiṇile deba nuāsanti mora haẏe | 436 |
ẏehā uddeśya karante sabunti aṭai āgyāṁ | 437 |
bipatti kāḷaku dhāta sañchi achai niẏate | 438 |
aśva goṭiẏe ḍakani re dekhiba pratakṣa | 439 |
nohale ki birāṭa rājyaku tote pāraiki nei
dekhilā aśvajāta bana yojana śata tini | 441 |
kaḷā pāṭala hurita śveta kuṁkuma śyāmarūpa svāmī | 443 |

div.note: thāna na ghuñchile deba na bāhuḍai mora haẏe |–tha, ga

candra arka boliṇa ye abada mantraśākhā
ẏe mantra baśa karante sabuhiṁ bārantā |–tha, ga, ṭa
“aśva goṭiẏe ḍākani re dekhibā pratakṣa” pare na, kha, pothire bhinnapāṭha :–
yujheṣṭhi deba boile śuṇa re bibatsa
bipatti kālaku dharma sinā āmbhanta sāhāpakṣa |
nohile birāṭa rājyakaiṁ pāranti ki tumbhanta nei
jaṇa nija rūpa hoile jāṇima samastaṁkuhim |
arjuna boile nakuḷa mukha chahiṁ
ṭhākuraṁkara āgyaṁ tu karasi re bhāi |

lg.l: kemanta aśva goṭiẏe āsiba deba kati
śveta aśva goṭiẏe āsu dadhi maṅgaḷa sugati | 444 |
aśva āgama mantre bāmābartteka paḍhila kumāra
bābu tohora prasanne prāpata hoiba mote rajya | 446 |
bābu aśvaṁkara prasanne śatr̥ku hoẏe jiṇi
ẏebe se udita mote hoilā daṇḍapāṇi | 447 |
tuhi se sarbagyaṁ bābu kisa kahibāka tote | 449 |
āmbha sabuṁkahiṁ bābure tuhi se buddhidātā
śuṇite icchā mora tu kebaṇa guṇe jitā | 450 |
kaha boli bolanti se dharmara nandana
kr̥ta śva maharuṣi tāhāra putra ye kahili | 454 |

div.note: śāmaḷa maharuṣi boli tahāṁkara putre |–ñja, ca, cha, kha, na

bundāarkara nandana manumana bhadī
ẏehāra nandana ye hoilā jambudhi |–ka, tha

lg.l: baiṣṇaba ruṣiṁkara nandana ye atai aruṇateja
svāmī dineka nāradaṁku ye pucchākalā rāẏe kaṁsa
bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā munihe mr̥tu mote kisa | 463 |
tohroa mr̥tu heba hāde bhaṇajāra hāthe | 464 |

lg.note: manurathara nandana hoilā suśarmī maharuṣi |–kha, na

lg.l: bāḷuta putra goṭiki se āpaṇe kachāḍai | 467 |
kr̥ttikā antare rohiṇī prabeśa rātra ye arddhara | 471 |
kaṁsara āgyāṁẏe jagichanti ye aneka pāhāri
bāsudebaṁka maẏāre kari saburi acebana kaẏe | 473 |
pāṭe rāja karibe boli bānddhadile śāḍhī | 475 |
keśaba maẏāre se jaḷa gala chāḍi | 477 |
bāma ḍāhāṇare se aneka tāḷa rañchi

lg.note: pāhāri=praharī, dvārī |

lg.l: ādi annaparṇṇā ye rahila tāra garbhe
tāhara dohitāẏe ye janmicchi sehi rāti | 485 |
se bijaḷi kanyāku kachāḍai kaṁsa nr̥panāha | 487 |
antarīkṣe picikāi gala se anādi bhairābī
gopapuraku śāpa acchi na yiba tahiṁ kati | 489 |
gupate māriba tume nanda gauḍara pua | 490 |
boilā ẏe chāra bāḷaka muṁ āsibi nipāti | 491 |
ẏete boli pūtanā ye ailā gopapura
dibyarūpa dhariṇa se paśilā nanda ghara | 492 |
kṣīra pibante ye hari badhakaleka prohiṇī
pādeṇa bhāñjile ye yāmaḷā arjuna br̥kṣa beni | 494 |
bāḷuta kheḍe thāiṁ hari bidārile tr̥ṇābarttā | 495 |
brāhmaṇī anne santoṣa hele bāhuḍāi dile paṇḍā | 497 |
dābāgni bhakṣiṇa ye daḷile deba kāḷī
haraṣe ramile gopa nāẏekā trīḍāraṅga kutūhoḷe | 499 |
svāmī rādhikā nailā dūtikāra bole yahuṁ
keśaba bisarile kaṁsaku badhakaribi muṁ ābara ye kāhuṁ | 501 |
puṣyeka nandinī rādhikā yebe mohore aprīti

div.note: nārāẏaṇe bhagati baḍhāilā baraṅgana |–ka, ṇa
nārāẏaṇaṁku mohilā sehi baraṅganā |–kha, na

lg.l: ẏethe tu paśibu yebe ramga kautuke
puṣyaka nandinī mote na dila aṅgabhoga | 506 |
aneka dhanaratna dei muhiṁ dūtiki dili peṣi
dhātāẏe boile hari tu kr̥ṣṇabarṇṇa kaḷā
teṇukari tote na bhajilā puṣyeka abaḷā | 508 |
rādhikā nāma dhari beṇu prathama svare bajā
to tahuṁ byatrake ballabha nohiba ānajana | 511 |
ẏe baiṁśīre kamabīja tu jaapibu pratakṣa | 512 |
tebe se rādhikā ye hoiba mohamāna
nimiṣe na chāḍiba kahilu tote kāhna | 513 |
śr̥ṅgāra iccha nuāribe gopa stirīṁkara saṅge | 515 |

div.note: aneka duḥkha se ye pāile br̥ndāarke |–ka, ṇa
gopa kāminīmāne miḷibe sarbe āsi |–‘ṇa’
saburi upastha ye luḷiba taḷamarge |–ja, ṭa

lg.l: nānā roga byādhimāne goruṁku na karibe bādhā | 517 |
karaṭī akaraṭī maḍicchi achandā aduhāṁ gāī
svāmī caturtha svare baṁśī ye bāile
yahiṁki peṣibu se karibe tora bāṇī
ẏe baiṁśīgoṭi tote prāpata hoi ye cakrapāṇi | 520 |
pañchamasvare hari yebe baiṁśī bāibu gāḍhe
ratha gaja aśva pādānti yoddhā ādikari
sakaḷa kṣatrīmāne bhūmire ye paḍibe prāṇahāri | 522 |
ẏe mohana baṁśī cumbante beḷa ṣaṣṭha
saptame baṁśī dhari yebe cumbibu deba hari
ṣoḷa sahasra gopī tote khaṭibe paricharī | 525 |
beṇu dei dhātā gale pura yaśobantī
niśi arddhe yāiṁ prabrśa hoile candrābaḷī

div.note: debatāẏe dr̥śya hoibe nāma dhari gāile |–ka, ṇa, tha, gha
sakaḷa kṣatrīmāne paḍibe yuddhe hāri |–ṭa, na, ṭha, kha

lg.l: muhiṁ yāiṁ bheṭili kāḷindī nadī ye baṭataḷe
bhmajeṇa bhiḍi deba dhaile mote koḷe
samasta kuśaḷa mote gata āgata pachāri | 534 |
tohora tahiṁki magadheśvara sājilāka deba daṇḍa | 535 |
tu yebe badha karibu kaṁsa mahārājā
heti praheti tāra beni ye bhārija | 536 |
bidhabā hoi chāmure tora karibe aśr̥bāṇī | 537 |
teiśi kṣauṇī baḷa gheniṇa jarāsandha rājā

529|1 aneka haraṣe se mohile gopanārī
nāukā binode prabhma trīḍāraṅga kari |–ñja, ṭa
tu ẏehānta gheniṇa yāa bāruṇā praśaste
godhana samarpi deba dile mote biraha baiṁśī
ẏeṇe se godhana pala sādhya hoantiṭi āsi | 542 |
muhiṁ go lakṣaṇa bidyā jāṇaiṁ samasta
svāmī nārāẏaṇa prasanne muṁ go lakṣaṇ abidyāẏeṇa jitā
dropatī boile byāsaṁkara bacane thibi muṁ sudeṣṇāṁku ārādhi | 548 |

lg.note: sukheṇa godhana pala carāa tu banaste |–ka, ṇa
matsadeśe godhana pala achai apramita |–tha, ka, ṇa, ka

sahadeba bākye harṣadharma mahīpati
śuṇi tuṣṭa hoile chāḍilā manu bhrānti |–kha, na, ṭha
catusama bheṭāibi ẏekayoa kari |–ka, ṇa, na

lg.l: dekhile icchā kariba laṁghile nāśa yāẏe | 550 |
athabā birāṭa hou kibā ānajana hou
ẏesaneka bākya yahuṁ kahile yujheṣṭhi nr̥pati
prāñchāḷī boile muṁ cittabr̥tti thibiṭi nibartti | 552 |
tumbhe ye yāhāra nāma karasi gopana
yujheṣṭhi deba śuṇiṇa pucchākale tahiṁ bāṇī
sairindhī nāmahuṁ mohora nāhīṁ āna dīkṣā | 555 |
tenyāẏuṁ kari sairindhī nāma hoilā mohori | 556 |

lg.note: dekhile se icchai khāile nāśa yaẏe |–ka, ṭa, gha
indriki icchā mora nāhimṭi sarbathā |–ka, tha, gha
sairindhrī nāmahuṁ mohora nāhiṁ āna icchā bāñcchā |–ṭa, na, kha
sairindhī nāma mohora achai pūrbara byabasthā |–ñja, ṇa, ta
sairindhrī śilpa karma acchi yāhara se sairindhrī |–ña
sairindhrī byabasāẏare sadādina hari |–kha, na

karma anarūpe bañchibā dinakāḷa |–ṇa, cha, na, ṭha, tha, gha,
karma ādariṇa ye thibā dina jāṇi |–ja, ca, cha

lg.l: svāmīna gali tīrtha ye na kali dharmāna
na paḍhili śahasra muṁ na jāṇili kicchi
hr̥dagate bighaṁsu mama śrīkr̥ṣṇa nāma goṭi | 564 |
srijita bhābakarma gunanātha anītiki bāṭa nade | 565 |
buḍantā sindhujaḷuṁ tuhi se deba uddharantā | 566 |
mūrkha apaṇḍita muhiṁ na jāṇai kicchi
śūnya śabada bākye tuhi se sarbasākṣī | 567 |
biṣṇura āśrā byatreke na jāṇai āna
tukuiṁ nātha muṁ magai tora japatapa dhyāna | 568 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śrī puruṣottama pāde banda | 569 | | 776 |
lg.note:
jaẏa tu jagujībana mohana śrīpati
tohora prasanne mora manabāñcchā siddhagati |–ja, ṭa, cha
na bhedili akṣara muṁ bhagatajana bācchi |–ka, ṇa
śubhāśubha karma deba ānagati ninde |–cha, na
śrī sāradāra ballabha tuḷusāra prāṇabandha |–ṭa, cha
lg.l: śuṇa ho caitana śamībr̥kṣa śiṁśupā latā taḷe
tahiṁ basi āraṇyeka bāsa kale samāpate | 2 |

lg.note: biṣṇuprasāda bolikari ẏekai parbate |–kha, ṇa, na, ṭha
tahiṁ āreṇyaka parba kale samapate |–ca, cha, ñja, ga, ja
śatabhikṣā nakṣatra gurubāra lekhana |–kha, na, ṭha
kisṇaghna nāme karaṇa āẏuṣmāna nāme yoga |–na, kha, ja
“banabāsa samāpata kale sehi dinu” pare ‘ṭha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha –
sahadebaṭhāru bujha dharmaṁka nandana
agyāṁ tabsaku tahīm baḷāle mana |
boile kaha bābu anakūḷa goṭi
yepariki amaṅgaḷa āmbhaku na ghaṭi |
śuṇi sahadeba kahe dhrma pāde nami |

lg.l: sahadeba boila ye yujheṣṭhi caraṇe pariṇāmi
svāmī prātakāḷe yognī ye mahālakṣmī mūrati
dhanulagne pāpagraha nāhiṁ māhīndra aṭe yoga | 11 |
bho mahata batā śuṇa āmbhara ye bāñcchā
matsadeśe gopyāna hoibu na kahibu mithyā | 13 |
ye yāha icchai tu tāhā phaḷāu pratakṣa | 16 |
tahiṁre sannidhye acchi sāhaḍa nāme br̥kṣa
tahiṁra taḷe basila yāi pabana ra batsa | 18 |
śirare ghenilā bhīma tāha dekhile yujheṣṭhi | 19 |
lg.note: matsadeśe gopya nimante kahibu āmbhe mithyā |–ka, ca

lg.l: bāṭe na chālai bhīmā amaḍā māḍāi
yahiṁ dharma tāhā se daṇḍake chāḍai | 21 |
kujana lokaṁka tuleṇa tāra bhala goṣṭhī | 22 |
kubhūmi pāile se sustāna karai tejyā
kumantra bidyā paḍhe kūjana saṅge bheṭi
kicchihiṁ na boilā br̥kṣaku bhagati nohilā
bhīsena boilā deba tumbhe kicchihiṁ na jāṇa
ẏe sāhḍā br̥kṣara deba achai bahuta guṇa | 28 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīma kemante tuhi ẏehā jāṇu
mohora āgare kimpā ẏe kathā na bakhāṇu | 29 |

lg.note: anīti bāṭe bhīmā thāi anubrate |–cha, ñja, ca
ẏe sāhāḍābr̥kṣa deba aṭai baḍajaṇa |–na, kha, ṇa, ṭha

lg.l: ẏe br̥kṣaru patra goṭiẏe kimpe śireṇa tuhi gheni | 32 |
ẏemāna chāḍiṇa tu ẏehā kiṁke bandu
baila boilā deba bāmeṇa sāhaḍā br̥kṣa thile
puṣṭa bhojana miḷai ẏethu patreka śirare gheniḷe | 35 |
iśvara hasile se bai(?) bacana śuṇi
kemante anna miḷiba āja tote parīkṣe bujhi jāṇi | 36 |
amr̥ta pāka muṇohi sampādile debī umā
svāmīki bāṭa chāhiṁ bimukha sadānandara bāmā | 40 |
pañchugrāsa mātra kariachanti ye debī satī
svāmīra āgata boli debī uṭhile dhātikāre
se muṇohi yogāḍāmāna bharile nei br̥ṣabhara guāṇire | 44 |
lg.note: se muṇohi yogāḍa bharile nei br̥ṣabha kuṇḍare |–cha, na, ṭha, kha

lg.l: aḷiā ghāsa lochāi tahim upare ghoḍāi dile āṇi | 45 |
aṁchobana sāri debī śrīkare gheniṇa ratnajharī |
bailaku ghāsapāṇi āja na debure kicchi | 48 |
br̥ṣabha bichārai ājadina muṁ amr̥ta bhojana pāili | 50 |
mohora sebaka hi mote na kariba sebā
sāhaḍā br̥kṣaku se bandai kimpe abā | 52 |
jāṇimānā kemante āja prāpata hoiba ādhāra
rajanī prabhāte svāmī prabeśa hele br̥ṣabha katira | 53 |
sadānanda boile ho kemanta kalu baila
sāhāḍā br̥kṣa sebi kisa kisa pāila | 55 |
lg.note: kṣudhāre br̥ṣabha ye khojai guāṇi |–ja, gha, kha
sukheṇa baila ye achai mahānidrā yāi |–ṭa, cha, ñja
lg.l: br̥ṣabha bhoilā svāmī śāhāsa nohai mithyā
anaśya prāpata hoai manare kale bāñcchā | 56 |
svāmī yeteka yogāḍa ye tumbhara maḍhaphuli
sāhāḍa br̥kṣaku sebiṇa muṁ samasta pāili | 57 |
amr̥ta bhojana kali sakaḷa śrama galā
tumbhe ẏehāku rātre ādhāra dila kigo āṇi | 59 |
praṇa patya bhābe ye badaẏanti pārbatī
svamī tumbhanta bāṭa chāhuṁ chāhuṁ hoilā bahurāti | 60 |
sarbe anna pañchuguṇḍi karicchi muṁ grāsa
ārate samasta drabya gheniṇa gali toḷi
br̥ṣabha koṭharīre samasta dili deba toḷi | 63 |
ẏehā śuṇi hasile ye deba sahānanda
ẏe goleka br̥kṣaku ho samasteheṁ banda | 64 |
bhīmasena boilā deba ẏesanaka acchi pūrbe
muṁ tāhā śuṇi deba goḍāi acchi ẏebe | 65 |
mūrkha hoi tohora paṇḍita buddhi anargaḷā | 66 |
lg.note: sāhāḍābr̥kṣa prasāde muṁ samasta paili |–kha, ka
sāhāḍābr̥kṣa bāñcchāre samasta pāili |–gha, ja
br̥ṣabha guāḷire samasta dili ḍhāḷi |–ca, jha
muhiṁ tāhā ṇi sebuacchi ẏebe |–ka, ṇa
teṇukari patreka ghenili muhiṁ ẏebe |–ca, ñja, cha

lg.l: birāṭara kaṇṭhe bijekalra go parama baiṣṇabī | 68 |
taba binaẏa bhābuṁ citta na baḷu ye āne | 69 |
kāmaicchāẏe go tu mohilu parama yogī | 70 |
bicheka bāhinī go namāmi mama āśa

div.note: birāṭara katāke bijekara go baiṣṇabī |–ga, ca, ja
kāmaku aṇaicchāẏe mohilu parama yogī |–na, ṇa
siṁghabāhinī go taba caraṇe mama āśa |–ka, ca, ñja, na, kha

div.head: {@tripurāsura badha@}

lg.l: dharma boile tripura badha hoilāka ẏethe | 1 |
dropatī boile tripura boliṇa se kebaṇa kauṇopa
kāhara putra se ye ke tāhāra mātā bāpa | 2 |
baitaraṇī kūḷe madhupura boli ẏeka nagra bidyamāne
prathama rajobatī bāḷī hoilā se dinara | 6 |
someka nāme śūdraku gheni se gharakalā | 7 |
baẏasa saṁhari nuārilā se bidhabā brāhmaṇī
śūdraku gheniṇa se kalā para dārāẏeṇī | 8 |
se brāhmaṇīra raje sehu śūdrara ye bīryye
kr̥ttikā nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara | 10 |

div.note:
dopatī boile tripura boliṇa se kebaṇa asura
kāhāputra keuṁṭhāre tāhāra nagara |–kha, na, ṭha
kārttika śukḷapakṣa pūrṇṇamī arkabāra |–cha, gha, ka,

lg.l: biṣṭināme karaṇa ye nāganāme nāganāme yoga
se dina brāhmaṇī garbhmaṁ jāta heba kumāra
andhāra niśi ye rātra pāñcha ghaḍikara | 12 |
se someka śūdra tāku chāḍi paḷāila | 15 |
se putrakaiṁ gheniṇa se bidhābā brāhmaṇī
bane rahithāi se pichāśuṇī br̥tti jāṇi | 16 |
se nandana bolilā muni he tumbha pāde mohora namaskāra
āre nara chāṇḍāḷa tu āmbhaṁku praṇapatya
āja āmbhara gala re dinakara sukr̥ta | 21 |
se putra boilā muni he muṁ brāhmaṇa dekhile
niti prati praṇapatya karai tāhāṁka paẏare | 22 |
brāhmaṇa sukr̥ta harai śūdre namaskāra kale | 23 |
lg.note: yetebeḷe brāhmaṇī putra prasaba hoila |–ṭha, ṇa, cha
lg.l: nārade boile tu mote hoilu praṇapatya
jāti nara chāṇḍāḷare ke tora pitāmāta | 24 |
dhātāra nandana tumbhe bhuta bhabiṣya jāṇantā
tumbeh se kaha gosāiṁ he kiẏe mohora pitā | 25 |
nārada boile re mana jāṇe pāpa
āra kiẏe kahiba re to mātā jāṇe bāpa | 26 |
ke tohora pitā nāma se kahiba yugata | 27 |
ke mohora pitā go kahasi mahātmāṇī
mātā bole bābu muṁre bidhabā brāhmaṇī | 29 |
pitā tohora ye someka śadra boli
prasaba māteke putra re paḷāilā chāṛi | 30 |
se mote harilā muṁ nara chāṇḍāḷuṇī hoili
bho māta muhiṁ nicaẏe narachāṇḍāḷa hoili | 31 |
toho yoge mātā muṁ hoili kaḷaṁkita
kaha kāhākaiṁ sebi muṁ hibi mukata | 32 |
śiba sebāre se ye baḷāilā icchā | 34 |
kaṣṭhora tapa dekhiṇa se bijaẏe paśupati
īśvare boile tu kāhāku karu sebā
se kumara boilā bho nātha tu yebe īśāna
sadyu bāma ghora īśāna tatapurukha pañchuśira
ẏe tiniheṁ saṅgama huanti miḷi candra jaṭāra | 45 |
khaṭvāṅga mudugara śuddha saṣṭika phṇi maṇi | 48 |
timiri bidāraṇa maṇi mekhaḷa kaṭi prabhā | 49 |
kṣaṇe kṣane yoga āsane kṣaṇe raṅgabhoḷā
dibyacakṣu prāpata hou mote diasi ādideba
ẏethe thāi chāhiṁle mote koṭi brahmāṇḍa diśiba | 76 |
śahasramāna bheda nohiba ye mora aṅga
bajra śakati brahma śakati śūḷa śakati cakra samasta hoiba bhaṅga | 77 |
yetekahuṁ adhika baẏasa mote nohiba yugate | 79 |
svāmī ẏekastarī gaṇḍā yuge hoẏe ẏekamanu
īśvare boile re samasta hou astu
yeteka māgu teteka hou tote parāpatu | 81 |
svāmī dibi bhūbi pātāḷa ẏehi tinipura
nārāẏaṇara hathe ye nohibi muhiṁ hata
tumbhara caraṇe kehi na karibe pūjā
tumbha sthāne basi muhiṁ bolāibi debarājā | 86 |
lg.note: puruṇā īśvare thile nūā īśvaraṁku kāhim pūjā |–ka, ṇa
lg.l: īśvare boile re hoilā mora satya
tu yāhā māgilu re siddha hou samasta | 87 |
svāmī pināka śāraṅga ye akṣaẏa benitroṇa
triśūḷa śakati amoha śakati ye mudugara
tra purā bacane rudra dile ye samasta
ẏe tohora baila mote debāka biśvanātha | 90 |
ẏekādaśa loke mote jiṇantā nohu kehi
baila ḍambaru sahite bhoḷe dileka paśupati | 92 |
bara māganteṇa debatāẏe mane kale śaṁkā
gaṅgā pārbatīṁki ẏe na māgai yemante | 94 |
samasta māgilā se gaṅgā pārbatīṁki chāḍi
bhoḷeṇa īśvare ye dile samasta kāḍha | 96 |
caubiṁśa daṇḍe se ye gale astaṁgatā | 98 |
lg.note: tridaśe seba mote karibe gosāiṁ |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: ẏehi parbate se tripura bīra thāi rahi
pināka triśūḷa ye kahaṭvāṅga ḍambaru praśuhāthe | 102 |
īśvara āsane yāiṁ tripurā basai māḍi
praśu gheni ẏehā śiragoṭi chedibi ẏehikṣaṇa | 108 |
muhiṁ īśvara aṭe ẏe piṭhikalā mote
mattagarbe mote ta ẏe nuārilā cihni
boilā jāṇu jāṇu sinā ẏe karai amāni | 110 |
nakaru mānya pache na bolibi kicchi
āho namaskāra kimpe na kale āmbhaṁku | 113 |
tripurā boilā tu ye puruṣa uttamā
īśvara debatāṁku tu karuṭi ki praṇāma | 114 |
śirare dhabaḷāṅgī pārbatī thānti hr̥de yebe
āho īśvara ye aṭanti jagatabhūta bāi
tāhāku ye sebā karai hoiba se bāi | 118 |
gaṅgā pārbatīṁki se kiṁpe na diantā | 119 |
īśvara pada yebe tote se prāpata
tote yebe deithāntā chāri ye bhārijā
āre naracaṇḍāḷa dekhi tote īśvara bhaṇḍalā
tebe se nicaẏe hoibu debarāja, svāmī
chāri bhārijā tote na diai athabā
yadyapi tote dui bhārijāiṁ na deba
br̥ddha īśvara se āu tahim kiṁpā thiba | 126 |
āṇa chari bhārijā tote īśvarapada hou ẏekā | 127 |
tote kiṁpe pūjibu ẏehā jagannātha boile | 128 |
mūrkha pāmara se na jāṇilā katha kūṭachandi | 129 |
āre āre boli dhāmai se pāpiṣṭha
ati ugrabara prāpata hoai ki yugate | 134 |

lg.note:
“āṇa chāri bhārijā tote īśvarapada heu ẏekā”
pare ‘kha’ pothire alagā pāṭha :–
tebe tuhi tahiṁ dekhāibu bīrapaṇa
īśvara debtāṁkara mastaka chediṇa |
tuhi yebe tāṁka patnīmānaṁku āṇibu
tā saṅge amare tu sundara diśabu |
pañchamuche – pañchamuṇe |

lg.l: āho īśvara kebaṇ aprakr̥ti hoilā tohora | 138 |
ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra baraṣa dukhe arajili tapa
bāhija bara yāhā dilu nirutānta kalu gopya | 139 |
debataẏe basiṇa na dile mote merusabhā
yebe mote sañchilā tora chāri bhārijā mote debā | 140 |
āre gurupatnī haraṇa kale cchedana hoẏe muṇḍa | 141 |
tripurā boilā svāmī tu harilu to nijamāte
ude aste pariyante yāha māgilu tāhā dili | 143 |
kāli yadi māgithāntu chāri ye gharaṇī
tripura boila tu mohora parama guru
dui bhārijā dia mote kiṁpe nastikaru | 145 |
yadyapi na debu mote gaṅgā ye girijā

lg.note:
“tra purā boilā svāmī tu harilu to nija mātā”
ehi pādānta pare ‘gha’ pothire dvitīẏa pāda :–
mote āja debu hara tohora banitā |

“kapiḷāsa bhāṅga tora muhiṁ hoibi debarajā”
‘kha, ṭha’ pothire alagā pāṭha :–
yebe dui bhārijā na debu tuhi mote
kapiḷāsa bhāṅga nāśa karibi mum tote |

lg.l: ẏe tohroa mr̥tubheda ture nuārilu jāṇi | 147 |
tripurā boilā re āja cchedibi tora śira
kare dhanu dhariṇa se nārājeka pūroi
lāghaba samare kehi kāhakuhiṁ na jiṇi
deba śahasramāna sabu ādhāna kale āṇi | 157 |
āhāra nidra abakāśa nāhiṁ ye athabā | 159 |
lg.note:
e (?)nare “duhiṁkara śarīru bahe śrama jhāḷi” |
‘kha, ṇa, ṭha’ pothire pāṭha heuci –

lg.l: samara baḍhilā ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra baraṣa aprayante | 160 |
boile svāmī samare śrama pāila ki paśupati | 162 |
īśvare boile bābu muhiṁ bindhai yete śara
bighnarāja boile ẏehāra śarīre khañjila bajrara chauṁrī
teṇukari śasramāna na bhedanti ẏehāra śarī | 164 |
ẏebe tu keanta bichāra karu deba mane
tebe se daita ye hiba triputi | 166 |
kaṣṭhora kale debi gaṅgā ye gaurā | 167 |
bighnarāja boile tu mbhaku sehu sebi
mohora tahuṁ śuṇa tripurā badha hoiba kemante | 169 |
svāmī ẏe śahasramāna ye ghenilā tora tahuṁ
teṇu se badha puṇa hoiba hāde kāhuṁ | 170 |
brahmā biṣṇu debaindra āu candra sūryya
pabana pañchu pakṣī hoi lāgaba tahiṁra upara | 176 |
ruka yaju sāma atharba ye beda chāri
uttara dakṣiṇa pūrba pacchima charidiga ruṇḍa
satya tretaẏā ye dvāpara yuga kaḷi
ẏehi chāriheṁ hoibe rathaku chāricaka phaḷi | 181 |
himabanta mālyabanta bindhyamāḷa gandha ye mādana
ẏe chārinta rathaku khurākaleka ti locana | 183 |

lg.note: ẏe aśva hoibe śūnye ye ācari |–ka, gha
chāriheṁ uparaku hoibe chārithamba |–ka, gha

lg.l: tetiśakoṭi dedatāẏe dhara dhara māra māra boli bobipāri | 185 |
beni bhārijā debi boli śanta karāile | 186 |
īśvara rathī hele brahmā sārathi hoile
dūre thāikari dekhilā ye asura tripurā
jagannāthe boile svāmī ẏe svargadhārā debaśara
svāmī nābhigarbhara gambhīre ye na paśilā bajrachauṁrī
anya ṭhābare paḍile nāśa nohiba daitā | 194 |

lg.note:
athabā biṣṇu pabana agni debatā
ānaṭhāre paḍile nāśa nohiba daitā |–ṇa, gha
lg.l: trāse paḷāilā ye nara chaṇḍāḷa tripura
nābhi na diśai nārāja bindhanti dharmaṭī | 198 |
tiriśi sahasra baraṣa yuddha kalā prathame
pūroi śahasra ye na peṣanti debahara | 200 |
hastanāma nakṣatra ye bhoga se dinara
bighnarāja boile deba śarabindha he dhūrjaṭī | 203 |
nāma dhari boile paḍa tripurā nabhireṇa | 204 |
tripurā dhaṁsana nātha jaẏa tu śūḷapāṇi | 206 |
sānande āropaṇa kale tāṇḍaba ye nr̥tya
indra kaṁsāḷa dhaile pabana dhaile kāhāḷa | 210 |
nārāẏaṇa tāḷa dhari gāile madhura saṁgītā
debatāẏe bhāṣkara nidāgha udita kiraṇa jyoti
nidāgha udaẏe ki kiraṇa koti koṭi
kāḷa kāma rundheka chandheka bandhaka pañchu mudrā
dharaṇī kampai ye ananta nāga pheru | 222 |
lg.note: uṁkāra–oṁkāra |

nārāẏaṇa tāḷadhari gāile madhura saṅgīta
sarasvatī yāhāṁkara caraṇe bandita |–kha, ṭha
ananta paulasta kaṇva mārkaṇḍa bhāskara |–kha, gha
lg.l: saṅgama alekha nilekha nandana piṅgaḷa pañchujaṭā
śuddha saṣṭika barṇṇa aṭu parama yogī | 227 |
iti śrī śibapurāṇa bākya ye saṁgate
tripura badha ye śrabaṇe śuṇanti ẏekamane
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa rudragaṇa saṅge meḷā | 235 | 1083 |
lg.head: {@yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara birāṭa sabhāku gamana@}

lg.l: aṣṭadaśa parbae ye birāṭa parba kathā | 1 |
kīñchekara bhārā ye sahi nuārai pr̥thī
tāhāra badha nimante pāṇḍabaṁku ẏete śāsti | 3 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bhīma yāa birāṭa sabhāku
birāṭa cihni pārai ki nuārai tuku | 4 |
yebe tote cihni nuāre birāṭara nāhā
yibā birāṭa rājyeku tu āge hoi yāā | 5 |
birāṭa sabhare muṁ kāhāmukha chāhiṁ sampāda kahibi | 6 |
svāmī āmbhara kopare se nicaẏe nāśayiba | 7 |
bhīmasenaara bacane saja hoile deba konte
sauroba tambāpātrī kareṇa beda ye karāṇḍa
dvādaśa citā śrībatsa lāñcchana bāmakare kuśabiḍa | 11 |
deba samārjane kākhe biṣṇu purāṇa ye pothi
nirākāra puruṣa nātha dharmarāẏe ye yujheṣṭhi
pabitrā uttarī ye aṅgu ṣṭhire kuśagaṇṭhi | 14 |
kebaṇa beśī ẏe āsi madhyapure paśi
manuṣya abatāra ta sarūpa na diśi | 25 |
lg.note: ajapārī gāẏatirī pabitra bandha joḍā |–ña, tha

lg.l: khaṭanti āstāna taḷe ye yāhā bhuakhaṇḍa | 27 |
lakṣeka śaṅkha ye phurai āstānara taḷe
aleka bodhana ki ẏe guṇasāgara mahātamā | 33 |
aḷakāra nātha ki ẏe aṭai kubera
amarādhi nātha ki ẏe bije sureśvara | 34 |

lg.note: tini ahibrata bīratūra śada(?) pāhāri |–ka, ta, pa
hatarājya prāẏeka bichāra muhiṁ kali |–ka, pa, ta, tha

lg.l: khagabara cañchujāṇi nāsā kaṭi kaṇaẏa mekhaḷā
śuddha saṣṭā ka jāṇi diśai daśanaha
pr̥thuḷa prāẏeka bapu śobhā diśata ye kucchī
ulaṭa rāma kadaḷī jaṇi śohai benijānu
saṁkīrṇṇa majhā ye aḷapa ḍhaḷai tanu | 46 |
aẏeṁḷā puṣya prāẏeka pāda taḷipāra kānti

lg.note:
gabhīra nābhikunda ghaṭaṇa jāṇi gacchi ‘tha, ḍha, da’ pothire adhikā
pāṭha :–
sthuḷa praḷamba bapu kaṇaẏa patrakucchī
gabhīra nābhikunda ghaṭaṇa jāṇi gacchi |
keśarī jiṇi majhā aḷapa caḷai tanu |–pa, ta, gha

lg.l: āstāna yāke samaste tahiṁ kale mahabhaẏe
mantrī boile deba uṭha uṭha ho birāṭa
āja tu pāiachu mahātmā puruṣara bheṭa | 50 |
deba bipra tapodhana dekhile kari pūjā
dekhiṇa praḷamba ye hoile rāẏe maccha | 53 |
samaste praṇa patya hoile yujheṣṭhiṁka pādataḷe
samaste maunabrata kāhāra na purai bāṇī
mantrībara boilā deba samasyā kara rāẏe
birāṭa boilā mote lāgucchi baḍa bhaẏe | 56 |
bho mantrī tu tāhāṁku kaha tusti bāṇī
kisa uttara kahanti tohora bacana śuṇi | 57 |
semāne ki samasyā deita āmbhe pāri | 58 |
gosāiṁ kebaṇa bhmabanara ṭhākura tume aṭa | 59 |
kebaṇa rāṣṭa ke aṭai piẏara māẏe | 60 |
bairāṣṭa goṭra dharmadāsa paṇḍāẏe āmbha pitā
bhojara nandanī māheśvarī āmbhara ye mātā | 62 |
hastinā ṭhākura deba ye yujheṣṭhi nr̥pati
dvādaśa baraṣa ye se bulile banaghora | 65 |
ẏekabhūta hoi āmbhe ye nirañjana deba khaṭuṁ
ye se yujheṣṭhi se pratakṣa āmbhe aṭuṁ | 67 |
ẏeherṇṇeka mahātmā se karanti āmbhaku daẏe
se yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara āmbhara aṭai ẏekakāẏe | 68 |
āho birāṭa pañchubaṭī hāde pāṇḍabe rahithile
tohora rājyaku ye yujheṣṭhi ẏehikṣaṇi aile | 69 |
sādhu sādhu mahimāṁ se dharmarāẏe suta
61|2 pacchima saurāṣṭre kuñjagaḷa deśe āmbhara bāḍibr̥tti |–‘ja, ḍha, da, cha’
birāṭa boile kontamohora ẏeteka puṇya kāhiṁ
baṁśa mohora mukata hoibana yujheṣṭhiṁka pādapadma chāhiṁ | 73 |
rājusī yāga se kale yebaṇa kāḷe
āho birāṭa tu dekhi nuārilu āmbhara barṇṇacihna
birāṭa boilā muṁ pāñcha uttara śatebhāra subarṇṇa ghenigali
gaṇḍasthaḷe hāthadei se antarīkṣe ghenigale mukuṁ | 78 |
śarīre jībana rahila muṁ bratili dharmeṇa | 79 |
uṭha uṭha birāṭa boli ṭhāri dileka se kare | 80 |
baccha mudi goṭithilā yujheṣṭhi debaṁka aṅguṣṭhi
bijuḷi teja prāẏeka diśilā mama dr̥ṣṭi | 81 |
ābara dekhili muhiṁ bāma taḷipāra kānti
mohora chāra pāmara carma naẏana beniākhi
yujheṣṭha debaṁka śrī caraṇa kāhiṁ pāribi āra dekhi | 83 |
tebe sinā mohora rājyaku āsante yujheṣṭhi | 84 |
lg.note: ṣoḷadina pariyante nuārili dekhi |–ṭa, tha
lg.l: ẏeḍe parama bhāgya kariba mohora rājya
ẏe mohora rājye paḍiba ki yujheṣṭhi debaṁka pādaraja | 85 |
mohora rajyaku kiẏe yebe pāriba tāṁku āṇi
konte boile na bhāḷa rāẏe dekhāibā tote
āmbhe yebe ailu se āsibe dinākete ante | 87 |
tu maha dhāmaka ho aṭa bibeka guṇabanta
ati apuṇyetā āmbhe ye tote hoilu parāpata | 88 |
tuhiṁ se paṇḍita gyānabanta śirībanta subhāgyabantā | 89 |
guru nindākale hoai mūrkha, paṇḍite abagyānī | 93 |
deba nindākale dina na yāi bhale

lg.note: yanasata debatā brahmaṇa abhyāgata, subākya supaṇḍita subhāgya guṇabanta |–gha, ṇa

lg.l: bhojana nindākale anna ye na miḷi
parastirī ninda kale janme janme dukhi | 103 |
debī nindākale abaśya śira hoai cchedana | 106 |
br̥ddha nindākale ye huai dīrgha rogī

lg.note: sādhuku nindākale huai bhikārī |–cha, ka,gha, ja
lg.l: goru nindākale śūkara hoi hoẏe jāta
gurujana bākya nindākale sukr̥ta hoẏe hata

lg.note: subarṇṇa nindākale dukha huai anubrace |–cha, ja, ḍha
lg.head: {@yujheṣṭhiraṅkara śāḍhī grahaṇa@}
lg.l: āho caitanya bacana sarthuka yahuṁ śuṇiṇa birāṭa
boile konte tumbhe baḍāi dhāimika aṭa | 1 |
konte tumbhe kebaṇa purāṇe śakata kebaṇa guṇe bakatā
dharma bichāre āmbhe basuṁ ye sarbathā | 2 |
rājāra samāne basi āmbhe sabhāẏe bichāruṁ
konte boile birāṭa tu paśāẏe yāha hāri
āpaṇe na hāribe boli bolanti sabhāra | 6 |
satya sarūpa kari se kahuchanti bāṇī
tadyāpi birāṭa ye nuārila hāde jāṇi | 7 |
yācakeśvara mantrī boile śuṇa ho mahārājā
ṭhākura samāne lokaṁku bahuta na bajā | 8 |
yujheṣṭhi samāne āmbhe ārdhanā karibuṁ paẏara | 9 |
āpaṇāra śrī hāthare birāṭa ghenilāka śāḍhī | 10 |
lg.note: tatakṣaṇe debuṭi yāhā parijā kari |–śa, da, ka
tatakṣaṇe debuṭi yāhā padijā kari |–pa, ta
bajā = bahuta kari tāṅku āghāta dianā |
ṭhākura janaṁku tu bahuta na gañjā |–ta, pa

lg.l: ẏe mohora rājye tumbhe sabhāpaṇḍā hoila | 11 |
birāṭa ye yācai śāḍhī gheni hāthe
mohora rājye adhikārī hoila śāḍhī ghena konte | 12 |
dharmara nandnaa ye birāṭa śāḍhī dekhi
boiel bho paramānanda puruṣa tu ẏethaku hoa sakṣī | 13 |
kopa kariba śāḍhī na bānddhale māthe | 14 |
athaba kopa yebe mote kariba birāṭa
bichāri jāṇima tumbhe yujheṣṭhi deba nice aṭa | 15 |
muṁ ẏehāra śāḍhī taḷa hāthare ghenile
śāḍhī mathāre na bānddhale hoibi jāṇantā
prasanne nārāẏaṇa mote ẏe kaṣaṇuṁ pāri ye karantā | 17 |
dusaha kaṣaṇe yahuṁ konte kale cintā
konte muṁ tumbhaṁku śāḍhī yācili na jāṇi | 19 |
yujheṣṭhi deba samāne yāhāku karibi pūjāsebā
upara hāthe śāḍhī kemante debi abā | 20 |
tumbhara śāḍhī debā mote bihita ye āse | 21 |
muhiṁ chāra yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhibi āra kāhiṁ
yujheṣṭhiṁka samāne tumbhe aṭa ho gosāiṁ | 22 |
nārāẏaṇa sumari konte ābharaṇa kale basana
yogījana hr̥daẏa nātha tuhi se ādhipati | 25 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa saṁgati biṣṇu purāṇe | 26 |
pūjā pāi basile se birāṭa āstane | 29 |
śrīkare khaḍi gheniṇa dharmarāja ye yujheṣṭhi
triẏakaccha kariṇa ye dvādaśa koṭhi kāṭi | 34 |
aśvamedha yagyaṁra phaḷa kapiḷā dāna phaḷa śr̥ti | 35 |
dekhiṇa sānanda ye hoile rāẏe matse
birāṭa nr̥apti konta paṇḍāẏe basile pratikacche | 36 |
ẏeka āstāne bijaẏe kale rāẏe beni

lg.note: śrīkare khaḍi gheniṇa bhīmasenara jyeṣṭhi |–ca, cha, ja, da
lg.head: {@bhīmaṅkara birāṭa sabhāre prabeśa@}
lg.l: āho caitana ẏemanta samaẏe ye pāñchaghaḍi dinakara
śrībats alāñcchana hr̥de śarīre citā dvādaśa phuṭi | 2 |
bāmakandhe yagyaṁ pabitra uttarī beda ye karāṇḍa
mahā sambharbeṇa āstāne ye bijaẏe birāṭa
ākāśa tejiṇa ki bijaẏe ẏe mañcha maṇḍaḷe | 9 |
mahateja dekhi sarbe bujile beni cachugoṭi | 10 |
lg.note: mehā–megha
ākāśu utapati ẏe mañcha maṇḍaḷe |–ṭa, gha
mahāteja dekhi sarbe bujile benidr̥ṣṭi |–cha, ṇa, ṭha
lg.l: ki aba anaḷa debata aile brāhmaṇa sarūpe
mama dharma biḍite sarūpa hoi gopya | 11 |
birāṭa boilā ho dekha dekha kontabhaṭe(?)
ẏesanaka rūpa puruṣa dekhicha ki ẏe madhyajagate | 12 |
pāṇḍaba sohoḍa yāiṁ āstāne bije bega | 13 |
dūra dūra hoiṇa amanātya gaṇe gale ghuñchi
trāseṇa samāsyā ye na dianti kehi kicchi | 14 |
māruti praṇa patya birāṭara āstānara taḷe
aneka krodha rāẏe bhīmasenara praḷamba dekhi
jvaḷita kimbā na galāte ẏe mohora beniākhi | 17 |
yāhāra bhaẏe nāśagle baka hiḍimbaka kumbhirī kinnarī ẏe chāridaitā | 18 |
bābu lakṣeka nr̥pati yāhara caraṇe bande
ẏe bhmabi bhmabana madhye mahimāṁ tora sādhu | 21 |
bābu keuṁṇa puṇya matsarājā karithilā pūrbe
tāhara āstāna taḷe miḷilu āsi ẏebe | 22 |
lg.note: biṣaladu pāra karantā nāguṇī darpabhañjā |–ṭha, ṭa, ja, ṭa, gha
ẏe tribhmabana madhye mahimāṁ tora sādhu |–ṭha, ṭa, jha, ta
lg.l: ẏe mohora śarīra hoai kina dahija
ẏe thora kaṣṭa bābure dekhilaiṁ muhiṁ nilajja | 23 |
hāthara sukhare bābu muṁ ye kheḷilāi paśā
pañchukaṭaka hāri ẏebe bhr̥tyapaṇaku kali āśā | 24 |
kāhiṁra nimante bābure ẏeḍe kaṣṭa pāi | 25 |
bacane daridra hoi muṁ kāryyanāśa kali
kaurobanta māra boli kiṁpe na boili | 26 |
mote āgyāṁ magalu tu bhāi dusaha kaṭāḷe | 27 |
kiñchita kari yebe ābyāṁ muhiṁ dyanti
āmbhara tahuṁ se ye āgyāṁ na pāile
konte boile uṭha uṭha ho dvijabara
ṭhākuraṁkara āgyāṁ hoilā kāryya kahasi tohora | 33 |
mastake hāthe dilā kontaṁkara mukha chāhiṁ | 35 |
aneka binoẏa tu mote katha kahu
muhiṁ tote bichārai tu mānabajanma nohu | 38 |
konte boile tu śuṇa ho dvijabara
gaṅgā yamūnā ye beni nadīṁkara madhye
kuñjagaḷa deśa boli kṣetra aṭai sādhye | 41 |
se rajyare yujheṣṭhi debaṁka sānuja pāṇḍaba bhīmasenā | 42 |
konte boile ho birāṭa śuṇa sūpakārabr̥tta | 44 |
śuṇa ho machhcādhipati badaẏanti bīra bhīma
randhaṇā bidhāna jāṇai pūpakāra ballaba mora nāma | 45 |
hātara sukhe yujheṣṭhi paśā ye kheḷile
rājyabhāra siṁhāsana hāriṇa se banabasa kale | 47 |
lg.note: tohora kathāmāna kahasi rājāṁka chāmura |–ta, tha, jha
kuñjagaḷa deśa boli kṣetra boli hāde |–ga, ṇa
muhiṁ tāṁkara aṭai ballabha paṇḍābr̥tti |–cha, ja, na
lg.l: yujheṣṭhi ṭhākure tohora rājyaku aile boli
bātatā pāi muṁ śabdaku goḍāi aili | 48 |
birāṭa boilā ho bātuḷa hoilu dijabara
yujheṣṭhi debanāma dhailu tu se trailokya īśvara | 49 |
pāñcha ubhara śate ratha muṁ subarṇṇa ghenigali
ṣoḷaha dina pariyante draśana na pāili | 50 |
bhāi tāṁkara brikodara mo kandhare hātha dei
birāṭa boile konte muṁ pachārai tumbhaṁku
konte boile tumbhe śuṇa raẏe macche
ye se ballaba se bhīmasena pratacche | 54 |
ẏeharṇṇeka kari ẏehāku sadaẏe karai ye bhīmā
ẏe dija aṭai ho bhīmasenara pañchu ātamā | 55 |
birāṭa boilā ẏe yebe bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁkara sūpakāra
mohobeḷe ārddoḷiki muhiṁ pāribi ki ẏehāra | 56 |
ruha boli boile bhagati hoi pāribiki tote
yāa boli boile kopa karibaka mote | 57 |
konte boile rājā tu bhaẏa na kara kichci
sarūpa bujhibā ho thāu anna bāci | 58 |
lg.note: pāñcha ubhara śatebhāra muṁ subarṇṇa ghenigali |–ḍha, ka, ṭha
prataccha–pratyakṣa
ruha boli boile bhagati hoi nuāribi toe |–ka, ṭa, da, ṭa
parīkṣa bujhibā ho thāu anna pāci |–gha, ḍha
sarūpa bujhibā ho thāu anna sañchi |–kha, ca

lg.l: ẏekeṇa sapakārake rāndhaṇā muṁ samasta karibi siddhi | 59 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni bhmañji basibu tohara tule
chaḍarasa yogāḍa kari triputi kari pārai mohora bole | 60 |
śuṇiṇa samasta sabhā ye hoile āśrije | 61 |
lakṣeka sūpakāra rāndhaṇā tohora ye pure
ẏete sainiṁki anna ke pāriba aṇṭoi
dusaha pratagyāṁ dvija hāde kahilu ye tuhi | 63 |
bhī sena boilā śuṇasi rāẏe maccha
sarūpa nr̥pati tu dekha ho prataccha | 64 |
puruṁ bāhāra kara to lakṣe sūpakāraṁku
subarṇṇara kuṇḍahiṁ mātra thiba roṣua ghara pāśe
āhuri kathāẏe mora śuṇasi ho nr̥parāṇa
kicchi kicchi āṇai muṁ māla ye bindhāṇa | 68 |
śrīkare birāṭa ye ghenilā āpaṇe śāḍhī | 69 |
ghena ho bipra boli rājā yācai āstāne
birāṭara śāḍhī ẏeta na ghenima taḷahāthe
praṇamya nohiba ẏe na bānddhaba śāḍhī māthe | 72 |
muṁ ẏehāra rājyaku aili durgati bañchibi boli
dusaha kaṣaṇuṁ hari mote karibāka pāra
se śāḍhī thoilā nei kontaṁka agrate
paṇḍāẏe tumbhara śāḍhī se debāra yogāi bihite | 76 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka samāne tumbhaṁku muṁ karai sebā
ẏe ballaba sūpakāraku tumbhe śaḍhī debā | 77 |
śrī jaganna thaṁku sumaraṇā kari hr̥dagate
tohore pratikāra achai se deba mote | 78 |
birāṭara bacane āpaṇe śāḍhī gheniṇa dile dharmanāne
uṭha utha dvijabara boli boile dharmasuta | 80 |
dharma dharma sumari ye pāṇḍabara bāḷa
pāṇḍaba sundara ye prabeśa roṣuara śāḷa | 81 |
ẏesaneka upāẏa kariṇa se matsādhipara rājye
rāndhaṇā bidhāna se karia bīra saje | 85 |
kañchā bārunta neiṇa se pakābai cullī
doharā prasanne jaḷa jaḷa hāde boli | 86 |
yeteka jāḷa diai samasta kāṭha kañchā | 88 |
śuṇa deba rārādhi rājeśvara matsa ādhipati
bichāri bujhibā se kemanta hoẏe pāge | 92 |
kemante bichāra kala paṇḍaẏe rāndhaṇā bidhāna | 93 |
mohora bichāraku ta na yogāi ẏesana
se brāhmaṇa na diśai sūpakāra prāẏe | 96 |
tohora abadhāna kathā bhāṅgibu āmbhe kāhuñ | 97 |
kontaṁkara bacane ye boile rāẏe matsa
ẏehikṣaṇi muṇohira kāḷe kathā bujhibā praticcha | 98 |
tumbhe ye muṇohi kariba āmbhara tule
āmbhe ye sūpakāra karichuṁ tumbharahiṁ bole | 99 |
ẏemantara samaẏe roṣua gharu aile chāragaṇa
deba sūpakāra boile pāka hoilā sampūrṇṇa | 100 |
āhārṇṇika sārantu rāẏe na kariṇa heḷā | 101 |
sūryyabeḷe muṇohi kale āhāra hoẏe paṁku | 102 |
anna jīrṇṇa nohai ye somara beḷa paḍile
mandāgni hoai deba beḷa bāri nuārile | 103 |
ẏesaneka bebhāra deba achai śāhāsra saṁgati | 104 |
hr̥daẏa biṅghasilā birātā ballaba bākya śuṇi | 105 |
birāṭa boiā konte paṇḍita aṭai se brāhmaṇa
konte boile ho matsādhipa brāhamṇa bhīmara prātrama | 106 |
ye yāhāra saṅgate achanti paṇḍi panti | 110 |
rajyabhāra sampada tora ẏe baḍāi durlabha | 112 |
muhiṁ jāṇili rāẏe tu bāḍāi bibādī
pararāṣṭra māḍi tu hoilu baḍa dvandī | 113 |
lg.note: paidalya–padachārī bā padātika |

lg.l: samāna bhāba kale kāraṇa hoiba tore | 114 |
samasta saini tohora ho basantu chatreśāḷe
saṅgate bhmañji basile baḍimā pāi thāṭha
satakṣauṇī baḷa gheni ye birāṭeśvara basi
pāñchalakṣa supakāra gheni bhīma ye paraśi | 119 |
gaurī saurī naḷa bidhi ye rāndhaṇā
deba randhaṇā parā pāibe se kāhiṁ
ante jāṇu sinā ẏehāṁkara guṇa ye prakr̥ti | 123 |
amr̥ta rasa ye gāḍa bhmañjiṇa saini
samaste praśaṁsanti brāhmṇa tora dhani dhani | 124 |
āṁchobana sāriṇa ye rāja bijaẏe āstāne

lg.note: samaste praśaṁsanti ballaba mukha chāhiṁ |–ta, gha, ja

adabhmate brāhmaṇa tu kalu kāhuṁ,
keuṁṇa digapāḷa tu supakāra nohuṁ |–ṇa, ca, ṭha

lg.l: tumbhe paṇḍāẏe randhana kari kaṇakaḷape āmbhanta debā | 127 |
samaste bolanti birāṭa rājya tora hoilā siddhi
śuṇa ho manurāẏe tu mahatamā puruṣa
bhīmasena gopyāna kathā kahanteṇa na yāi śeṣa | 131 | | 1327 |
lg.note: bhīmasena gopyāna kathā kahante mahārasa |–ja, gha, ga
lg.head:
{@arjunaṅkara birāga sabhāre
prabeśa@}

lg.l: kaberī bhāra belāuḷa khoṣāẏe ka sañchi | 1 |
lalāṭare mathāmaṇi karṇṇe kāpa ye beṇṭulī | 2 |
ākāśara maṇi ki se benikare subarṇṇa caḍi
kiñchita batra naẏane caḷai heḷu heḷu
caḷai yogeśvarī ki beṇībhadrā nadī kūḷuṁ | 6 |
saṁsāra jana mohilā se puruṣa tirī beśa
kiẏe rambhā tejilā ki ākāśa bhmabane | 8 |
kiẏe teji ailā ki sābitrī menakā
bhaleṇa kehi nāhiṁ gabana kiṁke ẏekā | 9 |
lg.note: lalāṭare mathāmaṇi karṇṇe karnṇāñchaḷa badhulī |–ja, da
lalāṭare mathāmaṇi karṇṇe karṇṇāñchaḷa doḷī |–ka, ṇa

ājānu bhmajadaṇḍe subarṇṇara cūḍi
gaḷāre lambita mukutāmāḷī chāpasari |–ta, ja, tha
caḷai yogeśvari ki maṇibhadrā nadīkūḷuṁ |–ta, ca
lg.l: birāṭa āstāna sannidhyeṇa yāiṁ dhanurjaẏe bheṭi
dekhante na aṇṭai se saburi ẏeka dr̥ṣṭi | 10 |
bāsabara nandana yāi bijaẏe āstānara taḷe | 11 |
trailoka mohinī tāra rūpa guṇa dekhi
birāṭe pachārai konte ẏeta baḍāi apūrba
ākāśa bāhinī ki ẏehra sarūpa dekhiba | 13 |
āre nillaja ātmā mora kiṁpe achu rahi | 14 |
bābu duibāhe mahābhārā pr̥thī dhailu dhanuhuḷe
subhadrā chaḷe dvārikāẏe jiṇilu kr̥ṣṇa kāmapāḷe | 15 |
pāñchāḷī haraṇe tu jiṇilu sarba yodhī | 16 |
gosiṁha bhaẏe dvārakā rakṣāgalā tohora parasāde | 17 |
bābure araṇye gamante jiṇīlu tu aṅgārapannaṅga
śahasra bighāte bikotilu tāhāra ye aṅga | 18 |
bābu agni debatāra khaṇḍilu tu ludubudu byādhi
bāsabakaiṁ jiṇī khāṇḍaba banuṁ delu mauṣadhi | 19 |
kirāta rūpeṇa tu araṇye hara jiṇi
paśupatra akṣaẏa troṇa bara tote dile
hara pārbatī tote ye prasanna hoile | 21 |

div.note: dekhiṇa sabhājane hr̥daẏe kāmadr̥ṣṭi |–cha, ja

lg.l: toraparā bhāi āsi ubhārilu birṭara sabhātaḷe | 23 |
phuti kimpā na galāre mohora beniākhi | 24 |
phuṭiṇa na kahanti konte bichāranti mane mane guṇi
amara bhmabana jiṇi diśilāka ati śobhā | 26 |
amanātye boile uṭha āgyā hoilāka hāde | 28 |
sāṣṭāṅge paḍi ye achanti sehu bhūmigate
āmbhara āgyāṁ na pāile ye na uṭhai kirṭī | 31 |
konte boile tu go śuṇasi mahatmāṇī
birāṭara bacane ye se tūnī hoithilā
birāṭa boilā tu śuṇasi go sunderī
ke tohora mātāpitā ke tohora prabhma
kāhuṁ ailu tu go kāhāra kuḷabohu | 35 |

div.note: muhiṁ tumbhamku nāśakali paśāra kutuhoḷe |–da, cha, ga, gha, ja

lg.l: mohinī rūpa dhari paśilu moa rājye
kimbhuta tora sampāda kahakisa tora kāryye | 36 |
apara kāryya mohora bichāre nāhiṁ kicchi | 37 |
se arjunaku deba tuhi cihna pāru ki birāṭai
paśāre rājyabhāra hārile yujheṣṭhi debe yahuṁ
hastinā nagraku āura yibu āmbhe kāhuṁ | 41 |
yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhākura tumbha rājyaku ailu boli
se śabadakaiṁ muṁ ye goḍāi aili | 42 |
kanyāṁkara antapure muṁ thāi nr̥tyagīta kari | 43 |
mamahr̥de bichārai tu go diśu puruṣa lakṣaṇa prāẏe | 44 |
stirī puruṣa lakṣaṇu muṁ atai bāhāra | 45 |
birāṭa boile konte ẏe aṭai kisa rūpa

div.note: āpaṇāra kārye muṁ brahmāṇḍa bhramuacchi |–ca, ja, tha
mama hr̥de hejili tu puruṣa lakṣaṇa prāẏe |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: biśvāsagalā loka gheni karāa bege śodhā | 50 |
tebe se antapure thiba napuṁsaka hoile | 52 |
birāṭa nandana uttarakumāra parīkṣa se kri | 53 |
teṇu se pāthara upastha galā gopya | 54 |
sarūpa dekhilā nāhiṁ stirī puruṣa lakṣaṇa | 55 |
stirī lakṣaṇa nāhiṁ puruṣa lakṣaṇa galā gopya | 56 |
birāṭa boile konte sādhu mo jībana

div.note: antabāḍā–antāpāṭa |
stirī beśa nāhiṁ puruṣa beśa galā gopya |–gha, jha, cha, ga, ṭa
stirī liṅga nāhiṁ puruṣa lakṣaṇa gopya |–ta, ka
mahataṁka bākye jane labhanti puṇyamāna |–ja, pa, jha, ṭa

lg.l: prathame ye boilā yujheṣṭhi aile boli
se śabdegoṭi śubhilā muṁ teṇu nistarili | 58 |
konte boile rāẏe na ka hu āmbhe mithyā
puṇi abade pariyante dekhibu tu yathā | 59 |
ābara candrasūryya kiṁpe śūnye karibe gabana | 60 |
tu mohora uttarā bāḷīki nr̥tya karāa br̥hanārī | 61 |
arjuna ṭhākuraṁku dekhibi muṁ āra kāhiṁ
saṁsara andhapaṭaḷa phiṭāi tāhāṁka mukha chahiṁ | 62 |
yācakeśvara mantrī boilā tu śaṇimā mahārājā
mantrīra bacana śuṇiṇa se dhārmika daṇḍadhārī
ghenisi br̥hanārī boli śrīkare rāẏe toḷi
ẏehāra śāḍhī ye muṁ ghenile caḷahāthe
bhr̥tyapaṇa hoiba sinā śāḍhī bānddhale māthe | 66 |
tinihuṁ chāri mote diantā nāhiṁ śāḍhī
kahuṁ kahuṁ arajuna adhara puṣṭa kalā
āja tohora śirī sampada sarai birāṭe boilā | 68 |
hari se tohora bole aili birāṭa rājyaku
ẏe dharma kaṣaṇuṁ hari he pāri karibā muku | 70 |

div.note: abaśya sambharbe dekhibu rāẏe yathā |–ta, ja

lg.l: birāṭa boilā konte muṁ najāṇi kali anīti
tumbhe śāḍhīdeba hou ẏe br̥hnnārī ki
śrīhaste śāṛhī arjuna mathāre banddhalā hāde | 74 |
nr̥tya ārambha nei se pātile antapurī | 76 |
yujheṣṭhi sabhāpaṇḍā birāṭaku gheni kheḷābanti paśā
jāṇantā nohile ẏe tiniheṁ rahile ye gopye | 78 | | ‘405 |

div.head:
{@draupadīṅkara birāga bhabanare
prabeśa@}

lg.l: caḷa tu antapure go sudeṣṇā yahiṁ | 5 |
bije annapūrṇṇā maheśvarī ye sumari bhagabāna | 6 |
śrīkare benibāhī debī mukuḷa keśa sina | 7 |
mauna bikāre ye kāhāku bacana na bolai satī
kāhuṁ se āsiachu kaha go mahātmāṇī | 10 |
lg.note: sudeṣṇā–śrīkr̥ṣṇā |

lg.l: satya bacana āmbhara śuṇasi go māẏe ẏebe | 11 |
kathā na kahai go maunabrata jāṇi
kapiḷāsa tejiṇa ki bijekale debī umā
ki se śacīdebī aṭai indraṁkara bāmā | 14 |
ki abā padmabana teji aile kamaḷinī
tirīṁkara madhyeṇa go sundarī aṭai rambhā
saṁpoḍe kaṣaṇa go paḍilā thāsi tote
jagujana mohinī se go tirī ratnakānti
jāti padminī se rūpe rūpabantī guṇabantī | 18 |
nicaẏe tohora go se hoiba sapataṇī | 19 |
ke bolai tāhāku nemā keśa dhari

113 mana abikāre kāhātuhiṁ nāhiṁ sambhāṣi
mudusuli tirīmāne beḍhileka āsi |–gha, ñja, tha, ta

div.note: kāhuṁ āsi ẏethe bije mahatmāṇī |–jha, ṭa
ḍeṅguri –apamāna kari |

lg.l: ke bolai kuruḷi kari piṭibā mukhe dei biṇḍā
ke bolai hāṇimā ki kare dhari khaṇḍā | 21 |
mahata loka hoithiba na akra ghañchāḷa | 22 |
ghañchāḷa kale go abaśya hāde mari | 23 |
mohora chāmuku go gheniāsa bege puṇi | 24 |
śrīhari sumari caḷai pāñchāḷī ye birāṭa antapure
śrīkr̥ṣṇā bichāranti ẏeta pratakṣe aṭai rambhā | 28 |
ke abā kebaṇa drohe patita bhūataḷi | 29 |
kiabā sābitrī satyabante teji aileka ẏehi | 30 |
sarba lakṣaṇa beśa kiṁpe keśa ye mukuḷā | 31 |

div.note: kuruḷi–pāṭikari, tiraskāra kari |
ghañchāḷa–kaṭāḷa |
kaṣaṇa nimante abā āsicchi debastirī |–pha, ga

lg.l: ālo bahana samasyā kara bacana kisa boli | 32 |
māẏe samāna sādr̥śye hāde bacana kahibā
ẏemāna heji nuārile khaṇḍaṇa hoẏe tapa | 40 |
ẏete ṭhābaku caracha karanti paṇḍita ye bhāba | 41 |
tu ye dhārmika bibeka paṇḍita kuḷaśīḷa
to tahuṁ garuhaṁsī tāhāra diśai bākyabaḷa | 42 |
śriẏāra bodha bacane ye badaẏanti śrīkr̥ṣṇā
kebaṇa deśuṁ gabana kalu kaha go satr̥ṣṇā | 43 |

div.note: debatā anarūpe prasāda bhogyamāna |–ñja, dha, pa
bacana prakāśante śubhai aṇḍira kokiḷabāṇī |–ñja, ta

lg.l: ke tohora ballabha ke tohora piara māẏe
gr̥habāsa kāhiṁ go kebaṇ akuḷe jātahoẏe | 44 |
śuṇa go bairāṣṭa ura bhmabana maṇḍaṇi
mgo pacchima saurāṣṭe ye nadī bahai yamūnā
se nadītaṭe yamapraśasta indra praśasta jainta bāruṇā hastinā | 47 |
baḍāka pramoda sthāna ey kuñjagaḷ abārasvatī
nohai dropatī muṁ aṭai tāṁka dasī
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile go kahilu sinā bhalabākya
baḍāi dulabha kathā ẏe śubheta trailokya | 52 |
ājadinara kathā suphaḷa go puṇya apramitā
kimbhūta māẏā ẏe go śuṇuachu bāṇī
sarūpe satya ki ẏehā kahibā dr̥ḍhabāṇī | 55 |
kathā anarūpe bākya karanti prakāśa puṇa | 56 |
aneka rajye ye paḍai ẏehu kathā
āmbhe bichr̥ sata ẏe nohai sarbathā | 57 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile go basa basa māẏe
tu ye pucchākalu rāṇī go pāṇḍaba pāñchaṁkara kathā
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile go stirī mātra bhaḷi
sairindrī boile go sehu pratakṣe jighnasenī
dhanya se stirī aṭai satī biḷāsuṇī | 64 |
muhiṁ se draupatīṁkara aṭai nija dāsī
tāhāṁkara samāna mote abhinna na karanti śubhrakeśī | 65 |
sakaḷa sandeśamāna se kahanti mohora āge puṇa
tāhā tote kahibā tu ẏekamane śuṇa | 66 |
yujheṣṭhiṁkara tahiṁki se gamai yeuṁṇa dina
se kāẏā dahana yāi puṇa hoai āna kaẏe

lg.note: āmbhe boilum satya ki hoiba sarbathā |–ṭa, jha
nityeheṁ parīkṣa se karai doharāgna |
āreka brikodara tule trīḍārasa hoẏe |–ñja, ta

lg.l: se anaḷe dahana karai sehu kāẏe
nabatana śarīra gheni puṇa samarpai pārthiba dhanurjaẏe | 70 |
pañchu dine anaḷe dahana huai pañchu ghānti | 71 |
ẏekara ucchiṣṭha se ārekaku na diai
pañchai puruṣa hāde se ẏekai ātmā tāhāṁkari dehī | 73 |
saicindrī boile go sannidhey tāhākaiṁ khaṭi sebā
ẏesaneka abhinna kari se dekhai mukuiṁ
se yehne dropatī pratakṣe aṭe muhim | 76 |
sannidhye khaṭaṇi sebā nāma mora sairindhrī
śabadeka śubhilā tumbha rājyakaiṁ aile yujheṣṭhi debasvāmī | 79 |
lg.note: pañchu dine anaḷe kāẏā dahai bikoti |–ṣa, dha
satya pratipāḷi hoile banagāmī |–ca, ñja, ga

bichārili rājye tora aile dropatī
goḍāi aili māgo bacana saṁgati |–jha, ṭa
lg.l: muhiṁ bichārili draupatī yibenāhiṁ ki birāṭa rājyaku
māgo dekhili bibeka dhārmika tohoraka icchā
se nimante tora rājye rahite kali icchā | 81 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile yebe mohora bhāgya thiba
mohora chāra pāmarī draupatīṁki dekhibai kāhiṁ
khaṇḍai kinā durāpada muṁ tumbhara mukha chāhiṁ | 84 |
māgo kathā pucchibi tote muṁ hoiba kaṭāḷa
sarbaguṇe sādhabī māgo mukuḷa kiṁpe bāḷa | 85 |
sairindhrī boile mohora diare kali kaḷi
bhracchanā boli muhaṁ tāhāre bahuta dili gāḷi | 86 |
rāgeṇa na bānddhali mohora kaicchā aṅguḷi | 88 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile tora keśa ye mukuḷita
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile tora keśa ye mukuḷita
bandhana na kale puṇa hoiba kemanta | 89 |
sadibhāba hoi śuṇ akahai muṁ tāhā
mohor asvāmī hāthe upuḍāibi beni tāra bāhā | 90 |
tāhāra bhmaja śoṇite pakhāḷibi mohora keśa
tebe se bandhana karibi mohora satya bacana prakāśa | 91 |
śuṇina śrīkr̥ṣṇāra ye kaṇṭilā lalāṭa pāṭi
boilā stirīmātra hoi ẏeḍe kaichcā jagajjeṭhī | 92 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile ẏe mohora rājey samaẏeka rahile
tote puṇa bhagati kari nohai mohora beḷe | 93 |
napuṇa bhāinta mohora kari nuārai rakṣā | 94 |
sairindhī boile go ye se ṭhākurāṇī
draupatī śrīkr̥ṣṇā tumbhe ho ẏekaātmā jāṇi | 95 |
ye se sebaka go se sabuṁkari aṭai bhr̥tya
alekha tiḷekha beśa bhūṣana go karāuthibi niti
pada pālaṭā uttiṣṭha go na chuāṁibu māẏe
bhracchanā bola na bolibu aḷapa kathāẏe | 99 |
sāmānyeṇ ana piṣibu adoṣe na karibu tejyā
puruṣe na peṣibu na chuāṁibu mote śeyyā | 100 |
ẏe chadagoṭi kathā māgo karithiba dr̥ḍha
aneka dharma upujiba bacana mora gāḍha | 101 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile go mohora bicitra pure thibā
tumbhara bhrathā achanti kāhiṁ go mote tā kahibā | 102 |

div.note: tote ki bhagati hoi na pāri mohora beḷe |–dha, ṇa
samasta gandhacandana muṁ karipāri ẏekaprati |–cha, gha, ṇa
yathaprīti–yathāprati |
bhratsanā na bolibu mote dr̥ḍha ye kathāẏe |–ja, kha
bahuta dharma upujiba bākya hoiba tora hr̥ḍha |–ja, kha
bahuta dharma upujiba bākya hoiba tora gāḍha |–ga, cha
patibratā tumbhara go yāicchā karibā |–kha, ṇa, tha, ṭha

lg.l: sairindhrī boile māgo muhiṁ ẏethi thile
dekhu sinā svāmīṁki mohora tohora icchā kale | 103 |
pūrbe mote yāhā kahichanti mora mātā | 104 |
athabā se hoiba boli hr̥dagate bichāri
napuṇa huai niki ẏe dropda kumāri | 106 |
ghenasi mātā go boli urddhvabhmaja kari dhari | 108 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā śāḍhī ye yācanti upara hāthe
ẏe deba upara hāthe muṁ ghenimi taḷa hāthe
na puṇa kopa kariba śāḍhī na bānddhale māthe | 110 |
taḷa hāthe śāḍhī gheni bānddhale śireṇa
bho hari ! śāḍhī gheni puṇa śire na bānddhale
na puṇa jāṇai ẏe binoẏī nohile | 112 |

div.note: pūrbe mote yāhā kahichanti bidhātā |–cha, gha, ta
athabā se hoiba ki na hoiba hr̥dagate bisari |–ca, ṇa
ẏe puṇa kopa kariba śāḍhī na bānddhale māthe |–ga, ṇa

lg.l: hari tuhi se jāṇunā ho ẏethira carita
muhiṁ āśrita tohroa pāṇḍabe sina tora bhr̥tya | 113 |
tohora bacane sinā aili birāṭa rājyaku
tuhi ẏe dharma kaṣaṇuṁ pāri karasi deba muku | 114 |
śūdramuni sāroḷ adāsa namanti śate śate | 116 |
mora śāḍhī deba ẏāku nohai bidhana | 118 |
āgo sairindhrī aṭu tumbhe mohora rājye gaurobī
muhiṁ kemante tumbhaṁku śāḍhī upara hāthe debi | 120 |
