div.note: atharba deba mahāmantre se śakatā |–ka, ṇa, ña
chāribede ṣaḍaśāsra aneka mantreṇa mahāśakatā |–ja, cha, da

div.head:
{@birāṭa rājyare candanayātrā
utsaba prabarttana@}

lg.l: ābara ki yuddha hoilā birāṭa rajyare | 2 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti brahmaruṣi
kīñcheka badhakalā bhīma birāṭa rājye paśi | 3 |
baḍāi durāpada ẏe śuṇite mohor aicchā
agsti boile pāṇḍabe rahiel birāṭe gupate
mr̥tu maṇḍaḷare ye basanta uchcchaba yātrā

div.note: bhīmasena annakhāi puṣṭa hoilā apramiti |–ṭa, ka, ḍha

śuṇa baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
kīñcheka badhakalā pabana āpati |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: āho birāṭa yebaṇa rājyare raṅgasabhā nāhiṁ
yātrā ucchaba yebaṇ arājyare na thai | 10 |
nicaẏa se rājya jāṇa asureṇa bhogya | 11 |
basanta ucchaba yātrā acchi ṭiki mahārāje | 12 |
muhiṁ na jāṇai basanta ucchaba yātrābidhi ye kemante | 13 |
gopāḷa br̥ttahuṁ muhiṁ na jāṇai āna bhaṅgī | 14 |
sujana jana saṅga muṁ pāili ẏetekāḷe
tumbhe thāi yātrā āropaṇa kara kathā rahu cirakāḷe | 15 |
lakṣeka māḍha subarṇna boiba tora byāja | 16 |
tahiṁki kicchi bichara na kara benilakṣa māḍha lāguṁ | 17 |
kontaku samarpa mora lakṣe bhaṇḍāra ādikari | 18 |
ahibrateka māḍharatna tāhā chāmure dile āṇi | 20 |

div.note: gopāḷa buddha mohora muṁ na jāṇai ānabhaṅgī |–jha, ñja, pa, ka
byāja = sudha |
lakṣemāḍha subarṇṇa tora hoibāka tyāja |–ka, ṇa, tha, ṭa, cha
tahiṁki kicchi bichāra na kara mora yte dhana lāgu |–tha, ñja, ka
konte bijekale bhaṇḍāra sannidhāne |–jha, ṭa, tha

lg.l: āho biśvakarmā āhuṭadaṇḍa ye hoiba paṁkaja
amūlya ratnamaṇi mukuṭa ye hoiba lalāṭe
puṇi pāñcha ahibrataka māḍha dileka ratana
ahibrateka māḍha subarṇṇa uddaṇḍa ālamba pāñchalakhī
ucchaba nabara ye nadītīre tāhā rakhi | 25 |
phḷanta kadaḷī āmbha naṭikāḷa br̥kṣanta nei āropaṇa kari | 27 |
dibārātre abakāśa nāhiṁ lāgale bega begi | 29 |
rātra dibase dekhi upekṣā kalā nidrā kṣudhā | 31 |

div.note: nirbāṇa–nirmāṇa |
dibārātre biśrāma nāhiṁ lāgile begi begi |–ja, jha

lg.l: birāṭa boilā konte pratakṣe tumbhe dharma | 33 |
konte boile birāṭa ẏe kathā aṭai yugata
bāṇijya nāme karaṇa sukarma nāme yoga
dibya bimāne śrī cakradhara svāmī karāile bije

div.note: sakaḷa kāḷe āmbhe ṭhākurapaṇe bhogī |–tha, ña, ga

sarba subidhāne āmbhe aṭu paramayogī pādānta pare |–
‘ña, ṇa, ga, tha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
birāṭa boilā tumbhe ṭhākura yebe aṭa
mohora rājye kimpe bolāa kuntabhaṭā(?) |
konte boile ho mahārājā mahāprabhma
tumbhara chāmure āmbhe ṭhākura bolāibu kāhuṁ |
basanta ucchaba yātrāra bidhāne
konte srijanā kaleka sājeka basane |
phaḷanta br̥kṣanta se nābare nei ropi
chāpanta pare nei kaṇaẏa niropi |

lg.l: tahiṁ nei bije karāile deba dāmbodara | 44 |
hāthī daṇḍa ratha aśva baḍāi gahaḷa
āditya adr̥śya hoile uḍante paṭachatra māḷa | 45 |
kuntakaiṁ bahuta praśaṁsā ye karai birāṭa | 47 |
konte baṁśe baṁśe mora aneka puruṣa galā
ẏeḍeka sampada yātrā mora nāhiṁ na dekhilā | 48 |
konte boile birāṭe aneka puṇya karithile
bahuta puṇya upujai dharma udita hoile | 49 |

div.note:
samasta sampada gheni bijaẏe rājadebe |
pādānta pare ‘kha, ṭha, pha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
bīratūra ṭamaka ye niśāna ghoṣai
udaṇḍa pāṭachatra ye śobhā prakaśai |
śveta chāmara ye ḍhāḷanti caupāśe
trapūra guṇri āmoda uṭhai ākāśe |

lg.l: mahādeīmāne bije karibe ki yātrā dekhibā nimante | 54 |
yātrā stānaku kiṁpe na āsibe ẏebe | 55 |
dhāiṁyāi kahile yātrāku bije karibā ṭhākurāṇī | 57 |
āsa āsa maẏe go yibā yātrā dekhikari | 58 |
sairindrī bichāranti muṁ yibi ẏehāṁkara tule
dekhibi svāmīṁki mora achanti kinā bhale | 59 |

div.note: māranti picikā ndana rasa jaḷe |–cha, ja
yātrāthānaku ki birodha acchi puṇa ẏebe |–ka, ṇa

konte boile yātrā utsaba maṅgaḷe
yātrāṭhāku āsibāku yogāi sakaḷe |–da, ja
pachare goḍāichanti bhārā nibāriṇī |–pha, cha, jha, ṅa, da
sanidhye sairindhrī achanti goḍāi |–ka, ṇa, jha, ṅa, ṭa, ga, ja, pha

div.head:
{@sairindhrī daśane kīcakara
dūta preraṇa@}

lg.l: nābeṇa thāi kīñcheka ye chāhāṁka nirekhi | 2 |
daibe āditya asta prabeśa helā niśi
dihuḍi katire sairindhīra teja ye bikāśi | 3 |
ālo baḍāi upādhi ẏeta anteśvara pure dekhili | 4 |
koṭiẏe guṇe śrīkr̥ṣṇāhuṁ diśai ati śobhā | 5 |
kebaṇa rājā birāṭaku abā dila bindī
mote na kahi birāṭa kemante sampādi | 6 |
ālo tadanta kari tāhā pachāriāsa jāṇi
āgo kebaṇa rājāra ẏe aṭai kumāri | 9 |

div.note: sarbajana mohinī se trijagta mohinī |–bahu pothi pāṭha

lg.l: kuḷamūḷa nāhiṁ ẏehāra ẏe aṭai deśāntarī
ṭhākurāṇīṁki alekha tiḷakha karai nāma ẏehāra saindhīri | 12 |
svāmī kebiṇa deśara se aṭai deśāntarī
pitā mātā bhrathā kehi nāhiṁ ye tāhāri | 14 |
patibhrathā nāhiṁ tāra sannidhye khaṭi sebā
aneka aḷaṁkāra dei biśvāsa kathā boli | 17 |
hr̥daẏe bhūṣaṇa ye kaṇaẏa suraṅga prabhā | 19 |
dāsīnta tiārai bīra ẏemānanta kare gheni | 22 |

div.note: mukutāra jāli ye kasturī rekhā gheni |–cha, da
bidamudi bohuṭi kaṁkaṇa pāṇidrabya |–ṭha, ṇa

lg.l: mohora bhmabanaku nia samasta kathā kahi | 24 |
muhiṁ tāhāra bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya dāsara ye dāsa
draśana mātrake mora lāga lā muhāṁsa | 26 |
muṁhi mahāchatrī sairindhrī mohora binati ghenuu | 28 |
sairindhrī naẏana bāṇe mohora śarīra aśakatā | 29 |
muṁhi tāhāre śaraṇa se rakṣā mote karu
maẏāṇa paẏāṇaru se mote beḷeka uddharu | 31 |
ālo kaṇaẏa sāhāna karāibi bheṭāile sairindhrīki | 33 |

div.note: saburi upare mohora hoiba śirapaṇi |–ṭa, pa, ḍha
maẏāṇa śaraghātuṁ uddhari mote dharu |–jha, da, ṇa, ka, cha, gha, tha

lg.l: basa basa mahātmāṇī go durita apahari | 35 |
ẏe macchadeśa maghadeśa sukheṇa hāde bhogakara āsi | 36 |
māgo stirīṁkara tinidaśa ye kṣaṇake leuṭai
ājahuṁ mahātmāṇī go tora phiṭilā kaṣṭai | 37 |
stirījanma madhye go jībana tora sādhu
ẏebe āsi tohora go hoila bhābyakāḷa | 39 |
rājyara kāreṇī hoi pāibu tuhi sukha | 40 |
bichārilā pramāda cintilā āṇi mote bihi | 41 |
sairindrī boile tu ki hoilu bāī
pūrbaṇa yāhā arji ẏebe se tāha pāi | 44 |
hoi hoi mahātmāṇī go pūrbara tapa
kīñchakara draśane go khaṇḍibu tohora parba pāpa | 45 |

div.note: abhāgya daśaru uturile pāibuṭi kāraṇai |–da, cha
pūrba se yāha dāhi ẏebe se tāhā pāi |–ka, gha

lg.l: basanta utsaba yātrā bhiāile konta ye paṇḍāẏe
mā go maghadeśa macchadeśara se ādhipati
ẏe duideśa bhogya karai se kīñcheka bāhubaḷe | 50 |
samare jiṇipāranti se tini ye jagata | 51 |
māgo śrīkr̥ṣṇāṁka sannidhye tohora rūpa dekhi
kebaṇa bhābe bhajilā tumbhakaiṁ tāhāra pāpa ākhi | 52 |
āmbhanta rāi baragila hoilā bahuta abhyarthī
ājahuṁ khaṇḍaṇa galā go tohora durgati | 53 |
māgo sustha śarī prāpata adabhmate na gañji
kīñchekara prasāde go aneka bhoga bhmañji | 54 |
kīñchekara bhabanaku go chāla yibā ẏehikṣaśi | 55 |
aneka chṭu bacane kahilā yahuṁ kathā
śarīra kampāi debī rāgeṇa halāile mathā | 56 |
ālo stirīkuḷe upuji tumbhe aṭasi cāṇḍāḷī

div.note:
basanta utsaba ytrā bhiāile konta ye paṇḍa ta
toho subhāgya hoilā prāpata |–da, ṇa
māgo sustha śarī rpāpata akāraṇe na gañji |–tha, gha

lg.l: yāhā arajib ẏebe kaḷantara bhoga sinā | 58 |
puṇa janma labhi akhaḍeṇa bege pāpe paśa
ẏeghānti janama lo tumbhe hua mahanarkī | 60 |
uttiṣṭa bhakṣakara lo ẏethira ye anukarme | 61 |
poḍu poḍu banada lo nr̥pāa kiṁpe lajjā
yāa tumbhe janme janme paradāreṇī hoi nija svāmīṁki kara tejyā | 63 |
yebaṇa puruṣa tumbhaṁku lo hoiba bibhayoga
stirīkuḷe dūṣita tumbhanta āne karu bhogya | 64 |
svāmī aneka prārthanā kari kahilu tāṁku bāṇī
pāṣāṇa taraḷi parai āmbhara bākya śuṇi | 66 |
svāmī stirīkuḷe janami se baḍāi durāpāti
kiṁpāi āne tāhāku srijiacchi basi prajāpati | 67 |
jagujana mohinī rūpa dhari se pareṇ bhr̥tyakārī
sajjana lokaṁkara nāma huai ki saindhīri | 68 |
svāmī yeteka aḷaṁkāramāna chāmure dilu nei

div.note: uttaṣṭha bhakṣakara lo ẏethira utakarme |–cha, ṇa, da, pa, pha

lg.l: pradārā sucarita tāku lāgilā baḍa byathā | 70 |
duguṇa śrāga tāhara baḍhilā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
nirāśa bacana śuṇi se gaḷita mattahārā
āhā sairindrīre tu mohora pañcha bhūta
tohora nirāśa batana śuṇi diguṇa birahita | 75 |
koḷe dhariṇa dāsī mukheṇa pāṇi siñchi
sāṣṭāma nimanteṇa tāku ālaṭa dhari biñchi | 76 |

div.note: kāmadebara jvāḷā taku lāgila baḍa byathā |–da, ja
niśvāsa kharatara paḍai mohayāi |–ña, tha

“sāṣṭāma nimanteṇa tāku ālaṭa dhari biñchi”
pādāntāpare ‘ga, ña, tha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
yeṇiki chāhimle teṇe diśai saindhīri
sairindhrī sairindhrī boli ucce biḷāpa ye kari |
cetanā pāiṇa saṁkocana rājāra baḷā
rakha rakha sairindhrī mora pañchubhūta kaḷā |
re re sairindhrī mora pañchubhūta ātmā
biraha sāgaru mote bāreka uddhārantā |
adharu amr̥ta dei mote bāre sakhī
madane santāpa mote go tuhi pāru rakhi |

lg.l: luḷu mohora kāẏā sairindhrī nija ṭhābe | 78 |
kīñchaka boilā lo se kāhākaiṁ thāi sebi
dāsī boilā tumbhara jyeṣṭhabhagnī se śrīkr̥ṣṇa maha debī | 80 |
kīñcheka boilā ẏe ratnamāna nei śrīkr̥ṣṇāgchāmureṇa dia
mohora abastāmāna nānīṁka āge yāiṁ kaha | 81 |
buḍilā chatrīpaṇa muṁ samasta kali tejyā
ālo mohora abastāta yāuchu sarba dekhi
samasta kahibu go bhaẏa saṁkoca upekṣi | 83 |
abhyarthī kariṇa lo boliba tumbhe yāi
mohora jīiṁbāre yebe acchi tāhāṁkara āśa
sairindhrīki bheṭa se karāibe mora pāśa | 85 |
athabā oprodhe yebe na parib tāku boli
muhiṁ baḷātkāre anteśvaruṁ āṇibi yāiṁ kāli | 86 | | 3057 |

div.note: luḷu–loṭu |
nānī–bhagnī
anteśvaru–antapura |

div.head:
{@sudeṣṇā sairindhrīṅku kīcaka nikaṭaku preraṇa
o sairindhrīṅkara sūryyaṅku prārthanā@}

lg.l: nija āstāne bijaẏe kale birāṭa mahārāẏe | 2 |
karuṇā mudusulī yāi prabeśa śrīkr̥ṣṇāra pāśa | 4 |
aneka aḷaṁkāra yogāḍa neiṇa dile chāmu
dekhiṇa śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile lo kemanta jañjāḷī | 6 |
ālo upādhi aḷaṁkāra kimpe kīñchaka mo tedei | 7 |
mā go tumbhara sodara go aneka ratna dhvaṁsi
tumbh bhogya kariba nāhiṁki amūlya ratnarāśi | 8 |
ālo dāsī mohora mātāpitā achanti nā kuśaḷa

div.note: raẏaṇī–rajanī |
māgo tumbhara sodara go sarbaripu dhvaṁsi |–kha, ṭha

lg.l: ẏekā kīñchekaku go āborilā kisa byādhi
samarājya loke loḍi na pāilu mauṣadhi | 12 |
māgo anna na rucai tāmboḷai biṣapitā
lalāṭe kara tāḍiṇa go bhūmire diai ghodāloṭi | 14 |
aśr̥jaḷa ḍhaḷita go beni ye locana
māgo rātrare nāhiṁ nidrā dibse nāhiṁ kṣudhā
kebaṇa roga āsi kalāni baḍa bādhā | 16 |
bāraṇa na galā go ẏeheneka carita
dharma dharma sumarai se barāṭara nārī
ālo rājāṁka chāmure kaha badya āṇantu loḍi | 18 |
aneka dhanaratna lo nia mora tahuṁ
bege badya loḍiāṇa pāiba yahuṁ tahuṁ | 19 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye paḍigale mr̥cchā
ālo buddhi karani mohora yemanta bhāi hoẏe rakṣā | 20 |
mudusulī boile māgo tarasta noha māẏe
kebeheṁ na tuṭai se anaṅga mahābyādhi
bhala hoibāku tumbhara tahiṁ achai mauṣadhi | 22 |
11|1 kahai cturī se abhaẏe kuṭuṇī |–cha, ṇa, ṅa, ḍha
kebaṇa mauṣadhiṭi mote kimpā na kahu | 23 |
gosāṁaṇi go sairindhrī boli ye acchi tumbha tahiṁ
tāhara gale rakṣā hoiba tumbha bhāi | 24 |
ẏehāra aṅga lāgante tāhāra kṣaẏe hoiba byādhi | 25 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇāra sannidhye āsi sairindhrī hoileka ubhā
śrikr̥ṣṇā boile go pucchai tote bāki
mantra mauṣadhi māgo jāṇu ki byādhiki | 29 |
māgo kīñcheka mohora ye sahodara bhrātha
tāhāra bāhubaḷe go samasta rājya mohora sustha | 30 |
ẏethi rājya karuthilā kāḷa ye naumi | 31 |
se duhinti jiṇiṇa māgo rājya karai ẏetha | 32 |
māgo kīñchekara darpe sinā rājya ye mohora
tāhāku apacaẏe paḍile rājya mo hoiba chārakhāra | 33 |
beḷeka dāna dia go mohora sodara byādhikhaṇḍa | 34 |
lg.note: mahāsvatī–mahāsatī |
bāḷaarka prāẏe tanu diśe śobhā |–cha, tha
bāki–bākya, kathā |

lg.l: muhiṁ kehne jāṇimi go mantra mauṣadhi | 35 |
māgo mote dekhikari to bhāi kīñchaka kaā icchā
kūṭa buddhimāna yeteka kahuchanti ẏe sarba mithyā | 37 |
sañchaẏe bhāira mora śirī hoilā cuta
nohile bhrātha hoi bhaẏeṇīṭhāru pāṭhāẏe ki dūta | 38 |
tu chāra pāmarī lo bhikhārī deśāntarī
mātā sahodra lo ke aṭe tohori | 42 |
akuḷīṇa nārī tahiṁ bīryya ḍhāḷita na yogāi | 43 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile go aneka ratna debā
bhala sulakṣaṇī kari go bibhā karāibā | 45 |
māgo baḍhilāka roga ye srāgilāka soga
uchuḷilā nadī abaśya karai ye bhogya | 46 |
lg.note: sañchaẏe–niścaẏe |
cuta–cuta (tutibā) |
soga–sarāga |
naśanta–bināśa |
manīṣā–āśā |

lg.l: birāṭa śirī sampada se nāśayibāka yemante | 47 |
ābara jībante ki bratai mora bhāi
yāhā se arajilā abaśya taha sehu pāi | 48 |
māgo sairindhī tote kathāẏa pucchibi priẏabhābe
athabā bhala nohile na kahibu bairāge | 50 |
sairindhrī boile tote yāha acchi māgi
pādapālaṭā na chuāṁibu uttiṣṭha na chuāṁibu
puruṣe na peṣabu bhracchanā na bolibu | 52 |
ābara tu yāhā go bolibu tathyabāṇī
muhiṁ tāhā karibinā go bichāra kara rāṇī | 53 |
tohor chāra pamerī ṭhākurāṇīki kahu jiṇa | 55 |

“muhiṁ tāha karibinā go bichāra kara rāṇī” |–
pādanta pare ‘ṇa’ pothire adhika pāṭha ;–
pacchima dite yebe udaẏa sūryyajyoti
rāsāṅgata hoi yebe paḍibāka kṣita |
parbata upare yebe phuṭibāka padma
kūḷa laṁghi ratnākara yebe hoibāka madhyasthāna |
ākāśa yebe māḍi basibāka mr̥tuloke
tathāpi mahattvaṁkara na caḷai bākye |

lg.l: śatesiṁghara prākrama jāṇi dutī yema debatā | 56 |

ẏe mahīsthaḷa madhyare keśarī darpa sinā | 57 |
caraṇe lakṣmī tu bolāuchu karmara abaḷe | 62 |

māgo kīñcheka yebe tote hariba niścaẏe
keśa dhari kīñcheka tote go nemaṭi tatakṣaṇi | 65 |
sairindhrī boile śuṇa go karuṇā mudusulī
āgo samudra hoi yebe laṁghibāka mahī
māgo indradebatā yebe na karibāka br̥ṣṭi
prasabilā putra yebe mātā karibāka bhakṣa
se bāḷuta ābara kehne hoibāka rakṣa | 71 |
āgo svāmī na sahile sebaka kāhiṁ brati
māgo svāmī hoi yebe se sebakeṇa hoẏe rāgī
muhiṁ tohora rājyaru yāuacchi go māẏe
mohora ẏethe thile paḍiba go bahuta apacaẏe | 74 |
śuṇi śrīkr̥ṣṇāẏe boile ẏehara ẏehuṁ gale
pura mohora dahija hoiba ẏehāra piṭhidile | 75 |
māgo beḷeka kṣamā karibā muṁ hoili anīti | 76 |
rāgeṇa apāra bhracchanā ye bolanti poilī | 77 |

tāhāra kāhiṁ thiba arjilā aneka janma puṇi |

mohora ẏethe tha(?)le paḍiba bahuta apacaẏe |

śrīrāmacandrara bhāriyā go aṭai debī sītā
tāhākaiṁ puṇi harinelā go rābaṇa daitā | 80 |
māgo gautama ruṣiṁkara bhāriyā nāma tā ahilā
se puṇi kāḷe go karāile kr̥ṣṇe rati | 83 |

kīñcheka birāṭaku yebe nāśa muhiṁ karibi
konta paṇḍā nāmagoṭi kehne bolāibi |
lg.l: āho birāṭa kṣīrodra laṁghile ki pr̥thī hoẏe rakṣā
śiba sampada na paile ki pūroi manobāñcchā | 73 |
ṣaṇa(?) prahara kale ki bratai hāde gāba
dharma laṁghile sacaracara bratai kebaṇa bāga | 74 |
birāṭa boile konte anīti ki ẏe kathā
kebaṇa bhagya ẏehāra ṭhākuraṁkara hoiba banitā | 75 |
praẏāge jhāsi se yāhā kariba manabāñcchā
kīñchaka prasanne prāpata hoiba ẏehāra icchā | 76 |
ghr̥ta bhojana pāile ki tejyā karanti bahani
bhārā nibāraṇa hoile ki bisarai medinī | 77 |
prāpata nidhi ke puṇa pelāiba pāde
bipuḷa bhoga bhmañjiba sairindhrī kīñchakara parasāde | 78 |
birāṭe boiel konte ati puṇya kale sundara huanti yugatī
ati puṇye se dhana santāna huanti puṇi | 80 |

lg.note: dharma laṁghile sacaracara kibrtibe saẏaḷe |–ka, gha, ṅa, ja, pa
kebaṇa bhāgya ẏehāra kīñchekara hoiba banitā |–ka, ṇa
bhārā nibāraṇa hoile ki birasa hoai medinī |–ka, cha
ati puṇye karithile sundara pati pābanti yubatī |–pa, ga

“kīñchaka sairindhrī hoilā ẏetekāḷa bheṭai”
pare ‘ṭa’ pothire adhikā paṭha:–
prāpata hoiba yesaneka karmaphaḷa
nia ho kīñchaka tote dilu abaśya nuhai biphaḷa |

lg.l: bho daiba bihilu āṇi ẏetedūra pariyante | 83 |
mahā anaḷa bidāri jāta yebaṇa jighnasenī
sabhāre nyāẏa bichāre tumbhanta praśaṁsanti jagate | 85 |
birāṭa rājyare gosāiṁ muṁ aṭai nirimākṣī
muhiṁ anastuṇī mohora paiṁ kṣaṇeka hua sākṣī | 86 |
dharma bichāraṇā tumbhe samasta ṭhābe kaha
muhiṁ dukhī pāiṁ kiṁpe kathāẏe na kaha | 87 |
tumbhe thāuṁ hariba mote kīñchaka maharāṇe | 88 |
yujheṣṭhīṁka samāne tumbhaṁku birāṭa karai sebā
kīñchakara haraṇu gosāiṁ mote pari karidebā | 89 |
bahuta binaẏe sairindhrī aneka tusti boli
rājā harilāra tu kāhāku karibu guhāri | 91 |
lg.note: “bho daiba bihilu āṇi ẏetedūra pariyante |” pāda pare ‘ṭa’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
sabhātaḷe ubhā se hoichanti dropatī
kara dhari oṭārai kīñchaka senāpati |
bho daiba puruṣa ẏehā lihiachu yāhā
ke āna kariba bidhātā lihiachi ẏehā |
dharmaku kontapaṇḍāẏe sākṣīhua tiḷe |–kha, ṭha
kīñchaka kaṣaṇu gosāiṁ mote pāri karidebā |–pa, ḍha, cha, gha
lg.l: tohora kr̥teṇa tu ye aneka sahilu
kara tohora kāryya āmbhe pratakṣe dekhilu | 92 |
sairindhrī boile gosāiṁ muṁ nohoi anāstuṇī
mote rakhibāku achanti candra sūryya beni | 93 |
pañchu gandharbe aṭanti mora nija pati
na poṣanti na naśanti na sahanti paraharaṇa
ye mote hariba abaśya ghenibe tāra praṇa | 95 |
se pañchu gandharbe tora jīuṁ jīuṁ male | 96 |
konte boile se tote rakṣā karantu kina | 97 |
yāhāra nāma dharile kaḷadaṇḍa chāḍai ye yama | 98 |
gandharbe tohora chāra lo keteka mātra bāi
puruṣa marāi mote na deba apacchāti | 100 |
birāṭa boile mote ẏemāna na ḍarā
ūrddhvakaiṁ sākṣī karai debī bitrama bacane | 102 |
kaṣā basana pariharaṇe tāra na diśai aṅga
boile sādhu sādhu kīñchaka re jībana tora dhanya | 104 |
lg.note: kara tohora karyya āmbhe pratakṣe boilu |–ka, ṅa
ye mote hariba abaśya tāhāra maraṇa |–da, ka, ja, ṅa
ūrddhvamukha hoi sākṣī karai tridaśa debagaṇe |–pha, ka

lg.l: mr̥ṇāka nāḷa sahite yehne diśai suraṅga paṁkaja | 105 |
tote se srijilā acchi amūlya ratnakānti | 109 |
sairindhrīra kara dhariṇa ye kīñcheka boilā
āstānaku ailu tote birāṭa ki rakṣākalā | 110 |
birāṭā boilā āẏi na bhāḷa āna kicchi
bipuḷa bhoga bhmañja bhajilā tote lakṣmī | 111 |
caḷai kīñchaka ye sairindhrī kara dhari
baḍāi sihāṇī tu aṭu go caturī | 112 |
re praṇa ballabhī mohora puraku yibā āsa
ājaka mr̥ccha mote prasara hou raẏeṇī | 114 |
baraṣe pariyante mohora nāhiṁ puruṣara meḷā
keśabāsa maḷiṇa ye kāẏe mo apakhalā | 115 |
kīñchaka boilā yibā go mohora puraku
sahasre mudusulī mājaṇā karibe jāṇa tuku | 116 |
ājaku hoiba sarbe chāri dibasa chāri rāti | 117 |
tretaẏāyuge pāñcha dibase raja mukta hoai nārī | 118 |
raja mukata hoai kahile agasti tapobante | 119 |
āho kīñchaka aśuddha hoanti yebaṇa kamanārī
prathama dina chuiṁle chāṇḍāḷa chuiṁlā doṣasari | 120 |
yte basre chuiṁle tete basre srāhāna yebe kari
tebe se śarīruṁ pātaka khaṇḍai tāhāri | 121 |
dutīẏa dibase ye chuaṁnti aśuddha nārī
aśuddha yubatī ye chuaṁnti tr̥tiẏa dibase
liṁgabhagna doṣa ye labhanti se puruṣe | 124 |
gaṅgāre srāha na kale tuṭe se pātaka
caturtha dina ye chuaiṁ aśuddha yubatī

lg.note: āho kīñcheke aśuddha huanti yebaṇa nārī |–da, pha
tebe se pātaka yāi kahile sairindhrī |–pha, ṭa

“gohatyā stirīhatyā surāpāna huanti biṣuḷipati” pare
‘ṭa’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
caturtha dina yebaṇa jana hoanti ārata
pitaloke rajabiryya karanti bhmakata |
garbhanāśa yai baṁśa na rahai
pañchama dibasare śiśu nāśayāi |
ṣaṣṭha dibasare maranti bāḷake
śiśubadha doṣa puṇa arjai aḷapake |
saptama dibasare sakaḷa kāryyasiddhi
tohora āgare kahili yeṇu tu subuddhi |
lg.l: pañchu mahāpātaka ye caturtha dine chuiṁle
pañchama dibase śuddha hoai agasti boile | 127 |
sairindhrī boile tu ye baḷātkāre bīra chuiṁlu āja mote
śirī āṣya tuṭilā tohora jībathibā pariyante | 128 |
āho kīñchaka brāhmaṇa hoi yebe jaḷaku bhaẏekari
śarīra gaḷita hoai yebe keśapachā yogī | 131 |
debatā hoi yebe atihiṁ hoẏe kopī

div.note:
“pañchama dibase śuddha hoai agasti boile”
pare ‘ṭa’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
ẏete doṣa lekhai ye rajakārīṁki chuiṁle
kicchihiṁ doṣanāhiṁ ye kīñchaka boile |
śarīra uśvāsa nimante ye keśa maṇḍāi yogī |–da, cha, ja

“śarīra gaḷita hoai yebe keśa pachāyogī” pādānta pare
‘ṭha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
byādhibanta hoi yebe matsastarī bhogī
ẏehipari karmakale naśayānti begi |

lg.l: atihiṁ kr̥paṇe ho nāśa yāānti sādhu
br̥kṣara phaḷa yebe prāpata huai kare
yugate kāli mohora śuddha srāhāna pāḷi
beśa beśana hoi muṁ āsibi kāli prantaoḷi | 138 |
kīñcheka boilā mote acchikini tohora icchā
kebaṇa abhimāne mote kalu ẏeḍeka icchā | 141 |
sairindhrī boile ho tohora mohora chorī śr̥ṅgārare
āho kīñcheka pañchu gandharbe achanti ye mohora nija pati
āstāne rājyara parimukhe hoilā yahuṁ āgyāṁ
gandharbe mote nirāśa hoibe śuṇiṇa pratagyāṁ | 144 |
āstāne basi yahuṁ āgyāṁ dile rājā
kīñcheka boilā tu ye paṇḍita sugyānī
kiñcheka prabeśa hoilā āpaṇā śaẏana sthāne | 147 |

div.note:
“kīñcheka prabeśa hoilā āpaṇā śaẏana sthāne” pare ‘da’
pothire adhikā paṭha :–
rātra prabeśa yahuṁ hoilā pañchaghaḍi
daka daka sairindhrī ye kīñcheka kathā manepaḍi |
sairindhrī basiṇa ye karanti bhābanā
āho konte anāsta heli tumbhe thāu sinā |
ākāśa bhāṅgi ki na paḍai mora śira
pr̥thī kiṁpe rāsāṁgata nohilā ẏetebeḷa |
ẏetebeḷe kiṁpā mote tumbhe sāha noha
tumbha parā sodara ki moteta na kaha |
baḍā baḍa lokamāne hela tumbhe pāṇi
kīñchaka ki baḷabanna tumbhaṭhāru puṇi |
kete drapiṣṭha asura mārinahaṁ hāthe
ẏetebeḷe anāstaṭi kala ho sāānte |
moho prākarma kari muṁ dina gaḍāili
ẏebe āsi bikṣāsīra pātrare paḍili |
dibasa śeṣa āsi hoilā bhāḷu bhāḷu
kīñchaka chāra peṣiba tāhāra nagraru |
asti nāsta kahibāku mora buddhi nāhiṁ
ẏehikṣaṇi śrīkr̥ṣṇā ye khojibe pure yāiṁ |
apakhyāti helā āhe dīnabandhu thāuṁ
gupata kathā na pheḍile kontabhaṭā(?) yahuṁ |
birāṭāṁkara baśare rahichanti pañchubīre
bhīmasena rahile ye nicinta āhāre |
br̥hanārīpaṇa kale arjuna ṭhākure
sahadeba tantrīpāḷa hoi dudhabhāte dinanele |
[abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇā antapuraku ye na gale sairindhrī | 148 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā bichāranti sairindhrī ye kīñcheka puraku galā
chāṇḍāḷa bhāi mora tāku chāḍita na dilā | 149 |
ājara rāti yebe yāiṭi mote bhale
karmara suphaḷa mora pramāda na paḍile | 150 |
bho dharma debata mote karibāka rakṣā
sarba śūbha bidhāne mora pūrāa manabāñcchā | 151 |
ẏeṇe ātaṅga paiṇa ye dr̥padara nandinī
tu se bhagabāna bhūta bhabiṣa gyāṁtā

div.note: [pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
gopyānare rahichatni birāṭa rājyare
śrīkr̥ṣṇāṁku khaṭili muṁ citra karibāre |
sarbatra kathā jāṇai śrīkr̥ṣṇā nikara
āmbha prati kahibāku upāẏe ye nāhiṁ tāṁkara |
ẏeṇe bhāi teṇe svāmī ghenichanti yāku
kisa bā kahibe bhāi prati buddhi na diśe tāhāku |
aneka santāpa tāṁka manara madhyara
niśce jāṇa nāśayiba kīñchaka mahābīra |
ẏemante pāñchante dina abasāna helā
śrīkr̥ṣṇā puraku ye sairindhrī na galā |

lg.l: taba yātrā dekhante hoili muhiṁ dukhī
ẏe mohor aabasta kahibi svāmīṁkara agrate
niśāẏe kehi deba na dekhantu mote | 157 |
jagujana sodara nātha muṁ tohora śaraṇa | 159 |
kīñchekara baḷātkāru mote uddhari dhara catrapāṇi
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa praṇapatya na rāẏaṇa pādagate | 162 | | 351 |

div.note: athabā gaṇḍasthaḷa mora pakāa bege hāṇi |–ka, ṇa, gha
athabā gaṇḍasthaḷa mora pakāibi hāṇi |–jha, ga, ṅa, ta,pa, ḍha
tu deba jānakīra kānta kodanta cūḍāmaṇi |–cha, da

div.head:
{@pañchapāṇḍabaṅka nikagare draupadīṅka
kīcaka mr̥tyura gupta parāmarśa@}

lg.l: byāse kahichanti se ye pādukā mantragoṭi
ẏekā pādakare yaiṁṇa kontaṁka pure bheṭi | 1 |
svāmī lakṣe nr̥pati yāhāra caraṇa taḷe nitye bande
svāmī goruchorī kariṇa ye aniḷaka basu
tiniyuga andha se taba daraśane cakṣu diśu | 8 |
svāmī tohora caraṇa reṇu śire gheni
śarira nikaḷaṁka hoile niṣādara putra tini | 10 |

div.note: mahānidrā ghoticchi śoichanti nicinte |–ka, ṇa, gha, ṅa, pha, ḍha, jha, ga, ṭa
śarira nikaḷaṁka hoile byāsaṁka putra beni |–ja, pa

lg.l: bhala bhala kari aśva gaja ratha bācha
yeteka jiṇi pāribu teteke sanya gacha | 76 |
beni parāẏadha ratha batriśa parāẏūdha hāthī
pacchima diga chāranta se hakārile bege | 79 |
āre sateheṁki sairindhrī nimante gandharbe kīñchakaku māile
svāmī āmbhe thāi dekhiluṁ se kīñchekaku agnire dahile | 80 |
ājara dibasa baḍa suphaḷa hoilā mote | 81 |
dropatī nimante se kīñcheka badha kale | 82 |
bhīṣma droṇa duheṁ ye hoile ẏekānte
sairindhrī nimante gandharbe māile śate kīñcheka raṇe | 85 |

div.note:
āre sataṭiki gandharbe kīñchekaku badhakari
svamī sarupe dekhilu āmbhe agnire nei bhari |–kha, da cha, ja

“sairindhrī nimante gandharba māile sate kīñcheka raṇe”
pare ‘ṭa’ pothire adhikā pāṭha –
aneka badhāi ye paile tahiṁ chāra
boile ẏehita sarūpa bichāra |

lg.l: bhīṣme boile droṇe kemanta bujhala ẏehu kathā
nohile mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe ki thāānti gandharbe | 87 |
bhīṣme boile droṇe sairindhrī ye svaẏeṁ aṭai jīghnasenī
tada nimante kari se sairindhrī nāma gheni | 88 |
jagujana mohinī se tāku kīñcheka āśākalā
bhīma tāhā sahi nuāri tāku sampoḍe nāśakalā | 89 |
gahuta ānanda ye hoile bhīṣma droṇe
driyodhana boilā tumbhe śuṇimā guru he
trigartta ye śaraṇa paśilā āmbhara tahiṁ
tāhāra nimante kari abā yāāntu āmbhe bāhi | 93 |
bācchikari dilu ratha gaja aśva ye saini | 95 |
bhīṣme boile bābu ẏe mohora bola śuṇa
tāhara danta gheni se yāu trigartta mahārāṇa | 97 |
para kāryye na yibā āme pararāṣṭa
sāmānya jaṇa puṇa se nohoi birāṭā | 98 |
tumbhe mahabhigyaṁ deba najāṇa aba kāhā
āmbhe jāṇu birāṭaku baḍa jaṇe sāhā | 99 |
yāa ho trigartta boli boilā śakuni
śubhayoge yaiāsa ho godhana pala gheni | 102 |
āradrā nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara | 103 |
bigchā saṁkarāntiki ye naba dibasa bhoga | 104 |
aneka ratne ratha gaja aśva maṇḍi
garjanti yoddhāẏe ye gagane teja dekhi | 108 |
caḷai trigartteśvara bandi mānage bindara padārabinde
hāja ḍāka dianti bīre parama sa nande | 109 |
yamunāra kūḷe kūḷe ye caḷai samadaṇḍa
garjana tarjana nāda śabade ye kampai brahmāṇḍa | 110 |

div.note:
“mohora thāṭha bhaẏe yāiki gandharba chāraku”
pādānta pare ‘ta o tha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–

ratha gaja aśva kehu parikaḷi
samudra ulloḷa prāẏe sanya koḷāhaḷi |–ta, tha

lg.l: caḷai nija baḷa ye pacchima mūrati
prathama dina paẏāṇa batiśa yojana prati | 111 |
puṇi āreka dina bāāne yoajana yāi
ẏekādaśa dibase rājā thāṭha galā caḷāi | 113 |
tahiṁ yāi trigartta thāṭha rahilā benidina | 114 |
bīñcheka nāśagalā ye birāṭara kebaṇa abastā | 115 |
svāmī trigartta bāhilā ye amāpata sanye | 118 |
pāñcha yojana māḍi deba thāṭha chanti tahiṁ rahi | 119 |
ratha gaja aśva pādānti deiachai narendra | 120 |
bahuta pahija kathā deśāure kale yahuṁ puccha
hā hā kīñcheka boli kara tāḍai lalāṭe | 122 |
tohara abhabe śatr̥ mote hoilā kaḷantā | 123 |
konte boile ho birāṭa raha raha
birāṭe boile konte muṁ kahai tumbhaṁku
jībana suphaḷa muṁ tumbhanta karithili sebā
ẏebe gosāiṁ tumbhe ye yāhāra rājyakaiṁ yibā | 127 |
mora bhāgye nāhiṁ tumbhanta sebā karibāku
gamibai nānā tīrtha pinddhabaiṁ bāsa kaṣā | 129 |
binā yuddhe śatr̥ku ghuñchibā nohai yukata | 130 |
daṇḍa goṭiẏe gheniṇa yibā chāla peli
sāma dāna bheda daṇḍa chāri prati boli | 131 |
keuṇisi parakāre yebe śatr̥ku jiṇi nuāri
tumbhara buddhi thile konte sājibā hou thāṭha | 133 |
sāja ho samadaṇḍa aśva gaja ratha sahite | 134 |
bājai bīra tūra ṭamaka ākāśe śubhai hāde dhūni | 135 |
bahuta baḷa cañchaḷa caḷante mahī heḷa ghenaiñ sindhu māta | 136 |

div.note: śatr̥ kaḷibeṭi tohora bisma rante |–ṇa, tha, ṭa, cha, ḍha
bahuta baḷa cañchaḷa mahī ullasita |–ña, ṭa

lg.l: bahuta sambhare ye bāhāra hele thāṭha
kehu se dhāmanti ye dhariṇa murāṭa | 137 |
maṇḍanti rahubara kaṇaẏa jaḍita ratha taṭe | 139 |
hīrā nīḷā poẏeḷā baiḍaryya māṇikya markata mukutā
ratha pīḍhāṁkara caukati lambai kṣadu ghaṇṭiḷā
rathare aśva se ye yocile śvetabarṇṇa | 144 |
ye yāhā ye ddhāẏe ye achanti gahane | 145 |
bācchiṇa aśva ye yocile chāri bāji | 151 |
chela catra konta nārāja asipatra yāṭhi
tāḍa toḍara gumpā saraḷa bāhuṭi kuṇḍaḷa
hr̥de bhūṣaṇa padaka mukuṭa karṇṇāñchaḷa mekhaḷa | 155 |
ye bidhi yoddhāmānaṁku āpaṇe rāiṇa dile śāḍhī | 156 |
bhaṇḍāra pheḍāi dile yoddhā ye mānaṁku
nabalakṣa yoddhā ye tāhāra tuleṇa paẏāṇi | 160 |
indra bije parāẏe diśai thāṭha caḷuṁ | 162 |
konte boile ho rāẏe śuṇa macchembara
aśva gotāẏe gheni kari ho tu thibuṭi ṭhākuraṁka pachakati
daśabiṁśa bhāñji pārai se tuleṇa thāu rāẏe | 167 |
brāgha mala māilā se dekhilu pratakṣe
kontakaṁra bacane balalbha sūpakāraku hakāriāṇa yāi | 169 |
gosāiṁ ballabha gosāiṁ ballabha boliṇa ḍaka dei
rāndhaṇā roṣuare na śuṇanti tāhā karṇṇe | 172 |
brāhmakaiṁ pāḍi yenehe siṁgha ye ātreṣi
kere mora ṭhākura boli chāhaṁi rakata kumuda dr̥ṣṭi | 174 |
gosāiṁ tumbhanta yibāpāiṁ āgyāṁ dile macchādhipa svāmī | 175 |
lg.note: ruāi–ḍakāi |
parikakṣe–parikacche–pratacche–pratakṣe |
hāthīki bekhi yehne siṁgha ye ātreṣi |–ṭa, ñja |

lg.l: boilā birāṭa chāra rājā se kāhāra ṭhākura | 176 |
muhiṁ tāhāra caśye ki yibai āstāne
gale dvandahuṁ mote na peṣai āne | 177 |
kāhiṁ bolai bragha māra kāhiṁ bolai māla māra
taba āgyāṁ meṇṭilā se ballabha sūpakāra | 179 |
boila birāṭa chāra se kāhāra ṭhākura | 180 |
ẏeḍe duṣṭa gheni deba muṁ bañchu acchi dina | 181 |
birāṭe boile konte ballabhaku bola kirāga
se ghāṇḍi ruāi āṇila marāila māla brāgha | 182 |
se rāga dhariṇa se nailā chāmuku
paṇḍāẏe kopa na kara ho ballabha sūpakāraku | 183 |
konte muṁ ye tumbhanta rājyabhāra samarpili
ballabha ruāi āṇu tumbhara āgyāṁ boli | 184 |
rājāra bacane ki se uṭhai sūpakārī | 191 |
konte boile ṭhākuraṁkara āgyāṁ ye hoilā
kīñcheka nidhana śuṇi tigartta bāhilā thāṭhe | 194 |
rāja ẏebe bije kariachanti samara bhūmire
āgyāṁ hoilā tumbhe thāa rājāṁka saṅgatare | 195 |
agyāṁtabāsa nikaṭa hoilā boli mane mane guṇi | 196 |
ẏehu daṇḍa sājibāku mānabe nohe raha

lg.note:
jita mahāprasāda boli birāṭa bidhāna
rājāra bacane se na uṭhai bhīmasena |–gha, cha
raha–yogya |

lg.l: āna rājyaku yogāile se kahilā akāraṇe | 202 |
trigarttaku āja jiṇi pārai ṭiki bhale | 203 |
maghadeśa jiṇi birāṭa thāṭha ye paṭoāri | 204 |
gaṇḍukī dhārā se dakṣiṇa bhaguṁ phuṭi | 205 |
se nadīra kūḷe rahile birāṭai saini
mānabhaṅga parbate rathi bāratā dilā dūta | 207 |
pañchadaśa yojana paẏāṇa kalā ẏekai dibase | 209 |
baruṇagiri parbate taḷe se ruhāilā thāṭha
aneka basra aḷaṁkāra dei trigartta binopai | 211 |
lg.note: āja trigarttaku kemante jiṇai bhmajabaḷe |–gha, ña

kamabhadrā bolikari ẏekai nadīgoṭi
gaṇḍukīdhārā se dakṣaṇa bāhinī dei phuṭi |–ṇa, ta, ña, cha

lg.l: senāẏe ratagyāṁ kale trigartta bacana śuṇi | 212 |
re re kara kariṇa samadaṇḍa gheni uṭhi | 213 |
mūḷānāme nakṣatra ye bhoga se dinara | 214 |
śarada mehu prāẏe hāthīṁkara ghora garjuṁ | 220 |
birāṭara saini ye nija bhūmi svadeśī

lg.note:
“āgiāṇi thāṭhare se samara nirodhi” |–‘ka’ pothire
adhikā pāṭha’ |
parighāi thāṭha se yehne hoile sāgara paẏodhi
yesaneke sakaḷe se laṁghanti bārādhi
paḍanti thāṭha se na lekhanti kāhā
mānagobindara prasade se samare śasrabāhā |

lg.l: lāgilā samara kehu na ghuñchanti raṇe
garjanti tarjanti senā na bhāñjanti baḍimāpaṇe | 225 |
bahuta baḷa cañchaḷa ye kehu pāriba kaḷi
piṭanteṇa bhājilā ye gaja aśva ratha | 230 |
naba sahasra rathī paḍile naba yojanaku | 232 |
pādānti yoddhā se ye paḍile aneka | 233 |
beni sahasra rathī se nele bandīkari
konte praśaṁsanti sādhu sādhu birāṭa tohori | 234 |
bhagna baḷa gheniṇa caḷai rāẏe trīgartte
raẏaṇī prabhāte puṇa sājilā tāra thāṭha | 236 |
ghoṭile samadaṇḍa ye na yāi gaṇitā | 240 |
āpaṇe uṭhilā se gagane ghoṭi ratha | 241 |
konte boile thāṭha sāja ho birāṭa
samara dharma sinā rājāẏe rājāẏe bheṭa | 244 |
rathīki rathī pātraku pātra yoddhā yoddhā sama
ẏemanta samara ye śāhāsre acchi dharma | 245 |
pataṅga poke paḍi ki bratai agnihotra | 246 |
nakuḷa śvetaaśva caḍhi pache madhye birāṭeśvara rāja | 248 |
lg.note: pātaṅga ḍaranti ki agnire paḍante ghr̥ta |–gha, cha
lg.l: jānuṅhaṇṭa mahābāhu boliṇa birāṭara beni rathī
giribara tuṭā se mahā maha dantā
thāṭha manthana kale se yoddhā benijane | 251 |
biśikeśana boli se birāṭara sāna bhrātha
āgiāṇi thāṭha se tule benisasra ratha | 252 |
piṭiṇa trigarttara sanya māri kalā padā | 253 |
trigartta rājāra sanya paḍile ẏeteka puṇa
āpaṇe khaḍaga gheni raṇaraṅge uṭhile kṣatriẏa sohoḍā | 256 |
re re kāra kariṇa se samareṇa uṭhi
bakapala dekhi yehne śāmaḷa goḍānti niprohi
teheneka kariṇa trigartta ḍākai mahākopa bahi | 258 |

lg.note: utaṅga sārikṣe kāẏā nāga mahāmattā |–gha, ka
āgiāni thāṭhe se bulai apramita |–cha, gha
lohamaẏe nirbāṇa kare gheniṇa beni gadā |–ta, tha

lg.l: ohobaḷa saini ye na yāi bāraṇa | 262 |
para ke āpaṇā boli nuāranti cihni
ke sahasre nārāja ke śateka bāṇa māri
āditya asta se ye sandhyā abakāśe
rakata māẏeṁse karddana hoilā yojana sāta | 266 |
garjanti tarjanti se na ghuñchanti raṇe
āpaṇe birāṭa tāku ye pakāila hāṇi | 268 |
yete yete samara kale sehu raṇe
tohora prasāde māgo kahi ki dibyarīti | 271 |
ṭhika ṭhika kari kalpalā kahili śāsramate | 272 |
he paṇḍita jane na dharibā mohora doṣa

lg.note: sehimati andhāra ye diśilāka daśadiśe |–ṭa, gha, cha, ñja
muhiṁ tāhā lekhākari pāribi ki ẏekājaṇe |–ka, ṇa
lg.head: {@trigartta saha yuddhare birāṭara bandīhebā@}

lg.l: senāpati pāridaṇḍa gheni samare uṭhilā birāṭa
ti garttara tule rāẏe hoilā yāiṁ bheṭa | 2 |
trigartta boilā birāṭa paḍilu mora mukha
āja se pāsoribi banabāsa kaṣṭa dukha | 3 |
kīñcheka gheni mote ye cintilu pramāda
śaraṇamatsaḷa mote sambhaḷilā rājā māna ye gobinda | 4 |
birāṭa boilā re kīñcheka abā malā
ẏekā birāṭa tote śate kīñcheka hoilā | 6 |
muhiṁta na jāṇai tuhi bhale achu braḷi
boilā konte āna rājyaku yogāa tumbhe mantrī
birāṭaku trigartta rāẏe ye baḍa kaṭāḷuacchi
ẏesana samaẏe ye bhīmasena galā ghuñchi | 10 |
lg.note: āpaṇe śahasra dhari ye uṭhilā birāṭa |–ñja, ṭa

lg.l: bhīma nakuḷakaīṁ yehuṁ na dekhile kati
tiniṁkara bhāñjante ye bhāñjile sarba sanya
trigarttara saini ye na gale gaṇana | 13 |
tini parāẏūdha rathī pāñcha paraẏūdha hāthī
ẏekādaśa parāẏūdha bāru naba kṣauṇī pādānti | 14 |
kehi jaṇe sakhā ye nohile rājāku | 15 |
ballabha sūpakāra yahuṁ na dekhilā kontabhaṭe(?)
nija kara birāṭa nei tāḍilā lalāṭe | 17 |
birāṭa boilā muṁ ta bujhi nuārili
śatr̥re mitratā kari na pāili kicchi kāryya | 19 |
puṇa bichāre mora kīñcheka prāẏe sākhā

lg.note:
“jaḷaprabhā tule muṁ maitra hoili” |
pādānta pare ‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
samudra pāri karibāku se boilā yemante
mote āsi kathāgoṭā kahilā sehimate |
nigūḍha gaṇḍa dekhi harilā mitra prāṇa
se kathāgoṭi mote phaḷilā ẏehikṣaṇa |
kontabhaṭa(?) saṅgate muṁ baḍhāili prīti
mahāghora sāṁgrāme mote dei ẏekāḷe kale bhīti
lg.l: teḍeka loka yebe galā mohora nāśa
ẏehānta gheniṇa ghuñchile konta ye paṇḍite | 23 |
yujheṣṭhi rahile yāiṁ kaupīna nāme bane
thāṭhasanya ketye paḷāile khinikṣetra hoi ẏeṇeteṇe | 24 |
ẏekā birāṭa ye prahareka yuddha kalā
pañchaṣaṭhi sahasra yoddhā ẏekā birāṭa tuhāi pāḍalā | 25 |
nabalakṣa yoddhā gheni trigartta birāṭa rathe piṭi
sahasra khaṇḍa hoi bhajilā birāṭara rathagoṭi | 26 |
samaste praśaṁsā karanti sādhu sādhu ho birāṭa | 31 |

lg.note: yujheṣṭhi rahile yāiṁ kauśika nāme bane |–ṇa, pha, ta

lg.l: ketana boliṇa yoddhāẏe trigarttara dhāiṁlā ati bege
se gajara chāri caraṇa paḍilāka cchiḍi | 36 |
birāṭa hāṇante gajamāhunta huheṁ gale cchiḍi | 37 |
āre thāṭha manthāna mohora kala ẏekajaṇe | 39 |
puṇihiṁ ḍāka dilāre beḍhiṇa bege māra
dharma adharma boli kicchihiṁ na bichāra | 40 |
dhaiṁṇa beḍhile birāṭaku sanya pāñcha ye kṣauṇī | 41 |
aniryyāpa kariṇa birāṭa binddhalā aneka śara
ke phaḷāẏe kāṭilā ke gadāẏe khaḍaga bhāji
trigartta boilā birāṭa tora pocchilā yama pāñji | 43 |
prāṇe na māri jībante dharare birāṭanta | 44 |
birāṭa sumarai mote dharma debatā hua sāhi | 45 |
jaẏa jaẏa śabada kari se caḷai trigartte | 47 |
kuñjeśvara bane dharmadhārā boli ẏekai parbate
samara sambharbe thāṭha upabāsa dina tini
āho caitana bimuha hoi ye pāḷāile kontabhaṭe(?)
sūpakāra bājīpāḷa duhinti bheṭile kāmenī sara taṭe | 51 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka mukha chāhiṁ brikodara kahai hasi | 52 |
konte boile se ẏemanta kimpe kalu bhīmā
ẏeheneka upugāra kala tote birāṭa mahatamā | 53 |
tinaśāṭhi pauṭi anne na purai tohora peṭa
na jāṇu banaste pāilu yete kaṣṭa | 54 |
bābu tohora ārddoḷi sahi nuāranti giri ḍiṅgare
bābu kāima caḍāi parāẏe hoilā āmbhara gati
ye anna diai ho tāhākaiṁ anīti | 56 |

lg.note: jaẏaśaṅkha śabada dei se caḷilā trigartte |–ta, tha, ja, cha
dujaṭi baṭataḷe duheṁ chanti basi |–ṭa, ñja, pha
haribaṭa taḷe duheṁ chanti basi |–ṇa, pa, cha, gha
lg.l: āre śateka śaḷā tāra māilu anamite
bābu yebaṇa br̥kṣataḷe dagadha beḷe basi
dhika ta jībana mohora poḍu beniākhi
nilaja ātmā kiṁpe rahici birāṭa kaṣṭa dekhi | 60 |
bhīmasena boilā gosāiṁ tumbhanta yāhā boila birāṭa
svamī tāhā śuṇi kopa ye basilā mohora hr̥de
se rāge muṁ apasarili birāṭa bandī galā hāde | 62 |
konte boile bābu tohora āpada gheniyāi
birāṭaku āṇa ho bege bandīru mukuḷāi | 63 |
bābu yāhāra anna khāi tāhāra kāryyakari
kalāra upugāra bābu kebeheṁ na pāsori | 64 |
bhīmasena boilā svāmī samara gāraḍi bidyā
mohora āṣya gheni brata birāṭa pārahou | 66 |
bābu birāṭaku yebe tu na āṇibu jībante
mote ki āura re pāibu dekhante | 67 |
bābu nārāẏaṇa sumari caḷa ya hr̥dagate
śatr̥ māri bābu kuśaḷe huasi yāi ubhā
yemante birāṭa bandīru mukata hoi temanta kara re bābā | 69 |
lg.note: mohora āgyāṁ gheni batu birāṭā rakṣā pāu |–jha, ṭa, ta
lg.l: bhīmasena boilā deba muṁ karuacchi samara
kalpa kalpāntara puruṣa nabakoti mantra sādhi | 73 |
jātaka yātrā ādi ye sarba anakūḷe
dadhi rucira badana ye sarba maṅgaḷe | 74 |
sadaẏa yogeśvara tu kṣīra sāgara byāpi | 75 |
maha bhigyaṁbanta puruṣa nātha prāpata hou nidhi | 76 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa badsaẏanti mukati gati arthe | 77 | |4468 |
lg.note:
jaẏatu dadhibābana matsarūpa ādi
aleka nirañjana puruṣa sarbamantra sādhi |–ṭa, ña, ḍha, cha

sarbamaṅgaḷa svāmī tuhi se anakūḷa
dadhirūci maṅgaḷa sarba śubhabeḷe |–ṭa, ña,
lg.l:
bhīmasenaṅkara yuddha o birāṭa
rājāṅka mukti
nirbhaẏe ballabha kontaṁkara āgyāṁ śirare nibeśi | 1 |
rātra pāñchaghaḍi uttāre deḍha prahara parabeśa
bāma dakṣiṇa kare śāḷabr̥kṣa beni gheni
yama debata bijekale ki kāḷadaṇḍa gheni | 3 |
kare nuhāra bāḍi se gheniṇa nakuḷa | 5 |
āre āre boli boli nirghāte dila ḍāke
meru leuṭi abā paḍilā ki khasi
nirghata bajrabāṇa madhye ki paḍilāka āsi | 8 |
pāda ghāteṇa ye pāṣāṇa gaḍa bhāji

div.note: kuruma camakolā ḍhaḷilā pr̥thīdebī |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: yebaṇa mattahāthī caḍhi trigartta yuddha kr̥thilā
sehi mattahāthī dhari bīra bikrama gatire bulāilā | 11 |
rathaku rathe ghena se piṭai pābeni
kāḷebara mr̥tti dekhi trāsai yama debata | 17 |
bhojane śaẏane samare nāhiṁṭi yāhāra śrama | 18 |
trigarttara saini ye samareṇa bege uṭhi
gadā mudugara chela cakra śahasranta gheni piṭi | 20 |
bajra ẏeḍanteṇa na tuṭai yāhāra kāẏe
asimunā tīkṣamunā nārājaku nāhiṁ tāra bhaẏe | 22 |
śarīre śahasra paḍante yāhāra digr̥ṇa uṣata

div.note: saini upare nei piṭilā māruti |–tha, kha, jha

lg.l: rathe ratha gaje gaja aśve aśva piṭi
para ki āpaṇā boli se bāraṇa na yāi
āpaṇe āpaṇe marāmari hoi paḍile nibujāi | 27 |
pāñcha parāẏūdha rathī daśa parāẏūdha hāthī
biṁśa parāẏūdha aśva sāta kṣauṇī pādānti | 32 |
ẏekā pāṇḍabake māri sarba kalā cūra | 33 |
nakuḷa rahithilā se ye thānapāḷa rūpa dhari
se aneka saini ye goḍāi prahāri | 34 |

div.note: sodara bhāba boli na yāi gaṇitā |–ka, ḍha, ṇa

lg.l: aneka rathī yoddhā se ye thile baḷabantā
jaṇe rathi samara kari nuārile tāhāṁkara āge
mithuna āditya jāṇi teja tāhāra diśi
dante tiraṇa gheni bolanti śaraṇa rakha svāmī | 38 |
śaraṇa bolante goḍāi dūguṇa karai prahāra | 39 |
medinī na sahai ye bikrodara mahābhārā | 40 |
mr̥tupiṇḍara ghāẏe ye na diśai bāṭa | 41 |
rudhire bilepana ye bhīma nakuḷara kāẏe
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni bāhilā ti gartta
chārikṣauṇī paḍilā sanya aśva gaja ratha | 43 |
sakaḷa saini marāili āura kisa mo jībati | 44 |
samasta saini rājāra muṁ marāili ẏethe
kuṭumbha marāi yebaṇa prāṇī jībanaku āśakalā
nicaẏe jāṇimānā se jīuṁ jīuṁ malā | 46 |
rtha leuṭānte bhīma prahāra kalā muthe
trigartta lohāra gadā gheni piṭilā atibege | 50 |

div.note:
“mukataku kāraṇa boli trigartta bāhuḍile |”
–pare ‘cha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
ẏete bhāḷi trigartta ye leuṭāilā yāna
bhīmasena āge āsi miḷilā bahana |
birāṭa rajāku rathe bandhana kariacchi
dekhiṇa kopānaḷa pabanara batsa |
rathare uṭhante prahāra kale muthe
trigarttara ratha bhāji hoila bhaganaste |

“mukataku karaṇa boli trigartta bāhuḍile |”
pare ‘ḍha, tha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
raṇayagyaṁ karibā boli bāhuḍile sarba rathī
bindhanti tīra kamāṇa dhanure bajra śakati |
re re kāra śabada kari bhīma piṭilā dr̥daṇḍa
trigarttara ratha bhāṅgi hoilā śatekhaṇḍa |
sārathira muṇḍa moḍi pakāilā maruti
garjai kāḷānaḷa bitrama keśarī jyoti |
ratha bhañjante trigartta paḍilā muhaṁ māḍi
dhāiṇa ātreṣi ye sūpakāra dhailā darāṇḍi |
birāṭa trigartta duheṁ paḍile rathataḷe
uṭhi nuāri trigartta gadā piṭilā bhīmaśire |

lg.l: āre raha raha boli bhīma bāmaaṅga pāti
ṣāṭhiẏe ṣāṭhiẏe bhāra benigadā bhāji cūra hoilā tatakṣaṇānti | 51 |
raha raha trigarttare nisate na paḷā | 53 |
mūḷikā dekhi yehne pheru na ṭekai ahi
bhīma hākanteṇa ye kampilā tāra dehī | 54 |
neuṭi chāhīmlā pache sanya kehi nāhiṁ
bhājilā teja tāra sehi ṭhābeṇa rahi | 55 |
keśaku ākreṣi trigarttara bhīma dhailā aṅge
bāmakare trigarttara keśa ḍāhāṇe birāṭara keśa hāthe
antararīkṣe duhinti dhailā caraṇa na paḍe bhūmigate | 57 |
yujheṣṭhi bije kariachanti ṇīḷendī nāme bana
ballabha boilā gosāiṁ ẏe birāṭi trigartte
duhintihiṁ āṇili āgyāṁdebā he mahata paṇḍite | 60 |
tra garttaku chāḍidia se paḷāu indrapraśaste | 61 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara mahimāṁ
paḷāilā tra gartta se mathāre hātha dei | 63 |
boilā jībna dāna pāili konte ballabha parasāde | 64 |
sādhu sādhu ẏe brāhmaṇa sūpakāra hoi
konte kīñcheka thilā se ye mahābḷabantā
ẏehāṁka samāne se puṇi raṇe nohe jitā | 66 |
kiẏe rudra baruṇa kiẏe nārāẏaṇa gopyāna | 67 |
na jāṇi boili muṁ ballabha ballabha
ājahuṁ sebā mohora tote binaẏa svabhāba | 68 |
konte boile kīñchekaku māile yebaṇa gandharbe
baḷe āsi toto rakṣākale sehu ẏebe | 69 |
āho sehi gandharbe ho ballabha dehe paśi
sehi se samara kariṇa trigarttara thāṭha dhaṁsi | 70 |

div.note:
“paḷāilā tra gartta se mathāre hātha dei |”
pādānta pare ‘ṅa, ja, da’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
bhaganasta hoi se trigartteśvara galā
gogoṣṭhe godhana tantrīpāḷaku bheṭilā |
āho deba tantrīpāḷa śuṇa mo bacana
kṣīra amr̥ta bhakṣi deba santoṣa hoilā |
ẏethu anantare katha śuṇasi rājana
godhana haraṇa kathā bicitra ākhyāna |

lg.l: anāstahiṁ ye kale rakṣā karibe nāhiṁki ẏebe
amahata nuhanti se pañchu ye gandharbe | 71 |
bacane bodha se hoile rāẏe macche
na jāṇi baṇā se ye dekhile pratakṣe | 72 |
sadhu sādhu sūryybaṁśara daśaratha rājāṁka tanaẏe | 73 |
sādhu sādhu mahatama ruṣa śiṅga mahabrahma
yāhāra mantre tohora śarīra gṭi janma | 74 |
sādhu sādhu mahātmāṇī debī ye kauśulyā
jagabandara puruṣa goṭiki se garbhare ṭhāba dilā | 75 |
sādhu sādhu se jānakī sītaẏā nāme debī
sādhu se bīrabara bāḷī kumbhakarṇṇa rābaṇa
niḷendī puṣyabarṇṇa jāṇi yāhāra deha goṭi
śūdramuna sāroḷa dāsa yāhāra pāde loṭi | 79 | 4547 |

div.note:
bacane bodha karāile rāẏe matse
na jāṇila bhīmasena boli baṇā hoilā prataẏe |–pa, tha, ḍa

div.head:
{@trigarttara parājaẏa bārttā śuṇi mānagobindara
raṇasajjā@}

lg.l: āho caitana dhanumāsa kr̥ṣṇāpakṣa pañchamīra tithi
samasta samadaṇḍa gheni managobinda bije indra praśaste
aṣṭādaśa dibase macchadeśe yāi rpabeśa hoilā thāṭha
dui dibasa pariyante āmbhe paḷāilu bhāji
tr̥tīẏa dibasaku deba thāṭha uṭhilā gaḷagāji | 5 |
birāṭaku chāḍi paḷāile tāra sanya amanātye | 6 |
svāmī yeteka samara se birāṭa kalā ẏekā
beḍhidhari trigartta birāṭaku bānddhalā tāhāra rathe
birāṭara sanya deba paḷāiel deśa chāḍi
dutīẏa dina trigartta basiba macchadeśa māḍi | 9 |
godhana pala se āṇile āmbhara saini
ẏemanta dekhi deba ailu bāratā gheni | 10 |
aneka sānanda rājā māna ye gobinda
bijaẏe kurunātha dhanu śukḷa ṣaṣṭhī gurubāra
puṇa āna bāratā dilāka āna chāra | 13 |
svāmī prathama dina trigartta bandīkalā birāṭa
sehi rātra arddhamāne bhejana karuchanti samaste
nirāśa samare upabāsa karithile sanya tini dibasa pariyante | 15 |
arddhamāna uttāre rātra aḍhāi prahara parabeśa
bandhana kari birāṭaku trigartta basāiacchi pāśa | 16 |
birāṭara sūpakāra ẏeka brahmaṇa ballabha paṇḍā boli
rātrakāḷe paśilā āmbhara thāṭhe gaḍadvāra peli | 17 |
svāmī ẏekā brāhmaṇake yebaṇa samara kalā
deba dānaba manabe tāhā nāhiṁta dekhilā | 18 |
ẏekādaśa yojana pariyante sanya paẏeḍa paḍilā
chāri kṣauṇī baḷa ẏekā rātrake nāśakalā | 19 |
svāmī mahāghora niśākāḷe na galā bāraṇa
birāṭa trigarttara keśadhari brāhmaṇa ghenigalā macchadeśa
neiṇa dilā se konta paṇḍāṁkara pāśa | 21 |
droṇaṁkara hāthe ye droṇe karatāḷa dei
hasiṇa uṭhile bhīṣḷe bidura mukha chahiṁ | 22 |
bhīṣme boile droṇe ẏe ghānti kṣīra pāna karibā anubrate
duipadma dohāṁḷa gāī gheni āsuacchi trigartte | 23 |
āmbhara bacana ye na kalu kurupati
sakaḷa thāṭha ye marāilu akāraṇe animiti | 24 |
svāmī bhagnabaḷa gheni deba āsucchi trigartte | 25 |
bhīṣme boile droṇe sarila ambhara sadha
trigarttara prasāde khāibā āmbhe bahuta dudha | 26 |
dhanu kr̥ṣṇa traẏodaśī dinare rāje āsi paśi | 27 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa ye trigartta ghenigalā
chari kṣauṇī pañcha parāẏūdha saini paḍilā | 28 |
dui kṣauṇī pañcha parāẏūdha uburi ailā
rathare adhaka nāhiṁ āḍe āḍa pādānti śaraphuṭā | 30 |
saini gheniṇa trigartta draśana kalā āstānara taḷe | 32 |
kisa arthe trigarta tohora ẏesaneka jībati | 33 |
āta kṣauṇī thāṭha gheni ye ẏethuṁ galu
sāṁgrāma na jiṇi tu kebaṇa kr̥tya kalu | 34 |
svāmī prathama yuddhe deba muṁ jiṇili birāṭa
aneka saini māri bhagnakali tāra thāṭha | 36 |

div.note: śasrabindhā hoichanti samastaṁka kāẏe |–ṭa
kisa arthe trigartta tora ābara jībati |–jha, pha

lg.l: puṇi birāṭaku bandhana kari pakāli rathe
gheniṇa aili deba biṁśa yojana pariyante | 37 |
svāmī tini dibasa pariyante ye samara hoithilā
sanya upabāse deba anna na pāilā | 38 |
sukhe randhana bhojana karuchanti āmbhara thāṭha | 39 |
ke randhana karai ke karuchai srāhāna
deba ballabha nāmeṇa ye ẏekai birāṭara brāhmaṇa
rātreṇa bijaẏe kalā āsi mo thāṭhareṇa | 41 |
ẏekā jaṇake deba badhyakalā mora thāṭha
paḷāi āsite deba na pāilu bāṭa | 43 |
aneka śahasranta deba prahāra kalu dhari
tāhāra śarīre paḍi samaste gale cūri | 44 |
ki abā anyabhūmi chāḍi ailā merugiri | 45 |
svāmī kontabhaṭa(?) paṇḍā boliṇa se ẏekai dvajabara
āmbhara keśa dhari tāhāra pādataḷe loṭāi
āpaṇe śutilā deba daṇḍa praḷamba ta hoi | 48 |
svāmī baḍāi mahata se kontabhaṭa(?) brāhmaṇa
mote bandīru chaḍai dile se tatakṣaṇa | 49 |
śarīta dhūḷi huantā mora tāhāṁka muthaghāte | 50 |
sādhu se matsadeśa rājā sāmarathā baḷabantā | 51 |
benikharba bacchā aṇḍira pāñchakharba bacchā māī | 53 |
svāmī pr̥thunā bolikari achai ẏeka gāī
ẏeka gāīra dudha duhaṁi bhāra lakṣe
sātaghaḍi pariyante kaṭaka beḍhi bahai kṣīra nadī | 57 |

div.note:
“śarīra dhuḷi huantā mora tāhāṁka muthaghāte |”
pādānta pare ‘ka’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
brantha kāra nāme deba ẏekai bājīpāḷa
tiniheṁ ubhā hoile se baṭibr̥kṣara taḷa |
konte ballabha deba āne āna mūrtti
ki se brahmā biṣṇu deba umapati |
baḍāi maryyādā svāmī dekhiluṁ tāhāṁkara |
āgyāṁ paramāṇe keśa chāḍala mohora |
tahuṁṇa deba mum paḷāi aili
banastara bhitare yāiṁṇa paśili |
ẏe kathāmāna mithyā nohoi ho rāẏe
sanyamānanta rāi pucchibā yuddhara samaẏe |

lg.l: ẏeḍeka sampada yebe birāṭa rājye achai sambharbe | 58 |
maghadeśa macchadeśa māmuṁ yibā ki āmbhe daṇḍa bāhi | 59 |
birāṭakaiṁ jiṇi se trigarttaku rājya debā
godhana pala gheni se hastināku āsibā | 60 |
bhīṣme boile teṇe āmbhara priojana kisa
ẏekā gāī haraṇe ye doṣa apramitā
śakuni matrī boilā ho na jāṇa tumbhe kicchi
svāmī āmbhara sarba saini badhakalā bācchi | 63 |
ye se mānagobinda śaraṇa rakṣaṇa para dukhe dukhī
anāsta lokara kaṣṭa se nuārai dekhi | 66 |
58|2 chāragaṇe kahile deba dekhilu pratakṣe |–ṭa, ka, ña
lg.note: para sampada dūṣile āpaṇe yāi nāśa |–ṭa, ña

lg.l: nitiprati rāndhaṇā jāṇai gaurī śaurī naḷabidhi | 71 |
droṇe boile trigartta birāṭaku yetebeḷe bindīkalā
saini māri birāṭa trigarttaku nelā keśa dhari
bābu mahata se ye dharmarāẏera suta
ẏete kaṣṭe nāhiṁ tāra cittare bikr̥ta | 74 |
bhīṣme boile parakaryye se na mārai bairi
āho droṇe kointā ye tāṁkara aṭanti nijamāẏe
teṇukari yujheṣṭhi nāma bahile konta ye paṇḍāẏe | 76 |
droṇaṁkara āgare gāṅgabe puṇa puṇa puccha
droṇa boile ye ẏekādaśa masa galā
bhīṣme boile ho gopyāna kara ẏehu kathā
bidura boile ho na bāra driyodhanaku
aḷapa aḷapa kari caḷāi yihā bāṭa
agyāṁtabāsa gopya ye āsi hoilā nikaṭa | 82 |
bāhuḍabeḷe puanta gheni āsibā banabāsa sarile | 83 |
dantā mattā bāghaḍānta ke karu gaṇitā | 86 |
mahābātu rutaṅgame ye pabanu bege teji
ākaśa khepibāku samāna aṭanti sehu bājī | 87 |
aṣṭaratne jaḍi ye kaṇaẏa rathamāna maṇḍi
āgaāṇi thāṭhe caḷile bhārathe bhāroi malla | 89 |
biṁśa kāṭi ratha ye batiśakoṭi mātāṅga
chokhāra tugaṅgama rāuta samaste diśanti kr̥ṣṇabarṇṇa
mayura jhālarī chatra tarāsa kr̥ṣṇamegha yesana | 92 |
ḍāhāṇa pakhāẏe karṇṇa bhāroi malla mahārathī
tāhāra tule ye raṇaraṁkā tini marbhmata chatrī | 93 |
pāñcha marbhmata gaja ẏekādaśa marbhmata haẏe
rathe pātāṅga chatre diśanti raṅgabarṇṇa maẏe | 94 |

lg.note: tāhāra tule ye raṇaraṁkā tini marbhmata rathī |–ṭha, ṭa
ratha pātāṅga chtre diśanti bāḷa āditya prāẏe |–ka, ṇa, jha, da

lg.l: amara br̥ndāarka gheni ki bijaẏe sahasrākṣa | 95 |
śvetaśaṅkha phurai rājā chāmure tini ye mebaccha | 98 |
śvetaaśva tini sāgara śakuni aśastamā pachakati | 99 |
asaṁkhya aśva pādānti ẏegāra kṣauṇī saja | 101 |
cauṣaṭhipanti hīrā jaḍita rathara phera chāri | 103 |
śuddha saṣṭika rathare chāẏeṇī keśarī lāṅguḍa cihna
śate śate phera gaja mukutā māḷi māḷi | 105 |
mukutā māḷike ye māṇikya chāri chāri | 106 |
hīrā nīḷā poẏeḷā maṇi māṇikya ye baiḍuryya markata
upara beḍhāẏe śobhā diśanti yehne meṣa māsara āditya | 107 |
separi mānagobindara tule acchi chatra pāñchakoṭi | 108 |
hīrāre jaḍita kaṇṭha ḍaḷimba chāmara upara | 109 |
tni marbhmata ālamba naba marbhmata pāñchalakhi
bāme bāju ḍāhāṇe bāju mahā mahā sehnā
nirbhaẏe baḷa se ye kāmapāḷaṁka prāsāde
samadaṇḍa caḷāi se ye rājā mānagobinde | 112 |
puṣyā nakṣatra bhoga se dina bāra br̥haspati | 115 |
bāẏaba name karaṇa āẏūṣa nāme yoga
bida mudi padaka hr̥de bhuṣaṇa aḷamkāra
ẏeka ẏeka yoddhāke śate śate pāṭaśāḍhī
mahā prātāpī rājā tu mahītaḷe ẏekachatrī | 125 |
brahmā biṣṇu rudra debatā bipra ādi
pāṣāṇe kara lagante pāṇidrabya hoai tatakāḷe | 130 |

lg.note: anubrate barabeśa asaṁkhya pramāṇa |–jha, pa, ka, da, ṅa

anubrte hr̥dare asaruā sutā thāi
mātāpitā ādikari kāhākuhiṁ mānya nāhiṁ |–ṭa
lg.l: bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā paṇḍita bhigyāṁ daccha
bidure boile bābu se matsadeśara kathā
bābu āmbhe tumanta kahuṁ tathya ye bārata | 135 |
gupate rahiṇa achanti sehi birāṭa nabare | 136 |
gandharbe yujha abaśya karibeṭi āmbhara tule | 138 |
bidure kahile yahuṁ parama artha bāṇī
matta garabe se kathā kaurobe na śuṇi | 139 |
asura sabhāre kāhiṁ dharma kathā bakhāṇi
kumārga beḷe ki bibāda hoẏe sādhi | 141 |
birāṭaku kehu sari pāṇḍabe yāhāku saṁpakṣa | 143 |
lg.note: kumāra garbabeḷe ki bibāda hoẏe siddhi |–gha, cha,

śuṇa baibasuta manu agastiṁka bāṇi
asaṁkṣepa kathā ye kahibā pariṇāmi |–ga, ṭa, ñja

lg.l: rājya prajā dekhi sarbe hoile ye toṣa | 145 |
kīñchekara bhaẏe se paḷāila nija rājya chāḍi
chāpeṇa basila se kaḷapi rajya māḍi | 4 |
śaraṇa paśilā yāiṁ inda ye praśaste | 6 |
tāhāra nimante bāhilā kuñjagaḷa deśa rāẏe | 7 |
ẏeṇe trigarttaku jiṇi rājā uchcaba karāi
kaḷapi deśa rājā bīrabāhu teṇe bāhi | 8 |
svāmī kaḷapi deśara rājā ye bīrabāhu
samadaṇḍa hāde sājilā se sāṁgrāmeṇa rāhu | 10 |
āre mohora kīñcheka boli kara tāḍai lalāṭa | 11 |
ẏebe mote ripu kaḷilā re tohora abhābe | 12 |
bābu mohora parāẏe bāndhaba tote nohu
tohora parāẏe bāndheba mote sarbada hoithāu | 13 |
daṇḍa sāji yibā chala maghadeśa maṇḍaḷe
āpaṇe ubhāhoi daṇḍa sājile deba konte
uttara kumāra boli ye birāṭara jyeṣṭhabatsā
caḷile daṇḍa gheni uttara rājya kaḷapi | 18 |
bīrabāhu daṇḍa gheni rahiacchi naiṣadha deśe
chāḷiśa yojana pariyante kehu na rahanti katipāśe | 19 |
bīrabāhura daśa mebaccha ratha batiśa mebaccha haẏe
gaja yodhyā nāhiṁ thāṭhayāka rākṣasa maẏe | 20 |
go brāhmaṇe bhakṣanti hāthī ghoḍā ādikari
meṣa chāgaḷa barehā śrākāḷa ghu ṣurī | 21 |
madirā pāna rakate se poḍāmāṁsa kheḍi | 24 |
bikaṭa daśana ye ūrddhva khāṁkara keśa
oṭa gadha śārddoḷa brāgha bhāluka lāgi
ẏehānta ārohiṇa thāṭha caḷai begi begi | 27 |
saraku nadī tīre oho thāṭha hoile yāiṁ bheṭa | 28 |
māneba baḷa dekhi durānteka baḷa begi
re re kāra kariṇa ḍāka dei begeṇa lāgi | 29 |
samadaṇḍa gheni birāṭa kaḷapi rājyaku galā teṇe
daṇḍa gheni driyodhana bāhilā puṇa ẏeṇe | 30 |
se cina rahile yāiṁ kuṇḍaḷī banabhāge | 31 |
āreka dina thāṭha pañchāśa yojaan yāi
āreka dibasake thāṭha sateiśa yojana caḷi
puṇa āreka dina aṇatiriśa yojana yānti achārgaḷi | 33 |
se dina bijekalā rājā asakandā nāme bane | 34 |
svāmī macchadeśe maghadeśe nāhiṁ birāṭa nr̥patye | 35 |
svāmī bīrabāhu daṇḍa bāhilā birāṭa uparaku
samadaṇḍa gheni birāṭa bāhilā tāhāra thāṭhaku | 36 |
svāmī uttara kumāra boli birāṭara jyeṣṭhabatsā
kaḷapi rājyaku birāṭa galā danta chāḷi

lg.note: se dina rahile yāiṁ kurāṇḍeka banamārge |–ṅa, ta, tha
lg.l: bhīṣme boile bābu kara ho upekṣā
yāiṁ kisa karibā nagra yebe tucchā | 39 |
rājya māḍi basiba ki ẏehā chāra bole | 42 |
birāṭaku na jiṇile rajya mote nohaoi parāpata | 43 |
ẏeḍeka ārambhe āmbhe ailu daṇḍa caḍhi | 44 |
śakuni boilā trigartta godhana pala acchi kāhiṁ
surabhi pala subidhāne pāile gheniyibā aḍei | 45 |
tahiṁra upare ye godhana pala heuchanti dohana | 47 |
ẏekā goṣṭhake ye ẏeteka gāī acchi
ẏekā goṣṭhake māḍi achai beni yojana sthaḷī

lg.note: bhīṣme boile bābu na kara kaicchā |–gha, cha, tha

lg.l: makara māsa śukaḷapakṣa dutīẏāra dina rājā caḷilā hasitnāuṁ
aṣṭamare śaniacara rāhu tr̥tīẏa ghare bhoga | 55 |
se dina rātra pāñchaghāḍi thāuṁ kauroba mahamalla
bīratura dama dāuṇḍi ye nirghāta bajrabāṇa | 57 |
bherī dosarī marddaḷa mahuri bīra ye kāhāḷī
dhara dhara māra māra śabade kuruma uchuḷi | 58 |
ghaṇṭi ghāguḍi ye bīra ghaṇṭamāna bāji
mahī manthana karai ki abhaẏe bārānidhi
pr̥thī heḷa gheni ki kampai jaḷadhi | 61 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu trailokya kampamana

lg.note: dhara dhara māra māra śabade gagana uchuḷi |–gha, ga, cha, da
kuruma–pātāḷa |

kṣīrasindhu manthane yehne pralaẏa bāranidhi
pr̥thibī heḷa ghenuchanti kurusāgara hāde yodhī |–ta, tha
lg.l: ẏeteka ārambhe mahāthāṭha gogoṣṭhe yāiṁ beḍhi
dhabaḷī kamaḷī ye kāḷī kasurī śyāmaḷī
bacchānta dekhāi hākanti gāiṁka nāma toḷi | 66 |
tāhāṁka beḍhibā hāde gopāḷe na jāṇanti | 67 |
kuhuḍi phiṭante kauraba thāṭha ye diśilā | 70 |

lg.note: gopāḷaṁkara ḍakahāka susvara śabada śubhi |–ta, tha
bacchānta dekhāi gāīṁka hambārāba toḷi |–ka, ṭha
kicchihiṁ na diśai pūrita gahana |–ṭa, jha, ṇa, kha, ḍha
lg.l: baila piṭhiru ye tejyā kariṇa tantrīpāḷa
bho māta samadaṇḍa gheniṇa ye birāṭe
kaḷapi rājye gale saṅgate ballabha kontabhaṭe(?) | 76 |
benirājya tuccha gaja aśva sanya nāhiṁ
trigarttara abhimāne ye mānagibinda aila bāhi | 77 |
māgo birāṭa sampada buḍilā nohilā kicchi bhala
yadyapi goru pala gheni se yiba hari
māgo tohora thāānte birāṭa anāsta houacchi |
kaha go jagatamātā kemante ẏe hoi rakṣi | 80 |
tu debī go saẏaḷa jana cintāmaṇi
bhūta bhabiṣya bratamana jāṇu go gosāmaṇi | 81 |
māgo godhana pala mohora haraṇa heba ki tohora thile
muṁ āu brtibi ki bhīmasana ṭhākuraṁkara aile | 82 |
tu mahāmāẏī rakṣākara go mohora apāda
yemante na paḍai godhana palaku paamāda | 83 |
bābu muhiṁ tohora dāsara dāsa bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya snā | 84 |
yesaneke cakrī ye srijai māṭi loci
tu yeṇiki yibu muṁ teṇiki yāuacchi | 85 |
prothanā boilā bābu tu lākha mātra hoi mohora saṅge chāḷa
ẏehikṣaṇi maradibi muṁ samasta kauroba baḷa | 86 |
prethanā boila tu ẏethaku na kara kicchi bhaẏe
bāsuki ṭaḷile ke pārai bhārā gheni | 89 |
ratha gaja aśva bhāṁji karibi nabasthaḷa | 90 |
tuhi mātra mohora tule hoithibu sākhā
kāhiṁ samara karibi chāla mote dekhā | 91 |
ratha gaja aśva se māri karu cūnā | 93 |
kaṭire dāuṇī bāḷa chandaṇī kāchaṭānta bhiḍi

lg.note: tiraṇa rāśi yehne dahai anaḷa |–ga, ñja, ṭa
nabasthaḷa–nabhasthaḷa |
mathāre kholāri lalāṭe sīnthānī |–ka, jha
medinī heḷa ghenucchi pr̥thunāra hambāraba nāde |–ta, tha
lg.l: tāḷure cūḷa kāhāra sāta pāñcha beṇī

lg.note: bihaḍanti mātāṅgī bikaṭāḷa ghora senā |–cha, ṇa, gha
gaṇi tāẏehāṁkara icchāẏe loḍanti maraṇa |–cha, ṇa, gha
na cetanti parāpara durudurā gopāḷe |–ka, pa, ḍha
lg.l: prothana boilā lākhamātra mote hoithāa saṅge
achanti kauroba baḷa mahā mahā rathī
kāhāra rathe śiṁga māribi kaha tatakṣaṇānti | 113 |
dekha dekha mahasambhare bije karanti mānagobinda
chāra boli tāhākaiṁ kale sarbe heḷā
driyodhana rathe se prahāra kalā nei | 118 |
beniphāḷa hoi driyoadhanara ratha galā phāṭi | 120 |
puṇ akope se prahāra kalā atibege
mr̥dhuna phāṭi paḍile chāri ye turaṅge | 121 |
birathī hoiṇa se rājā māna ye gobinda
śiṁga māri se gāīmāne ratha kale cūnā | 124 |
śiṁga prahāra karante sarba ratha galā bhañji | 125 |
saturī saturī bhāra benigadā gheniṇa ke pamr̥tti | 127 |
re re kāra kari sabhiẏeṁ ogāḷile sahadeba chāmure | 131 |
kiho mūrkha pāmara agyāṁna mūḍha gopāḷa
āre rāhura chāmure ki candrara kopānaḷa | 132 |
āmbhe se managobinda godhana haraṇe āsu
gorunta aḍāi chālare tumbhanta kemanta kari poṣu | 134 |
āre mūḍha gopāḷaku tumbhara mahāpātra paṇe śāḍhī debu
sabunti ābharaṇa debu āmbhara hua re gopāḷa | 136 |
dhuśāsana ratha bhāñja sabu helā cūnā

lg.note: asaṣṭame rāute paḍile bhūmigate |–ta, tha

lg.l: āge ratha ṭekante se dekhila sahadeba | 140 |
āre gopāḷa boli śrīkare chāpa dhari
sahadeba lauḍi bulānte sarba hela cūnā | 144 |
śiṁga mārante karṇṇara ratha galā bhāñji | 145 |
ghoraraḍi kariṇa se gopāḷa bīre uṭhi
yoddhāṁka upare se prahāra kale yāṭhi | 147 |
goruṁkara samara deihi bhājile sarbe raṇe
māḍiṇa godhana pala paśanti thāṭhe peli | 153 |
pādānti baḷa mardi hoile goruṁka khure hāde | 154 |
paḍilā bahuta paẏeḍa na paile bāṭa | 157 |
cūra hoi yāuacchi se sainiṁkara gahane | 158 |
pañchadaśa jūṇa yāẏe se pāẏeḍa paḍilā
bhagnabaḷa gheni rahila rājā bārāhī nadīra tīre | 161 |
bābu kaṭāḷa na kara ẏehu bhagnabaḷa sinā | 162 |
gopāḷanta tiāri godhana pala chāla gheniyibā
puṇa driyodhana bāhuḍile leuṭi samara karibā | 163 |
driyodhana santāpilā bhīṣma droṇa mukha chāhiṁ
āsante bārila tumbhe bola na kalai muhiṁ | 166 |
tahiṁra rāga mote kala ki guru he
samara na kari tumbhe ghuñchila ki yataneheṁ | 167 |
bābu dekhuṁ dekhuṁ godhana pala helā baḍa hatyā
bābu āmbhe śahasra dharibā bāhā āmbhara śuddhi
samare māile āmbhaṁku doṣa nāhiṁṭi bidhi | 170 |
tu ye narendra pr̥thī pāḷaka adhikārī
na māri apasarilu ẏe nimante dukha tohora | 172 |
hatyā na lāgaiṭi go brāhmaṇa māile | 173 |
yadyapi gohatyā ho paḍiba ājara yuddhe
lāgu pache hatyā mote goru paḍile raṇa madhye | 174 |
kr̥tabarmā boile bābu śuṇa pūrbara kathā
ākaśa gaṅgāre srāhāna karante īśvara debatā | 175 |
nityakarma bidhāna nimante kuśabidā thoile nadikūḷe
surabhī duhitā nandanī ākāśuṁ āsai ye cari
ādhāra nimante khāila se īśvaraṁka kuśabiḍi | 178 |
jaḷaru bāhāra deba hoile ati bege
gāīki triśūḷa ye māile ati rāge | 179 |
gomuṇḍa lāgilā yāiṁ rudra debatāṁka kare | 181 |
tadyāpi na chāḍilā muṇḍa īśvaraṁkara hāthe | 182 |
bhairaba rūpe se muṇḍa bahile paśupati | 183 |
samasta doṣa harai brahmahatyā stirīhatyā ādikari
kadāśca te gohatyā doṣa na yāi apasari | 184 |
se doṣa chāḍilā ye maṇikarṇṇikāra tīrthe | 185 |
gohatyā doṣa ye na yāi kahaṇā
tu ye parama paṇḍita heuachu baṇā | 186 |
driyodhana boilā muṁ ẏehā na śuṇai
mohora beḷe se kathā nuārai sahi | 187 |
mara godhana pala muṁ pache yāi nāśa | 188 |
māra māra boli bīre bāhuḍile tatakṣaṇe | 190 |

lg.note: bakṣasthaḷe paḍilā ye rudaṁkara tridaṇḍa |–ka, ṇa, ṭa, jha
bhairoba rūpe se khapare bahile paśupati |–ka, ḍha
kemante birāṭara sampada hoiba rakṣitā |–ṇa, gha, cha

lg.l: gohatyā doṣa na bācchi bāhuḍile sarba ghoṭi | 192 |
prothanā boilā se āsu āpaṇe gogoṣṭhaku
ẏe ghānti paẏeḍa jaṇe na thoibi kāhaku | 193 |
teṇukari muhiṁ kalai aḷapa helā yuddha | 194 |
bābu parakāryye tumbhe ripu na nāśa boli
bābu tohora nimante muṁ heḷayuddha kali | 195 |
buḍila baṁśa tāhāra ke puṇa āja rakhu | 196 |
bhīṣme boile re gopāḷa dhanya to jībanagoṭi
dhanya śubhabeḷa hoilā dekhiluṁ putraṁka badana | 202 |

lg.note: bābu se numante muṁ lāghaba yuddha kali |–ga, ṭa, ña
hoile bīrabara mahāmāla yodhī |–ka, kha, ga, ña

lg.l: dhure thāi hāka diai kauroba śiromaṇi
prāṇe na māri gopāḷaku jībantā dhara ẏehikṣaṇi | 207 |
ẏehāku hoile mora samasta karyya bhala
tebe se prāpata mote hoiba godhana pala | 208 |
ẏe gopāḷaku dhaile mohora hoiba sakaḷa sampada | 109 |
dhari yebe nuārila samasta beḍhi bindha | 214 |
ke śate ke sahasreka ke abā ahibrate
kehu lakṣe na rāja binddhale apramite | 216 |
lg.note: chela catra nārāja bindhanti apramite |–ṭa, ja, ṇa

lg.l: bāma ḍāhāṇe nauḍi bulāi sehi sārikṣe | 220 |
śuṇa ho manu puruṣa śrījagannāthaṁkar amaẏā
prothanā nāma dhari se uñche kala dhuni | 223 |
bhedante chatrīmāne śahasra dhari nuāranti kara | 224 |
anaṅga bāṇe yehne asaṣṭama huanti prāṇī
samasta baśa hoile kr̥ṣṇara baṁśī śuṇi | 225 |
sahadebakaiṁ chāḍi yāithilā pāñcha ye yojana | 228 |
lg.note: kaṭhora prasanna hoile debarāja |–kha, da, ṅa, ṇa, ḍha, ña
samasta baśa hoile sahadebara baṁśīsvana śuṇi |–jha, ña, ga, cha
lg.l: godhana pala gheniṇa prothanā chāhiṁla leuṭi
dhāmanti godhana pala bāẏeṁśī svana heji
sānandeṇa gopāḷe ye prabeśa nija goṣṭhe
alājuka kaurobe lāja ẏehāṁka mukhe nāhiṁ
ẏesanaka bacana boile prothana sahadeba mukha chāhiṁ | 236 |
yugate muhiṁ ta na yibi ẏehāṁkara purī
trailoke sāmaratha ke mote baḷe neipāri | 238 |
tu bahana hoiṇa yāa yā macchadeśaku
na māri arajuna saburi darpa bhāñju | 240 |
lg.note: trailoke samaratha ke mote pārai hari |–ṭa, ṇa, ta, tha, jha
lg.l: muhiṁ godhana pala ghenithāiṁ ẏethe rahi
uttara kumaranta gheni ye bijekaru arajuna | 242 |
caḷai matsadeśa se bikrama siṁgha jāṇi | 243 | | 4938 |
lg.head:
{@br̥hannārīṅku sārathi kari uttarara
yuddhayātrā@}

lg.l: jhāḷa rudhira tra paṇḍa tantrīpāḷa gopāḷara kāẏe
śarīra diśai tāra pāṭaḷi puṣya prāẏe | 2 |
surabara sundara sohaḍa kumāramaṇi hoiba abadhārī | 3 |
godhana pala hari e neucchi āja rāti | 4 |
aneka goḷa samara se kale āmbhara tule
aneka sanya māilu tadyāpi na ghuñchile | 5 |
kadaḷī patra jāṇi kampai tāra aṅga
moho godhana pala haribāku kāhāra ẏeḍe darpa | 9 |
ke re bhāṅgai se yamara aragaḷā | 10 |
lg.note: tāmalocana prāẏe diśe ki kurusānu |–gha, ṅa

lg.l: na jāṇai ki uttarakumara karai kaṭaka rakṣā | 11 |
sārathi jaṇekari nemi kāhāku mora rathe | 12 |
gokuḷa kuḷaku tu muṁ ye rājyaku kareṇi
anteśvara pure carachā karai br̥hannarī puṇi | 14 |
sairindhrīki lāgai ta āmbha sabuṁkari kathā
yāa lo mudusulī bhitare kara yā bāratā | 15 |
bola godhana pala hari neucchi kurupati
sairindhrī thākurāṇī ẏethaku kisa āgyāṁ dianti | 16 |
bho debī godhana pala hari neucchi kurupati | 18 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā sairindhrī bije pacchima ye dvāre
tantrīpāḷa kahila ye godhana haraṇa kathā
uttara kumara boilā gopāḷa mātrake tāhāra baḷa bhāñjai
mohora gale tāhānta prāna pāāntā nāhiṁ | 21 |
bāhuka kari chāḍi na gale jaṇe | 22 |
adhare danta se chāpai puṇa puṇi | 23 |
lg.note: na jāṇai ki uttara kumara karai kaṭaka paricchā |–ka, pa, ṭa
lg.l: daiba sumari se lalāṭe tādāi hātha
ẏekā yibi kemante ke bāhiba mora ratha | 24 |
arjuna thākure yāāntu boli sahadebaṁku dile ṭhāri | 25 |
sairindhrī boile tu yebe loḍu ho sārathi
jaṇe acchi sārathi tuhi pāribu ki abhyarthī | 26 |
uttara kumara boilā samaẏe yebe bāhiba mora ratha
rājyaku thākura mohora sehi se yathārtha | 27 |
abhyarthī kimpe bolibi caraṇe karibi daini
pūjā karibi tāku lakṣeka subarṇṇa gheni | 28 |
sairindhrī boile br̥hannārīku āṇa tu hakarāi
baḍāi susañche se tora ratha nemaṭi bāhi | 29 |
uttara boilā tu ye pare bhr̥tyapaṇe khaṭu
dinakara sukr̥ta harai tāhāra mukha chāhiṁle | 34 |
stirīliṅga sarūpe se basiba mora rathe
dekhuṁ dekhuṁ ayātrika apuṁseka loka muṁ nemai kemante | 35 |
lg.note: pādāryya karibi tāku lakṣeka subarṇṇsa ghen |–ṭa, ṇa, ña

lg.l: āre kīñcheka nāśagalā yāhāra kiñchita kope
trigarttara bandhanaru ye uttārile tohora bāpe | 37 |
uttara boilā tantrīpāḷa tu ye thilu sahadebaṁka tahiṁ
tohora dekhante br̥hannārī acchiṭiki ratha bāhi | 39 |
gopāḷa boilā yāhā muṁ dekhiachai yugate
āho uttara ẏeheneka kari se mahātamā karai sadaẏe
ẏeheneka kari se ẏehāku nirbhākalā mahātmā
ye se br̥dhannārī se pratakṣe arjunara pañchuātmā | 43 |
se yebe yāi tohora kāryya subidhāna | 44 |
sukhe bihaḍanti se rājyare kehi nāhiṁ | 47 |
br̥hannārī boila muṁ uttara kumarara nuahiṁ baśyabr̥tta
muhiṁ samara kari tāhāra aneka baḷa nāśi | 53 |
na bhāñji dvanda se kale puṇa puṇa
āmbhara thāānte godhana ki hoiba haraṇa | 54 |
agyāṁta bāsa lekhante bābu ketedina acchi | 56 |
baraṣake daśadina baḍhi tahiṁki nāhiṁ bhaẏe | 59 |
uttara bichārai kaberī bhāra khoṣā kareṇa benibāhī
śate brahmaṇa bhojana dile se doṣa yāi pāra | 63 |
bharasā na kale ẏehāku muṁ nemai kemante
dekhite anyākāra ābara stirīhatyā doṣa mote | 65 |
mānagobinda rāja neuacchi mora godhana pala hari | 66 |
kakḷapi rājyaku daṇḍa caḍhi galeka birāṭe
sārathi paṇaku mote kehi nāhiṁ sākhā | 68 |
lākha mātra hoi bāhi pāribu ki mora ratha
sārathi jaṇe na thile kisa hoibāka sādhya | 70 |
br̥hannarī boilā muṁ kahai kinā tote
ẏeḍe baḍa dhārmika tu bātuḷa hoilu kemante | 71 |
kāryyaku ayātrā ho anakūḷaku hoẏe hīna | 73 |

lg.note: kāryyaku akāryya kuḷaku hoẏe hīna |–ka, ja, ṅa

lg.l: ārajanme paraku khaṭanti ye hāni hoẏe teja | 77 |
āho br̥hannārī tu ta pratakṣe aṭu arjunara pañchu ātmā
tatakṣaṇe maṇḍalā se uttara kumāra rathagoṭi | 81 |
śate śate poẏeḷā hīrā pābacche khañjaṇi | 82 |
markatara tule se māṇikya puñji puñji
tahiṁra upare ye aṣṭa ratanara khañjaṇi | 85 |
ḍāḷimba basanta ye pātāṅga peṇḍi oḷi

lg.note: śuddhahīrā maṇire rathara chārikāṇḍa |–ṇa
lg.l: ahibrate adhācandra darpaṇa rathe acchi maṇḍi
ḍāḷimbā chāmara goṭiẏe śveta chāmara goṭiẏe
keri keri lambanti rathara caupāśe mekhaḷā | 92 |
debāṅga basana neta ptanī nīḷaragga pāṭa
ghana kāṅgulā kariṇa rathare maṇḍile chāritaṭa | 93 |
mallī māḷatī yāī jūī campā raṅgaṇī rekha rekha
ṭhāba ṭhāba kari ye rathare lepana kari | 95 |
sarūpa diśila se āditya ratha prāẏe | 96 |
andhāra niśākāḷe yebe caḷuthiba se ratha
dibasa prāẏe diśiba caḷante yojaan sāta | 97 |
ākarṣaṇa siṁgha kale ki gabana pabanahuṁ uguḷi | 98 |
nimiṣake mahī laṁghaba ki śoṣiba bārānidhi
sapata dīpa laṁghiba ki sapata paẏodhi | 99 |
ẏesanaka ghaṭaṇa se ratha kaṇaẏa chāri sāhā
markata nīḷā se goṭi goṭi causama | 102 |
yebaṇa ratha maṇḍa acchi dutī bāsudeba
pañchaṣaṭhi rājara bhaṇḍāra yebaṇa amūlya dhana
ẏekā rathake tāha maṇḍile bīra phālagunyā | 105 |
mukutā maṇi māṇikya gunthalā bākhara apramita | 107 |
lañjā daḍabaḍi ye ḍāhāṇe baḍa bhūṣā

lg.note: caḷai ratha ye sandhu ghoṣa |–jāṇi |–ka, ṭa, ṇa

lg.l: puṇi bhūmiki dekhāilā ye śeṇāṣpakṣī prāẏe | 117 |
āka śu aśva ye paḍuchanti khasi
dhātikāre ṭekilā nei uttara kumara āge | 119 |
taratare aśva se ye na rahuchanti bhūmi
yāa yāa boile se kṣepibe ākaśa bhmabana tini | 120 |
phu phukāre turaṅgame ye teje anargaḷā
uttara kumara boilā tumbhe aila ye kahuṁ
kebaṇa mahātamā gopyāna tu napuṁseka nohu | 122 |
mānaba mātrak kehu ẏehu ratha pāre sāji
nāhiṁ nohiba nathiba ẏe tribhmabana majhi | 123 |
napuṁsaka boliṇa yāhā muṁ nindilai tote
tahiṁki anugraha dāna debāka hāde mote | 124 |
mukutā maṇi māṇikya hīrā causari rekhā

lg.note: nāhim nohiba dekhilā tribhmabana majhi |–ṭa, da, pa
nīāḷa phule citra puṇa śikuḷi |–ja

lg.l: nepura ghaṭaṇa ye hīrā kameṇ jaḍi | 130 |
subarṇṇara sīnthinī śire kaṇṭh jāti puṣyamāḷī | 131 |
lakṣe bipra miḷile ye beda dhuni ucchāri | 133 |
ākaśe dhuni śubhilā arjunara ratha sāju | 135 |
putrakaiṁ arghya debā go śubha abadhāri | 136 |
dharma āśrekari bābu jaẏe heu ye tumbhaṁku | 138 |
ẏemohora pua kathā tote se lāgai | 139 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā boile bābu sairindhrīṁki hua praḷambita
ẏehāṁkara kalyāṇe tote sabaṁśubha hou prāpata | 140 |
uttara kumara sairindhrī śrīkr̥ṣṇā caraṇa taḷe sebi
parama aiśuryya tote prāpata hou boile gāndharbī | 141 |
lg.note: bida mudi padmeka rūpā kaḍiāḷa |–ja, da
lg.l: śatr̥ mārikari ubha huasi re baḷā
uttara kumāra boilā sādhu sādhu br̥hannārī
br̥hannari boile tu ye mote kalu pucchā
ẏehikṣaṇi ratha bāhipārai ho yahiṁki tohora iccha | 144 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷa ye sutaḷa taḷātaḷa
nirbhaẏe hoi yebe āgyāṁ debu muku
ghaḍika bhitare muṁ ratha bāhipāre cauda bhmabanaku | 146 |
candradvīpa padmadvīpa kuśadvīpa śākalya dvīpa ramyeka dvīpa | 147 |
kṣāra samudra ikṣu samudra surā samudra sarpi samudra dhabaḷāṅgī
dadhi samudra dugdha samudra mahājaḷa samudra saubhāṅī | 148 |
bākī samudra antare bāsa se samudrara
ẏe bidhāne achai ye nadadvīpa sapata sāgara | 149 |
kṣaṇakara madhye muṁ yese pure pārai bheṭi | 150 |
āho arjunara pratagyāṁmāna muṁ kahai samasta
samare na jiṇile muṁ na bāhuḍāi ratha | 151 |
uttaa kumara hasila br̥hannarī kare karatāḷi dei

lg.note:
atuṭa ajaẏa hoi āsare baḷā
raṇa bhūmire tote rakhantu sarba ye maṅgaḷā |–da, ja
lg.l: arjuna boilā ho brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara kubera
candra sūryya megha maruta parbata niśācara | 154 |
rjuna boilā pāṇḍabaṁkara aṭai se sala | 157 |
punarbasu rukṣa bhoga helā se dinara | 158 |
dvādaśa daṇḍa aṭai bhoga candra kalā
nairuta koṇe yognī ye nārāẏaṇī ṁūrati
magara bāhāne se caḷai debī dhātī | 162 |
ratha caḷante se boilā uttara bāḷī
godhana pala āṇimuṭi tote kontaṁkara dvāhi | 165 |
lg.note: kuṇḍāiki basra muṁ saribi sarbakāḷe |–jha, gha, cha, tha

lg.l: driyodhanakaiṁ jiṇi godhana āṇa bhāiki mohora tāri | 167 |
khepanti ākāśe diśanti se śoṇāpacchī prāẏe | 169 |
kṣudra ghaṇṭi ghāghuḍi ye bājai ruṇajhuṇa | 170 |
tini yojana antare rahicchi kurusa gara baḷa
raẏaṇī prabhāte se ye godhana pala nemanta aḍāi
aḍābante bihaḍanti se abhaẏe duṣṭa gāī | 172 |

lg.note: kehpanti ākāśe diśanti se śyāmaḷa pacchī prāẏe |–ka, cha, gha, ṭa, ña

tini yojana antare rahicchi mahamala
lakṣepura kari beḍhichi gorupala |–cha, ṇa, ka, ṅa, gha, ṭha, jha
lg.l: aḍhāi tāḷa āẏatane aṇadahana bhūmi acchi
tada nimante rāma nirmaḷa bhūiṁ bācchi | 176 |
maḷaẏa pabana basanta tāpa nāśakara bidhi
svāmī abhaẏe bārānidhi pratakṣe dia mote buddha
śuṇa āho caitana mahābhāratha ẏe saṁsāra jana hitā
janme janme bhābai muṁ nārāẏaṇa saṁgatā | 182 |
dhabaḷa kamaḷa kuṁkuma nīḷa utpaḷa barṇṇagoṭi
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa hr̥dagate bhābai tāhā | 184 |

lg.note: tada nimante hari nirmaḷa asana bāchi |–ja, ṇa, ṭha, kha
anyāgata sahodra ḍāhāṇe baḷabhadra |–da, pa, ṇa, ḍha
madhyeṇa pitāmaha ye aṭanti saubhadre |–ja, da, kha

lg.l: nirākāra puruṣa tu ananta kāḷa bañchā | 186 |
se muniṁkra talaẏe muṁ hr̥dagate bhāṣi | 188 |
bārānidhi gaṇḍūṣa kale ye kheḍara kutūhoḷe | 189 |
janme jnme dāsa muṁs e muniṁka caraṇe
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa hr̥de bhābanti anukṣaṇe | 190 | | 5138 |
lg.note: anāgata–aṇākāra ākāraśūnya |

lg.l: se muni bakatā baibasuta manu śrotā | 1 |
agasti boile aruṇa prakāśe ye raẏaṇī pāhānti
aḷapa kuhuḍi ye dhurma pāẏe bighaṁsanti | 4 |
aḍāi re aḍāi re boli śubhai mahāgoḷa
ghaṇṭā rāba śabade ye bihaḍanti gābe | 6 |
uttara kumāra boilā ratha ruhā br̥hannārī

lg.note: iti śrī mahābhāratha ye cetanā sandehe |–gha, ṇa
ẏe ye mahābhāratha aṭe baḍai sandehe |–ka
dhabaḷa kamaḷa surabhī pala candramā prāẏeka diśanti |–ta, tha

lg.l: niẏaḍe prabeśa ye āsi hoilu sindhukūḷe | 9 |
āmbhe bahana hoi yibā ho kuur baḷa thāṭhaku
ẏehā chāra bole kimpā muṁ aili ratha caḍhi | 11 |
sanya ki samodra boli yebe ẏe na cihnai bhale
kisa yuddha kariba ẏe bhīṣma droṇaṁkara tule | 12 |
uttara kumāra tahiṁ bahuta karai bāci | 13 |
karṇṇa boilā ratha ẏeka āsai gāṅgabe | 15 |
śalye boile sañchaketu bibāna nāhite ẏehāra | 18 |
maheśvara rūpe se ye karanti gabana | 19 |
rudra debatā hoile saṅge thāntāṭi br̥ṣabha | 20 |
maruḷa bāhāna nāhiṁ boli nāstikalā śakuni | 21 |
lg.note: tuhita ratha bāhilu sindhu uttara kūḷaku |–ṇa, ka, ja, da, ta, ḍha, ṭha
lg.l: dropaṇe boile indra ki gobnda ki arjuna ẏe tini
āna ke āsantā ki ẏemanta ratha gheni | 22 |
mānagobinda boilā muṁ indra debatāre nohai bibādī
se mora samare kimpe āsibe jambhabhedī | 23 |
sarbadā anagr̥ha se karanti hari mote | 24 |
pāṇḍabe male ye kebaṇa banastare paḍi
āna ke āsai ye ẏeka rathe caḍhi | 25 |
ẏesaneka bichāra karanti se kauroba saini
uttara boilā tu badhīra kire sakhī
agada samodra tu bimarthe na dekhi | 27 |
br̥hannārī boilā tohroa abaḷa ki benicacchu
ẏeḍeka niẏaḍe kāhiṁ samodra dekhu achu | 28 |
uttara boila ratha ruhāi dekha br̥hannārī
dekha hāde samodre ye boita apāra
ẏehikṣaṇi paḷāiba ẏe kauroba baḷa dekhante | 32 |
sāgara sata ẏe tohora bacana kehu nāsti karipāri | 34 |
nicaẏe kuru sāgara ẏe aṭai saini
bābu boita boli tu boilu yahiṁki
rathamāne sehuṭi tu kimpāi na dekhi | 36 |
macch kacchapa tu yāha bichāru hr̥dagate
gaja aśvamāne ta se aṭanti yugate | 37 |
tu ye boilu bhitare thirapāṇi bhala
dhabaḷa kamaḷa se ye aṭanti godhana
lahaḍi boli tu yāhā boilu hr̥dagate
rathaṁkara upre ye uḍanti pātāṅga nete | 40 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa bhūrisarba somadatta bālambika
tantrīpāḷa gopāḷa ẏemanta boli kahilā ki mote
muhiṁ bichārili abā aile jaṇa chāri pāñcha sāte | 44 |
temanta prāẏe bujhi ailaiṁ bege muhiṁ | 45 |
lg.note: “ẏe se mānagobinda kauroba adhikārī“ | pāṭhapare ‘ta, a’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
pañchukaṭakara ṭhākura ẏehāṁkara śate bhrātha
yāhāra paẏāṇa karante kampai merugiri sahita |
temanta prāẏe bujha uduyoga kali muhiṁ |–cha, gha, ṭa, pha
lg.l: ẏete baḷa dhari yebe bāhilā kurupati
ẏekā kaibratake kāhiṁ samodra hoẏe manthi | 46 |
muhiṁ kemante ẏekā samara karibaiṁ bāḷachāṭa | 47 |
arjuna boilā śuṇasi ẏekā jaṇaṁkara mahimāṁ
ẏekā sapata sāgara gaṇḍūṣa kale ye agasti mahātamā | 48 |
ẏekā kāḷī ye manthīlā sapata sindhu jaḷa | 49 |
ẏekā paraśurāmeka ẏeke iśi bāra pr̥thi nichatra kalā | 50 |
rākṣasa baḷa dhaṁsilā ẏekā pabanara tanu | 51 |
ẏekā garuḍake ye uḍaṅga baḷa dhaṁsi
ẏehāṁkara tule kiẏe ẏethe baḷabanta hoilā | 53 |
rājāra kumāra tote boli ta nuāri | 54 |
parbata cūra hoanti yāhāra palāṇile thāṭha
nausahasa rājā jiṇi ye kalā ẏekapāṭa | 56 |
mātā pitāku ye na karai namāskāra
mānagobinda biradhū bānā aṭai anubrate yāhāra | 57 |
lg.note: ẏekā kṣirodra gaṇḍūṣa kaleṭi agasta mahātamā |–da, cha, jha, pa, gha
lg.l: uttara boilā muṁ agyāna tu yebe ẏehā jāṇu
agāda samodra bhitaraku kimpe mote āṇu | 58 |
mote pramāda paḍile tote bāca heba ukata | 59 |
tu sakhī br̥hannārī go kaṭāḷa na karasi mote | 61 |
niantu godhana mohora priojana nāhiṁ teṇe
bāhā mohora ratha piara achanti yeṇe | 62 |
br̥hannarī boilā tu jībanaku kalu icchā
astāne śādhī gheni ye hoilā kaṭaka rakṣā | 63 |
āho uttara kanyāṁkara pure tu pratagyāṁ kalu yete
chatrīkuḷe bābu tu ye hoiachu jāẏe
ante dekhili tote muṁ ajāyūtha prāẏe | 65 |
muhiṁ tote ye dr̥ḍha karāili bahuta
boili śatr̥ku na jiṇile na bāhuḍai mora ratha | 66 |
siṁgha prāẏe hoi ye miḷilu thāṭha kati
yujha goṭāẏe yujhakinā bāhuḍi loḍu jhāti | 67 |
sārathi paṇe mohora ẏesaneka buddhi acchi
mohora thile tote pramāda nāhiṁ kicchi | 68 |
uttara kumāra boilā tote paśilaiṁ śaraṇa
mote tārile tote acchi apāra kāraṇa | 69 |
apramāde yebe mote nei pitākaiṁ karāiparu bheṭi

lg.note: āstāne śāḍhī gheni hoilu kaṭaka paricchā |–ṭa, tha, ta, pa
lg.l: lakṣe godhana tote debaiṁ gāī dhenu
lakṣeka gaja debi tote bhagati kimpe na ghenu | 71 |
āho br̥hannārī asamaẏa kāḷe tāranti yebaṇa prāṇī
dante tiraṇa gheni tote dharai br̥hannārī
ẏe dusaha kaṣaṇu mote gheniyāa tāri | 74 |
br̥hannārī boilā yebe ailuni ẏete dhūra
ghāntiẏe haboḍā hāboḍi heukinā rājāṁka chāmura | 75 |
āho uttara pannaṅgā nārāẏaṇa ẏe mānacakrabratī
uttara kumāra boilā muṁ mandakr̥tya kali
dekhu dekhu muhiṁ jaḷaprabhā piṭhire bheḷā caḍhili | 77 |
leñchara tule pīrai se baḍhāili muhiṁ
dharma būḍaili muhiṁ nirlaje maitra hoi | 78 |
dekhu dekhu napuṁseka muṁ ailaiṁ tule
ayātrika meḷe āsi yibaiṁ ki āu bhale | 79 |
sāṁgrāme ohobaḷa bheṭe aśvamedha yagyṁ phaḷaśr̥ti | 80 |
baḷibeṇū mānadhātā jānughaṇṭa pururabā paraśurāma chaḍa cakrabratī
ẏete boli ratha ye bāhilā campāi
bhaẏe uttara kumāra rathaṁ paḍilāka ḍeiṁ | 82 |
lg.note: sarbaṅge ratna ābharaṇa karibi tora aṅga |–ta, tha, ṇa
dekhu dekhu jaḷaprabhā piṭhare basili |–ṇa, ḍa, kha, ka
lg.l: pāñchabheḍā ẏeka bheḍāẏe kari paḷāilā kumaramaṇi
dekhiṇa hasai se br̥hannārī mane guṇi | 83 |
nirlaja pamara ẏe ẏehāra pāpapuṇyaku nāhiṁ gyāṁna
ubhaẏa saṁkaṭe paḍi muṁ hoili pratagyāṁ hīna | 84 |
mohor dekhante yebe godhana haraṇa hoiba
muhiṁ yebe rājyahuṁ na āsanti athabā
kāḷe hīnabīryya hoi na tekilā baḍapaṇe | 87 |
sahadeba kahilā agyāṁtabāsa acchi dina ye aḷapa
muhiṁ abā ẏethuṁ āja bahuḍi yibi ghuñchi
bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁka kopaku jībana kahāra acchi | 91 |
uttara kumār apaḷābante br̥hannārī goḍāi pache pache | 92 |
tirī gotiẏe goḍāi acchi atiẏa subeśa

lg.note: bahuta dina galāni tinidina achai kaṇakalpa |–ka, ṇa, pa
lg.l: śuṇi prati uttara dilāka mātuḷa śakuni
birāṭa āsuthilā śaraṇa nimante śrīkr̥ṣṇāku gheni | 96 |
bhaẏeṇa ghuñchilā se dr̥bhāra baḷa dekhi
paḷāi birāṭa ye yāna bāhāna upekṣa | 97 |
nirbhaẏe stirī se ye prakr̥ti mahaduṣṭā
paḷāntāku goḍāntā ke tumbhe kemante bichāra | 99 |
paḷāntā loka keṭi āmbhe ta najāṇu | 100 |
bhīṣṁe boile ho sarūpa ẏehu kathā
godhana haraṇe ke boilā tumbhanta āsi | 103 |
ẏeḍe baḍa chatrī hoi gyāna ye upekha
arjuna arjuna boliṇa tumbhe aharniśi loḍi | 108 |
lg.note: kaurobaṁka barttana khāi pāṇḍabe kara cintā |–ka, da, pa, da

lg.l: hiteṇa kahile ye nohila tahānta bhala
puṇihiṁ pāṇḍabe ye marantu bane sebi | 111 |
baraṣe samāpata hoilāni baḷila daśa ye dibasa | 112 |
tumbhara lekhāre se tinidina lāguti kari | 113 |
bhīṣme boile kicchi na bolani droṇe
athabā arjna hoile jāṇi sinā ẏehikṣaṇe | 114 |
śireṇa kara tāḍi uttara kumara basi | 116 |
chāḍa chāḍa br̥hannārī daini karai tote
mahābhaẏa lāgilā mote dharu tu kisa arthe | 117 |
lg.note: “dharu tu kisa arthe” ehi pādānta pare ‘da’ pothire pāṭha :–
bhagati karucchi sakhi mote kara rakṣā
na dhara na dhara sakhi na kara mote kakṣā
napuṁsaka lakṣana tora male sinā yāi
yuddha karibu samare maribāra pāiñ |
muhiṁ rajaputra macchadeśa ādhipati
kimpāi chāḍibi mora ẏeteka sampradhi |

lg.l: bhārgaba gotra mohora sakhi karu kinā rakṣā | 118 |
āho reku lagāi śvānaku ho neuṭāi pakāile
jībantā jība dhari hoiba ki tāhāra beḷe | 119 |
br̥hannārī boilā tu ye hoilu nisata
jīrṇṇakūpe paḍilā tohora dharma ye sukr̥ta | 120 |
bābu samara kari yebe paḍibu raṇayajñe
baikuṇṭha betrake āna achai ki svarge | 122 |
kisa arthe upekhuachu tu ẏeḍeka suḷabha | 123 |
lg.head: {@śutra mahārājāṅkara upākhyāna@}
lg.l: śuṇa ho uttara harihara baṁśe śutra boli mahārājā
ādi mīna gorekha budha bli chāri ye ātmajā | 1 |

lg.note: “karu ki nā rakṣā” ehi pādānti pare–kha o ṭha re pāṭha :–
aneka binaẏi tote hoiacchi sakhi
muhiṁ maraṇa gale tu hoibu ki sukhī |
rejju lagāi śvana aṭabyāku melile |(ḍa, ḍha, ṅa)
jīrṇṇakūpe paḍilā tohora chātribr̥tta |(ṅa, ka)

lg.l: pr̥thvīre ẏekāṅga ṭhākura boli biradhu bhaṇāiṁ | 4 |
āho uttara se chārikumare ye tiārile pitāku
bho pitā daṇḍa nakara āu pararāṣṭraku | 5 |
bahuta cchedana doṣe tapa nohoi sādhi | 6 |
putraṅkara bacana rāẏe na śuṇilā karṇṇe
arabinda deśaku daṇḍa gheni caḷila kopamane | 7 |
putre apasarile ye pitāra ati pāpe
arabinda deśaku śatrarājā daṇḍa caḷaile yetebeḷe
dhanabhaṇḍāra jara kala aneka jana dhvamsi | 10 |
chāpeṇa dhari ghenigala sundara puanta adikari | 11 |
rājyare bipatti boli tāṅku nārade kahile | 12 |
nāradaṅka bacana śuṇi śutra rājāra putra chāri
rājā rājyare nāhiṁ kemante laṁghilā daṇḍadhārī | 13 |
kuṭumbha bināśane se chāri ye ātmajā
kare śahasra dhari chāriheṁ ākhaṇḍaḷa rājāṅku ogāḷi | 15 |
aneka ratha gaja aśva pādānti paḍile tāhāra | 16 |
saini paḍante yoddhāẏe beḍhile śasra gheni
budha gorekha se ye paḍile putrabeni | 17 |
ādi mīna duheṁ aneka samara kale
aneka paẏeḍa kari tāhāra saini mārile | 18 |
puṇa samaẏeke ye male se putra beni
chāri putranta rāi āgyāṁ dile padmayoni | 22 |
rājāra kumara hoi tumbhe ẏeḍeka gyānabanta
maha paṇḍita rūpe tumbhe chāriheṁ hoa jāta | 23 |
mahāpaṇḍita hoi janmile śutrara putra chāri | 24 |
sāra pika droṇa śuka chāripakṣī hoẏe
parama nirākuḷa se dhanapakṣī aṭanti svaṁẏe | 25 |
somapāḷa nāme baṭa merū pacchima pāruśe
ākaśakaiṁ ḍāḷa uccharga ye yojana pañchāśe | 26 |
se baṭara ḍāḷare chāriheṁ chanti hāde basi
ākāśa ḍāḷeṇa se bhuṣaṇḍa kāka svargabāsī | 28 |
marakaṇḍa purāṇa gata āgata se kahanti basi | 29 |
ṣāṭhiẏe sahasa celā ye bedabyāsaṁkara aṭai
sabuṁkari madhye ye jaẏamuni śreṣṭha hoi | 30 |
se jaẏamuni śrotā ye dharmapakṣī bakatā
se se kahu achanti chāri yugara prasanna bāratā | 31 |
śuṇa ho uttara kumra basaẏanti br̥hannārī
bhuḍi kari rathe basa ho birāṭi
parama gati pāibuṭi tu mānagobinda bhīṣma droṇa bheṭi | 34 |
uttara boilā mote kahilu purāṇara bāge
śāsra śuṇāile kisa bā hoiba badhīrajana āge | 35 |
br̥hanārī boilā ye pūrbe śāhāsra na śuṇilā
āho uttara tahiṁra doṣe se badhira hoilā | 36 |
āho br̥hanārī badhira āge pheile śāsrapothi
uttara kumara boilā muṁ na śuṇai tohara bāṇī
jāta hoile mr̥tyu ye hoai niẏata | 39 |
āho uttara brāhmaṇa hoi yebe jaḷaku karai bhaẏe
stirī hoi yebe agnire na diai kāẏe | 40 |
aneka abasthā kari tāku daṇḍa diai yame | 41 |
uttara boilā tu ye aṭu napuṁsaka
raṇe male tu pāibu ānajanme sukha | 42 |
tu ye br̥hanārī maraṇaku paḍuachu māḍi
muṁ kiṁpā nāśayibi ẏeḍe sampada chāḍi | 43 |
sārathi hoi bāhi pāribu ki mora ratha | 44 |
uttara kumra boilā muhiṁ tora sārathi hoile
trailoke ke acchi rathī mohora ratha bāhile | 45 |
brahmāra chāmuku muṁ bāhī pārai ratha | 46 |
indra gobinda hoile samare kāhākuhiṁ nāhiṁ bhīti | 47 |
āsa āsa uttara bāhā ẏebe mohora ratha
uttara boilā muṁ yebe sārathi hoibi
rathī ke hoiba muṁ tāhāra mukha chāhiṁbi | 49 |
nāsāre hasta dei hasilā saṁkocanara rājāra nāti | 50 |
sakhi ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe muṁ ye aṭai mahāyodhī
tuhi jātihīna pāmara aṭu napuṁseka kāẏe
thāṭha dekhi trāsa kalā ye ẏe mohora bhaḷi
tu chāra kisa samara karibu napuṁsake br̥hanāī | 53 |
lg.note: tume br̥hanārī sāṁgrāmaku paḍu acha maḍi |(ta, tha)
lg.l: uttara boilā tu ye pāpakalu pūrbe
subeḷa pāilu ẏebe raṇayāgyaṁ kalu icchā
uttara boilā br̥hannārī muṁ jāṇili tohora mana āśa
sakṣaẏe samare tu debu āja jhāsa | 56 |
br̥hanārī boilā re pratagyāṁ mohora dekha
tohroa prāẏe maṇilu ki loḍu bhoga sukha | 57 |
br̥hanārī boilā ẏe jīrṇṇa tohora dhanu
ẏe dhanu dhariṇa kurusāgaraku karucu āgamanu | 60 |
āho uttara bhīṣme dhanu bahanti pañchāṇoi sahasrabaḷa
