nausahasra baḷa dhanu bahanti bhāradvādaśaṅkara bāḷa | 61 |
baẏāṇoi sahasra baḷa dhanu bahanit aśvathāmā
pañchāśi sahasra baḷa dhanu ey gahanti bhuriśrabā
aṭhāśī sahasra baḷa dhanu bahanti karṇna ye rādhebā | 63 |
aśī sahasra baḷa dhanu bahai somadatta
baẏāaśī śasra baḷa dhanu bahanti bāhlika tāra suta | 64 |
tāhara dhanura baḷa sahasa aśīẏe pañchadaśa | 65 |
lg.note: subeḷa pāilu tu maraṇaku kalu icchā |(ṅa, ñja, ga)

lg.l: satāṇoi sahasra baḷa dhanu tāhāra dekhili | 66 |
satāiśi sahasra baḷara dhanu tāhāra mahābhārā | 67 |
aṇāaśī sahasra baḷa dhana thāi sehu gheni | 68 |
śākalya deśara rājā ye mahārathī śalya
pañchāṇoi sahasra baḷa dhanu dharai mahāmalla | 69 |
āho uttara sarbe pañchāuna baḷa tohora dhanugoṭi
ẏe dhanure śara binddhabe ratha gaja ava na phuṭi | 70 |
driyodhana bahai dhanu ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra baḷa
apramita nārāja bindhai se duihaste prabaḷa | 71 |
ẏe śatebhāi dhanu dharanti lakṣa lakṣa baḷa | 73 |
āho uttara yebaṇa yebaṇa yoddhāẏe achanti kaurobe
parbate paḍi aṅge cura heuthānti sarbe | 74 |
baḷuta agyāna tu ye kicchihiṁ na bujhu
ẏehi dhanu gheni ki tuy bhīṣma droṇa tule yujhu | 75 |
uttara boilā br̥hannārī ẏeb tu mote kete kahu
ẏekathā sañchapi mote kimpā antapure na kahuṁ | 76 |
ẏeteka udanta yebe muṁ pāānti sehiṭhāru
nirmaḷa śarīragoṭi kimpe karianti muṁ garu | 77 |
arjuna rathī hoi rathare bije kalā | 78 |
lg.note: prathame mote ẏemāna kahithile āsanti muhiṁ kāhuṁ |(da, ja)

lg.l: br̥hannārī boilā ratha mora bāhā śamībukṣa taḷaku tatakṣaṇānti | 1 |
banaste paśante uttara br̥hanmāriki kala pucchā | 3 |
uttara boilā ẏeheneka bhaẏe upujaiṭi rathīpaṇaku
tu ẏebe boilu ratha bāhāsi banasta bhitaraku | 4 |
br̥hannārī boilā ho uttara dhanu ye āmbhara nāhiṁ
dhanu goṭiẏe āṇimā ṭhābakari yahiṁ pāi | 5 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ biṣṇu bhadrā nadīkūḷe | 6 |
adabhmate adauḍi bandhane tāha mr̥tupiṇḍa rakhiacchi | 7 |
rathara uparu uttara kumara paḍilāka bhmabi | 8 |
lg.note: tu ẏebe ratha bāhu kehne banasta bhitaraku |(cha, jha)
prabeśa hoile yāi kr̥ṣṇabhadrā nadīkūḷe |(ka, pha, jha, pa, ñja)
śamī śiśupā br̥kṣa acchi |(da, ja, pha)

lg.l: mukhe jaḷa siñchiṇa sāṣṭāma tāku kari | 9 |
sāṣṭāma hoiṇa se pucchilā kumara cūḍāmaṇi
nirghāta śabada prāẏe śubhila kisa bāṇī | 10 |
svāmi uttara bhaẏe kariba tu kṣaṇe thantara huasi | 11 |
āu uttara ẏe br̥kṣa uparaku pāribuṭiki bābu uṭhi
uttara boilā baḍāi uccharga niate nāhiṁ śākhā
ki rūpe uṭhibi kāryya svarūpa mote dekhā | 14 |
dhau goṭie āṇa acchi troṭara bhitara | 15 |
āho uttara benicachu buja br̥kṣaku koḷakari | 16 |
br̥kṣaku kiḷakari uttara ye bujila benicachu
ḍāḷe uttara kumara yāi nāgilā pratakṣu | 18 |
benikośa āẏetana tahiṁ madhyeṇa acchi troṭa
dinakara nātha tahiṁ nitye hoi bheṭa | 22 |
boilā saṁkaṭa paḍilā ki āditya debatāku | 23 |
troṭahiṁ ta niśākāḷe diśai dibasara prāẏe | 25 |
br̥hannarī boilā ho troṭare hātha bhara
kisa kisa śahasra acchi bege kāḍhidia mora kara | 26 |
uttara kumara se troṭare māilāka kara
ḍāḷeṇa śoi asa ṣṭama ye hoila birāṭi | 28 |
bahana ohlāi āsa ho dhanu goṭiẏeka gheni | 29 |
kadāścite na phurai uttara kumāra bāci | 30 |

lg.note:
śarīra bisarji asāṣṭame paṛiacchi śrīkr̥ṣṇāra baḷā |
ka, pha, o jha, pa, ṇa, ṅa
“uttara kramara darpa pādānta” pare
ẏesaneka bichārai bīra sabyaśacī
uttara asāṣṭama dekhi hr̥dagate pārthi |
lg.l: mukharu gaḷai tāra kāḷa ye garaḷajāḷa
uttara kumarakaiṁ ye koḷa kalāka br̥hannarī
bighāte harila se uttara kumāra darpa | 34 |
brahmābiṣṇu maheśvara durgāṁku hr̥de laẏa kalā kiraṭī | 36 |
muṁ biṣa mārai na chuṁai hāthe | 37 |
āre āre biṣa ghā mukhe antarīkṣe mara | 38 |
jhaḍante jhaḍa na jhaḍuṁ boli kāhāra rāṇa
śrī gorekhanātha svāmīṁkara koṭi koṭi rāṇa | 39 |
āho caitana arjuna mantre ye chāḍigalāka garaḷa
br̥hannāī mukha chāhiṁ uttarakumāra kala pucchā
paḍilāka biṣa ye candra ghare beḷā
tini tihuḍi campāi cande ṇāye bandha
ūja ṇire ailāka biṣa sarpara bighāta | 49 |
śaraṇa paśila yāiṁ rādheba karṇṇa rathe | 51 |
sarpa boilā bho karṇṇa, rakṣā mote kara
āho bharoi malla śaraṇa paśili tohora | 52 |
karṇṇa boilā sarpa kāākaiṁ ẏeḍe ḍara
khāṇḍeba banare thile mora yete baṁśa
bana dahana kāḷe sabu arjuna kala dhvaṁsa | 54 |

lg.note: runddhalā tapana ye buḍābai golāhāṭa |(cha, ṅa)

“bairitā bichāre ye airi hoiacchi....pada sthānare
bhinma pāṭha–
kai karāḷa ādrābaḷī ābara ye biju
pābaka dhāraka loḷaśara samaraju |(ṇa) (abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: ẏe bidha arjunare śareṇa ẏe paśile bikaḷe
āho karṇṇa bāmpi bhitare muhi paḍithili uḍi
naba dibasa pariyante muṁ paḍithili buḍi | 58 |
khāṇḍeba bana dahana yahuṁ helā samāpata
śoṣeka nāme kāḷasarpa muṁ birāḷara suta | 59 |
āho karṇṇa arjuna mohora ye pitāra bairi

lg.note: (pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
baitrikā birāji puṇi ādrābaḷī rajju
jārabandha lokaṅkara aṭe samabandhu |(kha, ṭha,)
kāḷa bikarāḷa mahakāḷa ādi dakṣa
ulloḷa byākuḷa mahāpadma takṣa |(ṅa)

“māriṇa arjuna tāhā pakāilā anaḷe |” pāḍānta pare
ja o da pothire adhikā pada –
padukā gaṅgā nāme ye ẏeki nadīgoṭi
khāṇḍeba bana beḍhi se mekhaḷi dhāre phuti |
se nadī khaṇḍi ye khāṇḍeba banaku
aśī sāgara kumbha se buḍai pāṇi debāku |
arjuna śara pabana lāgi ye paḍili muhiṁ uḍi
naba dina pariyante thili muhi buḍi | (ja, da,)
śoṣeka nāme kāḷasarpa muṁ karāḷara suta |(ṭa, cha, da, gha)
khāṇḍababana dahane baṁśa mohora hoila samāpata |(ga, ñja)
lg.l: putra hoi pitāku na kale kāraṇa
se putra paḍai ye rairoba narkeṇa | 61 |
bho karṇṇa samībr̥kṣa troṭare hāde thili
se troṭuṁ arjuna śasra nele tāku ḍhaṁsibi boli | 62 |
birāṭara nandana ye toṭare hātha bhari
paḷāi aili ḍare rakha tu śaraṇa
ẏeḍe baḍa bighāta mora hoilā akaraṇa | 65 |
kāḷeṇa śrikāḷa āsi hoilā phāṇi bandha | 66 |
ẏete boli śoṣeka kāḷasarpa karṇṇa rathe rahilā
driyodhana agrate yāiṁ karṇṇa ey kahilā | 68 |
bho maitra sandeśa bāratā mūṁ pāili ẏehikṣaṇi
arjuna samare āsiba kahilā mote phaṇī | 69 |
śuṇa caitana uttara br̥kṣara upare, taḷe br̥hannarī
pāñcha dhanu daśa troṇa baḍhāiṇa dilā
sate sahasra thara praḷamba kaā dhanuśasra mānaṅku | 3 |
ẏe dhanu troṇamāna ke thoila ẏethe āṇi | 4 |
br̥hannārī boilā tu śuṇa birāṭara tanu
śuṇiṇa sānande se pachārai uttara kumara
śuṇimāku icchā mora kebaṇa dhanu aṭai kāhāra | 6 |
kṣadra hīrā puṁji puṁji lāgicchi śasra chāri | 7 |
śagkha sarddūḷa dhanu dhabaḷa barṇṇa guṇa
śuddha saṣṭika jāṇi dhabaḷa diśe beni troṇa | 8 |
pañchāśa sahasra bābu ẏe dhanura baḷa
ẏe dhanu bahanti ye yujheṣṭha mahīpāḷa | 10 |
śate sahasreka śara śveta śaṅkhacila pakṣī
dui troṇe nārāca dui sahasra acchi | 11 |
brahmāra sañchila ẏe ajaṅga nāme dhanu
samare anirbāraṇa ẏe bahai dharmarājāṁkara tanu | 12 |
se dhanu thoiṇa ye āreka dhanu dhari
bāmakare dhariṇa ye ḍahāṇa kare jhāḍikari | 13 |
dhanura upare śārddūḷa carma ye mekhaḷa | 14 |
jhalakanti hīrā kiraṇa ye śatecakra jyoti
dui troṇe khañjilā acchi mārāga pāñchakoṭi | 15 |
ẏekādaśa paṁkti māṇikya tini paṁkti hīrā
ḍiṅare na sahanti ye baṇa dhanubhārā | 16 |
dharaṇa dhāraṇa dhanu se nāma ādrābaḷī
ẏe dhanura darpe andheka bidārile debakāśī | 19 |
bhāgyabara nama dile dvitīẏa kodaṇḍa ye dhanu
ṣṭhiẏe sahasra baḷa ẏe dhanura kuruśānu | 20 |
duitroṇa bhitare achai nārāja sahsra pandara | 21 |
ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra baḷa dhanu bhīmasena bahai
ẏe dhanura ghāte chatrī hoi rahite nuārai | 23 |
lg.note: tinidhāri markata ye gunthilā pābacche |–cha, ṇa, ka
rudrara dila dhanu ẏe teja ye bikāśi |–da, ja
rudrara kapoḷe ki pramadā bikaśila śaśī |–ta, tha
lg.l: se dhanu thoiṇa ye ghenilā āna dhanugoṭi
ẏe dhanura mahimāṁ tu śuṇasi birāṭi | 24 |
ẏe dhanura pithire sahasra kaṇaẏa supāti
hīrā nīḷāra khañjaṇī prabandha kṣudra moti | 25 |
gaja paripāṭa upare kaṇaẏa padma gunthā
gaja mukutā benilakṣa gunthilā acchi caupāśe | 27 |
jhalakanti dhanu ye nirdhūma agni jāṇi | 28 |
dakṣaṇa diga sādhilā ẏe dhanu dharante | 32 |
se dhanu thoiṇa ye ghenilā āra dhanu
maḷaẏa basanta rañchanā khañjata hema jhaḷi

lg.note: nirmaḷ amukutā ye nirbāṇa pāṭasutā |–da, ja, pa
kuḷāndheka giri dahana kalā yene |–ña, kha
dakṣiṇa diga sadhilā ẏe rājisī yāga nimante |–ṇa, pa
dakṣiṇa diga sādhilā se kāryya anugate |–ga, ña, ṭa
gagane udaẏe ki ẏe tejeṇa aśvamāḷī |–ga, ña, ka

lg.l: śuddha saṣṭika barṇṇa madhye ki poẏeḷā | 35 |
ẏekai śarake jaẏe karipārai naba mahīmaṇḍaḷe | 37 |
dhanuhoḷa pr̥ṣṭhare khñjalā māṇikya puñji puñja | 38 |
māṇikya puñjike hīrā padma goṭiẏe goṭiẏe
tāreka bidāraṇa kāḷe ẏe dhanu kale śatamanu
śarada hema śiśira basanta grīṣma baraṣā chaḍarutu
ẏe dhanu chāḍa na yāi mānadhāṭa hāthuṁ | 41 |
pūrba digabijaẏa kāḷe prasanna hoile sūryyabaṁśī
nārāja chāẏeṇī ye anakūḷa bhadrā pacchā

lg.note: śarada śiśira hemanta tinirutu |–ga, ña, ka, ṇa, ṅa

lg.l: chāḷiśi sahasra baḷa ẏe dhanu bahai kuruśānu | 48 |
śuṇa bābu uttara tu ẏe dhanura mahimāṁ
se yagyāṁkuṇḍa madhyaru ye bāẏeṁśeka upujilā | 52 |
chatiśa paba se piṅṅgaḷa bāẏeṁśa goṭi | 53 |
se bāẏeṁśa goṭiki pitāmaha kalāka pāñchakhaṇḍa | 55 |
prathama khaṇḍaka ye ẏekādaśa paba kalā
manaẏeka basi brahma dhanu ẏe srijilā | 55 |
sehi dhanura baḷa ye hoilā tinikoṭi
pināka nāma dile tāha bahile dhurjaṭi | 56 |
dutīẏa khaṇḍa ye nabapaba kari gheni
benikoṭi baḷa se sāraṅga nāme dhanu
indra debatā bahile tāhā amara bhmabanu | 58 |
lg.note:
nāhiṁ gaṇṭhi nāhiṁ paba nāhiṁ kare sr̥ṣṭi
nābhi maṇḍaḷa nāhi pūrita benipr̥ṣṭi |–ṇa, ña, ga
bijekarṇṇakaṭāra ye gheniṇa pañchamuṇḍa |–da, jha, ṇa
lg.l: tr̥tīẏa khaṇḍa ye hoilā paba sāta
manuẏeka basi dhanu ẏe srijilā bidhāta | 59 |
kotiẏeka baḷa se ye ajaṅga nāme dhanu
satya yuge tāhā bahile praśurāma jamadagnīra tanu | 60 |
pañchabiṁśa gaṇḍā yuge se dhanu nirbāṇi | 61 |
nabalakṣa baḷa se ye kodanta dhanu nāma
tretaẏā yuge bhārābhara nibāraṇa arthe tāhā bahile śrīrāma | 62 |
āra ẏekakhaṇḍa ye hoilā paba tini
bābu ẏe dhanura nāma ye aṭai gāṇḍima
dvāpara yuge arjunaku ẏehā dile śrīpuruṣottama | 64 |
lakṣeka dhanu ẏe ye bahai phālaguni
ẏe dhanura nārāja sahantā nāhiṁ medinī | 65 |
pināka sāraṅga ajaṅga kodanta gāṇḍima nāma dilā | 68 |
āho uttara agraccheda hoi ye uburilā ẏekapaba
baiṁśī goṭiẏe kala tāhā pitāmaha deba | 69 |
satya treta yuge tāha thoilā yatnakari
dvāpara yuge nārāẏaṇa kahnā abatāre janmale gopapurī | 70 |
lg.note: ẏe dhanure śahasra sanddhale sambhāḷantā nāhiṁ nāhiṁ pura tini |–ta, tha

lg.l: mandara dhaile kahnā gopī gopāḷa nimante | 71 |
puṣyeka nandinī rādhaku icchale kr̥ṣṇa hr̥de | 72 |
pāde peli rādhā tāhā pakāilā dūrakari | 73 |
niāśri basile hari rātra ye dibase | 74 |
chāḍibaiṁ sarba cintā boile na maribi kaṁsa
manuṣya kāẏā chāḍibi yibi nija bāsa | 75 |
ẏesaneka nirāśa abasta hari hoilu kimarthe
puṣyeka nandanī rādhā lecchilā ki tote | 77 |
māribi kasaku yebe rasibe gopasti rīmāne | 78 |
se rādhā nirāśa kalā yahuṁ mote
muhim tote debaim aneka kāḷara biraha bāẏeṁśī | 80 |
stambhana mohona baśya uccāṭana añjana ye añchusvara
nāma dhari bāile gopīẏe āsibe tohroa chāmura | 81 |
se tote daini karibaṭi nijabāsa ẏeḍikari | 82 |
lg.note: puṣoka nandinī rādhā na majjalā kr̥ṣṇapāde |–da
br̥(?)nu sutā rādhā na cintante hr̥de |–ṭha
namāribi kaṁsa ẏe gopīṁka kāraṇe |–ṇa
lg.l: āho uttara yebaṇa baiṁśīgoṭi deigale hāde pitā
uttara boilā ho jībana tora dhani dhani
tu aba napuṁseka muṁ tote śubhabeḷe bheṭi
tohora jībana dhani dhani sādhu mohora jībanagoṭi | 85 |
śuṇa ho uttara kumāra ye gāṇḍa ma dhanu kathā
ẏeṇe se bhārā nirāraṇa hoiba sarbathā | 86 |
tu ẏehā kemante ho jāṇilu tadanta kari | 87 |
ẏehenneka kari mahatama āmbhanta karanti sadaẏe
ye se br̥hannārī se pratakṣe dhanurjaẏe | 89 |
uttara boilā tu samasta bheda jāṇu yebe
ẏe śahasranta thoi pāṇḍaba gale keuṁṇa ṭhābe | 90 |
rājyabhāra thāṭha sanya parijā kale ẏekābeḷe | 91 |
ye paśāre hārai sedvādaśa baraṣa bane sebi
baraṣe tera dibasa yebe hoiba jāṇantā
puṇa dvādaśa baraṣa se yiba ẏesaneka kathā | 93 |
lg.note: br̥hannārī boilā se kathāra kutūhḷe |–ṭa, ṭha, pa, gha, ña, ga, ta, tha, kha, cha
puṇa dvādaśa baraṣa bane se yiba ẏehenneka satyabratā |–ṇa, kha
lg.l: āho uttara daiba puruṣamāne kale darmare kaṣaṇa
bane paśiṇa ye aneka daita māri
hīdimbeka bane paśi hiḍimbeka daita māri
madhu meruśūḷa kāḷānaḷa kāḷanaumī ābara aṅgirī | 98 |
dharma na laṁghanti se mahata kuḷaśīḷa
tāhā tu gopyakari āribu ki hr̥dagate | 101 |
uttara boilā satya kalāiṁ ye muhiṁ
sātadina pariyante muṁ na kahibi kāhiṁ | 102 |
dharma laṁghai muhiṁ karatāre droha karai
nirañjana thāḷe muṁ biṣa ye bharai | 103 |
jaḷe ulagna hoi srāhāne yete doṣa
se doṣa labhibi muṁ kaleṭi prakāśa | 104 |
br̥hannārī boilā tu śuṇa ho birāṭi
ẏe tohora rājyare ye achanti pāṇḍaba pāñchagoṭi | 105 |
uttara kumāra āśrāja ye br̥hannārī bacane
āho br̥hannārī rājusī yāga yujheṣṭhi ṭhākure kale
pañchauttara śate ratha subarṇṇa dekhā daraśani gheniṇa birāṭa ye gale | 107 |
antarīkṣe birākura ghenigale gaṇḍasthaḷe dei hātha | 109 |
lakṣeka nr̥pati yāhāra caraṇa taḷe loṭi
bāsudeba paḍhihārī paṇe yāhāra caraṇa taḷe khaṭi | 112 |
yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara pāda aṅguṣṭhi basilā saburi lalāṭe | 113 |
ẏete puṇya kāhuṁ hoiba birāṭara baṁśe
yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara pādaraja paḍiba ki mohora deśe | 114 |
abade hoilāni tohora rājye ṭhākure achanti bijekari | 115 |
āho uttara yāhāra tule paśa kheḷanti birāṭe
anīti bacana ho na āsai yāhāra mukhe
sehi se yujheṣṭhi uttara bujhasi pratakṣe | 117 |
uttara kumāri āśrika ye hoilā tāhā śuṇi
dekhi tadanta kari bujha br̥hannārī puṇi | 118 |
lg.note: yujheṣṭhi debaṁka pādaraja lāgai saburi lalāṭe |–ja, da

lg.l: se gopyāna hoile puṇa kebaṇa upāẏe | 119 |
tiniṣāṭhi pauṭi annake ye beḷake atriputi
ẏe tohora bacana ybe muhiṁ karibaiṁ satya
athabā sarūpa kari mote kahani saṁghāta | 121 |
idaṁ bākya hr̥dagate bichārile sarūpa laẏe gheni | 122 |
śuṇa ho uttara trailokya madhye yāhāra mahimāṁ durlabha
pracaṇḍa māla ye māilā kautuka śadhe | 124 |
trigartta tohora pitāku ye bānddha neuthilā
thāṭha tāhāra saṁhari birāṭaku bandhanu āṇilā | 126 |

lg.note:
“agni bidāri bāhāra yebaṇa śarīra”
pāṭha pare ‘ṭa, gha’ pothire adhikā paṭha :–
mote ye pūjilu ho śuṇasi nikara
yāgaru jātakaḷe biśva maitra munibara |

lg.l: pañchāḷa deśa nr̥apti dropada rājāra abaḷā
pratagyāṁ sādhabī se keśa yāhāra mukuḷā | 131 |
gopyāna nimante se sairindhrī nāma bahi
dina haraṇa nimante se gopye chanti rahi | 132 |
hemabanta bibāde ye pr̥thī dhailā kontamune
rehantara prasāde se jāṇai aśva lakṣaṇa bidyā | 135 |
āho uttara yāhāra aśva sajile jiṇai parathāṭhai
na jiṇile na leuṭai sarūpa jāṇa aṭai | 137 |
āho uttara kahante na sarai ẏehāṁkara mahimāṁ
br̥hannārī boilā śuṇa ho birāṭara bacchā
se prothanā sādhya hoilā yāhāra benughoṣe | 143 |
uttara yāhāra nāma dharante sarba roga tuṭi
bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā bābu yāhāra nāmagoṭi | 144 |
teṇu se tantrīpāḷa gopāḷa nāma prasiddhi | 145 |
ẏemānaṁka bāratā pāili arjuna ṭhākure gale kāhiṁ | 146 |
muhiṁ se pārthiba hāde bāseba nandane | 147 |
bābu ki pātake arjilu ho bāsebara suta | 148 |
rāmakr̥ṣṇa jiṇimāku ye sāmartha aṭai ẏeke | 150 |
uttara kumara boilā kebaṇa tora pāpa
ẏe mohroa idam bākya śuṇa re birāṭi
nirbātakapace badhyakari muṁ amarādhi nathe bheṭi | 153 |
yebaṇa beḷe dāneba dhāḍidilā amara maṇḍaḷe
bhāñjiṇa jūra karai sarga maṇḍaḷa sarbakāḷe | 154 |
muṁ tāhākaiṁ nidhana hāde kalaiṁ samare
aneka utsaba indra debatā kaleka amare | 155 |
lg.note: bābu keuṁrūpe tuhi bāsebara suta |–gha, ṭha, ña, ga
nārāẏaṇa arddhaaṅga yebaṇa puruṣa |–da, ja

lg.l: āśā jāṇimā nimante bāseba debatā dile peṣi
aneka binoẏī ramaṇa mote māgila ubaṁśī | 157 |
śuṇa ho satyayuge amare purarabā nāme rājā
kāḷe se ubaṁśī hāde tāhāṁkara bhāriyā | 158 |
ẏebe se ubaṁśī aṭe tāhāṁkara yubatī
muhiṁ pāmara tāhākaiṁ kemante karibaiṁ surati | 163 |
baṁśa gurupatnī boli nāsti muhiṁ kali
rage ubaṁśī boilā napuṁseka hoa boli | 164 |
birahitā bāmā muṁ mote kalu tu nirāśa
śuṇa bābu uttara ẏehā jāṇile sasrayoni
sādhu sādhu putra boli mote kale dhani dhani | 166 |
nikaḷaṁka putra goṭiki mora dilu ẏeḍeka śāpa | 167 |
bāseba debatāṁka kope mote se kalāka sadaẏe
yāa yā śāpa mohora tote hita hou dhanurjaẏe | 168 |
lg.note: ubaṁśī rāile mote madana rasabhoḷe |–da

lg.l: āna āna rūpe tumbhe gupate rahiba pañchubhrātha | 169 |
bābu parama sādhabī mote yāha kopeṇa biilā
tu ye pucchākalu bābu mohora carita
uttara boilā arjuna ṭākure bahanti daśanāma
arjuna boile uttara bahuta gahana ẏe kathā
tu ye pucchākalu kahibāna tāhāra bāratā | 175 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭra andha ye rājyaku nohilā yogya
sodara arthe paṇḍura tāhāṁku baḍa srāga | 176 |
śataśiṁga parbatare ye āśrama kale puṇi | 178 |
se suranadī tīre arjuna nāme bana
tahiṁ janamili muṁ mithuna kr̥ṣṇa dutīẏāra dina | 179 |
br̥haspatī bāra nakṣatra ye uttarā phālaguni
rātreṇa koḷe mote kointāẏe chanti gheni | 180 |
śrīkare arghya gheni paṇḍu ye rājana

lg.note: āna rūpe rahiba gopate chāri bhrātha |–ga, ṭha, kha, ña, ṇa, tha

lg.l: āho uttara raibrata parbate gobinde phagu kheḷi
tatakṣaṇe keśaba bainetra piṭhare kale bije | 184 |
sarūpa dekhi mote koḷe dhaile janārddana | 185 |
āpaṇe doḷire basāi dutīkr̥ṣṇa nāma toḷi | 186 |
bābu amara nāśa kalā ye bajra kapacara suta
aneka ucchaba ye amare kaleka debarājā
kireṭī mukuṭa bānddha kirīṭa nāma dileka biḍojā | 188 |
aneka binoẏī mote kahile gandharbakuḷa śriẏā | 190 |
ẏe chārihaẏe śuddha saṣṭika jāṇi teja | 191 |
biśvābasu pūjākale mote śveta bārāsa gheni
teṇukari nāma mora dile śveta ye bāhinī | 192 |
yetebeḷe khāṇḍaba bana muṁ kalaiṁ dahanu | 193 |
biṣṇu nāthaṁka tahuṁ mote gāṇḍima dhanu dile | 195 |
abhaẏe bara tote prāpata hou boli agni debataẏe boile
trailokye jaẏīhua ẏe dhanu kare thile | 196 |
bābu ẏe dhanu kare thile hoai sarba jaẏe
teṇukari agni debatāẏe nama dile dhanurjaẏe | 197 |
bābu suganddhakā haraṇe muṁ hanumante bibādī
śate śare sāgara muhiṁ setukandha bāndha | 198 |
bārānidhi bhitare se caubiṁśa jūṇa dīrghaprati
ẏeḍebaḍa bandha muhiṁ bānddhalaiṁ dakṣiṇa mūrati | 199 |
teṇukari nāma mora dileka se pātha | 200 |
bābu yāgadi tīrtha ye gaṅgā srāhāna kāḷe
baḷātkāre harila ye śacī ye debīṁki | 202 |
muhiṁ basiacchi se asakanda nāme bane
tohora parāẏe putra thāuṁ muṁ hoili nirekha | 205 |
se aparṇṇāmāne boile khaṇḍilu sarba ariṣṭa
sarbasācī nāma tohora heu re putragoṭi | 208 |
bābu sāṁgrāme nisata hoanti yebaṇahiṁ chatrī
mukhe aṅguḷa lāi nisate dyanti piṭha
bibaccha karme muhiṁ na peṣai śaragoṭi | 210 |
samasta yoddhaẏe boile rpatagyāṁ tohora sāca
bābu rājusī yāgare ye diga bijaẏa kāḷe
uttara dakṣiṇa pūrba pacchima lakṣeka nr̥apti
bujaẏa nāma deiṇa sabhiẏeṁ kale tusti | 213 |
mora daśanāma bābu śuṇimāku sābadhāna hoilu birāṭi
āho uttara ẏe daśanāma ye paḍhanti śuṇanti
aputrike putra pānti dhana santati barddhuti | 216 |
napuṁseka lakṣaṇa mora galāṭi ẏebe phiṭi | 218 |
śuṇiṇa uttara kumāra śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi
aneka puṇya svāmī muṁ karithili pūrbe
jagujana sodara prabhma śaraṇa pañjara nāthe
śrīkr̥ṣṇa sārathi paṇe bāhānti yāra rathe | 223 |
sādhu sādhu sulabha ẏe maghadeśa macchapurī
sādhu sādhu sulabha ẏe birāṭara baṁśa
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa hr̥dagate nitye dhyāẏe | 226 | | 5625 |
idam bāca ye uttara kumāra kathopī
yahuṁ se saṁpakṣa mote dutī nārāẏaṇa
arjuna boile uttaa ẏebe br̥kṣaku bege uṭha
naẏana buji uttara br̥kṣakaiṁ kalā koḷa
uttara kumāra dhailā tahā taruḍāḷe thāi | 5 |
āgyāṁ pramāṇe se yāiṁ lāgilā pratakṣe | 7 |
kara caraṇa śira kicchihiṁ ẏehāra nāhiṁ
badana bihune ẏe ye bobi ẏeka dei | 9 |
ghora raḍighāte se ye kaṁpai brahmāṇḍa
adauḍi bandhane ẏe kiṁpā ẏeḍeka paacaṇḍa | 10 |
arjuna boilā śuṇa tu ho birāṭara bāḷe
aneka upugāra kali nirbāta kapaca badhakāḷe | 11 |
nirbātakapaca kaiṁ badhakari muṁ āṇili sehu bāḷī
bhāriyā paiṇa aneka sānanda hoilā pracaṇḍābaḷī | 15 |
mote boilā tuye badhakulu mora dārā bairi
debaku rahamāna nohai tu mohora guru
muhiṁ boili yebe prasanna hoilu mote
gandharbe dānabe kinnare śahasra nianti boli hari

lg.note:
“teṇukari bikaṭāḷe diai ghoraraḍi”
pāṭha pare ‘ta, tha’ pothi dvaẏare “śamī br̥kṣara br̥ttānta”
kathita acchi :–
uttara boilā ẏe śamībr̥kṣara mahimāṁ
ẏe śahasra saṁhari acchi kebaṇa mahātamā
badaẏanti arjuna bātu śuṇare uttara
ẏe br̥kṣara mahimāṁ se debaṁku agocara |
manu satyayuge se hara pārbatīṁka prasanne
bara māga boli ye boile trilocane |

lg.l: āḍa dīrgha yojana pariyante nuāsanti kehi | 21 |
lg.note: [pūrbapr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
muhiṁ boili svāmī mote bara yebe deba
mohor aśahasra rakṣā nimante tumbhe śamībr̥kṣa hoithibā |
birāṭe agyāṁtabasa baraṣe teradina
śahasra sambhaiba tumbhe hara pārbatī benijana |
harihara pārbatī tumbhe hoiba br̥kṣagoṭi
bhitara trokaṭa ye hoibe pārbatī
śahsra tahiṁ thoi āmbhe hoibu nibhrānti |
arjunara mukharu ẏesaneka bakya śuṇi
ḍāhāṇa bhmajaru keśaba bāhāra kale śroṇi |
sadāśibaṁkara bibhūti pārbatīṁkara bacane
brahmāṁkara kapoḷe hari medile bidyamāne |
sabu samakari nārāẏaṇa medile cakaṭi
kareṇa medi deba bhiāile khaḍigoṭi |
īśvare boile tora yetebeḷe kāryya
bhūmire tinigāra kāṭile hoiba saroja |
śamī śiṁśupāẏe harihara mūḷa
caturmūkha brāhmā hoile chāriḍāḷa |
īśvaraṁkara aṅga ye bāsudebaṁkara kāẏe
svaẏeṁ bibhūti medile brahmāṁkara kapoḷe |
dhātāra chāri badana chari sikaḍi chāriḍāḷe
ẏemante br̥kṣa ye upujilā rabitaḷe |
se br̥kṣa madhyatroṭare ye achanti girijā
ẏe se śamībr̥kṣa śuṇa tu birāṭara tanujā |
ẏe br̥kṣara śarīra yebe nohiba tāhāṁkara
ānake śahiba se śahasraṁkara bhārābhara |

lg.l: ẏe śahasranta rakṣākari pārai ki ānabhaḷi | 22 |
uttara boilā ẏe śamībr̥kṣara aneka mahimāṁ
ẏete śahasranta bahiacchi ẏe kebaṇa mahātamā | 23 |
mahībhārā na sahai ẏe br̥kṣa sahilā kesane | 24 |
śuṇa uttara kumāra ye bolai phālaguni
ẏe br̥kṣa harihara debataṁka bhmaja beni | 25 |
bābu aṅgeka śukḷa ye aṅgeka kaḷā
yebaṇa śahasra bhāra na sahai meru
harihara beni debatā ẏehā bahile garu | 27 |
uttara kumāra pachārai debadatta śaṅkha chāhiṁ
ẏe śaṅkhagoṭi svāmī pāila tume kāhiṁ | 30 |
makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa tithi ye cauṭhi
biṣṭi nāme karaṇa ye āẏuṣmāna name yoga
pūrbadige ambu baneṇa tāhāra ye bāsa
sehu se bhāskara tīrthaku baḷa ẏe mānasa | 36 |
candra bhāgā tīrtha se māẏe srāhāna kari | 37 |
aparba ratna aḷaṁkāra tumara tahiṁ acchi
debatāṁka aḷaṁkāraku tu iccha kalu lo pāmerī | 41 |
ẏethe aḷaṁkāra māgu lo chāṇḍāḷī durāpati | 42 |
boilā debatāṁka aḷaṁkāraku āśākaru lo toho chāra | 44 |
ḍāhāṇa bhmaje dhariacchi se lohāra lauḍi | 45 |
adhara puṣṭa kariṇa ye prabeśa kuberara āge
apāra baḍimā kathā se kahuacchi rāge | 46 |
āho kubera rāhura bīryya amba daitya jāẏe
arka datyakaiṁ māḍi se basile birañchi
se arkadatyara putra maẏa ye dānaba
hanumanta māḍi basila ye sebai rāmadeba | 49 |
kadambāsura nandana muṁ nāma mo ambāsura | 50 |
muhiṁ rakṣāpāḷaka ye bhāskara tīrtha adhikārī
mohor abhāriyā ye māgilā ẏeka māḷī
tohor bhāriyā mohora bhāriyāku dilā gāḷi | 52 |
daẏā na kale se na dile yugate
kahuṁ kahuṁ kopakalā se ambāsura mahābaḷa
ākreṣi naḷa kuberara dhailā yāiṁ bāḷa | 55 |
kumaraku bandhana kalā se jaḷaphāśa gheni
aḷaṁka ramāna se ye yete thile bhari
sahasre kanyāṁkara aḷaṁkāra samasta nei dilā | 58 |
bahmā rudra indra candra sūryya ādikari
meru āstāne basichanti tahiṁ kubera kalāka guhāri | 61 |
putra mohora galā arka tīrthe srāhāna nimante
pāṇḍaba kuḷe jāta tāhā māriba arjune | 64 |
naḷa kuberaku dhari neiacchi ambāsura daite | 67 |
tu tāhāku bahda ho kara phālaguni
kubera nandana debabhaṇḍāra bege āsa gheni | 68 |
nārada boile se thāi jaḷaandhāra pura
kebaṇa bāge se jaḷuṁ hoiba bāhāra | 69 |
parama sānanda se deba ye bidhāta
debadatta śaṅkha āṇi dileka mora hātha | 70 |
trailoka kampai se kambu śabada śuṇi
brahmāẏe dile mote ābara śahasra goṭiẏe
ẏehā gheni ambāsuraku māra ho dhanurjaẏe | 72 |
āho uttara ẏe śaṅkha dekhi ye mote pucchākalu
boilu ẏe śaṅkha svāmī kāhuṁ tu pailu | 73 |
debatāṁkara dilā ẏe asuraṁka badha arthe
teṇu se debadatta śaṅkhaku bahai mora hāthe | 74 |

lg.note: bāibā parbatuṁ mote niāile bahana |–ta, jha, cha, pa, gha, ṅa, tha, pha

lg.l: śuṇa ho uttara debadatta śaṅkhara mahimāṁ
ẏesaneka kari prasanne mote dile bedabrahmā | 77 |
ẏe śaṅkha laḷita kari yebe karai susvare dhuni
ẏe śaṅkha madhyamāne yebe bābe dhuni
asadhya sādhya hoai ẏe śaṅkhara śabada śuṇi | 80 |
ākreṣa badya se karibā yebe svara
ẏe śaṅkha gheni gali muṁ ye bhāskara arkatīrthe
āho uttara ẏe śaṅkhadhuni bādya krante muhiṁ ṭāṇi
jaḷa bhmabana kampilā gaha gaha śabada śuṇi | 83 |
garjana nādakari se jaḷuṁ bāhāra hoilā | 84 |
naḷa kubera tule se aneka biḷāsuṇī
jaḷaphāśa gheni se bānddhalā acchi ṭāṇi | 86 |
ḍāhāṇa kare luhāra lauḍa gheni kope bāhāra hoi āsi | 87 |
lg.note: mama janma pātaka tohora daśane nāśu |–da, ja
yaśobantī pure thāiṁ tāhā jāṇai padmayoni |–ṇa, ka
śaṅkhara śabada śuṇi se bāhāra hoilā |–ga, ñja, ṭa, pha
lg.l: bābu bahuta pratagyāṁ se kalāka daita ambāsura
ratha gaja aśva ye nāhiṁ tāhāra thāṭha
luhāra lauḍi gheni se bāhāra drapiṣṭa | 89 |
pāṭi phaḷā āḍeṇi aṅge nāhiṁ bajrasehnā
yete śasra binddhali tāhāra śarīre paḍa sarba galā cūnā | 90 |
lakṣe koṭi marbhmata mebaccha śara binddha
ẏekuẏeka nārājake ye kandare honti cchedi | 91 |
āho uttara anirbāraṇa ye mohora samasta śahasra
bābu ẏesaneka ihaloka śasre yahuṁ nuārili jiṇi
rāge deba śahasranta sandhāna kali ṭāṇi | 93 |
rudra śahasra kāmyeka brahma ye śakati
brahma śahasra nārāẏaṇa śasra ratnābaḷī cakra kāti | 95 |
ẏe śahasramāna samasta binddhali muṁ ṭāṇi
kāḷacakra prahāra kali hāde tahiṁra ye ante | 97 |
parbata amoha śasra ye maili aṣṭāṅge
kakaḍā māse yehne droṇamegha kare br̥ṣṭi
asura śarīre parbate paḍile koṭi koṭi | 100 |
antarīkṣe toḷi se bulāilā lohāra ḍāṅge
parbatamāna paḍi cūra hoile niśācara aṅge | 101 |
anaḷa bāṇa binddhali muṁ yeṇe saṁsāra hoẏe dahi | 102 |
śuṇa ho uttara tāra mahimāṁ durllabha
se anaḷa bāṇa yāi paśilā ambāsura garbha | 103 |
nīḷacakra baṇa ye nīḷāmbara biṣṇuṁkara dilā
yebaṇa śare kāmyeka bana dahana hoilā | 104 |
trailokye kampalā se nīḷacakra bāṇa peṣante
baḷarāma jāṇile tāha thāi bāibya parbate | 105 |
s arkatīrthe srāhāna karante harinelā baḷarāmaṁkara haḷa ye mūṣaḷa | 106 |
ẏegāra śahasra yojaan hoilā rāmara pādagati | 107 |
śrī baḷarāme tahuṁ rai mote bacana prakāśi
raha raha arjuna muṁ ẏehākaiṁ badha karaisi | 108 |
śrī baḷarāmaṁka bacane muṁ chāḍili sāṁgrāma
muhiṁ chaḍai āṇili naḷakubera amara baḷāsuṇī |
kopeṇa baḷarāma piṭile haḷa ye mūṣaḷa
caraṇa dhari baḷarāme rāgeṇa dile piṅgi

lg.note: yebaṇa śare kamadeba dahana galā |–da, ja

pūrbadige ambubane ambāsuraku māḍi basile tritaẏā | 118 |

lg.l: śate śate paṁkti hīrā māṇikya kāche kāche | 11 |
bajra śakati brahmaśakati śūḷa ye śakati
amoha śakati sūryyabrateka śakati chela ābara rudrakāti | 15 |
parbatā śara kuṭhāra praśu ye kodāḷa
nīḷacakra kāmyekacakra kāḷacakra hiraṇacakra śuddha cakra ye aśeṣa | 17 |
kaumudakī gadā ratnābaḷī gadā lohasāra gadā
bijeketana gadā kāḷebara gadā ābara cakrābartteka gadā | 18 |
lg.note:

pādānta pare ‘dhanuśara’ prabhr̥tira barṇṇanā ‘da’ pothidvaẏare

śāraṅga dhanu ādrābaḷī ajaṅga nāme dhanu
pināka dhanu bhmajaṅga dhanu śvetabaḷī dhanu |
mīnaketana dhanu ābara śvetamarddaḷa dhanu
nīḷadhanu prabāḷadhanu sūryyābrateka dhanu |
nīḷabaṇa bhmajabāṇa apālaṭaka śara
bāreṇī śara ye deba śahasra apāra |

lg.l: rātra dibasa ye na jāṇanti chāri haẏe
ākaśe kṣepatni se śyāmaḷa pakṣī prāẏe | 24 |
ẏekā nimiṣake bhrami pāranti se mahī
dibā arddhe hoanti se sapata brahmāṇḍa śāhī | 25 |
ratha gheni dāruka yāa arjuna śamī br̥kṣataḷe acchi | 26 |
lg.note: [pūrbapr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
hīrā nīḷā poẏeḷā māṇikā ābara
chatra chāmar aye ghaṇṭa ghāghuḍi apāra |
subarṇṇara caka ye rūpāra daṇḍa akha
aṣṭaratne nirbāṇa se jāṇiṇa mahāchokha |
kudsumara dhaṇḍāmāḷa rathare bānddhaṇa
gandha kasṇarī rathare lepana |
dibya pāṭa patanī gheniṇa ratha maṇḍa
āditya tejaprāẏe rathare teja khaṇḍa |
śateka śahasra ye gheniṇa debahari
rathare thoile nei deba madhuhāri |
ākaśe kṣepanti se śeṇāpakṣī praẏe |–ka,

lg.l: ratha dekhi arjuna ye hoilā naamskāra
dekha dekha uttara ho birāṭara suta
ẏe se bābure dekha āsi nandighoṣa ratha | 29 |
bhārā nibāraṇe tumbhe yuge yuge janma | 32 |
tu arjuna atu ho ananta sadāśiba | 33 |
tretaẏā yuge se ye śrīrāmacandra rāẏe
tuhi se lakṣaṇa ho sumitrā tanaẏe | 34 |
ẏe yugare naranārāẏaṇa atā tumbhe beni
janme janme tumbhe aṭa bhārā niśodhani | 35 |
keśaba sumari bābu yāa godhana haraṇe | 36 |
bijaẏa maṇi mukuṭa ye kuṇḍaḷa mekhaḷā
nārāẏaṇa bhuṣaṇa se ye sarba aḷaṁkāra

lg.l: uttara kumāra ratha gheni ẏehiṭhāre thāasi | 40 |

narāẏaṇa sumari yāiṁ nandighosa rathe uṭha | 44 |
bāma dakṣiṇe kakṣilā acchi akṣeẏa troṇa beni
aneka ratna maṇḍāta se nārājaṁkara dhānī | 45 |
svāmī āpaṇe kahile se kaurobaṅka saini asaṁkṣepa
ẏe benitroṇe tohora nārāja acchi aḷap a| 46 |
akṣaẏe nāma bahanti ẏe troṇa benigoṭi | 47 |
śuṇa ho uttara ẏe troṇara carita

lg.note: aneka ratna maṇḍita bicitra kama gheni |–da

“biraghaṇṭa chāmara bimaḷā kāṇḍimāḷa danuja”
pāṭhapare ‘cha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
acaḷa birupākṣa bhāskara mahāsura
medinī na sahai ẏe asuraṁka padabhāra |
[abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: medanī na sahai ẏe daitaṁkara bhāra | 51 |

lg.note: [pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
brahmāra bhmabana nairuta pura chāḍi
sakaḷa debataṁka pura datye basileka māḍi |
sindhu upasindhu dhumra locana bāḷabilocana
mahīgilā sahite aneka yātudhāna |
sakaḷa debatāṁku asure ghauḍile
ananta śayyāre hariṁki debe jaṇāile |
śrīkr̥ṣṇapachāranti brahmāṁka mukha chāhiṁ
bidhātā boilā svāmī bara deiacchi muhiṁ |
puruṣa hāthare ye na mariba asura
śuṇiṇa bisuẏa ye hoile catradhara |
tatakṣaṇe debagaṇa gheniṇa catrapāṇi
meru śikha upare basi karanti bhāḷeṇi |
kebaṇa prakārare mariba se datya
ẏethaku upāẏa tumbhe kaha he bidhāta |
bidhātā boile ādi arṇṇapūrṇṇā jātahele
tebe se datya baḷa maribe sabhāāḷe |
ẏemante sarbadeba bhaḷanti ẏekameḷe
śarīru jātakale brahma dābanaḷe |
se anaḷaku pūji kale aneka sṇati
agni bhitaru ādimātā hoile utapatti |
mahā baiṣṇabī se koṭiẏe sūryya teja
ẏekā śarīru utapatti sahasreka bhmaja |
keśarī bāhānagoṭi dileka hemabanta
tahiṁ bije karithile debī jaganmāta |
garbharu jāta kale troṭa ye anaḷe |–ga, ña
lg.l: se anaḷaku chahiṁ ye karanti bahuta tusta
mahā baiṣṇabī se koṭiẏe sūryyara teja
candrara tejaṁ durgāra stana ye hoilā
agnira teje ye cakṣu beni hoilā
sarba debatāẏe tāhāṁkara hāthare śahasra dile | 60 |
biṣṇu dile cakragoṭi rudra dile traśūḷa
baruṇa ye śaṅkha dile śakti dile baśyānara | 61 |
pabana dhanu śahasra dile indra bajra śakati
yama kāḷadaṇḍa dila baruṇa jaḷaphāśa dianti | 62 |
brahmā akṣaẏe troṇa dile kamaṇḍaḷahiṁ dile
aruṇa surāpātra dilā bāsuki nāgaphāśa dile | 63 |
āditya raśma dile kāḷa khaṇḍa phaḷā dile
hemabanta siṁghanāda dile durgā sahasre bhmaja hoi
māra māra boli durgā garjiṇa uṭhai | 65 |
indra dile airābrata śārddūḷa dile hemabanta
trādaśa debataẏe boile māgo pūraa manīṣā
sahasreka bhmaja hr̥de gopyāna kale saṁgati | 69 |
sindhu pacchima koṇe kulābai pāṭaṇā purī | 70 |
ẏekā troṇu nārāja goṭiẏe na sarila | 81 |
śuṇa bābu uttara sābadhāne ẏehuṁ kathā
bahuta sānanda ye śuṇina birāṭara suta
pranamita hoi boile keuṁ prasābe dile māta | 83 |
śuṇimā uttara kahibā pūrbara ye kathā
gaṇḍā goṭiẏeka ye gaurī thile poṣi
hara pārbatīṁka chāmure paḍi gaṇḍā hoilā prāṇatyāja | 5 |
re re kāra kari hara aneka pratagyāṁ boli
dr̥dhvaṁsa bākya tāhara muṁ sahi nuārili | 8 |
dhāmaṇā kāṭhara dhanu kaṇṭā bāẏemśara guṇa
śabara rūpa dhari muṁ baneṇa buluthili | 11 |
biparīta rupa dekhi cihni nuārile dhr̥jaṭī | 12 |
muhiṁ boili tapuāsire chedibi tora muṇḍa
pārbatī parāẏe bhāriyā hoiba tohroa rāṇḍa | 15 |
ẏehra abastā muṁ ye nuāibi dekhi
kope īśvae mote prahāra kale muthe
śroṇita dr̥ṣṭa se ye hoilā pañchu mukhe | 18 |
bara māga kirāta re boile suḍhaḷā | 19 |
iśvaraṁka mukhara ẏe saneka bākya śuṇi
bara māga bara māga bolanti īśāna | 21 |
bhattara, mahābhaẏa kariṇa muṁ kāḍhi pakāili dhanu
pranapatya hoiṇa śutili pañcha ye badanu | 22 |
lg.note: hāboḍā hāboḍi hoi duheṁ hoilu bāruāḷi |–ka, ṭa
ẏeḍe sundarī bhāriyā yāhā hoiba tora rāṇḍa |–ga, ña
lg.l: puṇa puṇa rudra mote bolanti uttara
bhaẏe boili deba muṁ aṭai agyānī
abhagate muṁ ki bara magibi debasvāmī | 24 |
īśvare boile āre śuṇa tu bīra pātha
yāhā māgibu tāhā tote debaiṁ mora satya | 25 |
srāhāna kara bho deba sarobare paśi | 26 |
pārbatī sandeśa kahile rāī hāde mote | 27 |
aneka śahasre badhya ye nohilā tra pura
pabana debatāẏe pacchī agni debatāẏe mūna
sehi śahasre badhya tāhāku kaleka trilocana | 30 |
pārbatī boile se śara māgare bābu
teṇu se trailokye jiṇantā pātha abaśya hoibu | 31 |
āho uttare srāhāna sāriṇa bije sadānande
paśupatra śara māgili dile mote hāde | 32 |
īśvare boile nārāẏaṇa agni pabana śara
muhiṁ se jāṇai ẏehā āne āgocara | 33 |
pārbatī na kahile kemante jāṇilāka pātha
īśvare boile pārbatī ẏe arjuna boli
ẏebe sarūpa muṁ ta jāṇi nuārili | 35 |
lg.note: ẏehra śahasramāna muṁ diāibi niaḍa |–ta, ña, ga
lg.l: ẏe ye putra hde hoila āmbhara
tumbh prasanne umā dia ẏehākaiṁ bara | 36 |
satya hoilā bara māga boileka umā | 37 |
bara debara dharma prāpata nohaiṭi bhale | 38 |
umādebī gale ye nadīki srāhāna kari
maẏeṁṣā badhakāḷe akṣaẏa troṇa kale debī jāẏe
tāhā māga pāthare tailokye hoibu ajaẏe | 40 |
prasanna hela yebe dia acchaẏe troṇagoṭi | 42 |
ẏesaneka bacana se boile debī umā
acchaẏe troṇa mote dile sadāśibaṅkara bāmā | 44 |
īśvare boile muṁ ta na kahili satī
bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā se bedabyāsa nāti | 46 |
pārbatī boile kahi na kahila tripurāri
śate īśvara hoile ẏekā arjunaku nohe sari | 47 |
lg.note: mote rāīṇa boile deba triurāri |–jha, ga, ta, tha

lg.l: uttara boilā svāmī jībana tohora sādhu
mohora jībana sādhu muṁ ye āśrekali mahāsindhu | 49 |
uttara kumāra boilā svāmī kahai muhiṁ tuku
muṁ chāra kṣema hoipāribi ki sārathipaṇaku | 50 |
arjuna boilā uttara tu āmbhara annaguru

lg.note: binā tape pāili paramānanda upāẏe |–jha, ga, ṭa, ña

lg.l: se āsana khamba māḍi basilā birāṭa santait | 2 |
arjuna rathī se ye uttara kumār asārathi
debadatta śaṅkha ye bājai ghana ghana
śuṇiṇa trāsile ye sakaḷa kurubaḷa sanya | 5 |
droṇe boile bhīṣme bijaẏe kalāṭi arjuna | 7 |
karṇṇa boile guru he śabada debadatta
śaṁkuni boile ye kapiketana dhvaja ratha | 8 |
śalya boile ẏeta nandigoṣa ratha āsai
kr̥pa āchāryya boile ẏeta arjuna parāẏe diśai | 9 |
droṇe boie ẏehā kemante karibāka sata
pāṇḍabe banaste paḍi male pañchu bhrātha | 10 |
āna ke nandighoṣa ratha ānai āmbhara chāmure | 11 |
ẏe mahārathīmāne ke ke aṭanti debasvāmī | 14 |
arjuna boile bābu śuṇa ho uttara kumāra
ẏe se bhīṣma droṇa karnṇa mahābīra | 15 |
bāhlika śaṁkuni ye droṇa suta aśastāmā | 16 |
kr̥pa ācharyya jadyaratha ābara rāẏeguru śalyā
chatrī bīrabara sundara bhārathe bhāroi malla | 17 |
bābu tāhāṁkara bāma pākhe kaṇaẏamaẏa ratha
hīrā nīḷā maṇiẏe jaḍita cirāḷa apramita | 19 |
bābu kr̥ṣṇāñjana chaurī ẏe rathara upare
gaja mukuṭa māṇikya hīrā nīḷā māḷi māḷi | 21 |
dvādaśa śārddoḷa ye yocilā acchi rathe
ākāśe kṣepī loḍanti na biśrāmanti dibārātre | 22 |
lg.note: ẏekadr̥ṣṭi kari ye chāhāṁnti jaḷa jaḷa |–ga, ña

lg.l: yāhāra śara bindhante trailokya kaṁpai bhaẏe | 23 |
nrāja bindhante yāhāra tāmragiri yāẏe phuṭi | 24 |
uttara, ẏekoiśabāra pr̥thī nachatra kale praśurāme
bābu sindhu śoṣaṇa hoai yāhāra śaraghāte
dārā saṁharaṇa kael se pitāra nimante | 27 |
na maribi boli saburi jība chedi
khecari bimāna ratha nāma tā biradhū
macchi locna beniphāḷa hoai yāhāra nārajā bindhu | 32 |

lg.note: bābu sindhu macchaan hoai yāhāra śaraghāte |–da, ṅa, ja
cauṣaṭhi koṭi hīrā rājai sūryyamaṇi |–ga, ña
lg.l: uttara kumāra boilā ẏe bḍa dullabha kathā
mātāra sodara hoi kiṁpāẏe tumbhaṁku ẏeteka niribathā | 35 |
karṇṇa arjuna āmbhe galu guṇḍi beni
driyodhana bhāge somadatta yujheṣṭhiṁka bhāge nakuḷa paḍi | 40 |

lg.note: bhīma dhuśāsana ye kale nāmakhaṇḍi |–ṇa, ka, da, cha, ja

lg.l: uṭhi nuārile ye bahuta lajja pāi
kaicchābanta kṣetrī se bāḷuta pua rāge
māẏe daẏinī kari boile aneka bāge | 49 |
kāhāri bola na kari rahile kuruthāṭhe
śuṇa ho uttara kṣetrīṁkara ẏehenneka kathā
dhanure guṇe se ye basāi nārāja
māṇikya gaja mukutā tini tini panti
ẏekā rathe maṇḍalā ratna bhaṇḍāra chāri | 59 |
lg.note: subāṭuḷa mukutā māṇikya tinipanti |–gha, cha

lg.l: keśari lāṅguḍa cihna uḍanti ratha dhvaje
amarādhi nātha ki se rathare kale bije | 64 |
āho uttara lakṣeka ālamba uḍai benipākhe
ḍhāḷanti subarṇṇa bandha ḍāḷimbā chāmarahiṁ lakṣe | 65 |
subarṇṇa bandhā śaṅkha hīrā nīḷāẏe jaḍi
pannagā nārāẏaṇa ẏe aṭai ye bidhi | 71 |

lg.note: lakṣeka cirāḷa ye pāñchalakṣī ahibrata |–kha, ṭha
lg.l: āho lakṣe rājāṁkara upare ẏe aṭanti mauḍamaṇi
bābu indra praśasta yamapraśasta hastina bāruṇā jaintā
ẏe pañchu kaṭaka mūḷe rājya apramitā | 79 |
gāndhāra deśara rājā mantrī ye śakuni}
bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā ẏe aṭai mahagyānī | 82 |
śuddha saṣṭa ka jāṇi ẏehāra ratha birāje
baḷaẏā bāhāne se ẏehāra ratha sāje | 83 |
āho uttara, ẏehāra ḍāhāṇa pāruśe yebaṇa ratha birāji
āditya kiraṇa jāṇi se ratha mahāteji | 84 |

lg.note: koṭipāde mukuṭe bijaẏe kamaḷinī |–gha, ṅa, cha, ṭa, ṇa

lg.l: ẏe se rādheba nandana se aṭai bīra karṇṇa
pr̥thī ẏehāku lāñcha diai śatebhāra subarṇṇa | 87 |
āho uttara āṇṭahoi caraṇa tāra pāḍanteṇa pr̥thī
teṇukari kaṇaẏa lāñcha diai bhara śate | 89 |
yujheṣṭha debahuṁ baḍa kointāṁka garbhmaṁ jāṭa | 90 |
uttara boilā bābu baḍāi durllabha ẏe bāṇī
āśrijya hoili muṁ tumbhara bākya śuṇi | 91 |
arjuna boilā ho kontabhoja boli ẏekarājā
kointā debī atanti ye tāhāṁka tanuja | 93 |
dr̥bhāsāẏe boile bāhuḍi yāa go āī
kicchihiṁ na pāi muṁ niṣphaḷa hoili | 97 |
yāciṇa na deuṁ ye āmbhe tu māgilu chāmura | 98 |
ẏebe āī tuhi yebe kalu icchā
kointa ẏe boile muṁ kisa māgabaiṁ bara
ẏehā gheni sumaraṇā karibu śeyyāra yugate | 102 |
yadyapi dharyam pabana indra candra rudra sūryya brahmā biṣṇu
se āsi prāata hoiba tohroa ghaṭu | 103 |
kointāẏe srāhāna sārile sehi ye banaste | 104 |
īśanye diśile ye āditya jyoti prabhā | 105 |
dinakara nātha yāiṁ dhaile tāku koḷe

lg.note:
“kointāṁka sannidhye ye bijekale yāiṁ” pāṭhapare
‘ga ja’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
āgyāṁdile bhāskara kāhiṁki sumaraṇā kala mote
bḷātkāre koḷe ye dhaile āditye |

lg.l: karṇṇare khañjale nei amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa beni
karṇṇa nāma dile se kumara koḷe gheni | 112 |
lājeṇa pitāra gharaku na nele kointāẏe | 113 |
mr̥ttikā mañjauṣa ẏeka kointā debī kari
se nadī bhitare debī pakāile begi | 115 |
kumāra teje kari sijhilā sehu māṭi
yāiṁṇa āujilā se indra praśasta nabare | 117 |
se boilā māẏe go rādhā kāhiṁ achu | 119 |
ẏehikṣaṇi caḷanti tu yamunā nadī kūḷe
mañjuṣa goṭiẏe upuciāi go yāuacchi jaḷe | 120 |
tāhā ghenikari tu māgo āsasi yatane
aneka yatane tāha rādhā ye pāḷile
najāṇanti kointā māta na jāṇu āmbhe bhrātha | 124 |
tadarthe karṇṇa acchi tāhā tule śahasra gheni | 125 |
bābu se karṇṇara sannidhyeṇa birājai yeuṁṇa ratha
rathara upare birājai candra kiraṇa maṇi
tathira upare malli māḷatī gajara mukutā
candra maṇḍaḷa ratha candra kiraṇa ye maṇi
kuru pāṇḍabaṁka madhye guru brāhmaṇa mahāsiddhi | 132 |
bābu se droṇa ye aṭanti mahārathī
bābu tāhāṁkara sannidhye tu dekha ho birāṭi
ẏekakhaṇḍi ratha se ye markata āhuṭi | 136 |
birājai rathe mukutā nakṣatra panti jāṇi
ẏe se aśastamā ho mahārathī droṇi | 137 |
lakṣe pañchāśa sahasra baḷa bahai ẏe dhanu
baja bighāte kṣaẏe nohai ẏehāṁkara tanu | 138 |
yama debatā na basai sañjībanī maṇḍaḷa | 140 |
droṇuṁ adhika pāñchasasra baḷa ẏehāra dhanudharu | 141 |
ẏehāṁkara mātuḷa ẏe hāde dekha kr̥pabrahmā | 142 |
maḷaẏa basanta ratha maḷaẏa basanta sārathi
maḷaẏāniḷa bijaẏe ratha ālokamaẏe birājai dibārāti | 143 |
aṁke lekhante se na yāi āu lekhā | 144 |
sahasreka śārddūḷa yocilā acchi baḷa lāgi
caḷai ratha gagane pabanahuṁ ati bega | 145 |
yāhaku śara se sandhai tāhāku abaśya bindhai
bindhante na bratai brahmā indra candara sūryya yebe hoi | 146 |
hatyā bibādaku ẏe na ghuñchanti sarbakāḷe
dibi bhmabana sañchaẏe upāḍi pāranti mantrabaḷe | 148 |
ẏe se mahārathī kr̥pa ye āchāryya | 149 |
āho uttara mārāga chāẏeṇī āraktamaẏe ratha

lg.note: sahasreka batramukhī yocilā bārubhāgi |–cha
suraloka nāgaloka pābanti mahābhaẏe |–cha, gha, ṅa
lg.l: bhāluṁkara carme ye gcaiṁlā acchi rathagoṭi
āho uttara tāhāṁkara bhiṇoi ye bāhlaka mahāyodhī
kṣatrībara sundara ẏe aṭanti paban bhedi | 152 |
bāu bāhlika deśara ẏe aṭanti naranāhā
rathare yocilā acchi dekha sahasre bāhuṭiā | 154 |
bābu hiraṇanagra boli maṇḍaḷa ẏeka deśa
padmeka yoddhā ẏehāra brāgha ye bāhāna
aharniśi biśvasa ẏe driyodhana rājāra sannidhāna | 157 |
rākāra saṁghāra ẏe ẏehu sākhā abirodha
tapeṇa prasanna tāku hoile pañcha manu | 160 |

lg.note: nibāḍa ratha dekha ḍāḷimbā chāmara chāẏeṇī | gha, cha
yesaneke birākai kausṇabha maṇi |–gha, cha, pa, dha
bābu hiraṇagiri boli maṇḍaḷa ẏekadeśa |–kha, cha, gha, ṭha, dha, pha

lg.l: sindhu deśara rājā ye dr̥śilāra pati
daśa ahibrate ratha ẏe sājai anubrate
pacchiāṇi thāṭhe caḷai se pitāra nimante | 164 |
marabhmateka yoddhā gheni ḍāhāṇa thāṭhe caḷi | 165 |
āho uttara bikarṇṇa deśara rājā ye urddhvakeśī
kāśīra bibāde hāriṇa mānagobinda tahiṁ śaraṇa paśi | 166 |
padmeka mukuṭa bandhāṇa yoddhā gheni mahāteji
bābu asāṁkṣepa kuru sāgara ẏe na sarai kahante
tu ey pucchākalu bābu senāpatiṁkara kathā
ṭhika ṭhika kari tote muṁ kahili bāratā | 169 | | 6049 |
lg.head:
{@arjuna duryyodhanara kaḷi o śatebhātāṅka
sahita yuddha@}

lg.l: kāhāra chāmuku ẏebe bāhibaiṁ tora ratha | 1 |
arjuna boilā śuṇa ho uttara kumāra
yadyapi hara indra brahmā āsibe āja bāhi
ẏe rathe thile bābu paramāda nāhiṁ | 5 |
aśvanta na chāḷiṇa ẏekā ārambhe basithile
bhedantā nāhiṁ tote bhīṣma droṇaṁkara beḷe | 6 |
uttara boilā gosāiṁ muṁ āśrekali meru
tu ẏebe samara kara mote kiṁpe cintākaru | 7 |
samaste bhoga karanti se rājāra sampradhi | 8 |
āumānaṁka chāmuku na bāhā mohora ratha
rājāku jiṇile se sādhye hoai samasta | 10 |
driyodhana chāmure ratha turite ṭekilāka āṇi | 11 |
kuroba baḷa trasile nandighoṣa ratha āsuṁ | 12 |
samaste dekhile rathadhvaje kapi ye ketana
di yodhana boilā kire āre,a arajuna | 14 |
āre sampada hariṇa ye paśila ghora bana

lg.note: “kauroba baḷa trāsile nandighoṣa ratha āsuṁ” pāda pare ‘da o ja’ pothire adhikā pāṭha –
uttara arajuna kathā ye saṁpāda huante
ādianta kari arajuna kahilā sakaḷa br̥ttānte |
uttaa kumāra śrotā ye arjuna bakatā
samasta kahila kṣatrīmānaṁka bāratā |
samasta kahilā kṣatrīmānaṁka bāratā |
kauroba samasta ye godhana beḍhithile
aḍāi niante se godhana na caḷile |
duidina pariyante beḍhile godhana
thātha beḍhi aḍānte se na gale asādhya gorumāna |
uttara arajunara saṁpāda sarila duidine
prabeṇa hoile yāiṁ saṁgrāma bhūmi stane |
samaste dekhile ratha dhvaje kapi ye ketana
di yodhana boilā kire ailu ki arajuna |
“nagreṇa paśila re hoila bhikṣāśī” pādānta pare ‘da, ja’ re bhinma pāṭha–
nagrare paśi re hoila bhikṣāśī
driyodhana cacane arjuna mahāroṣi |
āho citrasena tote bānddha neuthilā
mohora pratāpe se tote chāḍigalā |
tu ye boilu ẏe paśātrīḍara kathā
mūrkhapaṇa tohora na galā sarbathā |
kapaṭa paśāẏe kari bhiāilu kr̥tā
ajātaśatr̥ku tumbhe kheḷāila jūta |
bhikṣā māgilu boli ye boilu yathābr̥ti
dānabhikṣā māganti ye biṣṇa paśupati |
kandamūla bhakṣilā boli ye boilu bacana
araṇye bhakṣanti kandamūḷa ruṣagaṇamāna |
se paśākāḷe tumbhara dekhili saṁpradhi
āji benibhrātha khoḷibāka paśābidhi |
svāmī ājara paśāre pārai yehu jiṇi
tāhāṁkara mahmāṁ ye jagate bakhāṇi
yābata kaḷe saṁpada tumbhara kapaṭa kūṭa
ghareka bhiāila jauśaḷa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa
puracanā paṇḍā hāthe lagāila joi
se brāhmaṇa nāśagalā āmbhe galu pārahoi |
puracanā paṇḍā nāśagalā tohora biśāse
tote lāgiacchi ye brahmahatya doṣe |
āho biśvāsaghāteka hoi bratanti yeuṁ prāṇī
jībana dhika tāra narkare bāsa puṇi |

lg.l: ẏehānta badhakale ye aneka pāpa grāsi | 20 |
kuḷagotra buḍaila re birāṭe nela dina | 21 |
paśākheḷe kiṁpe hārila re rājyabhāra bhaṇḍāra | 23 |
arjuna rpatibākya ye jhiṁghāsa bacana śuṇi
tote uddhariṇa āṇilu tāku māilu roḷe | 25 |
nakuḷa uddhāri tote āṇila re tahuṁ
pāmra mūḍha re bākye tu ẏeḍe garba bahu | 27 |
dropada rājā rāijara jāṇu ṭiki kathā
mr̥tujība gheni ẏebe āsi pratagyāṁ karu kete | 29 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa na thile ki bābu | 30 |
kāḷeṇa samaste chāḍi paḷāi galeṭi tote
akaśakaiṁ bandhana kari tote nelāṭi citrasena rathe | 31 |
bāsabara suta mohora se sahodra bhrātha
sodara chāḍili muhiṁ tohora kaṣṭa dekhi
gandharbe yuddha kali muhiṁ uprodha upekṣi | 33 |
mūrkhadūrbaḷa bāḷute kathā kahu tu sarbathā | 34 |
se paśā kheḷare tumbhara dekhilu sampradhi
āja benibhrāthe paśā kheḷibā raṇa majhi | 36 |
svāmī āja paśāẏe pāriba yehu jiṇi
tāhara mahimāṁ se ye yugate bakhāṇi | 37 |
yābatakāḷe tumbhara saṁpada kūṭa ye kapaṭa
ghareka bhiāila jau sajaḷsa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa | 38 |
purañchana paṇḍāku peṣiṇa tāhā hāthe lagāila yūi
tahiṁ purañchana nāśagalā āmbhe dharme galu jīiṁ | 39 |
tumbhara brata hetu brahmahatyā pāpa doṣe | 40 |
āho driyodhana biśvāsaghātakeṇa bratanti yeuṁṇa prāṇī
dekhantu samaste paśā kheḷibā āja āsa | 42 |
paśā sārahiṁ ta ābara ẏethe nāhiṁ
raṇa bhitare paśā kheḷibā āra kāhiṁ | 44 |
senāṁkara śira cchiḍi hoibe sāra goṭi | 46 |
ẏethaku parijāho āsa karibā dra yodhana
ẏe paśaẏe jiṇile ye rājyabhāra bhogī
yehu āja hārai se samasta parityāgī | 48 |
semāne hoibenā āja paśāra sāra goṭi | 49 |
samare jhāsi arjuna yahuṁ kalāka pahija
mohora deha kampa acchi tu sahuchu kesane | 54 |
arjuan boilā hāde prara kāryya boli
kemante dvanda karibi boli bahuta hr̥de bisarili | 55 |
uttara boilā svāmī trigartta hāri paḷāilā
āmbhe ye tohora tahiṁ paśilu śaraṇa | 57 |
ẏeṇe uttara baikulya teṇe mānagobindara kopa
droṇaṁkara nāma dhari se dhanure lagāila mātha | 60 |
lg.note: arjuna uparaku binddhalā garuṭāṇa |–ka, ṇa, da, ja, jha, pa, dha
lg.l: droṇe boile tote parama kalyāṇa hou bābu
ẏe pañchu kaṭake ẏekachatra hoi basibu | 61 |
guna ṭaṁkāra kalā pātha keśaba nāma dhari
bhīṣma droṇa bhurisarba kr̥pa bidure chāhiṁ praṇapatya kari | 62 |
maneṇa sānanda pātha yujheṣṭhi nāma dhari
dhanu troṇa śarāsana bijuḷi yehne trāse
puṇa śate nāhāja ye binddhalā kirīṭī
birathī hoilā se kauroba mahābīra sohoḍa | 69 |
ẏe bidhi aneśvata bhāi thileka tāhāra pākhe
rāāku pachakari ye binddhale bāṇa lakṣe | 71 |

lg.note: aneśvata bhrāthaṁku aneśvata bāṇa |–ga, pa, dha
lg.l: ratha hāthī haẏa senā sārathi samasta gale phuṭi
dhanure śahasreka dhari se kalaka sandhana | 75 |
hāthīra citāre paḍa dhātikāre bāṇa galā phuti | 77 |
lg.note: “hāthīra citāre paḍi dhātikāre bāṇa galā phuṭi” pare ‘ka’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
yojanaka antare gaḍiṇa paḍilā
birathī hoiṇa mānagobinda paḷāilā |
mānagobinda paḷāibā dekhi bīra karṇṇa rāga
dekhila driyodhana paḷāi manabhaṅga |
kopeṇa kaṇṇabīra sārathiki kahai uttara
arjuna katki ratha bāhā bege mora |
dekhilā karṇṇa ratha ṭekilā thāṭhe thāiṁ
arjuna boilā ye uttara mukha chāhiṁ |
karṇṇara tahiṁki bāhā ratha mora
arjuna bacane ratha ṭekila uttara
dekhiṇa karṇna ye kope kopabhara
karṇṇahiṁ rahta āṇi ṭekilā arjuna āgara |
kopeṇa arjuna ye kahai parighāi
mohora mahimāṁ kire śuṇilā tora nāhiṁ |
āre hāthara sukhare kheḷila tumbhe paśā
asamkhya bhārathe jībana bibaśā |
ẏekā āsi ẏebe moho chāmure paḍilu
yāhāra pratagyāṁre bārānidhi hoẏe caḷu |

lg.l: arjuna ḍāka diai driyodhanara kaṣṭa dekhi
raha raha mānagobinda kāhiṁki yāu samara upekṣa | 79 |
niṣata hoile ki āja prāṇa gheni yiba | 80 |
uttara boilā svāmī tāhāra apacaẏa beḷa hoiacci
samara dharmakathā tu na jāṇu birāṭi
niśata yoddhāẏe ye samare dianti piṭhi | 82 |
tahānta māile ye āpaṇā dharma nāśi
sustha hoiṇa samara karukinā puṇa āsi | 83 | | 6132 |
lg.head: {@karṇṇara arjunaṅka yuddha@}

lg.l: lakṣe yoddhā gheniṇa se dhāiṁlā arjuna sannidhyāna | 1 |
re re pāṇḍabā tu āja yibu kāhiṁ
āre birāṭa kaṭake tu hoilu bhikṣābāsī
parakāryye ture āpaṇā mr̥tu loḍu āsi | 4 |
arjuna boilā tu ho śuṇa bīrakarṇṇa
dropatīṁka nimante tāhā badha kale bhīma | 7 |
āho karṇṇa trigartta ye aila daṇḍa gheni
birāṭaku rakṣa nimante tāhāra badhilu saini | 9 |
trigartta keśa dhariṇa se rāgeṇa ghenigale | 10 |
lg.note:
kebana prākarme tu kāḷasarpara āge khaḍiāḷu
maṇḍukī hoi tu kāḷasarpa kehne chāu |–pa, dha

lg.l: āho karṇṇa rākṣasa baḷe kehi na rahile sīmā
yete daṇḍa gheni āsila tumbhe bāhi
prāṇa gheni ẏethuṁ āja jaṇe yāi nāhiṁ | 13 |
jaṇeheṁ jībana dhari thāānta ki roḷe
roṣeṇa lāghaba yuddha se karanti apramite | 17 |
śateka nārāja ye bindhalā karṇṇa ṭāṇi
pāñcha nārāje ye arjuna tāhā hāṇi | 18 |
puṇa beni sahasra nārāja karṇṇa binddha
raha raha karṇna ho dekha mohora śara
puṇa puṇa parthiba ye binddhalā gaḷagāji
karṇṇa ratha śatakhaṇḍa hoi galā bhāji | 23 |

div.note: ahibrateka nārāja kalāka ādhāna | 24 |

lg.l: kopeṇa nārāja bindhai se rādhebara tanu
dhanu chedante ye karṇṇa ratha chāḍi
karṇṇara upare bīra galā ratha bāhi
āre āre pātha boli ogāḷile āsi

div.note: hāthī dekhi yehne arjai bitrama kerirī |–da, ja
ajaẏa śare bīra na pārai uṭhi |–ṇa, ta, pha, tha

lg.l: puṇi prabeśa hoilā āsi se dra yodhana chāmura | 1 |
ẏeka ẏeka yoddhāẏe sahasra bāṇa peṣi
ṣāḍa yoddhāṁka samara kahite ki pāri
sahasra sahasra śara ye arjuna chadai
lakṣa lakṣa koti ye na yāi gaṇitā | 8 |
jāḷābaḷī baṇa dhari bindahi bīra pātha

div.note: ẏeka dhanuke yoddhāẏe sahasra bāṇa yoḍi |–ka, ṇa, pa, da, jha

lg.l: aśastamā birathī hoi droṇaṁka rathe uṭha
āmbhra bola tu ye nakalu driyodhana | 11 |
duṣṭaṁkara bole ye ailu ratha sāji
gcaḍa godhana pala yibā chāla apasari | 13 |
droṇe boile rahiṇa yuddha karibā samaste ẏekamukhe
bhīṣme boile ẏekā pāṇḍabe chatrī mahāsiddhā
ābar abanaste se pāichanti aneka bidyā | 16 |
bhīṣma boile tumbhara śiṣyaprāẏe maṇila ki droṇe
droṇe boile dekha ho jāṇimā chatrībr̥tta
arjuna boila uttara bhīṣma droṇakiṁ chahāṁ
driyodhana yahiṁ acchi tahiṁki ratha bāhā | 20 |

div.note: ghuñchileheṁ jaṇe kehi na bratibe jībane |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: bhīṣma droṇa chāmure nandighoṣa yāiṁ bheṭi | 23 |
samara sambha ṣaṇa ye chāḍile gāṅgabe
puṇi pañchaṣaṭhi nārāja ye binddhale pārthibe | 29 |
puṇa biśāśate nārāja binddhalā pātha ṭāṇi
birathī hoiṇa se gaṅgā debīra suta
puṇa ārohile śuddha saṣṭi kamaẏe ratha | 37 |
pāñchalakṣa yoddhā gheni arjunaku ogāḷile āsi | 38 |
sehi se beḍhile āsi arjunara kati | 39 |
droṇe boile ho samasteheṁ raha raha
anīti na karibā samasteheṁ samara sarbe saha | 40 |
ẏekā yoddhāku bahuta loka samara kale
kṣaṇaka samara dekha ho mora rahi
rathe thāi pārthiba ye binaẏe daini
adhara puṣṭakari droṇe kope kahanti kathā
lokita karme se kahanti yathā yathā | 45 |
āre rājyabhāra tejiṇa re paśila yāiṁ bane
āmbhe hari nemuṁ yugate tumbhara kāryya sinā | 47 |

div.note: anīti karibā niki ẏekathā nohoi sandeha |–ña, ga
yoddhānta sambodhile prabodha bacana kahi |–ja, da
lokita karme se kahanti nirvyathā |–ṭa, da, ja

lg.l: samara dr̥bhāra boli yāa yā ẏethu ghuñchi
bhīmasena badhakale kīñchaka mūḷe śate mahabaḷī | 51 |
yāhāra anna bhakṣi tāhāku sinā rathi
śahāsra saṁghitāẏe tāta ẏeheneka bichāra acchi | 52 |
tumbhe ye boila agyāṁtabāsa tinidina acchi
baḍhilā daśadina lāi sātadina uguḷi hoiacchi | 53 |
ẏethu tumbhe samaste ho yāa sanya gheni
kathā se rahiba tāta nohiba kisa kāryya | 55 |
droṇe boile tu sambodhanā na kale
ẏe kurusāgara jiṇipāribu ṭiki tohora beḷe | 56 |
arjuna boile tāta sāgara jaḷa boli
ẏekāẏe sāgara se mantha lā bīra bāḷī | 57 |
droṇe boile koṭiẏe siṁghara prākrama aṭai yeuṁṇa bāḷi
lohaśaṅkha beni parbata śaṅkhanāḷa prāẏe toḷi | 58 |
tu tāhāku paṭāntara hoibu ki dhanurjaẏe
guruhe tumbhe ye boila ẏe kuru sāgara sanya
muhiṁ jāṇai saburi prāṇa acchi mo nārāja muna | 60 |

div.note: lohaśaṅkha beni parbata śaṅkhanāda kari toḷi |–da, ja
luhāra beni parbata bhmajare ghenai toḷi |–ṭa

lg.l: śate nārāja peṣile droṇe pachāru pachāru | 61 |
dujaśara gheniṇa se peśi chedile sārathi | 62 |
dhātikāre bhedilā se nārāja sahsre tini | 65 |
puṇi sahasra nārāja binddhale droṇe ṭāṇi | 67 |
anibāraṇa śara tāhāra ke pāriba kaḷi
ghuñcha ghañcha guru ho gheni mohora daini | 71 |
ẏe śahasre tumbhanta jiṇi huai ki roḷe | 72 |

div.note: oholuḷa samare adr̥śya aśvamāḷī |–ṭa, ña, ga
yesaneka kuhuka ghoṭai dhanumāse |–ga, ña

lg.l: maẏeṁṣā raktabīryya yebaṇa śare sādhiḷe mote dei achanti pārbatī | 73 |
guru brāhmaṇa na yāiṭi samara roḷa | 74 |
kisa kisa śahasra bindhukinā pātha bīra | 75 |
āho arjuna chatrī hoi kiṁpe bibhaḷita kāẏe
ādyahuṁ tohora śahasaku āmbhe kariachuṁ āśa
raṇayagyaṁ kariachu arjuna śahasre hoibuṁ prāṇanāśa | 77 |
arjuna boilā gosāiṁ ẏe nohaiṭi parastāba
prāṇatyāja hoiba ye nohoi ẏe ṭhāba | 78 |
parakāryya tumbhe anamite pāiba kiṁpe mr̥tu | 79 |
kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷe mahābhāratha yuddha ye hoiba | 81 |
se bhūmire paḍiba tumbhe chatriẏa kaicchā
tumbhe tahiṁ mr̥tu labhile pāiba parama pada | 84 |
droṇe boile bābu yehne tohora icchā
yesaneke śarīre bikāśai pāṭa ye debāṅga | 89 |
debadatta śaṅkhara ye ghora gahagaha nāde
pāñcha sahasra yoddhā gheni mānagobinda rahiacchi | 93 |
mohagalā yoddhāmāne uṭhile cetanā pāi hāde
śuṇa ho caitana debadatta śagkhara mahimāṁ

div.note: “yetebeḷe debadatta śaṅkha śubhilāka bādyanāde” pare ‘ga, ña’ pothire bhinmapāṭha :–
yetebeḷe debadatta śaṅkha śubhila bidyamāne
uttara kumara pachārai bho deba arjune |
ẏe śaṅkhara mahimāṁ deba atihiṁ agocara
śabada śubhilā chatrīmāne loṭanti bhūmira |

lg.l: ẏe śaṅkhara śabada śuṇiṇa chatrīmāne heuchanti moha
daibe bīre ye maranti bā samare mohayāi
smare cchidra pāile puṇa uṭhanti ciāiṁ | 98 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya aśastamā bhurisarba
puṇi nārāja gheniṇa ye samara ābori
driyodhana boilā ho nuhaṁi ẏeke ẏeke
dharma adharma tumbhe kicchihiṁ na bichāra
samaste beḍha ẏekamukhe nārāja bege mara | 102 |
pāñcha parāẏudha rathī ye naba parāẏudha hāthī
batiśa parāẏudha aśva ye beḍhile ẏekamūrtti | 106 |
ẏeka yoddhāku ye samaste karanti ẏekadr̥ṣṭi
āho caitana ke śateka ke sahasreka bāṇa binddha
sādhu arjuna ho tohore ẏehā hoẏe sahi | 109 |
tuṣāra br̥ṣṭi jāṇi śarada megha garajane
śara binddha urddhve ḍāka diai dhanurjaẏe
dhanughoṣa sna śubhai arjuna abā rathe nāhiṁ | 114 |
uttara kumāraku na śubhai śaṅkhara śabada | 115 |
arjuna bichārai rathe nāhiṁ abā birāṭa nandana | 116 |
uttaa bichārai aśve mohora nāhānti abā rathe

div.note: arjunara yoddhāpaṇa ye debaṁku agocara |–ja, ṭa, da
atihiṁ dr̥bhāra se hoilā samara |–ṭa

lg.l: arjuna boilā uttara tu mandakr̥ta kalu
samra teji ratha kiṁke gagana maṇḍaḷe āṇilu | 122 |
uttara boilā samara tora mote hoilā agocara
boilā niantu godhana pala samara nakara debasvāmī | 126 |
abaśya yuddha rahi karibu yebe pātha
muhiṁ kṣaṇeheṁ biśrāmi nuāribi to nandighaṣa ratha | 127 |
tahiṁ tote pramādare kicchi nahiṁ bābu | 129 |
ratha tejyākale bābu tohora hoiba maraṇa
uttara boilā tohora poḍu poḍu raṇa | 130 |
arjuna boilā dvādaśa baraṣa samara mora nāhiṁ
samasta śahasramāna beḷe beḷe bindhai kinā muhiṁ | 131 |
tu kimpe samra dekhi houachu bikaḷa
muhiṁ ẏe samara hāde maṇai kutūhaḷa | 132 |
lākhamātra sāhāhoi basithāa tu ẏe mohora rathe | 133 |

div.note: uttara boilā muhiṁ ho tohore śaraṇa |–ṭa, da, ja, jha

lg.l: godhana palaku matsadeśe yibā gheni puṇi | 134 |
muhiṁ jāṇili tu nisata hoilu birāṭi
rathu ḍeiṁ paḍile harāibu tohora kāẏāgoṭi | 135 |
ẏete boli pāṭaḍore bandhana kalā rathe
jhātikāre ratha ye bāhilā bīra pāthe | 136 |
kaurobe āśrija ye hoile tāhā dekhi
durāpada samara ye tini prahara āsi beḷa
śrame aśva gaja saini sabu hoile nicaḷa | 140 |
kṣudhā tr̥ṣāẏe aśva ye nuāranti caḷi
pibanti gaja aśve bahuta paḍilā cahaḷa | 143 |
sādhu sādhu arjuna boli śubhilā ākāśa | 144 |
śuṇa ho caitana ẏebe arjunara mahimāṁ
samare samarthaka se nuhaim baḍa rāgī
para mana jāṇanti se aṭanti parama yogī | 146 |
saburi āṣya gheni tu ho bata phālaguni | 147 |
sāṣṭama hoiṇa se ye kauroba saini
puṇi arjunaku bḍhile kare śasramāna gheni | 149 |
kakaḍā māse yehne nirādhāra baraṣai pāṇi | 150 |
bāṇa jvāḷābaḷī āditya teja yehne ghoṭi
ẏeka ẏeka yoddhāke ye nārāja koṭi koṭi | 151 |
karṇṇa śakuni kr̥pa bhurisarba ādi yete loka | 154 |
ẏekamukha hoiṇa ye pacha kale daṇḍa
ẏekā rathīki beḍhile se bāāna padma yodhī
nirāśi uprodha chāḍi ākreśi bāṇa binddha | 156 |
āja ẏethuṁ kemantare yibu prāṇa gheni | 157 |
arjuna boile guru he bacana tumbhara satya
āja kaurobe kehi na pābanti jībata | 158 |
kaṣṭhora dekhi bhīṣme parbatā śasra kale
mahā mahā phaṇīmāne pheru dhari ye garjanti thāṭheṇa | 161 |
uttara boilā svāmī uḍaṅga baḷa dekha
uttara boilā svāmī hoilā baḍāi dulabha
mandara parbata yehne sindhu kalā goḷā
sehi sarūpe diśai hāde se bāsabara baḷā | 170 |
sañchapi kari kehu kariba lekhana sarbathā | 173 |
satya tretaẏā dvāpara kaḷi yuga chāri
chāri yugaku asaṁkhya godhana haraṇa ārddoḷi | 175 |
ẏekā rathīke ye padma sāgaraka yodhī
samasta udita hoi rahilāka br̥tta yathā | 177 |
na dekhiṇa na paḍhiṇa kahita nuāri
tapana śara sītāṁśu śara nabatana bajramunā
amoha śara paśupatra ādrābaḷi añchu munā | 180 |
bindhanti nārāja ye troṇaru bācchi bācchi | 181 |
ki jāṇi juḷujuḷā poka niśābhāge diśanti | 183 |
ẏeka bhāñjante daśa biṁśa tiriśa beḍhanti | 185 |

div.note: “bindhanti nārāja ye troṇaru bācchi bācchi” pāda pare ‘cha, gha’ pothire pāṭha :–
aneka śara se dhariṇa nija kare
bindhanti se nirantare arjuan upare |

lg.l: bāraṇa na galā ke para ke āpaṇe | 187 |
ẏeka hātharu āreka śara ghenai uchuḍi
aśva yoddhāke pañchadaśa dhanu yoddhāke daśa daśa | 190 |
pādāntimāne bāmakare huḷā ye dāhāṇa kare gadā
ẏekādaśa yojana pariyante diśilāka dibasa prāẏe padā | 191 |
uttara boilā svāmī na karani yuddha
ẏeka paḍante se daśa baṁśa ghoṭanti | 193 |
arjuna boilā uttara na jāṇu ẏethira kathā
prāṇe na mariṇa muhiṁ kutūhoḷa yuddha kali
śira cchedana na karai parakāryya boli | 195 |
uttara, tera barasa hoilāni samara mora nāhiṁ
sarāga na bhāñjii ẏe kaurobanta chahiṁ | 197 |
prāṇeheṁ ẏehānta āga muṁ māribi kemante

div.note: samara abhimukhe lagāa dihiḍira huḷā |–ga, ña, gha, jha
“teṇukari nirādhāre na karai yuddha” pādānta pare ‘da, ja’ pothidvaẏare adhika pāṭha :–
caurāśi kṣeuṇa gosiṁhara baḷa
aḍhāi prahare tāhā maili sakaḷa |
indraṁku jiṇili muhiṁ khāṇḍeba bana dahi
kirāta rūpe īśvaraṁku jiṇilai muhiṁ |
chapana koṭi yadubaṁśa jiṇilai dvārakā
hari baḷarāma jiṇi subhadra āṇili ẏekā |
duṣṭa dāneba māri santhajana pratipāḷi
caturddiga jiṇi muiṁ rājusī yagyaṁ kali
hanumanta saṅge muhiṁ hoili bibādī
śare śare muhiṁ bānddhali paẏodhi |
nirbātakapaca muhiṁ māilaiṁ svarge
aṅgārapannaṅga muhiṁ jiṇilaiṁ raṇaraṅge |
citrasena gandharba jiṇi neuthilā driyodhanaku
se citrasenaku jiṇi āṇili ẏehāṁku |
pāṇḍabāsura ẏehāra śate bhāiṁki dhari
agnire dahakari khāuthilā poḍi |
se pṇḍabāsuraku mārilaiṁ mohora bhmaja baḷe
śate bhāiṁki jiṇi āili sehu goḷe |
ẏe chāra kurubaḷa mote tiraṇa prāẏe diśi
ẏekā śarake sarba māribi bikāti |
rāgeṇa pārthiba ye brahmāṇḍa yāka ghoṭi
kauroba sainiṁki ẏekā byapilā kirīṭī |

lg.l: uttara boilā svāmī tohora ākraṣaṇa yemanta
samarakuiṁ ārambha tu kalu kisa arthe | 202 |
svāmī uprodha yebe basiba chatrīṁkara kāryye
athabā uprodha kale chāla yibāka louṭi | 204 |
rāgeṇa pārthiba ye mohanā śara gheni | 205 |
mukuṭa yoddhāke pañchabiṁśa pādāntike daśa daśa | 207 |
bhārathe bhāroi malla mahimāṁ yāhāra dhani
ẏeka ghāntike arjuna peṣile ẏete śara ghei | 208 |
śate śate nārāja paḍilā ratha rathīṁka upare
pañchāśa pañchāśa nārāja bhedilā gaja yoddhāṁka aṅgare | 211 |
mukuṭa yoddhāke paḍilā pañcha biṁśa bāṇa
daśa daśa nārāja paḍilā pādāntike jāṇa | 212 |
aṣṭādaśa kṣauṇī upare ẏeheneka śara phuṭi
śarīru ātmāmāne ye saburi galā chāḍi | 214 |
rakate karddana ye hoile māṭi miśā | 217 |
candana kasturī kuṁkuma puṣya ye debāṅga
rodhire bilepana hoilā se sabuṁkari aṅga | 218 |
uttarā bāḷī bacana achuṭiki hetukari śuṇi | 222 |
yāa yā uttara ho kara tu utakarma | 224 |
bābu ratharu ohlāi paśa yā samara bhitare
uttara boilā muṁ karai baḍa bhaẏe
ẏemāne diśuchanti mote rāhura teja prāẏe | 226 |
āho uttara āmbhara sodaraṭi ẏe mahābaḷī karṇṇa
mama sahodra hoi kaurobe tohora meḷi
baijantī māḷā thilā karṇṇara hāde hr̥de
arjuna boilā uttara ho ẏehā ghena hāde | 231 |
ẏekā mātra bhīṣma ho nuhanti mohagata
ẏe duhinti chāḍi āṇa yete ratna pāru | 233 |
yahuṁ se āgyāṁ ho dila sarbasācī
amūlya ratnamāna uttara ghenai bācchi bācchi | 234 |
debāṅga basramāna ye amūlya ratna neta
karṇṇara sannadhe paḍilā acchi bīra dhuśāsana
āre tuhi ye keśa dharilu mohora dorpatī
muhiṁ tohora śira chedanti āja raṇe
muhiṁ aba tohora āja bidāranti bakṣasthaḷa
tebe se keśa bandhana karibe pāñchāḷī
tera barasa hoilā keśa acchita mukuḷi | 243 |
neiṇa ābharaṇa kalā se chāṇḍāḷara śira | 244 |
śuṇa ho uttara ẏeṭi āmbhara mtuḷa śukuni | 248 |
jadura ghareka ẏeti bhiāilā kūṭa kapaṭe
pureka rañchilā jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭe | 249 |
kūṭa upāẏe kari se ghenilā āmbhara sampradhi | 251 |
uttara boilā ye ṭekiṇa dakṣiṇa pāṇi
desi āgyāṁ durāchāra chāraku pakāibi hāṇi | 252 |
bābu uttara re tu kopa na karani ẏehā | 253 |
baṁśa nāśakalā ẏehāra pathara ghare bhari | 254 |
driyodhana sampada harāibā nimante akrāi abastā | 256 |
āmbhara jhiṁghāsa se karāi aneka bāge
āmbhe nāśa karibu kaurobanta sumari gatadoṣa rāge | 257 |
ẏehākaiṁ kopa tuho na kara birāṭi
bichārante śakuni re acchi āmbhara kāryya seṭi | 258 |
arjunara bacana śuṇi uttaa parama śānti
acchaba basanamāna ābharaṇa kalā tāra kāẏe | 261 |
āre sabhātaḷe basāilu tu āmbhanta nei
ẏebe se pratagyaṁmāna tora sabu gala kahiṁ | 263 |
samaẏeka bratithāa re yetedina thiba āśā | 268 |
rāge uttaa kumāra khaḍage karai prahara
arjuna boilā chāḍa chāḍa mukuṭa uttara
lakṣmī bije karithānti ẏe mukuṭa upara | 276 |
koṭiẏe māṇikya ye achai ẏethe lāgi
koṭiẏe pāde ẏethi bije karai saubhāgī | 277 |
ẏe mukuṭa bhārā hāde ānana sahai
pannaṅgā narāẏaṇa rūpe ẏehā mānagobinda bahai | 278 |
pannaṅgā biṣṇu ẏe ye rājā driyodhana
lakṣe nr̥pati ẏehāra pāde karanti bandana | 279 |
ẏe mukuṭara teja ye sahasre kiraṇa
ẏe mukuṭa tetiśa koṭi debatā nuārile bānddha
ẏe mukuṭara mahimāṁ ye ẏesaneka bidhi | 283 |
arjunara bacana śuṇi se birāṭara chāṭa
ye yāhā arajai abaśya tāha phaḷai
āpaṇe yāhā arji karma boli bhmañji
anargha maṇimukuṭa ye driyodhana śire thilā
kāṭari goṭiẏe nei lambāilā rājara gaḷāre | 290 |
śrabaṇa chedana kale yoddhāẏe yete bhala | 293 |

div.note: sadhīra prāẏe kari thoilā mukuṭa |–pha, ka, ṇa, jha
thāpita āṣya ye nāhiṁ nā khaṇḍantā |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: re re kaurobe tumbhanta āja kehu rakhu | 296 |
kāhānta ciriṇa ye rudhira dile baḷī | 297 |
kāhāra hr̥de ladile nei pāṣāṇa khaṇḍamāna | 299 |
atianta rāge arjuna ẏemanta kr̥ta kale | 300 |
uttara boilā svāmī tohroa bibatsa nāmagoṭi
aḍāa godhana paal uttara chāla yibāgheni | 303 |
aneka ratna se ye bācchaṇa ghenigale | 304 |
dhāmai sahadeba ye lauḍi kareṇa dhariṇa | 307 |
aḍābanti godhana pala se baḍāi haraṣe

div.note: dūrddakṣara bukure lambāile mandāra māḷa |–pa, tha, ḍa, dha

lg.l: aśī sahasra gopāḷe ye godhana beḍhakari
ratha bāhai tahiṁ se birāṭara bāḷa

div.head:
{@birāṭa kalpirājā yuddhogamana o bhīma
karttr̥ka bīrabāhura patana@}

lg.l: taba puṇye biṣnṇu purāṇa muṁ śuṇite kali icchā | 1 |
se beni rājāṁkara keuṁṭhāre helā bheṭa | 2 |
jābaḍe calāilā se samasta hāthī rathī | 4 |
maccha rājāra saini paḷāile sarba bhāñji | 5 |
śarīra na rahai sanyaṁkara hata dekhi | 8 |
bhāñji paḷābanti ratha gaḷa aśva chāḍi | 9 |
biśvāse āṇila mote konte nuārili rakhi | 12 |
ābara thāiṇa muṁ kisa karibaiṁ konte
ẏehikṣaṇi nāśa yibāṭi na yāi rakhante | 13 |
paḷāi loḍai rājā mantrī tule nāhiṁ | 14 |
nakuḷa ghenikari bāhuḍile na chāhiṁle leuṭi | 15 |
ẏe tiniheṁ ghuñchi bana gahane paśanti | 16 |
raha raha birāṭa ho dekhibā samara | 17 |

div.note: ẏehikṣaṇi bhitare yāi hoiba upagate |–ta, pa, dha
ẏehikṣaṇi thāṭha beḍhile nuārai rakhite |–tha, ga, ña

lg.l: bisari boilā muṁ aṭai baḍa pāpī
kiñcheka malā kimpā muṁ na mali adyapi | 20 |
ẏe kaṣaṇuṁ pāri muṁ hoibi kemante | 21 |
ẏehāṁkara pāpa ātmā muṁ jāṇilaiṁ hāde
mote ẏehi samare ye pakāile peli
ẏehāṁku ta nohiba mārantā brāhmaṇa jana boli | 24 |
birāṭa boilā mote chāḍu kinā gosāiṁ
ẏe gahana thāṭha dekhi mohora brati nāhiṁ | 26 |
ẏemanta beḷe ghuñchile bratibā āmbhe kāhuṁ | 29 |
tote mote sarbe ye dekhachanti beḍha
dhātikare beḍhile ye lakṣe mukuṭabandhā yodhī
lg.note: hāthe paḍi muhiṁ houacchi dhaṁsa |–ta, dha, ha
lg.l: bhīmasena boilā ho śuṇa rāẏe matse
purasari na yibu tu rahithāa mor apache | 33 |
nārāja cūra heucchi bhīmasena aṅge yāiṁ | 35 |
dekhile kaṣṭhore saini ye hoileka bheṭa
kāḷānaḷa mūrtti jāṇi se pabanara batsa
niśāpatiki dekhi yehne kṣepai śūnye rāhu | 39 |
sehi prakāre se diśai drikodara mr̥tti
re re kāra kari hākante paḷāile sarbasanya bhāji | 43 |
puṇa puṇa prahāra karai bīra paracaṇḍā
sehi sādr̥śye bhīmasena yabana baḷa paḍle nimajji | 49 |
gadā mudugara ye timbura cakra kāti
konta jāṭhi śakati guruja bābala lāṁkiā
kete ke māruachanti ke antakarū tāhā | 53 |
bhīmasena aṅge bāji śasre paḍanti mahītaḷa | 54 |
nāraja na bhedai yeṇu bhīmasenara aṅge
dvādaśa yojana dirgha tini yojana prati
ẏete dūra māḍaṇa ye paḍale saini pādānti | 60 |
diśai aṣṭāṅga ye mandara puṣya prāẏe | 61 |
bāhana tejyā kariṇa ke caraṇare loṭi | 63 |
śarana boile se kṣaṇeheṁ na rakhai | 64 |
bīrabāhu daṇḍa bhāñja kalā sarba cūnā | 65 |
āre leuṭā kari tora ruhāu kinā haẏe
nisata hoile ki rahiba tora kāẏe | 67 |
kaṭāḷa dekhiṇa se sahasreka yoddhā tule
nabaniśi konta gheni se ẏekamukhe rahile | 68 |
sahasre konta gheni ye māilā mahrāja | 69 |
śahasra biarthe ye rahile sarbe ghuñchi
canda dekhi rāhu yehne padu thāi māḍi

div.note: bhīmasena piṭilā ye lohadaṇḍa kāḍhi | 73 |

lg.l: nisata hoiṇa chatrī dante ghenanti tiraṇa
praṇapatya hoẏe yehuṁ tāku mārai pādaghāte
paḷāntā yoddhāku se prahāra karai mukhe | 76 |
rājāra paḍanteṇa ye apāra rathī thile
nija bhūmi chāḍi se banaste paśile | 81 |
śuṇa ho rājana bhīmasena caḷai birāṭaku gheni
aneka dhana bhaṇḍāra tāhāra kale jara | 83 |

div.note: rājāra paḍanteṇa ye aba thile |–ka, ba

lg.l: ratha gaja aśva tāku dileka bahuta
ẏemantara samaẏe nei bāratā dila dūta | 1 |
svāmī daṇḍabhagna hoiṇa ye trigartteśvara galā
driyodhana agrate yāi sabu bārata kahila | 2 |
rājā rājye nāhiṁ boli se bāratā pāilā
ẏeteka puṇya kāhiṁ abā karibi ihajanme
bheṭibi ki kauroba baḷa ājara sṁāgrāme | 8 |
nijara deśe rāja yaiṁ prabeśa taḍati
puṇa deśaure nei bāratā kale dhāti | 9 |
svāmī di yodhana rāja godhana nianteṇa hari
uttara kumāra ẏekā galāka rathe caḍhi | 10 |
konte pachārile se galā ki ẏekāṅge
tāhākaiṁ ghenigalā se rathe sārathi kari | 13 |
konte kboile ho rājā na bhāḷani āu citte
uttaraku pramāda nāhiṁ ye br̥hannārī thāānte | 14 |
ballabha thāṭha ye kaḍhāẏe bega bega
jibadāna pāiṇa ye kaurobe sarbe uṭhi | 17 |
ke bolai mohora mukuṭa kehu nilā
ke bolai ratnahāra ke mohora chorikalā | 19 |
ke bolai mohora gadā dhanu nāhiṁ
ke bolai mohora nāsā śrabaṇa chedilā
bhīṣme boile ho na kala āmbhara ye bola
kāḷe phaḷilā tumbhaṁku nohilā kicchi bhala | 22 |
paḷāa ẏebe samaste nillaja ātma gheni | 23 |
dharmeṇa arjuna sabuṁkari śira na chedile | 24 |
śakuni boilā ho male bhala huantā
maraṇuṁ adhika hoilā ye cirāñchana kathā | 25 |
yāna bāhāna caḍhi ye nuāranti śasra gheni | 27 |
mahābhāratha śuṇante ye durita hoẏe dhaṁsa | 29 |
aputra kamāne putra pābanti, basanti svargabāsa
he sugyaṁjanamāne śrabaṇe śuṇi hr̥de ẏehā ghoṣa | 30 |
dvārakapuraku yāa yā ẏebe nandighoṣa ratha gheni | 31 |
caḷai dāruka ye nandighoṣa rahta gheni
starībeśa aḷaṁkāra puṇihiṁ arjuna aṅge bhari
svāmī rathīra paṇe mohora rathe basite icchānāhiṁ
śarīra kampai mohora tohroa rūpa chāhiṁ | 36 |
arjuna boilā bhrānti na karasi kicchi
aṣṭadaśa kṣauṇī ye bhīṣma droṇaṁkara mūḷe
nandighoṣa chāiṁ hari karanti dhani dhani
ẏe rathe bije mohora kalāka phālaguni | 43 |
āho caitana samadaṇḍa gheniṇa calai birāṭa
magha matsadeśe prabeśa hoilāka nija thāṭha | 44 |
svāmī jagate udita hoile tohora tanaẏe | 45 |
svāmī aṣṭādaśa kṣauṇī ye ẏe kuru sagara
tāhā jiṇimāku ho sāmartha hoilā tohora kumara | 46 |
birāṭe boile ho putra mora sādhu
ẏekāẏe kemante manthilu re bārānidhi sindhu | 47 |
konte boile birāṭe br̥hannārī sārathi yāhāra rathe
tāhāku jiṇimāku sāmartha ke ẏe tini jagate | 48 |
oṣṭhe denta chāpiṇa adhara kalā puṣṭa | 49 |
āpaṇe āpaṇe matsarāẏe krodha mr̥tti karai śānti
oprodheṇa kicchi boli nuāri mane karai bhrānti | 50 |

div.note:
rāge trodhamr̥tti matsarāẏe mr̥tti
badana niropai rājā na bolai kicchi |–ta, dha, pa

lg.l: rāndhaṇā bidhi se ye karai sulabha | 52 |
paśāpīḍhe āsa ho kheḷibā toṣa citte | 54 |
birāṭa boilā mote na bhābai āna
āja se nicinta kalā ye mohora nāna | 57 |
ẏebe se maghadeśa matsadeśa hoilā mote bhogī
sarba sulakṣaṇa kumara hoilā parama yhogī | 58 |
kāṭa koṭhi boli rāẏe pakāi dile khaḍi
prabhma lokaṁkara āgyāṁ meṇṭite ki pāri | 59 |
dvadaśa koṭhi ye trakaccha kariṇa kāṭi
svāmī daṇḍabhagna hoi paḷāi gale akuroba sanyamāne | 63 |

div.note: paśāra ucita miḷai kiñchite birase |–ka, ṇa, cha
sabaṁśubhe kumara mohora hoilā mahayodhī |–ga, ñja,

lg.l: gogoṣṭhe nei ye chāḍileni nija godhana pala
birāṭa boile konte putra mohora dhani
ẏekāẏe jiṇilā bhāṣma droṇa kauroba saini | 66 |
konta boile birāṭe br̥hannārī yāhāra rathe sāhā
trailokara madhye kehu jiṇite ārai tāhā | 67 |
kheḍanti paśā se ye atīẏa kutūhoḷe
svāmī uttara kumāra tora kauroba baḷa jiṇi
konte boile birāṭe br̥hannārī yāhākaim sāhā
trailoke sāmaratha ke jiṇite pāre tāhā | 73 |
ẏehu abā aṭai ye se mānagobinda

div.note: aḷākānātha prāẏe diśai tohora uttara kumara mahāmala |–pa, ga, jha, ka, ṇa
pura indra prāẏe bije bhitaraku kumāra mahāmalla |–da, ja
br̥hannārī thile jiṇi nuārai asakanda |–ka, pha

lg.l: puṇa puṇa śalāghanā bacana kontaṁkara śuṇi
rāgeṇa karmpilā śarīra birāṭara kadaḷī patra jāṇi | 75 |
aṣṭāṅga bākye se oprodha kala tejyā
āho konta paṇḍita tu aṭubaḍa laghu
rātra prabhāte ho chāhiṁle yāhāra mukha
dinakara sukr̥ta harai miḷai baḍa dukha | 78 |
kāhākuiṁ na pāi se nelā āratara beḷe | 80 |
konte boile rājā na jāṇi kahu huḍi
āho birāṭa bhīṣma droṇa śalya kr̥pa aśastamā yāhākaiṁ sāhā
uttara prākrame ki jiṇite hoai tāhā | 84 |
adhara puṣtakari boilā ẏebe se tāhi tāhi mote kahu | 85 |
kāḷacakra prāẏeka bulāi rakata kumuda benidr̥ṣṭi

div.note: asaṅgata bākya se oprodha kalā tejyā |–jha, ṇa, ta
śalāghanā = śḷāghā = praśaṁsā

lg.l: śrībanta kapāḷe ye paḍilā paśā kāṭha
rodhira bāhāra hoilā yujheṣthiṁka kapāḷa phuṭi | 88 |
napuṇa na dekhanti nakuḷa bhīma sahadeba | 90 |
birāṭa śira kamaḷa ye kāṭibe ẏehikṣaṇa | 91 |
sahadeba nakuḷa arjuna na dekhu brikodara | 92 |
ẏe durgatiru nātha tuhi se rakhantā | 93 |
ayātaśatr̥ se ye aṇahāta kopitā mahiṁmā | 94 |
ẏete kaṣṭhore birāṭaku kopa kebeheṁ tāhāṁkara nāhiṁ
pāḍa ho birāṭa boli paśāsāra dile bāhi | 95 |
sañchaẏe śasya na phaḷanta ẏe nabasr̥ṣṭi | 96 |
meghe br̥ṣṭi se ye na karante bhale

div.note: śrīkhaṇḍa kapoḷe paḍalā paśākāṭhi |–jha, ṇa, ja, da
hāthe rodhira deba daile sambhāḷi |–jha, ṭa, pha
janajantu nāśayānte yujheṣthi kopakale |–ka

lg.l: pāpa nāhiṁ mithyā nāhiṁ yeuṁṇa mahatamāra aṅge
tāhāṁku ẏeḍa pramāde hoilā keuṁṇa bāge | 102 |
kare lekhana thile abaśya bihai bidhātā | 103 |
goḍi goṭiẏe gheni phimpi māranti anubrate | 105 |
darddura jība lalāṭe paḍi lalāṭa gala phuṭi | 106 |
sehi praha re ye nāśa galaka maṇḍukī
citragupate boile ẏe apāra kāḷa bratantā bhogī
kr̥tāntaka boilā adose ye ghenilā ẏehāra prāṇagoṭi
ẏesaneka śāpya yahuṁ dile jantu airi

div.note:
citragupate boile ẏe apāra kāḷa bratantā kr̥mi
pimpi prahāre adoṣe ẏe nāśagalā mr̥tubhūmi |–ta, pa

lg.l: ye yāha karai tu pratakṣe tāha dekhu
tatakṣaṇe bihu tāku kṣaṇeheṁ na rakhu | 112 |
mātā raja pita īryyare se ye upujai piṇḍa
dhatubādya lāi tu karu sarba ruṇḍa | 113 |
athabā para śakati karai yehu nindā
yābata tapana tāpa hoiba parama śītaḷa
parama brahma gheni ẏe pañchu dābānaḷa | 115 |
caturtha karmeṇa muhiṁ ye aṭai mandabhāgī
sarbagyāṁ nātha tu saẏaḷa jana cinta |
māẏā moha paṭaḷa ẏe saṁsāra racanā
lobha moha kāma krodha ẏe adauḍi bandhana sinā | 118 |
namāmi karama puruṣa tu aṭu mahākaṣṭi
śūdramuni sāraḷā dāsa kahile saṁsāra janahite | 120 |
ẏehāṁkara prasanne ye prasarai sarba buddhi | 121 |
kiñchita pātaka mohora yisa thilā pūrbe
bho daiba puruṣa khaṇḍana kara ẏebe | 122 |

div.note: ihajanme parajanme bihu tu kṣaṇake na rakhu |–cha, ṇa
ahantāre bihanta tu kṣaṇe heṁ na rakhu |–ṭa

lg.l: svāmī nirākuḷa puruṣa tu bihu ho pratakṣe
idaṁbākya bhābe muṁ kahite yeuṁṇa pakṣe | 123 |
pūrbara kiñchita doṣe upujili mānaba yoni | 124 |
janme janme abhyāsi kahili śāhasra yoge
candreṇa kaḷaṁka yehne bidita digenteṇa ghoṭi
karmara bipāke tāhā ye sahile yujheṣthi | 126 |
āpaṇe yete pāpa karai phaḷai pratakṣe
kalā karmahiṁ se karma bolanti jagate | 127 |
sahile se mari na sahile jhurimari | 129 |
mahata gupata āgyāna ye birāṭa parba kathā
śrī sarasvatī bhaṇḍāra muṁ bidhvaṁsili puṇyabaḷe | 132 | 6694 |

div.note: he budhajane kāḷe pātaka na kari |–kha, ṭha
sahile se tari na sahile jhurimari |–cha, gha

lg.l: kontaṁku samāsyā na dei pāilā baḍa lajjā | 1 |
lāja bhaẏa saṁkoce se dianti sambhṣa
bidhabā ātmā prāẏe se saṁkoce acchi basi | 2 |
konte boile ho uttara ẏekā āsu
ẏekā bhitaraku āsiba na āsiba br̥hannārī puṇi | 5 |
āgyāṁ pramāṇe se uttara kumāra āgasari
āsa āsa svāmī boli arjunara hātha dhari | 6 |
br̥hannārī bile ho kontaṁkara āgyāṁ mote nāhiṁ
ẏe gupata benidina hou kinā tūnī
kara yā draśana tu subidhāna karma gheni | 8
baibasuta manu pucchā kale śuṇa ho yogeśvara
br̥hannārīki kiṁpe konte paśite na dile bhitara | 9 |

div.note: caitana pucchākale śuṇa ho yogeśvara |–ṇa, kha, cha, tha, ja, gha, ṭha

lg.l: śuṇa lo caitana manu ye boile
śamībr̥kṣa taḷe ye pāṇḍaba niẏama kale | 10 |
gaṅgare hātha bhariṇa niẏaṇa niẏama kale chāri ye pāṇḍaba | 11 |
abaśya gupate tāhākaiṁ karibā prāṇe nāśa | 13 |
bolai mana ho śuṇa tu caitana
birāṭara doṣa ye na ghenile dharmanāna | 15 |
teṇukari bhitare paśi na dileka hāde | 17 |
prathame bandilā kontaṁka śrī padmapāda goṭi
ẏehi caraṇa taḷeṭi lakṣe rājāṁkara śiraloṭi | 20 |
ẏehi caraṇa taḷe ye śrībāsudeba pariṇāmi | 21 |

div.note: yujheṣṭha dopatīṁki ye kariba jhaṁghāsa |–ṇa, jha, ña, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ṭha, ja, da

lg.l: yebaṇa pādapadma dekhi kṣama nohilā birāṭa
se pādapadma raja āsi paḍilā mamarāṣṭa | 22 |
kebaṇa digapāḷara ẏe aṭai mahā yayāṁbhumi
teṇu se śrīcaraṇa paḍila ẏethe svāmī | 23 |
ẏe beni caraṇara ye diśai aṅguṣṭhi
cihan hoi basilā lakṣe rājāṁkara mukuṭāgoṭi | 24 |
śuddha saṣṭika jāṇi yāhāra birājai tanu | 25 |
ẏe jānu upare yagyaṁkāḷe basithile pāñchaḷī | 26 |
rasāṇilā subarṇṇa patra prāẏe śobhābana kucchi
samastaṁkara cintā acchi ẏe hr̥daẏa kamaḷa | 28 |
surabhī kamaḷa nāḷa parāẏe yāhāra beni karagoṭi
svāmī yugāntaka āropaṇa jāṇi yāhāra kaṇṭhataṭa

div.note: cihna hoi basilā lakṣe rājāṁkara lalāṭapāṭi |–da, ga, ña, ja
kucchi = kukṣi |
gabhīra nābhi kunda ghaṭaṇa jāṇi gacchi |–ka
svāmī bimbaphaḷa jāṇiṇa adharagoṭi ye prakāśi |–ga, ṭha, ña

lg.l: svāmī yābata candra se dibākara jāṇi
puṇa puṇ binopai se barāṭara baḷā
kontaṁkara mukha chāhiṁ padmapāde praṇapatye śutilā | 35 |
nicaẏe arjuna kahilā ẏehāra tule yāānte | 36 |
tāhāra na kahile ẏe āmbhanta kehne cihni
gupata tnidina acchi nāhiṁ abā kahilā phālaguni | 37 |
konte boile re parama kalyāṇa hoi tuku suta
lakṣmī aḷaṁkr̥ta hoi cirāñchana hou brata | 38 |
uttara kumāraku dekhi birāṭa uṣata hoithilā
kontaṁku praṇapatya hoante tāhāra śarira kampilā | 39 |
pitā ke mausā ke putra nuārilu bāri | 40 |
samare śatr̥ku jiṇi utsuka hoilu kire bābu
taba karttabye bābu ẏekatva kalu sabu | 41 |

div.note: lalāṭa diśai rakata tāmbra prāẏe phuṭi |–ka, ṇa, da, ga, ña
uttara kumār abinopa dekhi bichāranti konte |–pa, dha, ta
jyeṣṭha kaniṣṭha ta ẏekata kalu sabu |–ṭha, gha, cha, kha

lg.l: tohora bāhubaḷe jiṇi āṇiu ki godhana | 44 |
ẏe bolanti br̥hannārī achai yāhāra tule
tāhāku ki pramāda trailokya bāhi aile | 45 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka sabhāpaṇḍā boli muhiṁ ye kali gauroba
kāḷeheṁ na chāḍilā ẏe bhr̥tyara sabhāba | 46 |
bābu dhāraṇā jana hoi ẏehāra prakr̥ti baḍa laghu
keteheṁ sahibi re putra napuṁsaka saḷāghu | 47 |
puṇa boilā uttara pratagyāṁ ki br̥hannāī thāānte | 48 |
bābu sahi nuārili re jagubindana putragoṭi
uttara boilā tāta ẏehenneka tumbhara buddhi
svāmī yetebeḷe gandharbe kīcaka aneśvata bhrātha māri
kontaṁkara na thile ki tu āsantu uburi | 51 |
jāṇunā ki ti gartta samare yebaṇa kathā
bīrabāhu samare yehu uddhari āṇilāka tote

div.note: puṇa boilā uttara pragagyāṁ ki br̥hannārī dekhante |–jha, ga, ña, ka, da
pāde prahāra kala abyaẏa bārānidhi |–jha, gha, ṇa, ka, ṭa, da, ja, kha

lg.l: bho pitā yujheṣṭha samāne yāhāku kalu sebā
baraṣaka bhagati kṣaṇake kiṁpe bhāṅga lu tu abā | 55 |
uttara boilā tumbhe bahana āstānu ohlāarāẏe
kebaṇa mahātmā ẏe aba achai gupate | 57 |
rakṣa dakṣa hoile hoai se kr̥ṣṇara samāna | 58 |
subhigyāṁ putra hoile karibā nāhiṁ ki sabugaṇa | 59 |
ẏete bichāriṇa rāẏe āstāna kalā tejyā
kuśa hātha hoiṇa konte birāṭaku kalyāṇa kale bāñcchā
nicaḷā lakṣmī bhogyakara dharma debatā karu tote rakṣā | 61 |
uttara boilā svāmī sadaẏe yebe citte
aneka banaẏa bacane ye badaẏanti deba konte
parama sānanda hoiṇa bhitaraku gale pitāputre | 63 |
yāānte birāṭa pachārai godhana haraṇa kathā
satya bañchāiṇa se kahilā sarba mithyā | 64 |
sehi āstāneṇa ye achanti konte basi
arjuna boilā svāmī uttara kumaraku satya karāili
gopyāna kisa hoiba muṁ pratakṣe yuddhakali | 68 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile tu kāhāra bole galu
agyāṁtabāsa nihāi sarai tu kiṁpe udita hoilu | 69 |
arjuna boilā svāmī tumbhe śuṇimā rajadeba
muhiṁ kisa karibi mote peṣilā sahadeba | 70 |
ẏeṇukari yuddhe muṁ gali godhana kati | 71 |
gogoṣṭhe sahadeba acchi hakāri bege āṇa | 72 |
parama sānande se caḷai bege mantrī
sahadeba boila dhanu śakaḷa traẏodaśī dina hoilaiṁ gopyāna
yujheṣṭha debe ye sahadebaku kale bāci
nirañjana āgyāṁẏe āmbhanta baraṣe teradina sañchi | 80 |

div.note: baraṣe antara hoilāni ābara daśadina |–ṭa

lg.l: ābara sāta dibasa adhika kahilu kemante | 81 |
svāmī kūṭa kapaṭa mantrī ye śakuni mandabuddhi | 82 |
agyāṁtbāsa laguti se baḍhā dibasi gaṇante | 83 |
udita hoi pāṇḍabe aile āra kāhuṁ | 84 |
svāmī tumbhanta na kahili ẏe baḍhā daśa dibasa
bāhuḍi dvādaśa baraṣa puṇa paśantāi bane | 88 |
bhalahiṁ se kalu bābu pantita guṇagrāhī
ẏebe dui dibasa sarile abhiṣeka hoibāāmbhe kahiṁ | 89 |
ẏemanta thāna goṭiẏe re ṭhāba kariāsa | 90 |
āmbhanta abhiṣeka ta na karibe dhr̥tirāṣṭa
āmbhara sampada dekhile se kaurobe hoibe baḍa kaṣṭi | 91 |

div.note: śakuni lekhanteṇa kahantā yugate |–ja, da

lg.l: abhiṣeka hoi āmbhe yibā ẏethuṁ chāpe
ābara dhr̥tirāṣṭa puanta nāhiṁ mora oprodha
chāḍili sudaẏā ẏebe ārambha li yuddha | 93 |
sahadeba boile deba ẏe tohora satya
madhey kauśika nadī bahai uttara bāhinī | 95 |
pratakṣare aṭai se harihara beni sākhā | 96 |
mahā pabitra rājya ẏe matsadeśa aṭai
duhiṁbāra beḷe cire cire bhumiki pakāi
sātaghaḍi pariyante rājya beḍhi kṣīranadī bahai | 100
ẏemanta pabitra rājya nāhiṁ ẏe madhyabhmabane | 102 |
ẏe bhmabi māḍile deba sakaḷa kāryya siddhi | 103 |

div.note: ẏemanta pabitra rājya nāhiṁ tribhmabane |–tha, da, ja, jha

lg.l: makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa tithi ye cauṭhī
parama sānanda hoile yujheṣṭhi debe śuṇi | 109 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile śuṇa re arjuna

div.head:
{@śamībr̥kṣa tale yudhiṣṭha raṅkara
abhiṣeka o baḷadebaṅka apamāna@}

lg.l: uttarā bāḷīki dila ābara uttara kumāra
tadantare uttara kumāra ye binaẏe yujheṣṭhiṁki
ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra śiṣya achanti tāhāṁka pāśe | 13 |
pāñchalakṣa śiṣya gheni bijaẏe baśiṣṭha sudebe | 16 |
se sabhā gheniṇa se ailā biśvakarmā
ratna yogāḍa gheniṇa aile kubera aḷakārapati
brahmāindra rudra digapāḷa achanti tahiṁ miḷi | 32 |
śuṇi yogeśvara puruṣa se sadā matibhoḷi
nanda basudeba upananda ugrasena uddhaba akrūra prasannājita
rthe rathe caḍha sarbe hoile prabeśa | 37 |
bainetra piṭhire bije sabuṁkari hāthare arghasthāḷī | 40 |
lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra aśiẏe bāsudebaṁak putra
ẏehānta gheni khagebara piṭhire bijaẏe jagabhuta | 41 |
rātra cauda daṇḍare hoile yāiṁ bheṭa | 42 |
bherī kambu kāhāḷī ye yantrita nirbāṇa | 44 |
pr̥thī heḷa ghenaiṁ ye kampai tribhmabana | 46 |
yujheṣṭhi debe bije ye byāsaṁkara koḷe
pāñchayojana thāuṁ ye dekhile kr̥ṣṇa kāmapāḷe | 47 |
kisa śabada boli puccha le maghabāna | 49 |

div.note: niśi chāridaṇḍaṭhāre yāiṁ śamībr̥kṣa mūḷe bheṭa |–jha, ja, gha, da, ṇa, ka, tha
yujheṣṭha debe bije ye bāsabaṁkara koḷe |–ṭa, ṭha

lg.l: lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra aśiẏe ye suta
ālaṭa chāmara dhariachanti ẏe samaste ye hātha | 52 |
ānande aneka ye prārthanā bākya boli
śrībhmaje nārāẏaṇaṁku toḷi dhaile yāiṁ koḷe | 56 |
śī saṁki sāṇaṁka caraṇe dharme kale pūjā
aneka apacharīmāne kale ye huḷahuḷi dhvani-kare arghya gheni | 59 |
maruḷa bāhāne pitā bije kaleka antarddhāne | 61 |

div.note: aparṇṇāẏe huḷahuḷi dyanti kare arghyasthāḷī gheni |–ṅa, ṇa, tha, gha
“debasabhāre utsaba dekhiṇa bidhāne” pare ‘da, ja’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
sahadeba nakuḷa ye bhīma arajuna
jagannāthaṁka padmapāde praḷambita kaleka bahana |
[abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: agni āropaṇa kale baśiṣṭha uddāḷaka durbhāsā agasti
prāṇatyāja baśyānara kāḷyanaḷa jāḷā ye piṅgaḷa

div.note: [pūrbapr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
chāribhāiṁki koḷakari dhaile śrīhari
mukhe cumbanadei śībhmaje dharibhiḍi |
sannidhyeṇa thile ye deba baḷadeba
tāṁka pāde praḷambita chāri ye pāṇḍaba |
basudeba ugrasena nanda upananda
samaste mānyapāi hoile sānanda |
tuleṇa rudragaṇa gheni caudakoṭi |–ga, ña, ṭa
śamībr̥kṣa taḷe āsi bijaẏe taḍiti |–ja, ga, ṭha, gha

lg.l: jāta anaḷa bikarāḷa anaḷa śveta anaḷa pātile āhūti
ratna maṇi mukuṭa kubera dilāka ārambha | 75 |
amarādhi nāthaṁkara yeteka abhiṣeka yogāḍa alaṁkāra
samasta ābharaṇa kale nei yujheṣṭhiṁka śarīra | 77 |
arjuna śarīre tāhā ābharaṇa kale janārddana | 80 |
aśvinī kumāraṁkara yete abhiṣeka yogāḍa āṇi

div.note: dibya aḷaṅkāramāna aḷakā nātha saṁbhari (ṇa, ka)

lg.l: śrīkare gheni amaḷāṇa bastra pārijāta pusyamāḷa
anargha maṇi mūkuṭa āṇi dileka bhāṣkara
bije pañchu indre ye bāsabara koḷe | 87 |
pratyakṣe indra ki se mañche abatari | 88 |
bijaẏe pañchamūrtti brahmā indra biṣṇu hara kubera sārikṣe | 89 |
samasta khūāile nei sabhā ye sudharmā | 92 |
