pañchamūrtti abatara ye pratimā bighna rāja
rūdra abatāra pratimā kale tahiṁ nei saja | 93 |
mīna kūrma barehā narasiṁha bāmana praśurāma
rāma haḷadhara baudha baḷakī ye nāma | 94 |

div.note: bāmeṇa debaguru ḍāhāṇe rudra ye debatā |(ṇa, ka)

lg.l: dhāpa pabana caṇḍa pabna ye pracaṇḍa pabana
caradharma pabana tāraṇa pabana ye dhyāẏe pabana | 100 |
urddhvagati prāṇa apāna samāna byāna udāna pabana
bikarāḷa prabaha ābaha saṁbaha nibaha pabana
thakita pabana ye dhāraṇa ālokita pabana | 102 |
nirastaka pabana ye ghora jībanyāsa pabana | 103 |
kāraṇa māraṇa jāraṇa khara ye pabana | 104 |
gupata byakata ye gyāna laḷita pabana | 105 |
ẏemante pabana debata ye aṇachāśa mūrati
br̥haspati śutra śantiścara āditya soma maṅgaḷa ye budha
rāhu ketu nabagrahanta pratimā kale rūpabante prasiddha | 107 |
āho caitana ẏemante pratimāmānanta ye subarṇṇe ghaṭaṇa
hīrā nīḷā poẏeḷā ye aṣṭaratne niribāṇa | 109 |
sanai sanātana sananta sanandana manu ye kumāra
ẏe chāri pratimā ye bahmā abatāra | 110 |
pañchabiṁśa mūrati ye durgā bārohī narāẏeṇī
pañchabiṁśa pituḷi ye samasta ratne jaḍi | 113 |
caṇḍeśvara biśvaksena kuṇḍodara mātaṅginai teja se mañju baḷī | 115 |
kāḷa bikāḷa citragupata kāḷī bikarāḷī beni ye bhāriyā
mahiṣī bāhane naśakaragaṇa gheni bijaẏe yamarājā | 117 |
tambāra pratimā ye luhāra beni ākhi
svāhā svadhā mantre pūjā pāile bihitā | 119 |
śaṅkhapadma mahāpadma śveta karkoṭa kuḷika takṣaka ananta
naba pratimā kile grāma ye daibatī | 121 |
bhr̥gupuruṣa abhinna purūsa śūnya ye puruṣa

div.note: caṇḍa biśvaksena dhāpana yācaka pañchu baḷī |(apapāṭha)

lg.l: sahasreka śiḷā nīḷa lohita barṇṇa thiti | 128 |
sahasreka śiḷā ye śrīrāma nāma mudrā
brahmarudra karma dharam pr̥thī āpateja bāẏiba ākāśa
ẏe pratima ghaṭaṇa kale naba ye puruṣa | 130 |
aṣṭaratne nirbāṇa kale koṭiẏe dīpaku koṭiẏe rūkhā
guāghr̥te pūroi netara baḷitā ati śikhā | 131 |

div.note: maheśvara abatāre pañchasasra mekhaḷā |(gha, ṭa)

“maheśvara abatāra pañcha sahasra anargaḷā” pāṭha pare
‘ṇa’ pothire bhinma pāṭha acchi :–
sahasreka śiḷā ye piṅgaḷa abatāra
sahasreka śiḷā ye subarṇṇa tāmrara |
bāmana mūrati śiḷā ẏeka sahasreka
kūrma mūrati śiḷā ye aṭai sahasra ẏeka |
sahasrka śiḷā nīḷā nr̥apti
sahasreka śiḷā nr̥siṁha mūrati |

lg.l: mukutā jharāma ḷamāne lambanti koṭi koṭi | 132 |
ẏe bidhire yete debatā subarṇṇara khaṭuḷi
hīrā nīḷā māṇikya poẏeḷā aṣṭaratne jhaḷi | 133 |
svāhā svādhā mantreṇa karanti beni homa
dvādaśa koṭi mantre habi debatā toṣanti | 135 |
pañchabiṁśa sthāne homa karmaṇa bidhi āhūti
kampai sapata dīpa heḷa ghenai mahīdebī | 137 |
tahiṁki bādya na śubhai māẏākale deba śirīhari | 138 |
sumatī narmadā ye prācī candra bhāgā

div.note:
bāñcchā daẏāẏeṇī māẏāmanda lāgi
pātāḷagaṅgā jamitā nīḷābhāṣi saubhāgī |(ṇa)

brāhmaṇī nadī dīkṣāẏeṇī nadī māẏā mandāagni
pātāḷāgaṅgā jaintā ābara bibhāginī |(ja)

lg.l: mukutāra bhaṇḍe śuddha sphaṭika prāẏe pāṇi
bāma dakṣiṇe rahile ye śvetahastī beni
puṣkara debatā tule caurāśī lakṣa bājī

div.note: kanakabeṇī ye ābaa sarsvatī dhabaḷāṅgī yamunā
samasta tīrthamāna śrīhari karanti bhābanā |
gopyāna gaṅgā ye bhābānī narmadā agni sītāśiṁga
biśāẏe tāra saṁgama mātāṅgī puṇyarāśi siṁha |(ta, dha, pa)

“ẏehāṅkara mūḷe koṭiẏe ye tīrtha” ehi pda pare
‘ja’ pothire bhinma pāṭha :–
ẏete tīrtha mūḷe ye acchi koṭi tīrtha
sakaḷa jaḷa āṇi baraṣiba yujheṣṭhiṁkara mātha |
bāsudebaṁka bacane ye hoiṇa kr̥takr̥ta
puṣkara megha āsi bijaẏe turita |
mukutāra taḷe śuddhasphaṭika tiḷapāṇi |(dha, ta, pa)

lg.l: sānanda citte yujheṣṭhiṁki abhaẏe bara sebi | 151 |
rebatī nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara | 152 |
tāracandra beḷa ye rohiṇī ghare bhoga | 153 |
abhiṣeka bidhāne se samasta debe meḷā | 155 |
amara biḷāsuṇī ẏe ye dyanti huḷahuḷi
arakṣeka sundarī ye ālaṭa chāmaranta ḍhāḷi | 157 |
pāṭachatra lakṣe ālamba udaṇḍa ye lakṣe
sabhāẏe cauṣaṭhi koṭi kanyā tāṇḍaba rase khaṭi | 159 |

div.note:
bla choraḍa dui paribārī ye hakarile kati
bije komaḷa āsane īśāna mūrati |(ṭa)

śaṁkhacila pakṣī ye uḍai caukati
bijaẏe kamaḷākṣī īśānamūrati |(ja)

udaṇḍa pāṭachatra ālamba ẏekalakṣī
cyuḍoḷa śvetapārā rājahaṁsa pakṣī |(ṅa)

lg.l: susvara badya sā ri gā mā pā dhā ni sapata svaradhuni
yoga ādhyāne pañcha ahibrate jaṅgama basi | 166 |
āho caitana pratakṣe dharma nirñjana yeuṁṇa yujheṣṭhi
lekhante tāhā muṁ kahibi ki anta kari | 170 |
mahābākya ākhyāna muṁ kahili tahiṁra nimantu | 171 |
manuṣya janme utapatti muṁ ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe

div.note: gāẏeṇīẏe sārigama pādhāni madhudhuni |(ṅa)
se mahārājāṅkara puṇya abhiṣeke |(ka, ṭa, ṅa, jha, gha)
lekhante anta tāhā kehu karipāri |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: śaiḷa rājāra nandinī bijaẏe mohara karuśānu | 173 |
āṇi niuḍile ye kotiẏe tīrthara jaḷa | 177 |
dibya aḷaṁkāra hoi ye pāṇḍaba pañchubīre
puṣkara abhiṣeka kalā koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni | 180 |
puṣka br̥ṣṭi kale brahma daibata puruṣe | 181 |
amr̥tākṣa meghe tahīṁ kalā amr̥ta ye br̥ṣṭi
dadhibābana maṅgaḷa bākya pakṣī ye tārākṣi | 183 |

div.note: dadhimaṅgaḷa śabade gamai tārākṣi |(pa, dha, ta)
dadhibābana maṅgaḷa debatā sārikṣi |(cha, gha)

lg.l: diśanti paṇḍunandana brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara ki indra candra jāṇi | 184 |
bāāna bāāna gadā gheniṇa bīra bhīma | 185 |
bahuta sānanda ye houchanti br̥ndā arke
sabhā samārjanā deba karanti begi begi | 188 |
bābu sulabha jībana aṭai āmbhara dhanye dhanye | 189 |
aneka janmaku nirmaḷa hoilā āmbhara cacchu | 190 |
dharmanandana abhiṣeka dekhibāku sāmaratha hoilu ẏebe | 191 |
birasa badana ye hoile deba kamapāḷa
anamite dhr̥tarāṣṭra putraṁkara hoilu gadā guru

div.note: diśanti paṇḍu nandana brahmā indra kobera jāṇī |(jha, gha, ka)
diśanti paṇḍu nandana pañchu indra jāṇi |(pa, dha, ta)

lg.l: svāmi āmbhara saṁpada dekhi trailokya ānanda
athabā manaku yogāilā ki āmbhara ucchaba | 201 |
beḷe beḷe mānagobinda āmbhaṁku cintai pramāde | 202 |
bho svāmi mohor aẏekā ẏe mandabuddhi
beḷe beḷe mānagobinda harai āmbhara saṁpradhi | 203 |
tohora prasāde mote dile se biṣalaḍu
bānddha pakāile mote agādha sindhujaḷe paḍu | 204 |

lg.note: baḷadebaṅkara bimana bhīmasena jāṇi |(ka, ṇa, ga, ña)
lg.l: tohora buddhipāi āhuribeḷe āmbhanta kale kuṭa
ghareka bhiāile jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa | 206 |
kapaṭa paśā ẏeka ye bhiāile āpaṇa
sakaḷa anīti kale ye tohora bharasāẏe | 209 |
ẏe tohora parasāde pāilu ẏete kaṣṭa
ẏete bāge rāsa tohora na pr̥rila peṭa | 210 |
harasa chāḍi kiṁpe birasa tohora mati
keśa na bānddhalā debī cauda barasa ṣaḍamāsa teradina | 213 |
dhuśāsana rodhire yete keśa ye pakhāḷi

lg.note:
“ghareka bhiāile jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭa” pare
pa, da, ta pothira adhikā pāṭha :–
purañjana paṇḍā se ghara dila poḍi
āmbhara dharmabaḷe se āsila uburi |
tumbhara buddhire se ẏeteka kr̥tya kala
kāḷeṇa kamapāḷa niki nohilaṭi bhala |

ghoṣayātrā bolikari rañchila paumāde
sakaḷa anīti kale tohora paramāde |(ka, kha, ṭha, jha)
keśa na bānddhala se terabarṣa caudadina |(gha, ta, tha, da)
lg.l: svāmi dhr̥tarāṣṭa puanta muṁ bidāribi yuddhe
keuṁṇa bāge tāhānta rakṣā kariba raṇa madhye | 215 |
muhiṁta satya karucchi tumbhara pāda chuiṁ
anyadina prāẏe ki tumbhe bujhila baḷebara
ẏe ghāntiki bratiyibe yeteka sanya tra | 218 |
karṇṇa kr̥pa aśvathithāmā śalya bhīṣma droṇa
kebaṇa bāge ẏehānta rakṣā kariba saṁtriṣeṇa | 219 |
tathāpi kaurobanta rakṣā kari na pāribeṭi saṁgrāma | 220 |
sātabaṁśa gheni tumbhe kala ye saṁgrāma
pāmtaba bana dahane se indreṇa bibādī

div.note: amaragaṇanta gheni pūjākale bāsabe | 224 |

lg.l: āpaṇe jāṇanā ki jārāsandha rājānta thilā bandīkari
mahīthaḷe rahi nuārila tumbhe tāhāra ḍare
kuṭumbha gheniṇa yāi paśila sāhera bhitare | 226 |
kebaṇa bhagati nohilu ho āmbhe tote | 227 |
gosiṁgha daita tumbhanta abā na dila kete kaṣṭa
tahiṁ samaste na pāile kete ye abastā
lakṣeka rājanta jiṇi draupadīṁki āṇi ruhāilu kathā | 131 |
arjuna bandhanu mukata kalā jiṇi bidyādhare | 233 |
muhiṁ se bandhana kali birāṭaku parighāi | 234 |
daṇḍa bhagna dekhi kopa kalāka driyodhana
āpaṇe bāhila aṣṭādaśa kṣeuṇī gheni sainya | 235 |
go dohana beḷe goṣṭhe beḍhilā rāẏe āsi
ẏekā rathīke se ye jiṇilā kurusāgare | 237 |
śate siṁghara prākarma kīñchaka bhāi sate
tāhānta badhakali muhiṁ mahībhārā nibāribā nimante | 238 |
pratakṣe dekhila acha svāmi mahimā āpaṇā

div.note:
kaurobanta jiṇi pāṇḍebāsura māri
duryyodhana śate bhrātha deluṭi uddhari |(gha, cha)
muhiṁ se jiṇili parighāi roṣa bahi |(tha, ṭha)
tāhānta badha kali deba saindhrī nimante |(ga, ñja, ṭa)
cakṣu thāuṁ baḷarāme heuachu kaṇā |(ka, da)

lg.l: abhiṣeka bidhāne basiacchi ye abhimanyu tohroa bhagnajā | 240 |
kādambarī pāna bhoḷe kicchihiṁ na bichāru
dekhu dekhu upekṣā karu tu amr̥ta
svāmi susvādu mani biṣa tu karū garbhagata | 242 |
tu yāhā bichāra karū rāma manaicchā
jāṇimānā kaurobanta kebaṇa bāge karu rakṣā | 243 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ brikodara rakata kumuda dr̥ṣṭi
rāge śrī baḷadebe gale tahuṁ uṭhi | 244 |
dvāraka puraku debe kale tahuṁ bije | 245 |
baḷarāma kope kehi rahi nuārile āga
yahuṁ se prasara āsi hoilāka rāti
pañcha kaṭaka prāpata heu pūrū manaicchā | 249 |
ẏebe banastare ye nibārila daita duṣṭanta
aneka kalyāṇa se ye kaḷe deba maghabāna | 251 |
draupadī debīṁka śire nei arghya bandāpanti | 253 |
puṇa kāḷa antare tu hoibu prakāśa | 255 |
bijaẏe br̥ndāarke se ye yāhā bāhāne
prabeśa hoile yaiṁ ye yāhara bhmabane | 257 |
bandhu barga gheniṇa ye bijaẏe debarāje
garuḍa nandighoṣa rathe kale sarbe bije | 259 |
aṣṭakuḷā nāge gale ye pātāḷa svargapuri | 260 |
śamībr̥kṣa taḷe rahile pañchu paṇḍaba dropatī | 261 |
yujheṣṭhi debe ye byāsaṁku kale pucchā
birāṭa rajyaku mora yāite deba icchā | 263 |

div.note:
“puṇa kāḷa antare tu hoibu prakāśa” ei pāṭha
pare ‘ka, ṇa’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
debaloke brahmaloke bāñcchanti āśiṣa
maheśvarī mātā go hoa tu santoṣa |

lg.l: ẏebe se tumbhara bābu hoila sampada | 264 |
samasta ruṣi gale bahuta kalyāṇa ye kari
abhiṣeka hoi pr̥thīre dei na yogāi pāda | 1 |
yāna bāhāna ta āmbhara nahīṁ kicchi
bhīmasena boilā deba buddhiẏe mohora acchi | 2 |
samasteheṁ bije karibā ẏe mohora aṅge
birāṭa rājye yāiṁ paśibā āmbhe bege | 3 |
yujheṣṭhi debaṁka koḷe bije dropada rājāṁka dulāḷī | 5 |
dhanu troṇa bhāra gheni dibya aḷaṁkāra
gheniṇa sakaḷe se pāṇḍaba pañchu bīra | 7 |
dhabaḷa chatra gheniṇa bijaẏe bhīmasena bāma ye pākhara | 9 |
dhanuśara bhārathi dibya abatāra kareṇa mantrapothi
dibya abatara se diśanti digapāḷa prāẏe | 11 |
meru āsane yehne brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara
asakanda debatā tule yehne bijaẏe baiśvānara | 12 |
beḷa benidaṇḍa madhya yaiṁ matsadeśe paśi | 13 |
kaṇaẏa giri jāṇi bhīmasena chālante śohai
digapāḷa prāẏe ta diśanti ati śreṣṭha | 26 |
ke bolai śate kīñchakaku khāilā sairindhrī
ke bolai uttarā kumārī ẏe karāuthila nr̥tya
napuṁsaka rūpa chāḍi ẏeta indrasvarūpa saṁjāta | 28

div.note: dibya beśa aḷaṁkāra nakuḷa kumāra |(ṅa, paga, ñja, dha, ta)
napuṁsaka rūpa chāḍi ẏeta kandarpa svaẏeṁ jāta |(da, ja)

lg.l: kehu ẏehāra ye na chāhuṁthilā mukha
ke bolai ṭhākuraṁku ẏe aśva karāuthilā lāgi
ke bolai tantrīpāḷa gopāḷa rūpa dekha
daṇḍachatra kare dhari ẏeta abhaṣekī prāẏeka diśanti | 24 |
ke bolai ẏeta rānddha deuthilā ballaba
dekha ye ẏehāra ho mahiṁmā dulabha | 25 |
ẏehāṁkara carita ta na pārilu jāṇi
muṇḍe kāndhe kākhe haste se bahai
kehu maṅgaḷa dhuni karanti dianti huḷahuḷi | 29 |
ke bolai birāṭa ye kalā mandakr̥tya

div.note:
kehu ẏehāra aṅga na chuanti napuṁsaka boli
dibya abatāra diśai indrarupa sari |(ka, ṭa)

lg.l: kaḷire birāṭaku rājya māḍi basibe pratyakṣa | 33 |
deba bije kalā prāẏe dinti huḷahuḷi dhuni | 34 |
māhendra yoge se ye śubha anukūḷe
koḷeṇa pāñchāḷī gheni āsthāne chanti basi | 36 |
bhūta bhabiṣya jāṇai se kareṇa mantrapothi | 37 |
bāmakare gāntima ḍāhāṇa kare khaḍga gheni | 38 |
bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā gheniṇa benikare
yebaṇa sairindhrī moḍhī hetu kīñchaka nāśagalā
abhiṣeka hoiṇa se kontabhāṭa(?) koḷare basilā | 44 |
abhiṣeka yogāḍa debe se pāile abā kahiṁ
se ratnamāḷamāna madhyapure dekhilā āmbhara nahiṁ | 45 |

div.note: digabije prāẏe dianti huḷahuḷi dhuni |(ṭa, ga, ñja, da, ba)

lg.l: svāmi dibya abatāra se ye tantrīpāḷa gopāḷa
mantrīpaṇe pothiẏe gheni kahai bhuta bhabiṣya sakaḷa | 46 |
kanaka daṇḍa chatra dhabaḷa bīrachatra kare gheni
ḍagara mukhuṁ ẏesana bāratā śuṇina birāṭa
kare asipatra dhari adhara kala puṣṭa | 50 |
āja tāhāra muṇḍa muṁ pakāibi hāṇi
svāmi raha raha boli se śrīkr̥ṣṇāẏe boli
raha raha kopa saṁhara rāẏe matsa
birāṭa boilā re khaḍaga chāḍa bābu
bicakṣaṇa putra boli tote samarpili sabu | 56 |
bābu adabhute kāhuṁ āsi paśile bhr̥tyapaṇe
ante se mohora mukhe dilāka cumbana | 58 |
bābu ẏebe jāṇili kontabhaṭa(?) baḍa laghu
bājiṇa phāṭilā tāhāra lalāṭa ye pāṭi | 60 |
ẏeḍe pāmaraku tu ḷiṁpe samārjanī kalu
chāṇḍāḷa putra re tāhā chāraku mote praḷamba karāilu | 61 |
bābu bhīṣma droṇa jiṇimāku tu hoilu sāmarathā
uttara kumara boilā pitā daṇḍeka thirahoi basa
śrībhmajuṁ kr̥pāṇa thoi thira kara niśvāsa | 64 |
sābadhāna hoi tumbhe kṣaṇe śuṇa mora bāchā
sampada haribāku ki pratagyāṁ tora sāccā | 65 |
svāmi sābadhāne śuṇa ho se kontaṁka mahimā
svāmi rājusi yāga se ye āropaṇa kalā
chāriuṇā lakṣe rājā yāhāra caraṇe sebilā | 67 |
svāmi trailokya ṭhākura se deba madhuhārī
svāmi dekhiluṭiki lakṣe rājā sammukhe naāẏaṇa
sātakṣauṇī baḷa gheni chatraśāḷe anna bhmañjilu | 71 |

div.note:
abadhāna hoi tumbhe kṣaṇe śuṇa mora bāchā
sampada haribāku tāhāra pratagyāṁ nohai sāccā |(ka)

lg.l: kehi jāṇantā nohilā ye svāmiṁka chāmure | 72 |
bhāi tāhāṁkara tohara gaṇḍasthaḷe dei hātha
uṭha boli svāmi chāḷi dele pañchalaha
bho pitā hāthara sukhe se kheḷileka paśā
sahodre sampada dei araṇye kale basā | 75 |
satyeṇa nāma se ye bolāileka konte | 77 |
kontabhāṭa(?) nāma bahile na kahile micha | 78 |
pāṇḍaba nāma se ye bahile pāñchajaṇe | 79 |
nāguṇī baḷa jiṇilā se pabanara batse | 80 |
kumbhīrī nāme dānaba ye nipātile jaḷe | 81 |
binā yuddhare ye harile tāhāra darpa | 82 |
baka hiḍimbikā māri ye ẏekacatrā nagra rakhi

div.note:
kointā debīṁkara ye aṭanti jyeṣṭha batsā
dharmeṇa yujheṣṭhi se pratagyāṁ kaicchā |(ta, dha, pa)

lg.l: ḍodhi śibapure se chāṇḍāḷa baḷa dhvaṁsi
brāgha māla māilā ye kautuka samara | 85 |
svāmi pāñchāḷa durha saīndhrī bākya kari
śte mātuḷa mora kīñcheka raṇe māri | 86 |
ballabha sūpakāra se ye pabanara tanu | 87 |
para dukhe kātara se kaicchā jagajjeṭhī | 88 |
svāmi uttara diga bije kalāka ye sādhi
lihi pochante yebaṇa prāṇa karai naṣṭa
sapata dvīpā pr̥thibī se dhaila dhanuhuḷe | 91 |
duhitā deiṇa yebaṇa svāmīki kal pūjā | 92 |
brahma rūpeṇa se jiṇile sarba yodhī | 93 |
basanta utsabe ye hari āṇile saubhadre

div.note: aneka samara se kaleka gaẏādhārī |(ga, ja, ñja)

lg.l: agni debataku tārile se byādhi galā nāśa | 97 |
svāmi kirāta rūpeṇa se haraṁku ye jiṇi
akṣaẏe troṇa pāśupatra astra dile pāthara | 102 |
śare śare sāgare sehu setubandha bānddha | 103 |
lakṣe rājā dekhi laṁghi na pārile yāhāra sīmā | 104 |
meruśūḷa badha kale yehu harihara chaḷe
śaraṇa pañjara svāmī se aṭanti sarbakāḷe | 105 |
gopyāna nimante se napuṁsaka rūpa dhari
ubaṁśīra śāpe se dina pāra kari | 106 |
godhana haraṇe muṁ tāhānta gali gheni
samudra praẏe maṇili muṁ kauroba saini | 107 |
bhaẏeṇa paḷāi muṁ ratha kali tejyā
muku nirbhaẏa kari boilā tu sārathi hoithāa ya | 108 |

div.note: meruśūḷa baśa kale yehu harihara chaḷe |(ga, jha, ñja)
mote boile re sārathi hoithāa yā |(adhikāṁśa pāṭhāntara)

lg.l: muhiṁ se sārathi āpaṇe hoile rathī
debe se agocara dekhilā tāhāṁkara mūrtti | 109 |
aṭhāra kṣauṇī baḷaku se pāṭha rathī ẏekā
jiṇile bhīṣma droṇa se mane nahiṁ śaṁkā | 110 |
tera yojana māḍi paḍile se ye aṣṭādaśa kṣauṇī saini | 111 |
śrībhuṣā maṇi mukuṭamāḷa tāta āṇili muhiṁ sukhe | 112 |
ẏekā yoddhāke tāta jiṇile svarga tini
br̥hannārī bolu yāhā se pratyakṣe phālaguni | 114 |
mādrīra nandana nakuḷa kumāra yāhāku bolu
lakṣe rājā madhyare ye bolāi bhmajaṅga | 116 |
kumāra mukhe yāku ākāśe pāṭa yathā | 117 |

div.note:
“śrībhūṣā maṇi mukuṭamāḷa tāta āṇili muhiṁ sukhe” ei
pāṭha pare ‘ga o ṭha’ pothire bhinma pāṭha :–
mote boile ratna aḷaṁkāramāna
bācchi bācchi kari nia rājara nandana |
tāhāra bacane muṁ ye ratharu ohlāi
śrībhūṣā mukuṭamāna āṇili chaḍāi |
maraṇaku icchā kiṁpā kariachu tāta
tāhāṁka kopaku nāśibuta ro bitta |

lg.l: bho tāta jīuṁ jīuṁ maraṇaku kiṁpe icchākari lodu | 120 |
sāta saahsa rājā se khaṭile yāhāra pādataḷe | 122 |
ẏekā gopa ḷake bahuta samara se hādekalā
mānagobinda darpa cūri se godhana chaḍai āṇilā | 124 |
ẏekā ẏekā jaṇake tāta apāra mahiṁmā
agyāne ye kopa jāta karu pitāmaha
kauroba baḷa kṣaẏantā se dropada abaḷā

div.note:
śate kīñchaka yāhāra nāśagalā
gopyāna nimante se samasta durgati sahilā |(ka, ṇa)

lg.l: kīñchakara mūḷe yāhāra śate sahodra nāśi
uttra kumāa yahuṁ ẏemanta kalā pucchā
mukhe uttara kumara siñchilāka nei pāṇi | 132 |
bābu kiṁpei rahilā re mohora jībati | 133 |
svāmita paṇe muhiṁ aneka tukāra boili
babu yeteka bhracchanā re boliacchi muhiṁ
bhīmasena ṭhākure mote sahibe kisa pāiṁ | 136 |
sebā karibāku mote bidhātā na dile | 137 |
kebaṇa bāge nandana re chāhiṁbi tāṁka mukha
ajātaśatr̥ aṭanti se parama paṇḍita mahata | 140 |
tāhāṁkara citte yebe kopa tote thāntā
tāhāṁkara mane yebe tote thāntā kicchi kintu
trigartta bandīru mukata hoi tu kemante āsantuu | 142 |
bhumire paḍantā yebe tāhāṁkara rudhira phuṭi
tāhāṁkara ybe kopa thāāntā he tote tāta
mohora tule kiṁpe paśi na dile se pāṭha | 145 |
yujheṣṭhiṁkara rodhira se yebe dekhantā se ghāẏe
kṣaṇeheṁ sampada tohora go thāntā ki dhanurjaẏe | 146 |
birāṭa agrate se uttara ẏemanta boile
parbata cura hoai ki nātha ṭeḷā ye maile | 148 |
samudra poti hoai ki pakāile bāli
yaṣṭi piṭile ki bhāṅgai luhāra lauḍi | 149 |
se ki trailokya bratibe kopile bainetra | 150 |

div.note:
“trigartta bandīru mukata hoi tu kemante āsantu” pādāṁśa
pare ta, dha, pare adhikā pāṭha :–
tāhāṁkara citte yebe tote kopa thilā
bīrabāhu chāmuru tote kehu re āṇilā |

birāṭa agrate se uttara boilā
svaẏeṁ jagannātha yāhāra carane sebilā |(ga, ña)

lg.l: uthā uṭha tāta tu ye chāḍa manobhrānti
aśvinī nakṣatra ye bhogya se dinara | 154 |
śaśī aśvinī nakṣatraku amr̥ta yoga ye aṭai
aśvinī nakṣatra uttarāṣāṛhā nakṣatra aṭai maitra tāra
mīna lagna beḷā ye nabadaṇḍa bhitara | 156 |
māru ki tāru abā yāiṁ karibā daraśana | 158 |
ihaloke gati mukati male baikuṇṭha hoiba prāpata | 160 |
ẏeḍe sulabha bābu chāḍita ki pāri
ẏehā bichāri gaḷāre birāṭa lambāila koṭhārī | 161 |

div.note: ihaloke nāśa mukati male baikuṇṭha hoiba prāpata |(ṅa)

lg.l: kāḷacatra prāẏe bhīma bulāi beni ākhi | 164 |
birāṭa boilā uttara na rahi mora prāṇa
jhāḷeṇa tripaṇḍa bhūmire paḍi śarīra ye dhūḷi | 167 |
daśadoṣa apādha kṣamā karibā deba svāmī | 168 |
muhiṁ agyānī mūrkha aṭai baḍa doṣī
ṭhākuraṁka chāmure muṁ āsthāna māḍi basi | 169 |
svamī tumbhe ubhā hoila mohara āstānara taḷe
tatra doṣa mohora na dharibāka ẏe beḷe | 170 |
svāmi athabā samudra yebe laṁghibāka mahī
svāmi jaḷabr̥ṣṭi na karai yebe maghabā pr̥thigate
svāmi agni baraṣiba yebe āditya debatāẏe
daśanaha mukhe bhari aneka binaẏa ye boli
adyāpi hr̥dagate bikr̥ta na thāi yāhāku
bhīmasena boilā birāṭa tu dvāre thaa rahi
ṭhākuraṁka āgyāṁ hoile bhitaraku chāḍipārai muhim | 178 |
ẏemantara samaẏe arjuna chāhiṁlā ye āstāna taḷe thāi
arjuna boilā svāmi birāṭa acchi dvāre
bhitaraku paśi nuāri bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁka ḍare | 180 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile kaha yāiṁ bhīmasenaku
yete lokanta gheni se āsai birāṭa
mukhe draśana karu se niṣedha na kara bāṭa | 182 |
gāṇḍima dhanu bābala nārāca acchi kare | 183 |
duti kr̥ṣṇa abatāra se pratyakṣe kiraṭī | 184 |
praḷamba kale birāṭa putra bhariyānta gheni | 185 |
arjuna boilā ho birāṭa uṭha uṭha rāẏe
āsa āsa svāmīṁkara abhiṣeka dekhi pātaka kara kṣaẏe | 186 |
birāṭa boilā svāmi karai muhiṁ bhīti
apāra droha muṁ kalai ati ajñāna mūḍhamati | 187 |
arjuna boilā se svāmī kṣamā ye sāgara
śatr̥hiṁ kopa na basai yāhāru hr̥daẏara | 188 |
bhīmasena boilā tu yāa yā matsapati
arjuna boilā ye birāṭa mukha chāhiṁ
svāmiṁkara citte ye tote āna bikr̥ta nāhiṁ | 190 |
āsa āsa birāṭa ho draśana bege kara
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara indra yama kubera sahite
dharma artha kāma mokṣa prāpata pratakṣa | 193 |
birāṭa śrīkr̥ṣṇā uttara kumāra ābara mantrī amanātye
yaśobantīpura teji ki bijaẏe kale brahme | 195 |
śate sahasrabāra daṇḍa praḷamba āstānara taḷa | 196 |
svāmi sādhu mohora pūrba janma dharma karma
svāmi ẏe mohora rājye basanit yete jana
tāhāṁkara jībana sādhu se ye dekhile naẏana | 198 |
svāmi trigartta paẏāṇa kāḷe boili muṁ daṇḍa ye sājante
āna rājyaku mantrīpaṇe yogāa boili ho konte | 201 |
ẏethaku bhīmasena ṭhākure ghuñchile trigartta bānddhanelā | 202 |
birāṭa boile tiḷeka khañjaṇi yebaṇa lalāṭa pāṭi
svāmi āgyāna paṇe muṁ na kahili kāhā
mo tahuṁ saṁsāre deba āna nāhiṁṭi deorehā | 204 |
kiṁkara hoi birāṭa ye bahuta binaẏa boli
svāmi aneka aprādha kalāiṁ muhiṁ doṣa
pāẏe āsi birāṭa ye karai niugchāḷi
dhūḷi jhāḷeṇa ye kardana tāra kāẏe
tu deba ajāta śatr̥ para dukhe cintā
tu deba abyagata bhūta bhabiṣyata gyaṁtā | 211 |
tu deba yogeśvara parama brahma abatāra
tu deba khaṇḍibu nātha aśeṣa mahībhāra | 212 |
svāmi saubadra nāme brahmā baikuṇṭha bhmabana teji
ẏe mr̥tyu maṇḍaḷe nāma tohora se bhaji | 213 |
paṭāntara bākye śubhai dharma ye yujheṣṭhi | 214 |
svāmi pr̥thī āpa teja bāẏiba ākāśa
ẏe pañchadhātu tohora garbhare kale bāsa | 215 |
svāmi prāṇa apāna byāna samāna udāna pañchu ātmā
dhātubāda puruṣa tu sādhilu sarba mahatamā | 216 |
tuhi se bañchilu nātha kāḷa kama nidrā
parayogī puruṣa tu sādhilu sarba mudrā | 217 |
svāmi pāpa ātmā tejilu ṭekilu ajapāṅgī
caudharma puruṣa tu abyaẏa parama yogī | 218 |
svāmi pāpaātmā jiṇimāku yeuṁṇa puruṣaṁka icchā
teṇu kari śrīmukhe na phurilāka mithyā | 219 |
sata raja tama āśrita ye tini
ste biṣṇu raje brahmā tame rudranāma gheni | 220 |
svāmi kāḷa barttamāna jāṇi cintiṇa deba barttu
svāmi yoga pabana tapana tāpana ādhyāna adhyāpana
ẏe naba puruṣa deba tohora aṭai abhinna | 223 |
svāmi kāḷa ucita jāṇanta yebaṇa mahātamā
svāmi svarga mañcha pātāḷa sutaḷa rasantaḷa

lg.note:
svāmi yogabhmabana tapana tapana adhyāpana
ẏe naba puruṣa tora aṭai abhinma |(ka)

svāmi yogabhmabana ye ādhyāna sandhāna
nba puruṣa tora aṭai abhinma |(kha)

kāḷa bañchibāku yebaṇa mahātamā
tāhā prānta kari kahibāku kāhāra mahiṁmā |(dha, pa)
lg.l: svāmi ẏeteka taḷa madhye ye bhmabana saunidhi |
ẏe mr̥tyu maṇḍaḷe utapatti tu mānaba śarīra gheni | 227 |
lg.note:
“tahiṁ tohora bhmabna aṭai debabidhi” ehi pāṭha pare
‘ja’ pothire adhikā pāṭha acchi :–
satyayugare tu aṭu śvetabrahmā
nirākāra niañjana biṣṇu ẏe driyodhana mahātamā |
pannagā nārāẏaṇaṁku dekhiṇa tu galu
garba gahilā ẏe tote bheṭa na pāilu |
kopeṇa abhiśāpa tu dilu śvetabrahmā
śatebāra mr̥tyumaṇḍaḷe tu hoa janmā |
śuṇiṇa pannagā biṣṇu kahanti uttara
ẏeḍe abhiśāpa tu dilu ho bedabara |
karapatra yoḍi tote biṣṇu bahuta kale tusti
bho śvetabrahmā mote kalu tu anīti |
śatebāra janma hoante hoibi narka ghr̥ra
śuṇiṇa boile ye bedabrahmā uttara |
śate janma ẏeka bāreka hebu yāi
śategoṭi se ye mānaba janma bahi |
dvāpara yuge ye āmbhe hoibuṁ yujheṣṭhi
ẏekā tharake tote māribi śategoṭi
teṇukari śvetabrahmā tu hoilu yujheṣṭhi
pannagā nārāẏaṇa se hoilā dhr̥tarāṣṭi |
munimānaṁkara tahuṁ achai muhiṁ śuṇi
ẏeṇukari bho deba tora āge bacana bhaṇi |
guhāri tote yāiṁ kaleka padmayoni
ẏe mr̥tumaṇḍaḷe utapatti tu mānaba śarīra gheni |

lg.l: mahī uddhāraṇa puruṣa tu ananta kāḷa bañchā | 228 |
svāmi yābata ẏe pr̥thī candra dibākara ādi
taba nāmagoṭi svāmī udita dibi bhmabi | 229 |
svāmi aniḷeka nāme basu thile andha hoi
dibya cakṣu pāilā se tote draśana pāi | 230 |
tu deba yogījanaṁkara hr̥daẏa ye rañji
daśa doṣa aprādha karibā deba kṣama | 235 |
apāra mahimāṁ yāhāra na sarai kahante
guṇa sāgara nātha tu trāhi karibā mote | 236 |
uṭha uṭha birāṭa ho bhrānti chāḍa mane | 2 |
ẏeteka mahiṁmā tohora ẏe matsyarājya purī
bābu mahata ẏe to bhmabanara naranārī | 4 |
daṇḍa gheni trigartteśvara tahuṁ dilā dhāḍi | 6 |
ẏeṇe kaḷapi rājā ye ailā birabāhu
jāṇantā hoile tote chāḍantā abā kehu | 7 |
āmbhara bichāre tote kicchi nāhiṁ doṣa
āmbhe se tohora rājya karāilu nāśa | 8 |
beḷeke anna lāgai tāku ṣāṭhiẏe pauṭi | 9 |
ẏeteka ādhāre triputi nohai tāra mana
tuhi se sahi pārilu tāhāra ārdoḷi | 11 |
mote asaṁkhya ho rājā tohora mahiṁmā
pratyakṣe pitā mohora tu paṇḍu mahatamā | 12 |
kalā upugāra ye abā na sumari
pratyakṣe jāṇima se brahmahatyā doṣa sari | 13 |
āho birāṭa yetekāḷa pariyante āmbhe bratithāuṁ hāde
tohora anna khāi ye bañchilu durgati
tohora annabaḷe āmbhe mahītaḷe ẏeka chatrī | 15 |
tohora anna khāi āmbhe māilu brāgha māla
tohora anna khāi māilu kīñcheka mahamalla | 16 |
āho birāṭa kaṁsa keśī troṇā muṣṭika ye chāṇūra yāmaḷā
praḷambā aghā kadambā bakā ghora mahābaḷā | 17 |
jārā nārakā ādi ye śiśupāḷa gālu
gosiṁha jaẏesiṁha kumbha nikumbha bāṇā bajranābha mahāmalla | 19 |
ẏehāṁkara tule tohora kīñchaka nāma gaṇi | 20 |
ẏehāṁkara bhārā ye na sahilā basudhā
mukhe rudhira bahi se ye hele mahatrodhā | 21 |
kṣīra samudre se guhāri kale debaloke | 23 |
ẏehānta āṇile hari saunidhi baikuṇṭha bhmabana | 25 |
sadā gopyāna puruṣa ẏe aṭanti kuruśānu
debaṁku gocara nohai tu se ẏehānta kāhuṁ cinhuṁ | 27 |
āmbhara dehuṁ tu pūrbeṇa hoilu jāta
upara janme nāma tohora aṭai śveta | 28 |
kāhāre meṇṭaṇa hoiba se debatāṁka āgyāṁ
kīñchaka badhakari āmbhe se ruhailu pratagyāṁ | 30 |
tu mohora dharmapitā aṭu na bichāre
āre bāb nakuḷa birāṭaku basā āsthāna upare | 31 |
svāmi muhiṁ mānabā ye aṭai deba ṣthāna
jẏethāne basibāku ki muṁ hoibi bhājana | 32 |
ās aāsa birāṭa ho nakuḷa boile
svāmi baḍabhāgya muṁ arajai ẏehiṭhāre thile | 33 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile tu mane na dhara bikr̥ta
āmbhe pañchu sahodra tote lāi hoilu ṣaḍabhrātha | 34 |
pacchime nabasahasra rājāre tu śiromaṇi catrabarttī | 35 |
āsa āsa birāṭa ho tu ghena mohara śaḍhī
śrīkare śāḍhī ye tāku toḷi dileka dharmarāẏe
puṇa puṇa praṇapatya hoi śāḍhī bānddhalā mathāẏe | 37 |
konte boile birāṭe māga yāhā icchā
birāṭa boilā svāmi yāhā debu bara
tebe se sadaẏe boli jāṇimānā hr̥de | 41 |
tebe se mohora manabhrānti yiba sina phiṭi | 42 |
āho uttarā pradāna kale ye arjuna
aprīti bhāba hoibanā tohroa kr̥ṣṇaṁku ye rāma | 44 |
tote citte antara dharibenā rāma banamāḷī | 45 |
arjuna boilā deba ẏemanta na kaha
huḍi birāṭa boila ye ẏehāra gyāna nāhiṁ
bidyaguru śiṣya putrī saṅgati acchi kāhiṁ | 47 |
arjuna boila se mo aṭai śiśu putī
yujheṣṭhi debe tu yebe karu aparate
bandhu hoile se nibhrānti hoiba tote | 49 |
kumāreka acchi se ye arjunara tanu
rāma kr̥ṣṇaṁka bhaṇajā tāra nāma abhimanyu | 50 |
birāṭa boilā svāmi muṁ nistarili nistarili
ẏe dohitā prasanne muṁ parama gati pāili | 52 |
ẏehāuṁ sulabha muṁ ye arajibi kisa
ẏebe se jāṇili mohora sukarma suyaśa | 53 |

div.note:
“tāhā mohara kāhiṁ miḷai pīrati”
pare ‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
muhiṁ tāku nāṭabidyā śikṣā deiacchi
guru śiṣyare pati patnī kāhiṁ gacchāgaccha |

lg.l: bibhāra yogāḍa ye bahana kara yā yā | 54 |
rājye bhramaṇi mohora karibā ẏehi mūrtti | 55 |
koṭi koṭi janmara se khaṇḍuntu pātaka | 56 |
maruta deśara śibarājā thāṭha ye palāṇi | 57 |
chokhāra śvetaaśva palāṇi pāñcha ahibrata tule
sādhu mohora jībana bolai rāẏe śiba
hr̥dagate kalpanā kali dekhibi ṭhākuraṁka abhiṣeka sambhaba | 60 |
aneka haraṣe mahārājā hoilā kr̥ta kr̥ta | 63 |

div.note:
“bibhāra yogāḍa ye bahana nei yā yā”
ehi pothi pare ‘da’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
birāṭa boilā svāmi mohora pure hua abhiṣeka
mohara rājyare ye dekhantu sarbaloka |
ānande yujheṣṭhi ye pañchubhrātha gheni
abhiṣeka yogāḍa birāṭa dilā āṇi |

lg.l: śibarājā śvetahastī upare yujheṣṭhi deba kale bije
bahuta deśe deśāure bāratā kale turita | 69 |
pāñchāḷa deśa rājā dorpada deśa rāje
śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭa dyumana gheniṇa saṅge bije | 70 |
padmeka rathī ye beni padma hastī
batāi sambharbe se gheniṇa ratna kośa
śveta hastī upare ye bije dharmasute
gajeka ārohi se kareṇa gadā gheni
kiriṭī mukuṭa se śrīkare gāṇḍima dhanu
bhūta bhabiṣya jāṇantā se sahadeba mantrī | 81 |
gajeka ārohi se bīra ye nakuḷa
pacchiāṇā thāṭa ābori rahiacchi kṣatriẏa achārgaḷa | 82 |
aśveka ārohi birāṭara nandana ye uttara kumāra
pāñchalakṣa yoddhā gheni caḷai yujheṣṭhiṁka āgara | 83 |
lakṣeka yoddhā gheni se ḍāhāṇa pakhāẏe maṇḍi | 86 |
śvetahastī caḍhiṇa se pañchāḷa deśa dropate
kanaka daṇḍa goṭāẏeka ghenilā acchi śrīhaste | 87 |
draśana kalā āsi kīñchakara pitā saṁkocana rāẏe | 89 |

div.note: lakṣeka yoddhā gheni se ḍāhāṇa pakhāẏe niuṇḍi |(ga, ñja)

lg.l: dante tiraṇa se daśanaha bhari mukhe
aśr̥jaḷa bahai beni naẏanuṁ putraṁkara dukhe | 90 |
saṁkocana rājā chāmure draśana karuacchi deba svāmī | 91 |
āho saṁkocana āmbhaṁku āmbhaṁku āgyāṁ dile debatāẏe
se putra tote dei na paruchuṁ kadācitte | 94 |
pūrba janmeṇa se ye aśvamedha yāga karithilā | 96 |
aneka ratnamāna saṁkocana rājāku se dile
ẏesaneka saṁpade ye maghadeśe matsadeśe bhrami
dekhiṇa mukata jane se dharmarāẏe svāmī | 98 |

div.note:
“se putra tote dei na pāruchuṁ kadācitte” ehi
pāṭha pare ‘ja’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
ābara loḍile debu rājyabhāra siṁhāsana
dhana dhānya godhana debuṁ lakṣe parimāṇa |(ja)
arjunaku saṅge gheniṇa bhārā nibāraṇa |(ta, dha, pa)

lg.l: rājānta gheni muṇohiṁ bije deba dharma | 101 |
trapūra tāmboḷa ye bhojana deba kari | 102 |
dvārakā puraku tu yāasi bega hoi | 103 |
bibhā sandeśa kaha yāiṁ rāmakr̥ṣṇa beni
bega āsa ghen tu abhimanyu bīre gheni | 105 |

div.head: {@abhimanyura uttarā sahita bibāha@}
div.note:
“sahadebakaiṁ bheṭile se haṁsabaḷā parbateṇa” ehi
pāṭhara “haṁsabaḷā parbateṇa” sthānare bhinma bhinma pothire
bhinma pāṭha
āśābaḷī parbateṇa | (ka, ṭa)
śaṁsābaḷī parbateṇa | (ta, dha, pa)
rambhābaḷī parbateṇa | (cha, gha)
baṁśābḷī parbateṇa | (da)
hastābaḷī parbateṇa | (tha)
dr̥mābaḷī parbateṇa | (ṇa)

“sanidhye sahadeba śate daṇḍa pariṇāmi”
ehi pāda pare ‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
dekhiṇa jagannāthe sahidebaṁku koḷa kale
sakaḷa kuśaḷamāna ānande pachārile |
sahadeba pachārai śuṇimā debasāiṁ
tohara kr̥pāru āmbhe bañchilu gosāiṁ |
birāṭa rājyare aneka dvanda paḍilā
driyodhana godhana harinebāku ailā |
kauraba baḷaku ye jiṇile arjuna
birabāhu thāṭhaku ye māile bhīmasena |
rājādhi abhiṣeka karāile āpaṇe tahiṁ
birāṭa rājyaku āmbhe ailu gosāiṁ |
āsthāna māḍi basante birāṭa kala kopa
uttara kumār atāku kahila sarūpa |
teṇu yāiṁ birāṭa ye paśilā śaraṇa
boilā bho deba mote karasi karaṇa |
mohara duhitā ye achai uttarābāḷī
abhimanyukuu pradāna muṁ karibi hasta toḷi |
tebe mora aparādha hoiba khaṇḍaṇa
ẏemanta boli birāṭa boilā bacana |
śuṇiṇa ṭhākura ye sanamata kale
rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁku āṇa yā boli mote pramantile |
birāṭa duhitā ye uttarā kumārī
abhimanyukuu pradāna he kariba debahati |

lg.l: āho haṁsadhvaja rājā tu aśvagoti gheni yā yā | 113 |
sambhara saṁpade se hastinā rājyare basibe | 114 |
haṁsābaḷī parbataku se aśva gheni galāka taḍati | 116 |
se haṁsadhvaja rājā tahiṁ chāḍilā aśvagoṭi
sahadebakaiṁ gheni deba bijaẏe bainetrara piṭhi | 117 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa sahadeba śate sahasrajaṇa praḷamba karanti | 120 |
karapatra yoḍi bahuta binoẏī karai tusti | 121 |
subhadrā abhimanyuku gheni bijaẏa kara catrapāṇi | 123 |
gobinde boile svāmi uṭha ho chāla yibā
sahadeba boilā ye rāma caraṇe pariṇāmi
tumbhara na gale bibhā nohai deba svāmī | 125 |
mattabhoḷa puruṣa tu sadā parama yogī
śrījagannāthaṁka bacane rāma gatadosa kale tejyā
samadaṇḍa sāja boli āgyāṁ dile debarājā | 127 |
kukura baṁśara rāja ye aṭe anādhr̥ṣṭa
pañchu marbhmata ratha ye tāhara saṁgati | 132 |
haiheẏa baṁśe se rājā ye uddhaba
padmeka yoddhā gheni se baḍāi sambharba | 133 |
cauhāṇa baṁśara rājā ye aṭe upananda
sāgare rathī tāhāra mukuṭa bandha yoddhā tinibr̥nda | 134 |
ẏe bidhire satabaṁśa rājāmāne ratha maṇḍi
kareṇa chela catra asipatra konta ye bhūṣaṇḍi | 135 |
śrī baḷadeba haḷamūṣaḷa gheni bije karanti yahiṁ | 138 |
ye yāhāra āẏudha se dhaichanti kare
aneka ratna aḷaṁkāramāna ye ābharaṇa śarīre | 141 |
dakṣiṇe saunanda mūṣaḷa ye bāmakare bajrahaḷa
bāratā pāiṇa deba dharma ye yujheṣṭhi
maghdeśa matsadeśa pāñchāḷa maruta deśara saini
anugraha nātha prasanna hoa deba svāmī | 148 |
gobinde boile birāṭa atianta bhāgya tohora pūrbe
yujheṣṭhi ṭhākura ye bijekale āsi ẏebe | 151 |
śī baḷarāme bije dharma yujheṣṭhiṁka kati | 152 |
yujheṣṭhi baḷarāmaṁka chāmure bijaẏe deba hari
beḷe muhiṁ svāmīṁka seba karibi sannidhānu
gobinde boile ho tohora yehne bhāgya
tohora āmbhara pūrbe achai ẏesaneka bandhu yoga | 156 |
kara yāiṁ utsaba ho bibhāra bidhāne
śuddha saṣṭika stambha ye kaṇaẏa chāẏeṇi
tathira upare panti panti mukutā ratnamaṇi | 159 |
śate śate panti hīrā māṇikya tahiṁ sañchi | 160 |
kaṇaẏa patre chāẏeṇī yehne diśai mārataṇḍa | 161 |

div.note: śuddha saṣṭika stambha ye marakata chāẏeṇi |

chāpa sambharba madhyare candrāpa goṭi
ẏe ratane nabalakṣa tahiṁ uṭhi |
ẏe bidhire nabalakṣa āṭha thamba tnikoṭi |(ṇa, da)

lg.l: kanakara rua paṭā nīḷā ratne śobhā
tahiṁra upare ye kaṇaẏa rasāṇa patra ghaṭi | 164 |
aneka dhana bhaṇḍāra ye dhvaṁsila birāṭai
se kalaśa goṭike lakṣemāḍha subarṇṇa koṣai | 168 |
se kalaśa upare nete patāṅga goṭiẏe
ki aba ratana ye lāgila pañchu nidhi | 172 |
uttarā bibhā boli jagta deśāure kahanti | 175 |
naiṣedha deśara nr̥pati bhmabi ye bāhāna
daṇḍa sāji ailā se tule bahuta dhana | 176 |
baḍāi sambhare se rājā ailaka caḷī | 177 |
daṇḍa gheni aila se tuleṇa lakṣebhara dhana | 178 |
bhanupura rāja nāma karṇṇa ye keśarī
samadaṇḍa gheni sambharbe aila pāṇidrabya ratha chāri bhari | 179 |
atuṭa abandhyā āṇilā se chārilakṣa godhana | 180 |
pāṇi maṇḍaḷara rājā padma ye keśarī
saṅge āṇilā se pāṇidrabya sāta ratha | 183 |
bahuta sainya gheni se aila taḍati | 187 |
lakṣe ratha subarṇṇara gheni kala pādapūjā | 188 |
karṇṇa śakuni bālhika tule āsantu kurubīre | 190 |
ẏehā nei debu tu rājā dhr̥tarāṣṭi | 191 |
godhana haraṇuṁ se ye paḷāi ailā kurupati
akṣata gheni yāiṁ prabeśa bāmadeba prohita | 196 |
matsadeśara bāratā boli yāiṁ ḍagara jaṇāiṁ
āsānu āgyāṁ dilā āsantu bega hoi | 197 |
binaẏa uttara dileka nei bāmadeba dhāti | 198 |

div.note:
“śate sahasra daṇḍa praḷamba śatebāra” pādāṁśa pare
‘da’re bhinma pāṭha :–
ārogya kuśaḷa ye āmbhara samasta
tumbhara kalyāṇe kṣame āmbhe bañchichuṁ pañchu bhrātha | (para pr̥ṣṭāre abaśiṣṭāṁśa)

lg.l: tumbhe se ẏethaku ye aṭa adhikārī | 201 |
tumbhe mohora pitā thibana utsabara kāḷe
ẏemanta boli lekha deichanti yujheṣṭhi mahīpāḷe | 202 |
karṇṇa śakuni dhuśāsana pāile baḍa byathā | 203 |
sañjaẏaku āgyāṁ dile sāja bege thāṭha | 204 |
sājahua bhīṣma dorṇe bahana hoi yibā | 205 |
abhimanyu bibhā matsadeśe yibā ki taḍati | 206 |
mānagobinda boilā yāa ho tumbhe tāta
samara śrame ailu āmbhara abastā bahuta | 207 |
nāsti boli kari rājā paśilā antapure
yoddhāẏe saja hoi āu nuāranti ḍare | 208 |

div.note: (pūrbapr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
abhimanyuku birāṭā kumārī hoicchi bibhāyoga
bho pitā śuṇiṇa tumbhe āsiba udabega |
āpaṇe bijaẏe ẏeṭhāre kariba dantadhārī
tumbhe pitā barile bhāgya hoibanā mohari |

lg.l: daśa sahasra ratha batiśa sahasra hastī
ẏeteka sainya gheni ye ambikāra suta
bhīṣma droṇe gheni rāja bhāḷai ẏekanta | 211 |
tumbhe yāi kaha yā driyodhanara āge
samadaṇḍa sambahre gheni dvārakāiṁ galeni debarājā | 215 |
babu sahodre abhāba tu nohanā aprīti | 216 |
bhīṣma droṇa gheniṇa bege yāu tāta
mote yibāku āu na bola bahuta | 218 |
bhīṣma droṇa tule gheniṇa ye thāṭha | 219 |
aneka pabitra padārthe anne gabha sukhī
debe bhoḷa houchanti yebaṇa anna dekhi | 223 |
muṇohi mandire basi se bhojana karanti | 224 |
sudeba boli brāhmaṇeka ye sūpakāra baṁśa
doharuṁka prasanne tāṁkara samasta amr̥ta pākarasa | 225 |
yebaṇa rājāra yoddhā pātra amanātye yete | 227 |
samaste praśaṁsā kale birṭa sādhu sādhu
anādi puruṣaku tu pāilu ẏebe bandhu | 231 |
bāṇijya nāme karaṇa śubha nāme yoga
tāracandra beḷā ye rohiṇī ghare bhoga | 234 |
beni lakṣa brahmaṇa gheniṇa mārakaṇḍa brahmabettā
abhimanyu bibhā śuṇi prabeśa hoileka āsi | 240 |
sanaka satātana sananta ye manu bibhāṇḍaka
agasti janaka sumantaka biśvāmitra paulasti aneka | 241 |
bibhā utsabakāḷe samaste prabeśa hoileka āsi | 242 |
binaẏa bhābe khaṭanti yujheṣṭhi tāṁka pāśe | 244 |

div.note: āsiṇa prabeśa hoile bhāgyabara mahāgyāṁtā | (ṇa, cha)

lg.l: bho tāta daẏā mote kiṁpā chāḍilā driyodhana | 249 |
se mohara sodara muṁ tāku kalāi kebaṇa doṣa
putra bibhā śuṇi se kiṁpe nohilā haraṣa | 250 |
tu aba ki na jāṇu se samastaṁ baḍa duṣṭa | 251 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tāta duṣṭa ye hoile
samaẏa se bratai nā asajjana hoile | 252 |
mahāmahā duṣṭa ta tāta thile ẏehi bhūmi
kaṁsa keśī aghā praḷambā kadambā ambā kāḷa ye naumi | 253 |
jārā nārakā kāḷa yabana bāṇā bajranābha
pāṇḍabāsura nirbāta kapaca ẏemāne pāile parābhaba | 254 |
ẏemāne sabhiẏeṁ nāśa galeka nāhiṁki tāta
ati duṣṭapaṇa basudhā na sahai bahuta | 255 |
gobinde boile yujheṣṭhi bane pāila ki bāḍa dukha
svāmi āmbhe se nāśilu kaṁsa ugrasena chāṭa
abantīpure śāntipanī paṇḍā āmbhaṁku paḍhāithile pāṭha | 257 |
duibhāi hoi āmbhe ye galu pāṭha paḍhi
putrahuṁ adhika kari pāṭha se paḍhāi
niaḷa se aneka bidyā āmbhe sādhya kalu tahiṁ | 259 |
hr̥dagate bismarai se āmbhara pāṭha paḍhaṁ | 260 |
bābu jāḷa nāhiṁ āja yiba ki bhāi beni
śukhilā kāṭha kichu āṇa ho banu gheni | 264 |
koṭhāra khaṇḍiẏe āmbhanta diasi go māẏe
ẏehikṣaṇi āṇibu āmbhe kāṭha ye guḍāẏe | 266 |
saṁsārikā doṣe se bahuta dukha labhanti | 269 |
banasta bhitaraku se galu kāṭha pāḍi | 270 |
bābhiẏe duheṁ duigocchi kāṭha āṇima boiel | 271 |
kṣaṇake biśrāma se na kalā sedinara | 273 |
mahāśāḷabr̥kṣa ye goṭāẏe ghora gahana ye śākhā
jana manuṣya nāhiṁ benibhāi basiachu ẏekā | 275 |
baḷarāme troṭe thāiṁ ḍāka dianti muku
bāā baraṣaṇe se garjana dianti mehā
śītabāẏe bhoge hāta goḍa kampai śarīra
āradina beḷa hoilā ki āsi deḍha ye pradura | 280 |
kāryyakari nohilā kicchi pāibā baḍa lajjā | 282 |
pāilu kañchā ḍhāḷa śāḷabr̥kṣa ye goṭiẏe
ciriṇa duibhāi ye ghenilu gocchiẏe gocchiẏe | 283 |
āradina hoilā beḷa sthira dui ye prahara
kāṭha gheni heḷā na kari dhāiṁlu dhātikāra | 284 |
tāhāṁkara kāndante ye āmbhe pāilu baḍa lajjā
apāramate kahante se śoka kale tejyā | 286 |

div.note:
āradina hoiacchi thira arddhabeḷā
gheniṇa ailu kāṭha gheni na kariṇa heḷā | (jha, ka, ṇa, da, cha, ṭha,)

lg.l: dukha sukha ẏekata karai mahata prāṇī | 288 |
baḷarāma boile ho na pāṛa ẏekathā
bibhāra bidhāna ye paśa ẏebe śubhe
kaṇaẏa chāmuṇḍuā ye saṣṭi kara pīḍha
hātheṇa khañjhilā se ye mārāga śuddhamaṇi | 297 |

div.note:
“birāṭara āge ye kahinti bāsudebe” ehi pāṭha pare
‘cha, ṭha’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
dhr̥tarāṣṭra yujheṣṭhi ābara bhīṣma droṇa
mane mahādukhita se kaḷeka āpaṇa |

lg.l: se sabhā madhye ye bijaẏe yujheṣṭhideba ādi
pāñchalakṣa ratna khañjhiḍha kaṇaẏa dibya berī | 298 |
tathi taḷe basichanti nanda upananda ugrasena basudeba
se berīra upare ye ruya ruṣimānanta gheni
pāñchāḷa mumaranta se koḷe chanti gheni | 301 |
pūrbeṇa birāṭa ye paści me kirīṭī
samasta nr̥pa ruṣi moḍhe āgyāṁ debā
heu heu boliṇa ye sarbe āgyāṁ dile
baraṇa berī madhye se bije kale yāiṁ | 307 |
dhaumya purohiḍhe ye paḍhile haraṣe bedadhūni

div.note:
“baraṇa bidhire deśakāḷa bokyaku uchāra” ehi pāṭha
pare “ṭa, ka, da, ga, ñjha, jha, pothire adhikā mahābākya
rsakaḷpa achha :–
oñ biṣṇūrbiṣṇū rbiṣṇūḥ
gaṅgādyāḥ sarito(?)trāgachata |
gaṅgeca yamune caiba godābari sarasvati,
narmade sindhū kāberi jaḷe(?)smin sannidhiṁkuru ||
kurukṣetra gaẏā gaṅgā prabhāsa puṣṭharāṇi ca |
etāni puṇyaḍhīrthāni saṅkaḷpakāḷe bhabantyiha ||
oñ biṣṇū rbiṣṇū rbiṣṇūḥ |
śukjāmbaradharaṁ biṣṇūṁ śaśībarṇṇaṁ caturbhr̥jam |
prasannabadanaṁdhyāẏe tsarbabighnāpaśāntaẏe ||
smr̥te sakaḷakalyāṇaṁ bhājanaṁ yatra jāẏate |
puruṣaṁ tamajaṁ yaṁ nityaṁ brajāmi śaraṇaṁ harim ||
śañkhacatragadāpāṇe dvārikāniḷaẏācyūta |
gobinda puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa māṁ śaraṇāgatam ||
oñ biṣṇūrbiṣṇū rbiṣṇū |
adya iha puṇyehani biśiṣṭa bhūpradeśe
makara māse śukḷapakṣe nabamyāṁtithau br̥hasṭhatibāsare
gohiṇīnāma nakṣatre makararāśausthite bhāskare
br̥ṣarāśau sthite candramase lokaṁ yathāsthā nābasthiteṣū
bhaumādigrahayoga lagnakaraṇa muhūrttakāṁ śakeṣū
ebaṁ bidhibiśeṣaṇa biśiṣṭāẏāṁ puṇyatithau
kauśikagotra śrīmāna birāṭadeba śarmāhaṁ kauśikagotrāẏāḥ
mama duhiruḥ uttarā kanyāẏāḥ pradānāẏa baraṇabidhi karmāṅga-
saṅkaḷpamahaṁ kurbīẏa |

lg.l: prohite bākya paṛhanti kale pañchudebatā pūjā | 313 |
satī sābitrī yenhe diśai tenhe śobhā | 317 |
hāra niāḷī ye mukutā sari bhari
śañkha mahurī ye bibidha tūra bādya
neiṇa samarpile ye kanyāra nija māthe | 322 |

div.note: “prohite bākya paṛhanti kale ẏeṭhāre bariṇa pūjā | (ka, da, ṭa, ga, ñjha)”

lg.l: ẏemanta bidhāne ye bāñcchā kalyāṇa gheni
prohite boile ho bara āsu ẏebe
arjyūna kumāra ye dibya beśa hoi
ki abā airābrata teji āsai surapati | 327 |
ki abā rati tejyā kari ailā anaṅga
ẏesaneka diśuacchi ye abhimanyū dibya aṅga | 328 }
hāra niāḷī padaka tāḍa ye toḍhara
pāda śauca karāiḷe se ẏenheka pūjābidha | 332 |
mathāre dharilā se kariṇa dibya sūjā | 333 |
paẏara pūjā sāriṇa ghenilā susañcha dibya gabhā
bastra śrīphaḷa gubāka ye abhimanyu haste dile | 338 |
prohita mantri dile tāha pinddhale arjunara bāḷa | 341 |
jhīna basana goṭiẏeka kare ruṣi gheni
bhīṣma dhr̥tiraṣṭra bidura añjaẏe pāñchāḷa deśa raẏe
bābu dhanyadhanya puṇi se birāṭa mahīpāḷa | 351 |
candana parihāsye nei tahiṁ dile chaḍā | 352 |
abhimanyu bibhākaḷe matsadeśe pandara sahasra nr̥pati
ẏete rājā sambhare miḷile ghara barajāti | 353 |
kuṁkuma lepana sabu purūṣa ye stirī
rāja pātra yoddhā amanātya bādyakāra ādikari | 355 |
kuṁkuma lepana sāri tiḷa aẏeṁḷā maradi
bicitra deba nabare deba muṇohire bije | 358 |
nija mandire muṇohire bijaẏe kale rāmahari | 360 |
yahiṁre se nāẏaka ye aṭanti debahari | 362 |
niti āñchalakṣa bhāra yāhāra dudha dahi | 363 |
tāhāṁkara bhojana abā ke kariba anta | 364 |
yāhāra yeteka icchā se bhmañjanti samaste
piṭhāra barṇṇamāna ke karu hāde lekhā
keuṁṇa apūrba tāhāṁku ye śrīkr̥ṣṇa yāhāṁku sākhā | 368 |
